info.name: Unseen Sunscreen Invisible Broad Spectrum SPF 40 PA +++
info.description: What it is:  The original 100% invisible, weightless, scentless sunscreen that delivers broad spectrum SPF protection & doubles as a primer with a natural finish.Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and OilySkincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, and Dullness and Uneven TextureFormulation: GelHighlighted Ingredients:- Complex Derived from Meadowfoam Seed: Helps increase hydration levels, resulting in a more even skin texture.- Red Algae: Helps protect against blue light emitted by electronic devices.- Frankincense: Helps to provide a soothing effect. Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free, and gluten-free.What Else You Need to Know:  This iconic bestseller was created to eliminate any reason you have to not wear SPF — it doesn't smell like sunscreen, it doesn't leave a white cast (ever!), it doesn't feel heavy or greasy & it's free of pore-clogging oils. Plus, it doubles as a makeup-gripping primer.

Plus, it doubles as a makeup-gripping primer.

So at first i was so excited for this sunscreen. No white cast at all is my dream, but it quickly went all downhill. It smells super BAD. Its like smearing whipped baking grease on your face. just not AS greasy. its just not it.

Having very oily skin, most sunscreens I have tried tend to exacerbate the oiliness. This is one of the very few that doesn't. It has a consistency similar to a primer and mattifies my skin. There's no white cast and it is pretty much invisible. Also, a lot of SPF products contain at least some form of alcohol and/or fragrance but there's none to be found in this. The one thing that lets it down is the silicones, and we're not talking a small amount, there is a lot in here! I find I can get away with using it one morning, but if I attempt again on the following day, my skin reacts by breaking out in small hives throughout the day. And if I attempt a third day, I start to see bumps appear, which is very likely a result of the silicones clogging my pores up. The only way I can use up what's left in the tube is by A) using very occasionally, or B) if I don't have the time to apply a primer after my sun block, this makes a good makeup base/sunblock 2 in 1. Either way I have to be sure to strictly limit my usage of it. The fact that it doesn't leave any sign of where it's been applied may sound like a good thing, but it actually makes it very tricky to know where it has and hasn't been applied. I end up using more than needed to try and ensure even coverage. And that in turn means more silicones clogging up my skin. Without them this would be a fantastic product. I really hope they bring out a silicone-free version of this someday.

I've used Supergoop's Unseen Sunscreen every day for a couple of years. It absolutely protects your skin from the sun. It sits very nicely over almost any moisturizer and other products, and sits well under makeup as well (I usually use a primer over it, but probably not strictly necessary). The texture is very interesting and has a bit of a mattifying effect at first. After a few hours, I do notice it getting oily so I have to do some dabbing, but this is less extreme in cooler months and after getting used to it. Don't think I'd switch to anything else unless something amazing comes along. As an aside, I have microbladed eyebrows and I use it to protect the pigment in the sun/in general and it is fantastic for that purpose.

reviews.review_text: I love my supergoop unseen sunscreen. It is clear which is nice because a lot of sunscreens leave a white cast. I need to buy a new bottle!

A lot of fear-mongering around some of the ingredients in here...shea butter, red algae, and dimethicone are amazing ingredients, including for acne-prone skin, and are not considered comedogenic! I have acne-prone, sensitive, and oily skin and this doesn't cause me any clogging (with that being said, not all ingredients are for everybody, and patch testing is important if you're worried about breakouts!)

PROS:
-it has a very velvety texture, almost like a pore-filling primer
-truly undetectable on the skin, which I loveeee
-does not feel drying
-virtually no scent (I loveee this as someone who 1) hates fragrance in skincare and 2) does not like the typical sunscreen scent)

CONS:
-This is not a sunscreen for makeup :/ I found that it separated under my concealers/foundations so it is not ideal for me, personally (hence the 4 stars)
-There is Boswellia Serrata resin in here, which can be a sensitizing ingredient (even if it does have someee soothing benefits) and I did feel some stinging while applying....I'd rather they opt for a soothing ingredient without the potentiality for irritation, like allantoin or aloe
-Very natural/matte finish, which is not necessarily a con, but I do like a dewy, hydrated look to the skin

Overall, I would definitely recommend for people who do not wear makeup a ton...just be careful if you are extremely sensitive to fragrance or essential oils, etc. because of that Frankincense :/

I love this so much! It holds in your makeup, protects your skin, and its very moisturizing. I would recommend this to anyone, but especially kids and teens. As you get older, unfortunately you can develop skin cancer from being in the sun too long, but with this, kids don't have to worry about that! Overall, its just amazing.

The consistency of this is just like the Smashbox photo finish primer, and it’s a lot cheaper AND has SPF. I use this as my primer and I’ll never go back! I have dryish skin and I use the Nars foundation on top.

I wanted to love this product. at first it looked great on my skin, but after an hour it started separating under my makeup. for reference i have dry + combo skin. i ended up with red bumps around my nose + 
chin too… not worth the hype
Love the glow screen but didn't like this one, I felt it was super oily and made my face greecy so I was really disappointed in this

Loyal, repeat user for years. As someone who is passionate about the science behind dermatology, and as a medical student training to be a future physician, I believe in a wellness-approach to skincare. So, of course, a broad spectrum sunscreen was a must.

However, I must admit that for years growing up as a tennis player I abused my skin with hours of playing in the sun all the while finding every excuse not to apply the white, chalky physical sunscreens my mom nagged me to use. My naturally tan skin color loathed the ghost-like appearance that physical sunscreens gave me, and the fact that I never got sunburned further stroked my arrogance against applying sunscreen. 

It was only as a 20-something medical student that I woke up one day realizing the gradual demise of my youth and purchased the 'unseen sunscreen' by supergoop that had forever been on my wishlist for its transparent formulation and UV protective properties. 

Goes on smoothly, completely unnoticeable once on. What more? Coats my skin like a primer and highlights the contours of my face in the most luxurious balmy way.

I use it daily and have not had any bad reactions. I apply a chickpea-size amount to my whole face, neck, and ears.

I do wish it was a bit cheaper as the tube runs out quickly if you use it as is recommended for sunscreens, which is the only reason I have deducted a star.
reviews.review_title: A loyal, slightly pricey romance worth the buzz

reviews.review_text: I love the way this feels on my skin but it broke me out. Tried it three times spaced out and each time I broke out. Everybody’s skin reacts to things differently though. So I wouldn’t advise against trying it.

I like it because it wears so well under makeup and doesn’t make me look greasy but after trial and error its not for my super acne prone skin. Breaks me out
Probably the best sunscreen I’ve ever used. Love the texture, the way it spreads, how the skin feels and looks afterwards. I’m very prone to sunscreen breakouts and this one gives me zero pimples!

Prob 5* in the fall/winter when it’s less humid here- I have an oily t zone, and I look *very* shiny by evening now.   But it feels great going on and invisible, love high spf!!  Great for your scalp/part
Works pretty well but it leaves a greasy feeling at first.
This sunscreen broke me out and clogged my pores. It also burned my eyes. I would not recommend if you have sensitive skin or acne prone skin.
I can't recommend this enough! Love how it feels on the skin and that it is so lightweight. I use it daily and is now a must have for me.
I wish I didn’t like this as much as I do. I use it over moisturizer as a sunblock and primer. Whether I put foundation over it or not, my skin looks great.
reviews.review_title: Wish I didn’t, but I do

reviews.review_text: Ordered through Kohls website, was sent a tube of sunscreen that expired in April (2 months ago). Called them to let them know, they placed an order to send me a replacement, and I got another tube expired, dated for April as well!

I needed a new sunscreen and this one had great reviews. I have normal skin and have never had any problems with dryness. I wear light makeup if any at all. So i am unsure why his product made my skin dry and flaky.
I love this stuff it has an amazing texture. For me it is my go to for face sunscreen because every morning I swim for 1 hour in the sun and I rarely get sunburned.
reviews.review_title: 3rd time purchasing and I LOVE IT

reviews.review_text: Soy de piel mixta, este protector queda perfecto para mi piel cuando se siente seca o grasa. Su cobertura es INVISIBLE y es muy FÁCIL APLICAR, se desliza como mantequilla, sin ser grasoso. Es una maravilla no tener que estrujar mi carita al querer difuminarlo. SECA RÁPIDO, además sirve como PRIMER para un maquillaje de diario. Pero lo más importante, PROTEGE la piel de mi rostro. Que más puedo pedir!!!
reviews.review_title: SOY LATINA Y ME ENCANTA ESTE PSF!!!

reviews.review_text: Idk if it’s working lol but it’s so smooth going on, looks like  Vaseline but isn’t greasy at all. Feels like you have nothing on and it does help with my oil control and sweat
We have been using this and it is not greasy. Very effective

Tried for several months winter + summer time. It feels weird on, it has a matte finish but feels greasy. Also noticed that anytime I wear it I break out maybe a bump or two. I am a bit oily on my t-zone. It’s good on its own if you’re out in the sum but not with makeup. Makeup doesn’t last as long and I find myself having to touch up constantly vs when I use the Native face sunscreen.
reviews.review_title: Too greasy not good with makeup

reviews.review_text: The best sunblock ever! Dr. Alexis Stephens suggested this sunblock for black women and I love it! It goes on smoothly and layers well with my skin care routine. It pills a little bit if you use HA but if HAis blended in another serum it does pretty well.  This is officially my staple for all year sun protection
I love this product so much i’m almost out . It feels like literally nothing on my face and is not oily at all . This is my go to sunscreen .
I've been using the product since it was recommended during a perk facial and it has worked wonders.  The sun is almost my friend because of the sunscreen.

This is the worst sunscreen I have ever used! 
It stings your eyes and left a hyperpigmentation scar on my forehead and my nose. If I could give this product 0 Stars I would!
I use Chanel foundation . This sunscreen does Not make my makeup pill !!!

This is my absolute fav daily sunscreen and actually allows me to put it on every day. Other brand that leave a sticky white cast give me the ick. This is smooth and gel like, no stick and invisible. Love it!

Took a star off for being expensive for how little you get. Another for stinging my eyes, even after I’ve washed my face I still feel it. If you sweat a lot of have greasy skin this might not be great for you. Won’t repurchase by May try their mineral one
This sunscreen is wonderful, very light and it works like a primer 😎

This is my fave sunscreen ever, and I’ve tried a lot. As someone with extremely cystic + acne prone, sensitive combination skin this ￼stuff does not break me out whatsoever and leaves no residue on my face. Applies so well under make up and does not leave me greasier. Also, there is barely a cent at all. Only thing that I wish was different is the price.
reviews.review_title: Holy grail. has never broken me out.silky smooth<3

reviews.review_text: I like the texture and everything about this product, but the reason I gave five star is that the company has reduced the size to 2/3 while keeping the price fixed. It used to be 70 ml and now it is 50!
I love this product and I think it works really well this sunscreen didn’t last me super long but it’s only because I got a small bottle. It’s very protective and lightweight

This product caused acne and did not offer any protection at all. I tried this before and thought maybe it was an unrelated problem, so decided to give it a second chance. It is definitely the product. I don't wear a lot of makeup in the warmer months, so acne hasn't been a huge concern lately. After going weeks without any acne, I used this and now have several breakouts. Also, I used regular sunscreen on exposed skin of my arms and legs and applied this to my face and neck. I was only outside for about 40 minutes to maybe an hour. My arms and legs did not burn, but my face and neck definitely are burned. I wanted to like this product, because the scent is mild and I love the smooth texture and how well it performs under makeup. Unfortunately, this was a miss for me.
reviews.review_title: My fair skin did not benefit from this one at all.

reviews.review_text: This product is terrible, do not use it, it’s like a poison, I had a terrible reaction! Do use chemical sun screen, please. I learned my lesson the hard way
I LOVE this sunscreen! I use it daily on my face, no white-cast and rubs in nicely! I feel protected with this on and ready for the day!
This sunscreen is overpriced. It had a very greasy feeling when applying onto my skin. It also broke my skin out. I am giving it 2 stars because it is good to use under makeup.
reviews.review_title: Greasy and Broke my skin out

reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! I have tried many different sunscreens on my face and every time I’d still end up with a sunburn even if just a little! Today I tried this one and I came home for the first time ever after a long day fishing without even the slightest sunburn! My face is not red even a little bit right now I love it!
El mejor bloqueador solar para piel mixta. Voy para mi cuarto envase, no lo cambio por nada. Excelente para utilizar debajo del maquillaje.
good but expensive ngl, just buy the full size i know it’s expensive but this doesn’t last long rly or just buy the trader joe’s one. but it’s an amazing sunscreen but not sure abt the price
I am very surprised by the negative reviews. This is the best sunscreen I have ever tried. It does feel like a primer. The texture reminds me of Photo Finish primer by Smashbox

I’ve used several sunscreens & this is the best so far. It works great under makeup (almost acts as a primer) & isn’t oily. I have sensitive skin & it has not reacted poorly. Was skeptical after reading reviews but glad I bought it!
Terrible! Feels gross on the skin and smells very bad. Weird texture. Would not recommend!
Used this once and got a rash everywhere I applied it. Four days later, the rash is still not gone. Would not recommend!!

I wanted to love this product. It has a super silicone feel (which I may be in the minority but I love), left no cast, and went on fine under my makeup. I’m not really sure how effective it is for sun protection as I don’t go outside without a hat but I assume fine.  However, it broke me out SO badly that there’s no way I could continue using. I never, ever have acne and all of a sudden I was getting cysts in my driest areas like my forehead, cheeks, and under my eyes so I know it wasn’t hormonal. This was the only changed product. So sadly will be returning.
reviews.review_title: Great product in theory but NOT for sensitive skin

reviews.review_text: Love this product! Super lightweight and goes on so smoothly. I wear it under my makeup and it doesn’t get patchy at all. I do wear a light-medium coverage foundation and make sure my face is hydrated so I it doesn’t get dried out.

I was super excited to try this product, I have oily skin and wanted something sheer under my makeup. It didn’t look too bad under all of it but I’ve had acne like crazy the past month because of it. Would not recommend, especially for sensitive skin.

I don’t Like this product. When I put some on my face it felt so rubbery and felt like Vaseline. I didn’t worry about that for a sec but then it started peeling. When I was putting on my blush it started having tiny peels.  I would rather get the glow sunscreen
This product doesn't do the job in the hot sun. I've tried it multiple times and each time I end up burnt.
I love supergoop sunscreen but this is worst in terms of consistency plus it not effective

love love love! I like how it doesn’t leave a white cast and blends seamlessly leaving my skin with a beautiful glow. it’s greasy for about 5 minutes after applidtation but other than that, incredible product. will be repurchase
Initially I loved this sunscreen. But after a couple months I noticed it wasn’t protecting me at all. I now have a ton of sun spots and I spent less time in the sun this year then during Covid.
I was so excited to try this sunscreen and it was a big let down. This product doesn’t do well under makeup. Makeup peels off.
Love it! Goes on clear and little pleasant smell. I use my Paula’s Choice exfoliate, Goop Sunscreen, and Tachas moisturizer, and Laura Mercier tinted moisturizer. Love the morning routine.
reviews.review_title: Don’t Leave Home Without It On My Face

reviews.review_text: This sunscreen is perfect. It blends in with no effort and leaves skin looking really healthy. It is a must have to wear every morning and to reapply!!
i like that it doesnt leave a white cast, and the sunscreen itself is good. however, when i wear makeup over the product it patches up and does not blend smoothly.
I love this i got so many complements on my skin. It doesn't have a white cast and smells good. Perfect for the beach or everyday  and works well under makeup.

I use this under my primer and it feels really nice on the skin! It feels moisturizing and it’s def a new go two in my skin prep for makeup. It’s also sensitive skin friendly and hasn’t caused any irritation. Will be rebuying
Best sunscreen ever, every sunscreen u have used made my skin breakout so bad but this one it’s just my holy grail

The back of the bottle claims to be reef safe, but since it has the active ingredient octocrylene it is NOT reef safe. Octocrylene leads to coral bleaching and is toxic to fish and the marine environment.
I do like that this product is clear and goes on invisible. It sits well under makeup however I feel like I am aware that I have it on. It doesn't feel necessarily heavy, but I always feel kind of grimy with it on my face. I will use the bottle I have but will not be repurchasing.
reviews.review_title: NOT reef safe like it claims, product is just ok

reviews.review_text: I’ve been on a quest for the best spray face sunblock, have researched, bought so many. Still keep coming back to this one though even tho it’s not a spray. My skin is dry and sensitive. Can be hard to gauge if you’re fully covered since it goes on so clear.
reviews.review_title: One of my all time favorites

reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product. Been buying it for a couple of years now & love that it’s so lightweight and completely invisible. My teenagers (boy and girl) have recently started using it as well - it doesn’t seem to cause pimples, and they are prone to zits.

this sunscreen protects me from the sun very well. its buildable and looks good on my skin. although it looks good, its very oily. i have dry skin so it isnt too bad, but if you dont it could br a problemm.
I use it every day and haven’t burnt yet! As a redhead this is HUGE! I also suffer from cystic acne, this was actually recommended by Curology for me!
Love it but when I wear contacts I get a bad reaction. My eyes feel super irritated and I have to end up taking them out early.
this protected my skin and was amazing under makeup but the smell was very overwhelming
The only spf that doesn’t break me out, or leaves my skin feeling/looking greasy. Second time purchasing it now, I love it and it lasts long too!!
reviews.review_title: the only spf I’ve ever liked

reviews.review_text: My favorite every day sunscreen when I don’t feel like wearing makeup.

I can't speak to its effectiveness as a sunblock but the texture just doesn't feel right. It's clear and feels exactly the same as a very siliconey primer. For me it just felt awful on my skin, slippery, and felt too much like applying straight silicone.

I have very dry and sensitive skin, and somehow, it made my skin oily. It is definitely not worth the money, but im not telling you you can't buy it, I can't stop you, but I'm saying it's not worth your money.
reviews.review_title: IT IS NOT WORTH THE MONEY

reviews.review_text: feels great on my skin. I will get this again.it goes on great

So I got a sample of this and loved the texture - reviews were glowing etc etc, and I bought the bigger size and after about a month and a half I realized my skin was breaking out BAD and I couldn’t figure out why. This was the culprit. As soon as I stopped using it and went back to my old SPF (Paula’s Choice), I stopped breaking out. I then realized, after taking a closer look at the ingredients, that it must’ve been the silicones in this that was clogging my pores and making it so my skin couldn’t breathe. I wouldn’t say I have highly sensitive skin either.

I’ve tried a lot of spf products. This stuff is my favorite by a landslide! It’s SO light, has zero sunscreen smell, and works so nicely under makeup. I’ve even used it on beach and pool days on my face and not had any sunburn!
I don’t know if it’s a sensory problem on my part but the way this feels on my hand and face is so odd, I prefer the lotions over these. Do not have this issue with the flow screen.

The texture is kinda strange and it kinda smells like bug spray but it makes the skin look both mate and a little glowy at the same time, which surprised me. Besides the smell and texture, it's a great product
after first getting this i thought it was going to be great but it’s not the best because it is very oily so if you have oily skin it’s not the best
I really love this! It's completely invisible, totally lightweight, and even works underpinned moisturizer. I got a small size, but plan to get a full size very soon!

I love this sunscreen because it is lightweight, not greasy, not white and has a matte finish.
You can wear it under or over make up
This is such a great product !! It doesn’t leave a white cast, it’s non greasy and has spf 40!! Great for combination or oily skin! Definitely a must have, go buy right now !

I absolutely love this product. It does exactly what it is supposed to do and go onto your skin in a matte finish and feel so light weight like it’s not even there. It sets quick enough. I used this on a trip to Thailand and it stood up the sweltering heat in the city and on the beach.
reviews.review_title: A must have for a light and clear sunscreen!

reviews.review_text: Best face sunscreen I’ve ever used!! I hate that greasy feeling most sunscreens leave. This does NOT do that. I don’t wear much makeup so I love the matte finish. You could wear it alone or under your makeup.
After using this product for about week I started breaking out, I don’t recommend it

I bought this product a few weeks ago, have been using since. Love the texture and despite not being super light, I feel it doesn't weights either and adds a very welcome glow to my skin. My skin is oily-normal and I am 35.
I love this product. It is not heavy on the skin and protects well from the sun. easy to wear under makeup
My tried and true suncreen for my face.  Plays well with foundation.   Have tried others but always return to SUPERGOOP! unseen sunscreen!
Completely mattified my combination skin (with acne), did not have a white cast, but didn’t last on my skin as long as I wanted it to last. Overall would use again!
Feels nice but I prefer a dewy finish because I have combination skin.  Finish blurs and mattes.
reviews.review_title: Nice but not for combination skin

reviews.review_text: It has no smell and thats fine but the texture is gross and its overpriced for what you get.
I have been using this for a long time. I especially like how it can be used as a primer which is one less step for me. It is non greasy and it goes on easily.
A must have for darker skin tones! I have been using this for the past 3 years and haven’t found anything better! This is a staple in my skin care routine
I wanted to like it, but it just felt super greasy on my face. Had to return.

This sunscreen is fabulous! I use it every single day and it’s so good! At first it feels very oily but as you rub it into the skin it leaves the t soft and moisturized and isn’t caky at all! I love it and would recommend !
I despise the smell. It is awful, smells like sweaty feet, and I wonder if I just got a bad batch.
My face feels totally raw after using this. Washing it off was so painful and even just water causes so much pain. Please do a patch test before using this!!!

Not a fan. It has that dimethicone feel that almost makes it feel a little too slick even while “drying” down. As far as the sunscreen part, it seems to do the job. I haven’t burned but it doesn’t sit well with some of my makeup

Bummed on this yet again! I have sensitive skin and i tried to come back to this after a few years away from it and nothing has changed. Smells like sunscreen on my face all day, and i can feel a burning near my eyes. I would stay away if you have sensi skin.
Broke me out so bad and feels disgusting on the skin

I've always been hesitant about daily SPF because I have very oily skin. This product put all of my concerns to rest. This stuff feels like velvet on my skin and doesn't make my skin feel oily at all. It gives a velvet/matte finish and keeps my makeup in place. I can't recommend this SPF enough.
reviews.review_title: Most Important Step of my Skin Routine

reviews.review_text: As a woman with a medium dark skin tone, it's hard to find facial sunscreens that don't leave a white/gray film on my face. This sunscreen really lives up to its name of being "unseen" because not only do I not see it once it's been applied, but I also don't feel it on my face. Basically, it doesn't feel "heavy" on my face like some sunscreens and moisturizers can. It's so lightweight that I have to look in the mirror while putting it on to make sure I don't miss any spots because it feels like I'm not putting anything on. What I will say is that it feels greasy as it's being applied, so I was worried it would make my face feel greasy. But thankfully it doesn't feel greasy once it's on. And a little goes a long way. You don't need to put too much on which is probably why the bottles aren't as big as usual facial sunscreen bottles are. I definitely recommend it!
reviews.review_title: "Unseen" Sunscreen Lives Up To It's Name

reviews.review_text: Hate this so much! I got the mini size and 1. It only lasted for like a week and 2. DEFINITELY made me break out. Not ever buying this again!

Honestly, I was a bit wary about trying this product as it falls under a bit expensive range of skincare products. But but but it is so worth it. It doesn't feel heavy under your makeup, which is my major issue with most sunscreens. It doesn't leave a white sheen or become greasy after a couple of hours. It acts as a primer and a moisturizer and I love how my skin feels after applying it. Worth it, definitely.

I ❤️ he applied this spf to me and my face feels so velvety and great it is incredible it is one of the few spf that I love. It's my favorite, I love that it doesn't have a scent, which is too good for me and my skin.
Please be careful using this spf! I’ve used this in the past and I’ve had no complaint until now. My husband and I used this bc we were going to do some yard work and it damaged our skin.
reviews.review_title: Awful reaction while in the sun!

reviews.review_text: unfortunately was not fan, irritated my eyes over the course of the day. & personally can’t stand the texture/how this feels on my skin - silicone like film. didn’t sunburn which was a plus.

This product is worth the hype. Goes on clear, doesn’t have an overpowering sunscreen smell and feels very moisturizing. My favorite part of this product is that it doesn’t burn my eyes like most facial sunscreens.
This sunscreen breaks me out/leaves me with a rash so bad…..I’ve tried this product twice, several years apart just to make sure it was the product. No one else who I know has this problem…

Feels oily but rubs in completely matte. This sunscreen does not leave your skin looking oily—a plus for me! I like this sunscreen but have others I prefer more. I’ve only had one incidence where the sunscreen has pilled and balled up on my skin while interacting with another skin product. If this happens, pat your sunscreen into your skin instead of rubbing.

My sensitive skin loves this. It’s non-greasy, fragrance-free, and does not sting my eyes or clog my pores. Feels like I’m wearing nothing. Wish it came in spf 50+. My husband took a tube for his golf bag. We love it!
reviews.review_title: Love this sunscreen for sensitive skin

reviews.review_text: Product caused me to have very red, blotchy, extremely dry skin all over my face. This is strange as I’ve never had sensitive skin at all.  Unfortunately I will have to discontinue use.
I love it as a primer BUT it broke me out. I had the clearest skin for months bc of tretinoin. This caused me to break out horrendously. Lots of closed comedones. Silicon causes cc’s.
reviews.review_title: Caused closed comedones or ting bumps

reviews.review_text: Works great! I also love the texture for my skin type!
This complete my broke me out and others I know too!! Very disappointing for the price
I honestly really loved this product even when I accidentally put a little to much on since it’s pretty clear it does not leave my face oily or uncomfortable my skin looks great nothing bad so far

I am running out of option with sunscreen !   So many great reviews of this one and it does not protect my face from the sun OR the silicone in it is turning my face bright red and hot!!! So expensive and I hate returns
reviews.review_title: Leaves my face hot and red!

reviews.review_text: This product is lightweight and glides easily but made my acne prone skin breakout. Also price point is a huge negative.
Love this so much…get the large size though …half the price
reviews.review_title: Size and price make no sense …get the big bottle

reviews.review_text:
The sunscreen is not good for oily skin or humid weather. My skin does not feel fresh after wearing it. The texture kind of says that it has a a lot of silicons in it, which is not a bad thing, but on my 
face, it enlarges pores :(
I love it. I made my skin so soft and I did not get sunburned,buy it I recommend it. ￼
reviews.review_title: I must have in my routine ￼

reviews.review_text: I LOVE this sunscreen! it goes on clear of course and you can’t feel it at all. it doesn’t feel greasy or sticky + it almost has a matte affect on the skin. it doesn’t pill over skincare and works under makeup!
reviews.review_title: i’ve never liked putting￼ on sunscreen until now

reviews.review_text: i love this product i’ve been using it for a while and i love how it leaves no white cast and is literally invisible on my skin. it has a nice velvety texture which feels nice on my skin

Supergoop is the last word in sunscreen. As a darker brown skin person, it is such a relief to wear this and have it fade completely into my skin with no white cast or tint at all. Product is a soft, velvety gel, no smell, which melts and absorbs into the skin easily and quickly, but not instantly. Once it absorbs, it's unnoticeable in feel and look, there's no greasiness to it all after a minute or two.

I do like this product but I’m not sure how I 100% feel about it. The feel of it is slightly strange but the “oiliness” feeling in most sunscreens last a couple seconds in this one. So it feels pretty weightless. My concern is that I don’t know if I’m spreading it everywhere and the smell is horrible. I only notice the smell when I’m putting it on, and it’s on my finger tips but I have to hold my breath. I will say it has made my skin look absolutely gorgeous.
I absolutely love this product. I use it all the time.
This sunscreen is one my favorites. It protects my skin without irritating it, doesn’t really have a scent, and it’s clear
Can’t really say much , ive worn it 3 times and it makes my makeup look very noticeable
reviews.review_title: Will be giving it more trys

reviews.review_text: Best sunscreen I’ve ever used only wish it was more affordable.

I LOVE the glow sunscreens so I thought I should try the unseen sunscreen. The other sunscreen is so much better this one irritated my skin so much. It was red and bump and splotchy for hours and burned. My skin felt so raw.  Once the redness went down the texture of my skin was rough and dry for a few days after. The photos attached don't even show how irritated it initially was my face looked like I broke into hives I was horrified.
reviews.review_title: Face was red and blotchy for hours

reviews.review_text: Works well, but irritates and stings my eyes. I like the overall product, how it feels and sits on the skin is really nice. However, it REALLY irritates my  eyes. Because of this I won’t be repurchasing.
I love that it feels like a primer. What a breakthrough for a sunscreen. I'll be using this forever now!

I’ve been using tretinoin for almost a year and it helped my acne out so much. My skin was so clear, and despite the mixed reviews of this spf, I bought it. Upon 3 days of using it, my acne got as worse as when I first started using tret. ACNE PRONE STAY AWAY!
I love it. Its very lightweight and doesn't leave a white-cast like other sunscreens I've tried.
I was looking for a sunscreen that would feel like nothing and work well with my already oily skin (ie, not make me oilier). Supergoop got it perfect!

I like my super goop sunscreen. It’s a great every day makeup primer or just a nice light SPF for the day without any make up, it helps me stay hydrated with my skin and also helps me to get less sunburn when I’d like to be outside. if you have dry skin, this might be a very good product for you because your skin will stay hydrated. It is a little on the grease your side so if you have a greasy to oily skin I wouldn’t recommend this product.

Although I like the consistency of this sunscreen I’m not a fan. The price point is too high and I feel like you can’t combine it with anything. When I wear it alone it’s fine but if I try to use it over moisturizer it peels.
Perfect for everyday! Although pricey, spf is smithing worth the plunge. It goes on a little oily, but soon after you can hardly remember it’s there.
Hate the smell but swear by this product my skin feels so velvety smooth!

The Unseen Sunscreen is my favorite everyday sunscreen! It is perfect after my moisturizing routine. It is perfect under makeup. It is perfect on bare skin.  It is just…(you guessed it!) perfect! Anushka sunscreen, reapply eve
reviews.review_title: Perfect!  And don’t forget to reapply regularly!

reviews.review_text: Love the brand but this is not my favorite product. This feels like silicone primer going on, best applied in a thin layer. It provides wonderful sun protection and was great on my no makeup days. Sadly does not mix well with many foundations and will separated as the day goes. not mix well
Love this product - have repurchased it so many times. Works so well with my oily skin and gives me a lot of sun protection

I use this everyday on my face, chest, and shoulders, and I love it. It is matte, so it doesn't leave your face looking greasy. When I put blush on, it lasts so much longer when I put it on over this.
best sunscreen… ever. just ever. do yourself a favor & buy it.
Been using this for a few years now and I love it. Wears good under makeup and doesn’t leave a film and isn’t sticky. My daughter with fair skin now uses it and loves it as well.

I really wanted to love this sunscreen but I used it twice and it caused a really bad eczema flare up on my face that took a good week of moisturizing to heal. I'm not exactly sure what ingredient made my skin so angry but I typically haven't had reactions to other sunscreens (chemical and mineral) so it was a surprise to me
This product feels light on my skin while also adding the protection I need!

Maybe an unpopular opinion but I don't think this lived up to the hype. It feels extremely greasy, and not just when I first put it on, but for a long time after. That also means I have to be a little extra careful when putting on makeup/blending. I do really like that it's clear though and doesn't leave a white cast. And I like that it's a relatively higher SPF in the world of face sunscreens. it's not terrible, but I don't think I'll be repurchasing and think it is incredibly overpriced. I think however that if you're someone with drier skin, the greasiness may actually be a plus, and the fact that it's a clear color is pretty great so bc of those things I'd still recommend it. Just if you hate feeling greasy, give it a pass

This! I love this! I’m tan, so I hate sunscreen white cast. This is obviously clear, and I love it. I went to Mexico wearing this- didn’t get burnt. I have dry skin, so doesn’t clog pores, not greasy. Recommended to my sister and we all love!

I think the formula is great, didn't break me out and I didn't get a sun burn. It also did not leave a white cast or oily access on my face which was great. However, a little does NOT go along way with this stuff. I needed a few pumps to get my full face covered. This wouldn't be so bad if it wasn't on the pricer end as far as sunscreen goes. If price doesn't bother you though, than this is defiantly the product for you!
reviews.review_title: Great formula but a little expensive

reviews.review_text: Whats not to Love about this Sunscreen. No scent, no cast or Tint or color on the skin, smooth and silky which helps as a primer for makeup. Love this Sunscreen

I have dry skin and sometimes this can actually seem oily under my makeup. Very surprising. But it is very good. My teen who doesn’t want to wear anything detectable on their skin, also really likes it as a one and done product in the morning.
It’s the perfect texture just very expensive for the amount you get. I like that it has a primer built in.

I’ve used this Unseen Sunscreen as my go to everyday face sunscreen for the last 3 years. I love the way it glides on and has a primer feel to it. It doesn’t make me look cakey after applying my make up or disrupt my make up in ways other sunscreens have done before.
I love this sunscreen.  One of the only sunscreens that won’t make my eyes itch.  It feels so good on the skin.  This is def a must have!
Not good for sensitive skin. After two applications, my pores were clogged and skin was noticeably rougher.
reviews.review_title: Clogged my pores and made my skin bumpy!

reviews.review_text: I love this sunscreen! It is the perfect consistency and feels like a makeup primer. Makeup sits very nicely on top of it. It does not make my face feel oily like other sunscreens, would definitely recommend

I am an actor in the Florida theme parks where we take a beating from the sun, and I wear this every single day. I put it on before I got to work to let it set as long as I can, and then apply my make-up upon arrival at work. Protect your skin! Use this combined with an SPF setting spray.
People rave abt this product but it makes me sweat horribly. It’s embarrassing. Absolutely DO NOT RECOMMEND.
I have been using this sunscreen for over a year and love it for my oily ance prone skin! it’s feels light and nice on the skin and special leaving my skin smooth.

This is an excellent sunscreen & primer.  Best for oily skin.  I love that I can use this on non makeup days, or it can be paired with a tinted sunscreen.  I have oily skin and I have found using this before my tinted sunscreen works amazingly well.
reviews.review_title: A must have in my daily routine.

reviews.review_text:
Been using this for about a year. For a daily sunscreen it worked great and didn't make me break out like the other brands I've used. 
However, I just came back from a beach vacation and religiously applied this on a few times a day. I even wore hats to add extra protection from the sun. My face is currently sunburned, tender and red. The rest of my body I used a regular sunscreen and no sunburns anywhere except for my face.. This does not work well as a beach/full sun sunscreen. I am not happy. Back to looking for a more effective sunscreen.

I spend a lot of time in the sun and am incredibly protective of my skin. I have not had a sunburn in over 10 years despite spending time on boats, the beach, diving, hiking etc. Sephora was out of my usual face spf (Ilia spf 40) so I grabbed this on recommendation. I hiked for 2 hours and I am writing this review with my face burnt to a crisp. Like the kind where it might peel. I am LIVID. I've had a basal cell taken off my shoulder and I am beyond diligent with sunscreen. It's as if I put absolutely nothing on, or maybe baby oil. Burnt to a crisp. Not OK. Returning today. Please find something else for your skin if you care about protecting it from the sun.
reviews.review_title: Burnt to an absolute crips. ZERO sun protection.

reviews.review_text: Love this sunscreen. It soaks into your skin, doesn’t leave a white tint or noticeable film, and lays nicely under my primer and foundation. May be my HG sunscreen.
This product is great to my skin. I love the texture and how it pairs well with my foundation.

Works great and love the texture and consistency, BUT over time, it always ends up in my eyes and burns. I think it gets on my lashes when blinking and then in my eyes. I still recommend it, see if it works for you.
although the clear formula leaves my skin with a nice glow, the smell is a bit unsettling and it has a weird texture. very pricey for the size, but i’m glad i tried it.
I cannot stand the feeling of this on my face. It’s filmy and leaves a weird feeling after. Don’t understand the hype.
This is a great product. Absorbes well and doesn’t weigh down skin or make my face oily
I like this product but it does pill on me. I can still get it to work with my foundation but I don’t think I’ll buy it again.
I really liked the finish and it was easy to apply my makeup afterwards. Didn’t had any spots after a use of two weeks in Florida (hot weather, beach, salty water…)
This felt invisible on but it ended up clogging the pores on my chin, making it all bumpy. I don’t think this is suitable for sensitive skin.
SPF SPF SPF. This is it. Works solo or under makeup. Not greasy. Not smelly for a sunscreen. Feels luxe and makes sunscreen fun.

I've been using this every day for years. I used to use Krave Beauty's beet shield sunscreen which I loved before it was recalled. This was the next best sunscreen I found and haven't looked back. It doubles as a really great makeup primer and my makeup products always sit really well on top of it. It leaves a nice soft, velvety finish that isn't too matte or shiny. Would definitely recommend too for anyone with sensitive, acne-prone skin like mine.

I love this sunscreen! It goes amazing with my foundation and all my makeup overall. I recommend and will continue to buy over and over again. The price is okay I guess maybe a little bit to pricy but it’s worth it to make sure my makeup looks good
I have used so many sunscreens and I love this one the best! It is like putting on a silky primer. Keep in mind, that skin should be well moisturized before applying any sunscreen.
Seamless & works beautifully on any skin. Love it for being really non-greasy you wont even feel like you have applied any layer on your skin

I have been using this sunscreen is so far so good, my skin haven’t had any bad reaction to it, no breakouts or pore issues, I have sensitive skin and I suffer from rosacea and this sunscreen has been good even with those 2 skin conditions.  Only thing I don’t like is the smell and how greasy it feels once you apply it
Great product! Feels so light and soft on face. No white cast
I love this sunscreen. It doesn’t cause any breakouts on my face and it feels smooth, Almost has a primer consistency. I’ll be repurchasing for sure.

I use this before applying my makeup. My makeup grips so well to it and i love that i’m wearing some sunscreen without the sunscreen smell. I wouldn’t wear this alone as sunscreen though, it’s more of a primer

The sales associate recommended this product to me as part of skin care routine, and i love it!! it feels so satin smooth on my face with little to no dryness.  It also doubles as a makeup primer. my only gripe is the cost, so I'm very mindful not use too much. will purchase again, but the larger size.
The best sunscreen to protect the skin  from the sun

I have rosacea and sensitive skin and have never like using a sunscreen because it didn’t work well under makeup or it broke me out. I love this one! It blends so well with makeup and adds hydration to my dry skin.
reviews.review_title: Must have for dry sensitive skin

reviews.review_text: Writing this review after purchasing it three times. Works well on my dusky skin and under makeup. I have dry skin, but most sunscreens make me looks like a greaseball. This is just…chef’s kiss. ♥️

I don’t know how to feel about this. I got this in a mini size and for mini, especially at sephora, this will last me a while. First impressions, it’s really cute packaging. I think it’ll last me a long time. It comes out in a small tube and I do one line on my finger and spread it all over. I’ll Be honest, I felt like a greaseball. It is very unseen and no white cast. It feels sheer and greasy like I put oil on my face. My makeup without this and with this as a base are the same. No difference. I haven’t noticed a change in my skin at all for the better or worse. I really don’t think this does anything, save your money and buy for better. Work smarter not harder.
I am currently using this and I think it's decent. It has a little bit of a weird smell but nothing strong. I apply it on top of a serum I use it sort of starts to peel off.

I absolutely love this sunscreen! It is so creamy and velvety when applied, and spreads so easily onto my skin. It is also clear, not white, so it leaves no white cast like some other sunscreens do. This is my go-to sunscreen everyday! Go buy it; it will not disappoint!
I use this as a base for my makeup and it’s a 10/10. It’s super smooth going on and doesn’t make my face break out or feel oily at all. I like that this product is lightweight and smells good!

I love this sunscreen for my face.  I just wish it had a higher SPF.  I like the texture, it’s almost like a primer before I apply my make up.  It isn’t greasy or oily to the touch and doesn’t have a paste like consistency.  It isn’t sticky and not pilling on the face.  I have super oily skin during the hot mmo this and it works well.  I don’t feel like my make up is sliding off my face.
A family member recommended this to me and it immediately broke me out. 0/10, I gave this away. Also had a weird feeling on the skin.
It was nice that it did not leave a white cast but it clogged my pores and made my acne worse
I love the way it feels when i apply it, however, i think this gives me pimples. I have normal to dry skin.

I wished it worked for my combo skin but it didn’t really sink into the skin. I also noticed I would break out bad when I used it the most. If you have dry skin and not acne prone it might be a good one.
Honestly one of the best sunscreens ive found. No white cast, very lightweight, no pilling, very moisturizing, makes my skin so soft. Only thing is its a bit pricy for me to get often :(

It might be a good product but I have pretty sensitive skin and unfortunately this irritates my skin. It feels really nice though so I would give it a try if you are not sensitive and eczema prone like me
reviews.review_title: Not bad just not for me

reviews.review_text: i have dry skin and it make my face feel super greasy.
I love that the product is clear and has no oder but the gel has a matte like texture that I wouldn’t recommend for dry skin.
I really like it! Love how it grabs onto the make up, making everything nicely buildable as well. Maybe I’ll try the tinted one next.
Finally found a sun screen my husband will use.  No glow, no tint!

This is literally my 6th bottle and I love it! I used this product everyday after my moisturizer and it’s the best. It blends into my skin perfectly without any white cast or even making my face look oily. I would recommend

I LOVE this product. I have combination skin, and was worried, based on other reviews, that it was going to be oily. However, this product does not make my skin oily at all. It soaks into my skin, almost immediately, and leaves it feeling super soft and smooth! My skin is also extremely sensitive, and this product does not cause any irritation or breakouts. Love that it also is clear, so there's no white cast, or darkening of skin (ex. tinted sunscreens). Will definitely be repurchasing over and over again!
I love using this. It’s way better than a lot of my other sunscreens because you can’t see it on my skin.
This sunscreen was really weird on my skin and not a fan of the texture and formula

My most repurchased sunscreen. This just leave me feeling so soft and smooth. The silicone just form a protective film and it diffused the looks of scarring on my face. I love to used this whenever I’m doing makeup as I can use this as a primer. Highly recommend!!
This is my go-to sunscreen. I put it on every day and it does not irritate my sensitive skin. My skin tends to be mixed and acne prone. This does not cause me to breakout at all.

this sunscreen is really good i would give it 5 stars but it’s kinda expensive for what it seems to be a basic sunscreen. i kinda love the way it leaves my face after applying and overall enjoy the product
I love this sunscreen. It’s not sticky, or leaves a white cast. It has never peeled off. I wear it in the hot desert days (I live in the desert) and under my makeup. I highly recommended it
reviews.review_title: Non sticky or white cast/peel off

reviews.review_text:
An absolute staple in my routine, I cannot live without my Unseen. I am fair complexion, and most SPF leaves my skin looking chalky or ashen. This has more of an emollient feeling when applied, but then dries to the most moisturized and soft feeling. I do not wear makeup regularly, so I can't speak to how this wears as a primer, but I imagine it would be good based on the feeling. 
I do not go a single day without this product as a minimum.

As a person with oily skin, this was 50/50 for me. I love that there is no white cast and doesn't pill but I have noticed after reapplication throughout the day my T-zone gets pretty oily. If you have dry skin I'm sure this would be fantastic though!
Really is unseen. No white cast whatsoever and goes under makeup nicely.

Worst sunscreen I’ve ever tried Leaves white residue and makes makeup break/ won’t blend with makeup also broke me out oh and smells like rice very unappealing also and sits terribly on vanity inconvenient packaging
love this brand- just not this product. it feels greasy on the skin & broke me out. also separates with makeup. try the every single face or glow screen!!! so much better :)
great sunscreen, gives a glow but doesn’t make your skin oily. Always use this one before the beach. Absolutely love!!!

after using this sunscreen for a few days my skin has totally changed. after every time I would use this sunscreen my skin would be so soft and shiny and the sunscreen wouldn't leave me oily at all. I would totally recommend this product to anyone my new favorite sunscreen!!
Absolutely love this product! Great for everyday use. Does not leave your skin feeling greasy and product is nice and lightweight so you can put makeup over it and not have it feel heavy.
Great product! Definitely great for all skin tones and feels great on skin.
I cannot recommend this spf enough! It goes on my skin so nicely and doesn’t feel like the traditional sunscreen. I will be purchasing again!
reviews.review_title: I don’t go a day without it!

reviews.review_text: Ok. the sizing with the price threw me off guard. my fault for not reading the size, idk. Seemed like i got a sample of this product ngl. It does its job, but personally doesnt feel like the way sunscreen should.
Great for people that have sensitive skin and sunscreen normally breaks them out. Also great for low maintenance people because I use it as a primer as well for makeup.

I loved this but had to return it because it broke me out sadly, but the matte screen by supergoop doesn't break me out! loved it otherwise though so if you don't tend to breakout it should work really well for you
reviews.review_title: Perfect but made me break out

reviews.review_text: My go-to. I’m in love with this and just as much as the Saie tinted moisturizer. I paid the two and they go together beautifully. I’ll add pictures. I wore just this to the beach in the cat photo and only my body got burnt (oops), but my face was protected and flowed to perfection. It doesn’t break me out either.
reviews.review_title: If you stop selling, I will never forgive you!

reviews.review_text: hmm it’s okay! It’s sunscreen, it does it’s job. I think I prefer white sunscreens so I can see where I go. I like it but I won’t repurchase!

I love the glow screen by this brand, so wanted to try more of their stuff. I just bought this without really looking at it. I didn’t realize it works as a primer so it has that almost silicon feel. It held my makeup in place and protected me in the sun at the beach. Love it!
i love this sunscreen so much, it´s my 3rd time buying it.

I have fair, combo skin and use this product every morning at the end of my routine. I don’t layer on makeup however the finish of this sunscreen is pleasant. It’s not oily and the semi-matte finish in texture is barely noticeable.

Love this sunscreen 
Never pills under my foundation
I like I can use this after foundation if I forget to use a spf product. Goes on smooth and clear just like advertised. Love it!

I really love this sunscreen for every day wear. I have combination skin, dry around the edges and oily in T-zone, 30 years old, slight hormonal acne. This doesn't make me break out at all , at most I get some clogged pores if I put it on multiple times a day in the hot summer. It goes on so soft and silky and leaves a really nice almost matte/natural look to my skin. I rarely wear make up so IDK how it works as a primer like it says. I took one star off because It isn't strong enough for after strong treatments like tretinoin, to being outside in the sun all day (I came in slightly pink) and also because the price went up and it's now stupidly expensive. I'm going to try La Roche Posay sunscreens as an alternative because of these two reasons. But if you have normal skin (no harsh treatments) and want a great looking sunscreen and don't mind the price, I do recommend this!

It smells so bad. I bought this after seeing it on YouTube . and the thing I liked about it was that it was clear, but the smell was so bad as if sunscreen went bad. When it comes to sunscreen I believe in more is more, but not with this one.

At first you get a nice mate look, but after about an hour my face looks very shiny.
I really wanted to like this product, but it didn’t work for my oily skin
The texture on this is dreamy. I apply this a couple times a day and so far so good. Will be a new staple in my routine.

Does not give a white cast which I love!! I noticed it does not set well under my concealer at all! It rolls and peels from my skin which I did not like. It is also easy to spread and a little goes a long way.

The texture of this doesn’t feel good on my skin at all and I feel like I don’t get adequate protection with it. It feels like a jelly and doesn’t soak into your skin, so it feels like there is a film that you could just wipe off. I’m very oily so this doesn’t work for me and it did break me out.

I’ve tried multiple supergoop sunscreen products now to try and find the best one for me (glow screen and the swipe/stick one) and out of them all, this one is definitely my favorite. That being said, as someone who is very picky with textures, this one throws me off. It’s texture is kinda jelly like and dosent go down into my skin, so I always feel a bit greasy and like I have gel on my face (it dosent melt into my skin like I’d like.
My go to sunscreen. Can look a little greasy but is so nice for re application. I love

I have used this product for years and tried many other sunscreens and this is always the one I come back to- it doesnt leave my skin white cast or too oily and it acts as a perfect primer under makeup
Loooooveee this! I’ve been looking for a good primer and spf & I have found 2 in 1! Makes my make up look great!

this stuff is really great, it pairs really great with moisturizer and doesn’t feel sticky or thick. it’s not greasy and doesn’t break me out. it’s also totally scentless, which i love since a lot of sunscreen smells really strong
The best sunscreen that doesn’t cause me to break out and is invisible. My go to sunscreen
Love how this feels going on! And did my search of reviews via youtube & Reddit and this seems to be many people sunscreen go to!
this defiantly did protect my skin from the sun but it’s greasy and made my skin feel dirty
it's not my favorite super heavy like silicone. I don't like the consistency
Love that it’s so light on the skin and no residue feeling.
Lightweight, easy to apply, no white cast whatsoever. This is my holy grail SPF.
Go to sunscreen always works as a great base under makeup a little to pricey for regular application so have looked for other options but this is my favorite sunscreen I’ve ever used
BROKE ME OUT LIKE CRAZY. I haven't had that much acne since before accutane!!
This is hands down the best sunscreen I've ever tried!
My go to sunscreen. Glides & feels like oil velvety
love this sunscreen !!!! works great and looks good under makeup or on its own
feels weightless. own many supergoop products now!
This sunscreen is perfect! it doesn’t make me look greasy like some sunscreens do. I love this because you can’t tell im wearing sunscreen and I’ve also noticed a difference in my skin
I cannot recommend this product enough. It feels like you have nothing on. It’s great. Doesn’t clog pores and is good for sensitive skin
Love this sunscreen. I haven’t found anything that compares to it. I love putting it on and it feels so high quality 😉🙏🏾 even tho it’s $$$ sometimes but I find the $$ to be worth it

LOVE this product! I accidentally bought a mini of this instead of the glow one and thank gosh I did. I have struggled for so long to find a good sunscreen that doesn’t pill or give a white cast. When you first put it on, it feels like it going to pill but it doesn’t! 10/10

It wasn’t bad. Its matte & It’s clear so no white cast which I was happy about. It says it’s sweat resistant which I liked because I sweat a lot when commuting to work but because I have dry skin I’d try this again in the summer. It’s not moisturizing enough for the winter for me
This product was recommended to me by a Sephora employee and I love it!
it really is invisible! the only problem is that although it has a matte finish, it still leaves my skin feeling oily.

Good clear sunscreen but I stopped using because of the greasy texture and it also makes your face shiny which can look weird when I don’t wear makeup over it. Ultimately switched to Biore which has a much better texture
I wouldn’t say it’s the best sunscreen but not bad. It makes your face shiny and look weird. I did breakout but I don’t know if it’s because of this sunscreen or another reason.

I love the Unseen Sunscreen and wear it every day as a primer. It's texture is fantastic and a little goes a long way- gives a PERFECT glow. I've repurchased at least twice and have a miniature that I keep in my bag just in case. 100% recommend!!
I use this product everyday and i am obsessed with it, it’s transparent, and it feels super nice.
I love this. It doesn’t leave a white cast. I’m guessing it has silicones in it because the texture is very smooth, so I use it as a primer also. It doesn’t cause breakouts.

I like this product. It works well. No white cast at all, hence the name. A tad too silicone-y for me personally. If I apply as much as is recommended, I get oily. I prefer the PLAY sunscreen as I like the texture more. I think it might suit others better.
reviews.review_title: Good if you like the fact that it’s a primer

reviews.review_text: I have never in my life used a sunscreen that I didn’t have to worry about pilling up or leaving a white cast on my skin. It has a texture extremely similar to the Baby Skin primer which I love. I don’t leave the house without it.
So smooth and spreadable and not messy or stinky it’s a great buy .

This is a double whammy. Serves as a sunscreen and a primer. You can use this alone and no one can tell you are wearing sunscreen. It's invisible. It feels like Smashbox clear primer. Doesn' pill under foundation.
I love this sunscreen! I love how it is clear and can be used either as a primer or as a way to add a little shine to your skin without makeup.
Exactly what the name says: unseen. It come out clear, little to now smell, goes on with a skin like finish. First sunscreen I’ve ever tried that didn’t leave me super shiny. A new holy grail!
I wanted to love this so much, it has the smoothest texture and the most beautiful sheen. BUT, I had a reaction to it. Small pumps all over my face.
I love this product ! I bought this to wear under my makeup . This one by SuperGoop is very nice . It’s like a primer ! And it works ! No smell , no allergies, this is good stuff !

I was so amazed with this product in the beginning. it's soft and clear. It causes a tiny sheen, but not much. Doesn't burn my skin or eyes, never any white cast. So for that, its great.
But I realized over time, it's not very good as a sunblock! I still got burned everytime I used it. I think it's because it's sits on the surface of the skin instead of sinking in, especially if you do a skincare routine beforehand. and not a good primer. And the price.. way way too much for such a tiny amount.
i loveeee this! i use it everyday before i put on my makeup. i didn't want to get the glow screen bc i have combo skin

I’ve only used this product a few times since I purchased it but each time I did, I loved it. I usually have the sunscreens with a white cast and I was taken aback by the texture of this sunscreen when I tried it. It’s a very smooth primer and I mostly used it on days I had makeup on and when I was barefaced, I got oily after about 5 hrs.

I use this product and run to sephora to buy before I run out of this A M A Z I N G sunblock! I can wear this because it has minimal sunblock smell and it is not oily. I love it alone or under my makeup.
This is my new favorite primer. And love to also wear it on no makeup days for sun protection. It’s great for my dry, sensitive, rosacea skin.
my favorite sunscreen!! I love using this perfect timer and not greasy
Best face sunscreen!  I get sun spots and this significantly reduces them.

This unfortunately was the cause of my breakouts. I used it for quite sometime not thinking this was the issue, especially with all the rave. I took it out of my routine and my skin has been fine since. I think it works great for some people
Love this sunscreen so much. I have a acne prone skin but it doesn’t bother me at all. Will never stop buying it …
reviews.review_title: A must have in my daily routine

reviews.review_text: I only tend to use this in the summer time and it works amazing! It’s only 40 PA so it doesn’t help tremendously but it works if your going on a walk.
This forumla feels like a primer and does not leave a greasy feeling on the skin. I use this everyday before I use my actual primer and I love how it doesn't affect my makeup look.
reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine!!!

reviews.review_text: I really love this product. Very silky - makeup glides on effortlessly. Will buy again
Love this! Very lightweight with a matte finish. Perfect for oily skin and for an "invisible coverage".
Im sure it does protect you from the sun but it leaves a weird finish that made me look super wrinkled specially if i put makeup on over it. I would not get again.
I've used this product on & off for the last few years. I love the texture & it mattifies me just enough! A little goes a long way & it works well with my tinted moisturizer.
New favorite sunscreen! It is actually invisible and feels very smooth

This is a definite no for me. Used this 5 times and it causes major texture on my skin. I took a break from it and tried it again a few months later with the same issue. My skin looks horrible after using this sunscreen. I’ll stick with Elta MD instead.
I liked this product but I had to stop using it bc I have acne prone skin and it has ingredients that will clog your pores so if you have acne prone skin be aware!
reviews.review_title: It was good but not for acne prone skin!

reviews.review_text: I love the feel, but this has started pilling up under my foundation or powder, everytime i use it.  I tried the mini, and thought it would work well, but then the constant pilling started.  Very disappointed, and now looking at another spf to try.
reviews.review_title: Didn't live up to the hope i had.

reviews.review_text: sunscreen feels soft when applying it, it also feels warm on skin. it feels like you're not wearing any sun screen at all. I would give it 5 stars, but the price is not worth for a mini, even if it's for a travel size.

I got this product as a sample with an order and I decided to buy it. It works well but this is a really small bottle for $20 and I was very disappointed about that. I will have to wait for a sale to get a bigger bottle.
I really tried to like this but the breakouts it caused and the weird greasy texture made me hate it. I would not recommend this to anyone especially if you have sensitive skin.
reviews.review_title: Overhyped product that clogs your pores

reviews.review_text: Unseen Sunscreen has an interesting gel consistency that immediately absorbs into the skin. It really in unseen, although I could feel it drying my skin out. The scent is mildly unpleasant. It feels more like a primer that goes over moisturizer. At this price point, there are much better options. I would recommend either EltaMD or Thank You Farmer.

I love this sunscreen so much! I’m a Set Medic who works at outdoor locations year round in Southern California. Despite using other SPF 50 lotions, I was still getting way too tanned. One day a very fair skinned VFX woman caught my attention for not tanning or burning despite a 12 hour shooting day outside. She told me about Supergoop and I’ve been a devoted fan ever since. I love Unseen and Glow Screen. The texture and moisturizing action of Unseen is luxurious, and I swear it makes my 50-something neck look younger! It protects better than the heavy, pore clogging zincs. Thank you!
reviews.review_title: Best Sunscreen I’ve Ever Used On My Face & Neck

reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample from a skincare set and was super excited to use. It feels more like a primer, and it immediately absorbed into my skin, but it left it feeling dry- almost mattifying. I got two huge pimples that same night after applying. It was so drying! I recommend the Elta MD skincare sunscreen instead
This is what I use every day, it's lightweight and just slightly camouflages pores.

I was looking for a product that protects my skin without leaving product residue or turning my face white. I've been using this product for a while now and this is one of the products I grab when I stock up on Sephora. It applies smoothly on the skin and is not sticky at all. Works well with sensitive skin.
The best suncreen ever. Does not feel like I applied anything on the face, super lightweight!!

I love the glowscreen by this brand and happily wore makeup over it with or without foundation year long, and was hoping for a similar thin and "not sunscreen" like feeling when putting this on as it is literally called the unseen sunscreen. Especially because this is so heavily promoted online. I was disappointed this felt very silicone-like and the best comparison I have is that it felt like a thinned out vaseline being spread over my skin. This did make me concerned this would make my skin irritated or cause breakouts as it feels very occlusive due to this texture, so I assumed it would act like a face oil. It also looked much greasier for a short while after applying, and I would not have kept this on my face and switched to another sunscreen if I was not going to apply a full face of makeup before going out.
I was pleased that my concerns for my skin were not proven right - my face and neck were as happy as with my favorite formulas and no disruptions to the way the rest of my skincare or makeup sat on my skin all day as this worked very nicely under my makeup for the day. 
But that being said because I was worried this would cause my face to feel too hot and suffocated, and while this is on the better end of what US sunscreens feel like on the face, I would not opt for this over either the glowscreen or any of the highly elegant and much more affordable Korean sunscreens that are now widely available.
reviews.review_title: Texture like thin Vaseline, but does the job

reviews.review_text: Soy piel mixta y antes no usaba protector solar por lo mismo pero desde que descubrí esta marca y especialmente este producto no hay día que no uso protector solar, me encanta la sensación suave que deja en mi piel.
The best sunscreen, soft, not sticky, absorb really good. I tried few and i recommended 100%
reviews.review_title: This sunscreen is always on my rutine

reviews.review_text: This is going to be my go to sunscreen for quite some time. I love how it doesn’t have a white cast (I have medium-light skin) and it goes on clear. I deal with persistent acne and post inflammatory hyperpigmentation. I love that this sunscreen protects my skin whilst also not causing me to break out. At first, I thought this sunscreen was too greasy. I have oily skin. However, I just recently realized that I haven’t been rubbing it in properly for the past several months! At least for me, it takes several minutes for it to absorb properly into my skin. If you’re having similar issues with the oiliness, try working it into your skin for several minutes. It’s personally helped me out so much! My only complaint is that this sunscreen is definitely pricey compared to others. However, I have found that it’s worth it to invest in a good sunscreen. Hope this helps you!
reviews.review_title: I love the Supergoop Unseen Sunscreen :)

reviews.review_text: I don't use this regularly, only when I know I'll be out in the sun for an extended amount of time. I've noticed on the days I wear it, I tend to have a pimple or two pop up the next day. I'm not prone to breakouts, so I am pretty sure the pimples are due to this product. If it doesn't cause this problem for you, I would say go ahead and purchase it, because it definitely does its job!
reviews.review_title: I like the way it feels but...

reviews.review_text: i’ve tried so many sunscreens and always given up because i hated the feeling. this one is like no other, feels great on my skin and doesn’t look like i have sunscreen on. highly recommend, already on my third bottle!
reviews.review_title: Must have in my skin care routine

reviews.review_text: LOVE This Sunscreen! Goes on like silk. Not tacky. So glad a friend recommended it to me! My new go-to for sunscreen.

I have tried so so so many sunscreens and I'm the type who likes to try new products but since I have found this sunscreen I've never looked back. It goes on the skin very smooth and doesn't leave a white cast AT ALL which is probably my favorite part
I wanted to hate this, but it is honestly the best sunscreen I have ever used. Goes on so smooth and zero white cast. I use this or glow screen every day and am now hooked!
One of my favorites. I like how it feels on skin and makes it soft, however, if I touch scratch my eyes after washing hand and a small amount of product from face get in eyes, I won’t stop crying.
reviews.review_title: Good but not for sensitive eyes

reviews.review_text: Light wait but after feel is like a paint on skin. Works okay.

never knew something could be so tiny and expensive, but then again, im 4'10" and spend $100 on groceries every week so I guess it's possible. what I love most about this sunscreen tho is it doesnt feel heavy or sticky or shiny and there's no white cast. it functions like a makeup primer which is probably what encourages me to use it. but it maybe will last you like 5 applications, which is kind of crazy for a $20 product
reviews.review_title: great for a 3 day max trip

reviews.review_text: I tried Unseen Sunscreen 40 on my face, it makes my skin face look  so dry!
Very greasy and doesn’t absorb into skin just sits on top! I much prefer Cay Skin that has skin care benefits as well as spf!
I've tried so many sunscreens before but this one is the best! I have a dry skin with hormonal acne. This one never break off my face. It goes really well with any kind of foundation too!

Finally! A face sunscreen I look forward to wearing every day! This feels so nice going on, and I find that it acts as a nice 'primer' under my tinted moisturizer and liquid foundation - they stay all day. There's a reason this is frequently sold out. Highly recommend!

Supergoop, I am obsessed with you. I LOVE this 2-in-1 sunscreen and primer. It goes on so smoothly over my moisturizer and disappears instantly, without any white cast. The texture is beautiful and is a perfect primer base for my makeup, especially foundation and concealer. I have such sensitive skin and before this, I had trouble with facial sunscreens because they always broke me out. I just wish that it was SPF 50 like some of their other products. But it's wonderful and I tell everyone I know about it!!

it looks great under makeup but it stings my eyes… i didn’t put it around my eye area but if you use it and you sweat on your forehead, it will find it’s way to sting your eyes… i mostly use sunscreen for outdoors and i sweat so this doesn’t work for me. doesn’t work for me
reviews.review_title: stings the eyes, not good for outdoors

reviews.review_text: Forever product, best texture and completely unseen
A little expensive but I keep trying all the so called dupes and they never can compare
not my fav but definitely an okay sunscreen, leaves me with a silicone film which my skin doesnt love but i like that there isnt a white cast.
Hands down my favorite sunscreen! Currently on the 5th bottle and will continue to repurchase. As a dark skin woman this leaves no cast and it reminds me of the clear smashbox primer.
this looks fine on the skin but the texture of it makes my face feel dirty/greasy. it doesn’t make my makeup pill, but it does seem to speed up the breakdown of my foundation/concealer.
I love the fact it is see through, but I don't enjoy the texture of putting it on. It has a velvety feel, which some people may like, but to me it just feels oily.
I definitely like this sunscreen but the value for money is very less. There are so many similar sunscreens out there who do the job which are priced less or offer more qty.
fine under makeup as a primer occasionally but using regularly broke me out bad
Disappointed after hearing lots of people rave about this sunscreen. It feels nice going on however you can’t wear it with makeup at all.

This is the perfect sunscreen makeup primer that I love using daily. However, if I need true sun protection for a day out in the sun (i.e beach, hiking, picnic, etc), this alone will not be enough. So with that said, do I recommend using it as a daily primer with added benefits of some sun protection? Yes. Would I recommend this as main sun protection? No.

I love this product. It is so light and airy, and truly is “unseen” - no white streaks, you can’t tell you’re wearing sunscreen. It’s so tough to find a good sunscreen especially gentle enough for the face, and this does it! And a little goes a long way

got a little one of these in the Sephora favorites sun safety set and am sad to say I finished the bottle because it really did work beautifully under makeup. really filled in all the pores and smoothed out your skin while giving a good amount of protection. my only complaint is that it's a bit too greasy for me and does make your skin look a little too dewy after an hour of makeup wear, but I also do have quite oily skin so could just be a personal problem. honestly do think I will be repurchasing soon

I had the mini one to give it a try and I loved it! It’s not greasy, super light, no scent, and it gives a glow look to your skin without looking too shinny, if you have oily or combo skin you’re going to love it!
reviews.review_title: Great for combo or oily skin

reviews.review_text:
Long story short; Pairs well with my skin routine and works well under my foundation as a primer. No irritation and is an awesome primer. Makes skin feel nice. No smell, feels nice on the skin. Does its job. Nice matte finish and very easy on the skin :) Cons; cannot re-apply over makeup, makes my face cakey. I want to try the other products like the mist or brush to re-apply.


Detailed review; I have combo skin and I am avid make-up user in Miami. I use a drunk elephant skin routine (Protini Polypeptide Cream, C-Firma Fresh Day Serum, B-Hydra Intensive Hydration Serum, Marula Oil) under this sunscreen primer and it works sooo well with the Lancôme Teint Idole Long Wear Foundation and Tarte Shape Tape concealer. I've also paired it with the Maybelline Fit Me foundation and works well, too! 

It goes on LOVELY on the skin and is a great primer. It feels like a matte film that dissolves into the skin after a minute. My foundation also has sunscreen, it pairs well. Its been nice to wear with my make-up routine. The only con is, I cannot re-apply it over my make-up because it gives it a cakey texture. The cost is very high for me but after using it daily (pea size goes a long way!) it has been a great bang for my buck. I purchased it in March of 2022 and still have some in my bottle in October of 2022! I don't have to buy more for another month or so. No skin reaction at all! Nice matte finish. Buy it! :)
non greasy! glides well. doesn't give acne. doesn't irritate.
