I looked this product. But my complaint is that it is way too oily, but it could be a help to dry skin. It’s a bit better when shaken.
love love loveeee this sunscreen! I have oily skin and this was lightweight didn’t make me shiny throughout the day and worked great under makeup!

I have extremely sensitive skin that does not react well to sunscreens. I have tried many, many sunscreens (Josie Maran, Beauty of Joseon, Dr. Jart, Fenty Skin, even other Supergoop sunscreens), and they have all left my skin red, irritated, and itchy. This is the only sunscreen I've ever used that hasn't irritated my skin. It has a very unique texture (similar to the Benefit Porefessional) that is very blurring and smoothing, while still being soft and hydrating. It has great packaging and little to no scent (at least that I can smell). Supergoop knocked it out of the park for the sensitive skin folks on this one, and I hope they never reformulate.
reviews.review_title: My tried and true ride or die!

reviews.review_text: This sunscreen is completely transparent and does its one and only job. I wear it pretty much daily. I apply it after my usual day skincare products (toner, serums, cream) and before putting on foundation. No irritation or weird colors. Holy grail facial sunscreen right here!

If you're looking for sunscreen for under makeup, this is probably the best you'll find. It's not greasy, absorbs fast, and has the texture that can be comparable to Smashbox's Photo Finish primer (like a dry gel). It's great as a primer or just on it's own. I don't get any negative effects from it, just protection I need.
Absolutely love this sunscreen its light and it does its job!

I love to use this sunscreen during the summer. It has a skin-like finish and is never shiny. It doesn't feel heavy on the skin and it doesn't interfere with the way my makeup looks. I also wear it during winter sometimes, butI have dry skin so I like to opt for something with a little more moisture during that time. I highly recommend!
I have pretty much every Supergoop product and this is the one I keep going back to. It just makes my skin look better and is really the perfect primer for both powder and liquid foundations.

The consistency is weird and I feel like it scratched my face when I put it on. my face started to break out into a bunch of tiny little bumps and some hives. I didn’t like the matte effect either. Plus the price is way too high.

This is hands down the best sunscreen I’ve ever used! It’s so light and sinks in the skin immediately, you don’t feel it,yet you know it’s there doing it’s job! I will repurchase for sure!
Will
It truly is invisible spf. Goes on like silky velvet drying to a natural finish, doubles as a make-up primer, it grabs and holds make-up in place while leaving face feeling fantasticly soft & smooth
I was hoping to like this but it seems to change how my foundation sits on my skin and not in a good way. It goes on nicely otherwise.

I absolutely love this. I always sweat through sunscreen when I put it on my face and it always gets into my eyes, this was the first sunscreen that immediately absorbed into my skin without being greasy and it stayed even though I was sweating, I will never go back to any other sunscreen

This is a good sunscreen, it didn’t break me out or cause any irritation but the feeling left on my skin was a bit more of a primer feel. Its also very hard to get out once you’ve reached the end of the tube.

This sunscreen is so nice and it has a balm-like texture! I tried it out about a month ago, and it was so smooth and velvety! I would wish that the price would be lower, but other than that it’s a super great sunscreen!
I love this! My face is so matte, it is a must for me!

I am a big fan of the product itself but the bottle comes half full and lasts about a month at best (using dermatologist recommended 1 tsp of spf). There are much more affordable sunscreens that last much longer so please save your money.

I love this product so much and I can't find anything like it. I am really not a fan of the price but it works so well with my oily skin (not greasy, honestly don't really notice it's there). it's also an excellent makeup primer
reviews.review_title: the BEST sunscreen for oily skin and makeup

reviews.review_text: Extremely overrated product. Not only it is insanely expensive but also doesn’t absorb into my skill well and not to mention the EYE BURNS I get when I accidentally rub my eyes or touch my face and then rub my eyes. 40$ doesn’t last me even a months.
Love this sunscreen.  It's great as a makeup primer with no shine.  Projects the skin.  No scent.  My third time buying.  MUST BUY!
Eyes itches a lot. I think I rubbed it on the eyes too by mistake and it was just horrible. It’s very smooth in skin, but I wish they had spf 50

I bought this sunscreen to use everyday. I started to notice sun spots on my face maybe 8 years ago and it was advised I wear sunscreen daily. The active ingredients to look for are Zinc oxide and titanium dioxide. This sunscreen does not have these active ingredients, they are inactive. This did not provide the protection that I needed. I am choosing another option that goes on more milky white and be a better protection for my skin.

For awhile now I kept seeing posts of this product but I was using neutrogena sunscreen. So when it ran out I decided to give this a try. Not disappointed at all except for that I didn’t switch sooner! It applies nicely, no smell & my makeup can sit on top with out breaking apart.  Bought the sample just in case but I will be back for the big one.
My all time favorite sunscreen! and it doubles as a primer for makeup. If you don’t like greasy sunscreen and want one that dosent pill, I highly recommend this one.
This has the same consistency as a clear primer such as Smashbox. It’s perfect for sun protection under makeup. Completely unique

I really like this sunscreen because it doesn't leave any residue, is light weight and leaves a flawless finish but it made me break out really bad. My skin was clearing up but after using this sunscreen for the first time, my skin started to break out like crazy on my face I typically don't have acne. Will still continue to see how it is on my skin overtime because it is on the more pricey side and I wouldn't want this to go to waste!

I gave it a try for the whole summer and liked it at first. But then the heat got to me and I feel like I made my makeup melt. Realistically, only protected you for like 40 minutes. It also made me break out.
It leaves my skin feeling dry and I did not like the feeling, it was oily but matte at the same time.
Horrible!!! Made me break out like a teenager! Never again! Avoid this one if you have sensitive skin!

I have been using this product for a couple weeks and am loving it as part of my new morning routine. The consistency reminds me of the smashbox primer I used years ago. Applies and stays great on my oily skin!

Just buy it. I took this with me to New York and definitely did it’s job. Went to the beach out there with this on and my nose this time around didn’t get burned as usual. You need this!! I just wish i had bought the body lotion also! since i was sun burned

I heard that this product was great to wear under makeup. Although I haven't tried doing that yet, it probably is because it is extremely mattifying. Unfortunately, this is also what I don't like about it. My skin feels uncomfortably dry after I put it on. It has a very weird texture, and after wearing it for a week straight I was quite disenchanted. On the plus side, like all Supergoop products, it is cruelty-free and reef-safe. I absolutely adore this brand and use a LOT of its products, but I won't buy this one again.

I have oily skin, and this sunscreen gives you a glow so I just look like I’m sweating. Take the time to work it into your skin to avoid piling. I feel like it might work for dry skin, will be trying the mineral ones next.
reviews.review_title: Not the best for Oily skin

reviews.review_text: It blends in beautifully with your skin, which is the reason I tried to make this work multiple times. Unfortunately, every time I’ve used this product I’d wake up with white heads the next morning.
can't really wear this under make up, as it's a serum and pilled on me. I would certainly wear this alone, over a moisturizer.
reviews.review_title: It's ok. I'm not sure if 40 min is average ?

reviews.review_text: It's probably good sunscreen for many people, but not for me. This got me pimples every time that I used it.
reviews.review_title: You can buy it if you want to take the risk

reviews.review_text: This is my third repurchase! I have yet to be sunburnt on my face this summer because of this product! It sinks into the skin very nice and overall is a 10/10 in my book and my moms!

I use every day on top of moisturizer & put foundation over the unseen sunscreen. My skin is sensitive- no break outs ever. I've gone through several tubes. I never have pilling at all when I use this product. To me it feels light & not heavy at all. Amazing- absolutely love it.
I wear this everyday and it never breaks me out. I have very sensitive, acne-prone skin and I never have any issues. I use it as a makeup primer too. This product is a daily must have!!

This sunscreen pills REALLY BAD if you try to wear anything on top of it, and it sometimes pills if you have other skin care underneath it too. So I can basically only wear it on days with nothing underneath and no makeup on top.
this is my favorite sunscreen ever! it’s non greasy, has no white streaks, it has a nice subtle glow, and does leave my skin with an unpleasant texture.
Feels like silicone on the skin and feels heavy. Caused me breakouts after two days. Not a fan.

So it’s great at first, it’s clear and easy to apply makeup on. It starts to feel like you’re slathering a silicone grease on your face, and since it has chemical filters using it everyday I started to develop a sensitivity so I couldn’t keep using it, it’s pretty common so I’d recommend something else
It works very well but made my acne prone skin feel even more oily then usual!

I cannot recommend this enough. I used to NEVER use sunscreen because of the oily feeling or whitecast. This godsend changed that. I put on sunscreen every. single. day. for the past three months. It spreads easy and gives a matte feeling after putting it on.
i didnt like the texture at all. it felt very siliconey and it was just bad. i was excited cause it is so hyped but it wasnt for me.

Love this product! I am in love with the clear and broad coverage. Just a little goes a long way and it never leaves a filmy white residue like most face sunscreens. A game changer and must have for sure!

Hands down the best face sunscreen on the market.  Have used this for the last month and cannot say enough good things about it.  It is lightweight, does not clog pores, goes on smooth and unseen (!), and doesnt feel layered when wearing makeup over it.
reviews.review_title: The best sunscreen you will ever buy

reviews.review_text: I’ve used this product on and off for a few years. I love the way it feels and a little bit goes a long way. It makes your skin feel like velvet and you only need about a half dime-sized amount for your whole face. I’ve never burned while wearing this out in the sun. If you use too much and apply it too generously, it can clog pores. I love the formula because it isn’t too drying or sticky.
Writing this review for my grandma who doesn’t have a Sephora account but I bought this for her for Christmas and she said she loves it and it “goes on like silk”.
Received this product for free from influencer very intense smell don’t need much I would recommend it for your collection
Clogged my pores causing me to breakout. Would not recommend for someone with acne.

I wanted to like it - it feels cool and disappears instantly - not thick like other sunscreens. However, I don't think it works very well... my face got burned twice while wearing it. Perhaps you have to reapply much more frequently than other sunscreens, but that's not so convenient for me. For the high price, I don't think I'll purchase again.
I purchased this after reading good reviews everywhere and it really does wonders. Non sticky and as the name says 'unseen' sunscreen

Shouldn’t be marketed as a sunscreen, instead as a primer. I’m not a fan of the consistency and every time I put it on it just feels like it’s clogging my pores. It has a velvety consistency 
and it just feels as if it immediately sinks into my skin which makes it impossible to distribute it evenly. I wanted to like this but some products aren’t for everyone
Definitely unseen! Smoothing and matte, very nice product. Has a nice light scent.

I really want to like Supergoop. This product went on smoothly and felt like velvet; it was immediately absorbed by my dry skin...except for when it didn't and started pilling. I love that it's matte. It doesn't smell great, but it's a chemical sunscreen, so what do we expect? Really the only issue was the occasional pilling, which happened no matter how long I waited between applying my moisturizer and this product. It was disappointing.

My stars aren’t for the product. It’s good, though you’re likely using nowhere near enough for sun coverage. If you’re using a pea size or even a finger strip, that’s primer, not sunscreen. 

My two stars are because Trader Joe’s Daily Facial Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF40 has MORE sunscreen and the exact same inert ingredients—save one—in the exact same order. They’re producing it, selling at $9.00, and making a profit. That means that at $36 for this sunscreen we are all absolutely being had by this brand (and so many others). I’m over it. I’m over these brands making a killing off us trying to protect our skin from literal cancer. This isn’t some unique, highly inventive formulation that warrants anything near this price. There is now an exact copy for nearly every single Supergoop sunscreen for a fraction of the price and still we’re given a tag of nearly $40 for most. Forty. No. I’m done. You should be done too.
reviews.review_title: Trader Joe’s has a dupe for $9.

reviews.review_text: Not a bad sunscreen, but one I wouldn't race to repurchase. For that price you get very little. It is indeed invisible and transparent. It has the same texture and thickness of a silicon based primer.

I wanted to love and keep using this product so badly, but my skin SCREAMS no every time. If you have oily skin, this might not be for you. The only thing I could highly talk about is that there is no white cast AT ALL, which is the only reason I kept using it. At first, it leaves a matte impression on my skin, but the downfall of this product is when in a matter of an hour, my skin looks too greasy. 

This would be a great, indispensable product for dry skin.

I love this sunscreen. You don't need much to cover the whole face, so even the small bottle lasts a while. It's clear, so it doesn't leave a white tint. Going on it smells a little bit like sunscreen, but once dry it doesn't smell like anything. Also love that it doesn't leave a residue or stickiness, so putting on make up after this is super easy.

Sunscreen goes on and feels like a BB cream, I have combination skin so this sunscreen works perfectly well, but does feel greasy after a while. If you have oily skin I would recommend Supergoop Play instead.
reviews.review_title: Good sunscreen for dry or combo skin

reviews.review_text: Love this sunscreen! Goes on clear and does not feel greasy
I love this sunscreen! it sits on my face really well! I have normal/ oily skin!
I love Supergoop! products. I have been using the unseen sunscreen for a few years now and it feels great on my skin. I love the level of spf as well.

This has become my go to sunscreen product!
I’ve been using it for about 5 months now and highly recommend this product!
My go to sunscreen! I’ve been using it since 5years ago and I always recommend it to all my friends. I love how it doesn’t show and it isn’t sticky.

Love this product! Wasn’t sure about it at first because the texture threw me off. Feels very much like a primer. But I wear this and some setting powder and I’ve gotten multiple compliments on how clear my skin looks. I’m acne prone but this product is really light weight so I feel like I can wear it all day, everyday without clogging my pores.

This is amazing for oily skin girlies. I use it as a base for my makeup and it keeps my skin looking matte all day long. I wouldn’t really recommend re applying over makeup, instead I would use the Supergoop powder with SPF.

This clogged my pores & broke me out. It also made me look very oily throughout the day! (I have dry skin) 
It feels as if, you are applying a coat of silicone over  your skin!
I do not recommend!

I know it says to reapply every 40 minutes - which is insanely impractical for a sunscreen. If you’re using it for actual sunscreen purposes, as one does with SUNSCREEN, reapply EVERY 35 minutes. This melts off. Don’t trust it as a sunscreen. Think of it as a primer and wear another sunscreen because this one is simply not it
The best sunscreen. No scent . No white overcast. Fresh feeling skin. Perfection!
My go to sunscreen but I think the trader joe’s dupe is better and so much cheaper.
Amazing.  Hands down.  I will not be persuaded to try anything else.  Use it under makeup, by itself, whatever!  Easy to reapply.  Seems to even out skin texture when worn alone.

I love that this is really unseen! It is also one of the few sunscreens that hasn't broke me out as my skin can be quite sensitive. It's a bit pricey which is why I took off one star but I would definitely repurchase as this sunscreen lives up to its name and exceeded my expectations.

I’ve been using this sunscreen under my makeup for over a year now and it is soooooooo wonderful! It feels so good gliding on my skin! The texture is so soft. Between this one and the PLAY, Supergoop is my holy grail brand! Awesome products!
reviews.review_title: One of my favs from Supergoop!! ❤️

reviews.review_text: Works when you have nothing on your face, if I have my skincare on it pills very badly.
The best spf. It goes on sooo smooth and isn’t greasy at all! I wear this every single day. I have combo skin.
It’s very oily and might make your skin break out. I usually don’t break out and had been reapplying this throughout the day and my skin started breaking out within days. Rly wanted to like it :((
Love how lightweight this sunscreen is and that it isn’t white cream like typical sunscreen. It feels and looks like the Milk hydrogrip primer. I plan on using this daily, 10/10

For all the rave reviews, I was expecting a god-tier product but this was just... okay. It feels exactly like a primer instead of sunscreen, which may be what some people want but since I mostly just wear sunscreen, I was hoping for something more like that. I really dislike the silicone feel of it, even if it were a primer. Also because it's clear right away, I find it difficult to see if I've missed a spot without feeling around my face which is not my favorite activity, and more important to me since it's sunscreen vs. other makeup types.

I really enjoyed the texture of this sunscreen. Its very easy to glide on and clear so easy to achieve adequate protection. However, like many others, this sunscreen irritated my skin making it feel itchy and broke me out. Its not ideal, but I will keep the remaining to wear in water since its the best thing I found thats lightweight, waterproof, does not leave a cast, and is water resistant. Def worth a try if your skin does not get irritated easily!
works over time.  Stays on all day and easy to get good, even coverage.  Much better than other sunscreen products and does not cause me to break out.
This is my go-to sunscreen! It’s like I’m not wearing any at all. It’s not super heavy or greasy feeling either. I love it!

i was so excited to try this product... i was left extremely disappointed :(( first of all, the consistency literally feels like grease and doesn't get any better once you rub it into your skin. as someone with oily skin, i just did not see this product working out for me at all. not worth the hype!

I love this product a lot. I have oily skin and it mattifys it very well. It also goes on to the skin beautifully and feels great on the skin. I have sensitive skin and it does not make me break out. It is also easy to re apply
Love the silky texture of this sunscreen and the fact that it absorbs so well. Definitely adding this to my skin routine.
Good to use and light feeling of the existence of sunscreen

Wanted to like this so bad, but this did not work with my oily skin. Made my makeup separate and slip all over the place. May be nice for someone with drier skin and needs spf with just a little makeup over it.
Sunscreen makes my skin itchy and doesn’t provide enough protection.

I do not love this sunscreen. The unseen part about it is perfect (which is why I give this product 2 stars) but the texture is a no from me. It feels very weird putting it on to the skin but it leaves my skin so greasy for at least an hour. The product itself is greasy, and it shows on the skin. Wouldn't recommend it.
I love how light weight and hydrating this product is
This is my favorite way to wear sunscreen now! It acts like a primer before my makeup. My skin feels silky smooth after using it. I also have acne prone skin and have no issues with this.

This is the best sunscreen I have used so far. It works so well with make up as well. I apply it before as well as after the make up. The best part is the sunscreen being transparent. It stays on for a long time.

As long as this product is made, I will continue to use it! Of every sunscreen I have ever used, this is the all time greatest. It goes on so velvety smooth and makes my skin feel like silk. There is no color or cast to it whatsoever, making it a great face sunscreen for myself and my biracial daughter.  It is pricey, so I have tried a few “dupes” but nothing is quite as perfect as this. I do keep the others and apply them to my body instead! Love this product and entire company so much!
reviews.review_title: the sunscreen that makes you want to use sunscreen

reviews.review_text: I’ve used this for years, and it’ll probably always be a staple in my skincare drawer. It does exactly what it’s advertised to do. This is not a moisturizing SPF, but it’s not supposed to be. It’s a fantastic sunscreen and extremely versatile. It’s not heavy to wear on a hot pool day, it’s water resistant, has a nontoxic chemical compound (for both skin and reefs), and works as an amazing makeup primer. The texture is definitely different than anything else I’ve tried, it’s almost like a dry silicone gel, but it dries down well and feels good on the skin.
No te deja la piel pegajosa ni blanca ya que es transparante y se absorbe rapido. Se esparce con facilidad

•consistency reminds me kind of like a makeup primer?  (which I like)
•rubs in completely clear & doesn’t leave any shine
•there’s a scent but not overpowering 
•i’d recommend a moisturizer before this sunscreen
love this i use it everyday it is definitely worth the hype!! it makes a great makeup primer as well

I was in the market for a new sunscreen and bought this due to high reviews. I usually have very oily skin, so I hate sunscreens with oil, but this one works perfectly. My skin is soft but doesn’t look oily after putting this on. A little goes a long way!

I had tried the mini and I liked it just okay. Has a texture like makeup primer. I thought my boyfriend would like it since it’s completely clear but he wasn’t a fan due to the different texture. Sooo it sat in the cabinet for two months- went to use it today, it seems to have completely separated. I tried to shake it up but all that comes out is very greasy and oily (though it is oil free, I believe).

What your heard is true — this sunscreen rocks! I don’t have a bad word to say about it. It even works for my mom who has very sensitive skin and is very particular about what she puts on her face. 
We love this formulation.
I have combo to oily skin and this is perfect on my face. Doesn’t make me greasy at all. No smell to it and the consistency of it is so nice. It glides on like butter. Will repurchase!
The best! Feels so lightweight & has no white cast whatsoever!

I really like this stuff!! It has zero white-cast and doesn’t make my skin sting bc it’s very sensitive. It has the texture of a blurring primer and goes really well under makeup but is also great on its own.
Love the way this feels on my skin, it's an odd texture for sunscreen but doesn't leave a white-cast and seems to work well with my skin.
For some reason, this sunscreen leaves an odd grey film on my skin (medium/tan). The texture is nice and the natural finish is great, just wish it didn’t  look grey!

It felt like I was applying a primer on that was really greasy and I went outside and got a little burnt and I put a coin size amount on my fingy. This texture is for a specific group of people. I will try the other sunscreens.
I adore this product!! Disappears into my skin & provides an ever so slight blurring effect
My new go-to daily sunscreen. Doesn’t leave a white cast, doesn’t leave me dewy, and doesn’t pill. It works well with or without makeup on. Perfect for protecting my skin from the harsh mountain sun!

This is my holy grail! 
I had switched to the Paula’s Choice (which I really like for the body) but it made my face really oily/greasy. If you had to buy 2 thing from Sephora. THIS IS IT!
does not leave white cast.. and blended well into my skin
My face is super oily, and living in Texas my face just looks like a grease ball. This sunscreen helps with a matte finish for me
this sunscreen doesn’t give me a white cast, has no scent and is beautiful under foundation and a bit of a glow in sunlight!

This sunscreen has the weirdest texture. I bought this tube as my first Supergoop! product. 

Not hating on the sunscreen, just not a fan of it's texture. I don't usually wear makeup and when I do, the face primer I use has a closer texture to face lotion. I think this would definitely work for those who wear makeup regularly bc it functions not only as a sunscreen but also as a primer. I could feel how this would allow for adherence to BB, CC cream, foundation, etc.

Only 3 stars bc the texture wasn't for me.

I don’t understand how this product is so hyped. I love how it feels and the 40 SPF. The big downfall is that I have very dry skin, I get eczema on my body and face. This sunscreen converted my face Into the most oilest land field out there. I started setting it with powder and within two hours I was so oily. Let’s not even talk about it under foundation. It became embarrassing when my family and friends started asking me if I was okay because I looked so “sweaty”. I would only use a pea size. Never again
This is definitely my favorite sunscreen protector. No oily, no color, fits perfect with makeup, and the texture it’s super soft. Love it!

I wanted to like this sunscreen so bad but it just did not work for me. It broke my skin out super bad after using it for about a week, and I still got a sunburn even though I followed all of the instructions, reapplied regularly, etc.
True to its name, it's truly an unseen sunscreen and it's pretty effective too.
reviews.review_title: An effective sunscreen that is true to its name

reviews.review_text: I love this sunscreen, the only downside of it is the fact that it smells chemically. It’s great to use instead of a primer because it has a matte feel to it!
Unfortunately when I use this under any makeup it pills like crazy. Wish I could recommend but I don’t.
At first I did not like the way it felt. On the initial application it felt like silicone but as you continue to work it into the skin it feels and looks great.

This is my absolute favorite sunscreen. I have dark skin and this is completely invisible. It does not leave my oily skin feeling greasy. There’s a slight matte finish. In comparison to Black Girl Matte Sunscreen, this has a similar texture but way less oily. BGS left my skin feeling like I put on a layer of Vaseline. Both are invisible but this one works for my skin. Totally worth the $40.
I LOVE the feel of this sunscreen on my face. Goes on like a smooth primer. No greasy feel at all. My foundation, powder, or whatever I use that day goes on really nicely over it.

Am I the only one who is slightly annoyed by $40 for sun protection and such a small bottle at that? I appreciate the invisible part but it feels like a slippery silicone primer without the smoothing effect. I think it is good but there are other great options, like the innisfree which I love.

I did not like this stuff at all. It’s got the weirdest texture and feels really greasy. I tried it a few times and I just can’t get past that. Yuck. Sadly, I waited too long to return, so I’m stuck with it.
I really like this sunscreen it’s clear and when I put it on it felt weightless there wasn’t any grease on my face!

I have mixed feelings about this product. I do love the texture I love how it goes on. it's a good primer. but not a good sunscreen. I just got back from Branson MO. and I am so burnt. I was I'm the sun all day and this didn't help me one bit...

I’ve been using this religiously for about a week now. Before this, I used the Dr Jart+ everyday sunfluid. I’ve tried some of the Korean brands as well. I figured I’d give this a go because I work in a hot kitchen and don’t like to feel overly greasy at any point in the day but I also want to wear my sunscreen. This has been awesome, no pilling, no excess grease, and most important for me, no breakouts. I have super reactive skin and it goes red or I can get hives pretty easily so trying new products is a crapshoot most of the time. This sits well on my skincare below with no issue. I have others I’ll use if I’m out hiking or swimming but for everyday wear, this is the one. Ps I have olive skin tone
The best sun screen I have ever used, no greasy feeling and my skin feel so smooth,

was scared at first but i freakin love this stuff. a little pricey, product may seem greasy on your fingers but once blended i don’t even know it’s on. i’ve had this stuff for about three months now and i’m no where near needing another.

I use this every day and love it. I was using Tatcha sunscreen but theirs was difficult to find in stock and costs idk like $60 compared to this one at $36. I don’t wear any foundation so this is blurring and a great base in the Texas heat.

My skin very sensitive- I do not break out or get clogged skin with this sunscreen

My mother used to slather whatever drugstore sunscreen on my face when I was a kid and I hated how heavy and oily it was, so I used to not wear sunscreen day to day.  This completely changed my mind about sunscreen.  It's so lightweight and has virtually no scent.  Now, I can protect my skin without feeling like I'm about to spend the day at the pool!

I love the feel of this on my skin, doesn't feel heavy or greasy and I haven't experienced and pilling. It works okay but even reapplying regularly I get sunburnt and I burn very rarely. I think this would be a great product when the UV index is below 6 but on those higher UV days is just not strong enough for me to protect my skin effectively.
reviews.review_title: Possibly better on lower UV index days

reviews.review_text: The Unseen Sunscreen is my new favourite sunscreen. Got a free sample in-store, fell in love and had to buy a full size. I have tried the ZincScreen and the SheerScreen but this one tops them both. It glides over the skin nicely and leaves my skin soft without feeling or looking greasy. I have found this product works well as a primer if you wear foundation. Definitely recommend this sunscreen if you want a natural finish.
Not a fan of this particular formula. When applying it on face it gets flaky towards the end
I’m obsessed with this product. I just love the way it feels on my skin and is totally invisible.  It’s now my daily go to, to protect my face from the sun!
Having dry skin and eczema flare up sometimes I Love this sunscreen it’s so smooth and no smell
No white cast whatsoever, makes skin glowy, not too greasy.
Great texture. Feels non-greasy. Absolutely invisible. However, it causes me breakouts. I have sensitive, acne prone skin. I think this would suit normal skin types better.
Am very oily so this did not work for me. But very small enough to fit your daily purse
reviews.review_title: Good for combination to dry skin

reviews.review_text:
Loveeeeeed it.
No white cast, super light on the skin and gave me a super soft feeling on my face :)
way too oily for me. made my skin feel weird and i will be returning. i wanted to like this.
I have olive/tan skin and it left no white cast it doesn’t have a weird smell to it and wears great under makeup
perfect for anyone who hates the feeling of sunscreen. non greasy and doesn’t pill at all.

I liked this sunscreen. It's my favorite sunscreen and blends well with my skincare routine. I do not give it 5 stars because I feel it runs fast on my skin. Like if I need to add more than the ideal portion to feel it is protecting my skin. But so far it helps my skin to be protected and it is not toxic.
Absolutely no cast whatsoever! Perfect for a no make-up look too as it lightly primes and evens out texture.
This is perfect for wearing underneath your makeup because it feels like a primer. it's pretty smoothing. It has a slight silconey slip to it. Highly recommend.
I love how there is not white cast. It is silicone but I don’t mind the texture. Goes very well under the Bare Minerals tinted moisturizer cream. I even wear this alone without makeup.

This is the sunscreen of my dreams. A friend raved about it and it was hard for me to understand how someone could be so excited about sunscreen. I was skeptical. But this sunscreen is miraculous. 

The texture is sort of like vaseline. Not promising, right? But the second it touches your skin, it turns into this velvety powdery layer, virtually disappearing. Can't say enough nice things. I'm bummed because I got one of the summer kits from Sephora with a bunch of sunscreen samples, and I feel like I should use up the other samples before I buy more of this. But this sunscreen--it's my one true love!
My go to sunscreen. Doesn't leave a white sheen and doesn't have much of a smell, so it's great for everyday use.
This has been my go to sunscreen for the last 2 years!!! Love how it sits on my skin and works as a primer!!
I’ve been using this sunscreen for 3 years and it haven’t broken me out yet. Works as a primer just like the Smashbox photo finish.
This is a great sunscreen. As someone with very oily skin I was impressed by how velvety this was and how it mattified my face :)
Beautiful finish and good as a primer but basically pure silicone. Made me breakout and I used it for a month to be sure.  Clogs pores. Wish it had worked

Sits on the skin just like a primer, works beautifully! I have a special needs kid who is very picky about sunscreens on his face and the application and texture of this one are perfection for him. I was out for 4 hours, reapplied twice and my skin stayed protected!

Textured like a primer,  this is really,  really weird... until you get used to it.  However,  if works like a dream,  and it doesn't leave streaks on my black or dark clothing, or on my skin.  I can tell where it's applied because the texture is so unique.  It also doesn't have a super strong scent,  which is good for me.

I've had a lot of problems with sunscreens in the past (breakouts, allergic reactions, peeling, you name it). I was pleasantly surprised with this product, its clear so no  whitecast, a bit mattefying and doesn't clogg your pores.

best sunscreen i’ve tried so far. i really hate the feeling of sunscreen and the smell it has but this one is perfect. it is smooth and clear, so no white cast, and doesn’t make me look really shiny like other sunscreens do. is a great undetectable makeup primer

Smooth as silk. This is hands down the best sunscreen I’ve ever used! Comes on very smooth and sets well on my moisturizer. 

I initially got this as a free sample and I immediately purchased more.

Why is this one of the best primers ever???!!! It literally keeps my makeup in place all day. I’m honestly shook! 
What sorcery is this? I bought on a whim to use for an all day summer party. Kept makeup in tact and protected me from the sun. 

Give it a try! 

Could be breaking me out but unsure still.
Forget the white cast of sunscreens, this product is great! I totally recommend it.
reviews.review_title: One of the best sunscreens out there

reviews.review_text: Run don’t walk. I don’t know why more people aren’t raving about this sunscreen, a huge complaint for sunscreens is white cast, THIS this right here has no possible chance of leaving a white cast on ANY skin tone. I will say when you first put in on it’s like woah this is greasy but once it settles it’s really not greasy at all. It has the feel of a silicone makeup primer. I wear it every single day on my face.
This is my favorite sunscreen ever! So lightweight, not greasy, and leaves no white residue on your face like mist. I find the protection to be enough for me. It goes on so silky smooth.

This product pills.  I use a Shiseido foaming cleanser, then moisturizer, no make up.  Even without moisturizer, still pills.  At least it pills clear I guess.  I really wanted to like this product, but if the only way it doesn’t pill is if I pat the sunscreen into my face, then it’s not a very usable sunscreen.
Family favorite! Everyone loves this sunscreen. Works so well under foundation!
absolutely love this product , great for my brwon skin and leaves no white tint.

i’ve been using this spf for over a year and it’s easily one of the best on the market. it’s not greasy, feels great on your skin, is easy to reapply, and does jot leave a white cast. i can’t recommend it enough
reviews.review_title: one of the best on the market

reviews.review_text: It does what it says and works over most moisturizers, I'm not a fan on the feel on the skin, my hands are on my face quite a bit and even much later in the day I can still "feel" it. There is no white cast, which is really the most likeable thing about his but I wouldn't willingly repurchase
I've finally found a sunscreen that doesn't make me look pale or ashy. For my oily skin it doesn't work perfectly as a primer but I still love the product.

I purchased a sample through Sephora’s sun safety set.  It lasted me about two weeks with consistent reapplication. I wanted to like it (I did at first) but my skin just needed something different. This SPF feels like a primer, very silicon-like, and I love that texture personally but my skin would get oily 1-2hrs after applying which it hasn’t done in a long time (it’s usually 4-6 hrs or by the end of the day). Even if I used blotting paper or powder and re-apply, it would get oily so quickly again. I concluded that my skin needs more moisture from a sunscreen. I have combination skin where part of my face gets oily the other stays normal but can easily become dry. After days of using this I noticed that the texture changed slightly and the SPF became more gritty which I didn’t like since my skin is reactive + I didn’t like the feeling. Maybe I had a bad product, I’ll definitely try again in the future just in case but so far, I can’t recommend.
reviews.review_title: I Wish it Worked for Me

reviews.review_text:
Love this!
Goes on very smoothly and doesn’t leave a white cast
I love this sunscreen, not oily and works great alone or under foundation
Texture was weird when I first tried it (silicone feel). But after awhile I got used to it! It’s lightweight and easy to reapply/carry around.
this broke me out :( im not even that acne prone. its big confusing, i started getting pimples not long after using it, and the same happened to my sister when she uses it.

Love the consistency on my oily skin, especially in the summer heat. However, I had to stop using it because I noticed I would get a breakout the very next day after using. Once I stopped using it, the breakouts stopped. Now I have to keep searching for a sunscreen that doesn’t leave me feeling me oily but also doesn’t leave a white cast on my dark skin.
Love this sunscreen. Very lightweight. Pricey but definitely worth it!

The consistency, color, and feel of this sunscreen feels like putting Vaseline on the skin. However, it actually dissolves beautifully in the skin without leaving any white cast or other residue. It makes the appearance of pores small, and sits like your favorite primer. It’s a great base for makeup too!
reviews.review_title: Glides like Vaseline, but feels like Chanel

reviews.review_text:
Best Face Sunscreen Ever! Not greasy.
Used in Hawaii for 7 days, I am fair skinned & not 1 sunburn... even swimming all day.
Buy it, you won't regret it!
Buy this, you should have bought it yesterday. This sunscreen is … amazing. Lightweight, not oily at all, no white cast and I can hardly tell I have it on.
I wore this at a lake in the beginning of summer and my face got burnt to a crisp. Didn’t sweat, didn’t go swimming, my face turned bright red. Don’t think there is real sun protection here.

I love the texture and lightness but the product just doesn’t protect you from the sun well at all. There are much better products (at same price point!) out there that provide all day defense against sun damage. Made the mistake of taking this along as a trial during a weekend in California. Came home with mild sunburn on the face. I’ve had much longer sun exposure (up to 12 hours!) using other products (Lancôme and Dr. Brandt) and never had any redness in the face — and never had to reapply during the day!
reviews.review_title: better products out there for all day protection

reviews.review_text: Great product! I have really sensitive skin, and this hasn’t bothered it at all - definitely is a staple in my makeup routine

I have a hard time with sunscreen. When I put a lot of sunscreen brands on my face, I instantly feel like my skin is not breathing and is starting to feel like I am sweating under the sunscreen. This however does not give me that feeling. It feels just like a primer or a moisturizer. Very happy and will be repurchasing when I finish mine.

So I really love this formula as a primer/sunscreen duo. It's super siliconey in texture so if that's not your thing you won't like it. But it blurs pores, grips makeup, and protects your skin all in one. Highly recommend for summer events. Only reason I docked a star is because it did break me out a little bit, but I'm just sensitive to chemical sunscreen.

Holy grail!!! I hate wearing sunscreen on my face. It’s thick, greasy, leaves a white cast and clogs my pores. This is the complete opposite. It’s clear, goes on like a gel primer, absorbs immediately and doesn’t clog my pores. I didn’t want to love this so much because it’s kind of pricey, but it’s worth the money hands down. It also goes on flawlessly under makeup. Will recommend to everyone (especially those who hate wearing sunscreen like I do). I now look forward to putting on sunscreen in the morning.

I like it! I love that it’s clear; I don’t need sunscreen to make me look more pale than I already am so I’m glad there’s not white residue. Has a sort of strange consistency on the border between greasy and silky, but I have very oily skin so that could be why.
No white cast. Really good for people with oily skin.

I have combination skin: Oily T-Zone with dryness in cheeks and neck area; sensitive skin. I use this sunscreen after I have washed and moisturized my face. Once you first apply the sunscreen, it may feel oily at first, but once you work it into your skin, it feels very light. As someone who has experienced clogged pores from sunscreens and stopped using spf due to that reason, this brand has not caused me any skin troubles. Has a very light scent.

Man oh man. I have been using Supergoop Play for some years now, but as I have gotten older, for some reason it seems to look more oily on my skin than before. I love Supergoop, so recently I decided to try their other sunscreens. Boy, have I been missing out on the Unseen Sunscreen. I will say the texture is a little weird. heavy feeling going on, almost like a skin barrier, but when its all said and done I truly forgot I was wearing anything AT ALL. From a face sunscreen perspective, I have never felt anything like it. literally nothing. I am so excited! reapplying was perfection too.

This is definitely worth the hype and price. It is the only sunscreen that has worked for me. It melts into the skin, isn't oily, doesn't break me out like other sunscreens people say are holy grails. Goes easy over/under makeup and reapplicating is a breeze. I bought one for work and my car!

one star because it’s clear sunscreen, half a star because its matte, and another half a star because it doesn’t stink. i also love that it’s spf 40! but other than that, this stuff ain’t it.. at least for me! 

it peels so much! with or without makeup! it just sits on top of the skin like another layer. ugh! 

to the back of the skincare cabinet it goes!
reviews.review_title: i really wanted to love this product

reviews.review_text: Not worth the hype! Feels like silicone and pils really bad safe your money
For those of us oily peeps, this one sort of mattifies your skin in a very subtle way.
Worst product ever!! Horrible combination of sunburn & weirdest breakout ever. How did this ever pass the testing phase???? I want my money & pre sunburn skin back!!

I love this so much, there actually aren’t words to describe it. It immediately absorbed into my sensitive skin and was like I had put nothing on. My moisturizer even leaves a minor sticky feel. This was just, gone. I have severe rosacea, this will now be the only face sunscreen I use.

I have tried many different sunscreen SPF products for my face of combo oily and dry skin. This is by far one of my favorite products to date. Most products leave white streaks that don’t feel or look pleasant. However, this product absorbs into my skin so well without any noticeable white streaks. I have a medium skin tone and this leaves me with a light Dewey look and feel. I apply Moroccan oil to my cleansed face for hydration then layer this over and it’s worked wonders on my face. 10/10 would recommend.
I am in love with this unseen SPF.  You can wear under your makeup or apply afterwards.  It’s great.  I live in the south and it’s pool season!!!
Hands down, the best sunscreen I have ever used.  Invisible & stayed on all day.  I’m very fair and didn’t burn.

I’m giving this product 2 stars because the brand DOES have some great products and also for innovation (clear sunscreen). HOWEVER, this particular product of theirs is terrible (IMO). It is definitely not suited for anyone with combo or oily skin. It is very slippery in texture (due to the oils, silicones & silica). I wore this inside my house and I’m glad I did. 

Initial application was just the sunscreen alone for about 15-20 mins. My skin had a slight sheen to it. I then proceeded with my normal makeup routine to see how the two interact. Because it is SO slippery with silicones, it allowed the makeup to “glide” onto my skin. This is great for using less makeup & easier application. HOWEVER, over time, my face began to look “sweaty/shiny”; so much so that it looked that I had applied Illuminator to my face when I wasn’t wearing any. 

I never have to wear setting powder unless I’m wearing a glam makeup look for a special occasion. The setting spray I normally use locks everything in place (even through heavy sweating at the gym). I wore this sunscreen inside for about 6 hours and by the end of the day, it was just not cute. I have combo skin and my whole face looked oily and felt moist *barf*. I don’t see how this product does well or stays put in place in the blazing sun. 

This sunscreen was just not it and I’m not a fan.

I rarely ever write reviews but this product is so good I just have to. I was looking for a sunscreen that wouldn’t disturb my makeup but still protect my skin. When I first started to apply it, I really thought I was going to hate it because it feels like silicone at first, almost like I was applying the Smashbox photo finish primer! But I let it dry down for several minutes and then applied my makeup and it instantly exceeded all my expectations. It grips my makeup so well and made my skin look completely poreless and smooth. As someone with super oily skin, this made my makeup last longer than anything else I’ve ever tried (and I’ve tried it all!) it wore so well all day long, after 12 hours I didn’t even want to take it off because it still looked so good! It didn’t feel heavy on my skin, it didn’t irritate my eyes at all, and it made my makeup look phenomenal. I love this product and I hope it sticks around forever.

This sunscreen is great! I love that it dries down and feels just like your skin. It’s perfect for me considering I need to layer my make up over my sunscreen. My only complaint is that it has an oily feel to it, but goes away once you rub it in. Great product and will be repurchasing!
This works so well under makeup. It’s the first facial sunscreen I’ve found that doesn’t pill on the skin. I also love how there isn’t a heavy sunscreen scent to it.

It’s a clear sunscreen that feels a bit like Vaseline and primer, specifically like a Elf primer I used to use. I have dry skin around my checks and chin so I wasn’t too worried about the consistency of this product. That being said because it feel a bit like Vaseline, I wasn’t sure if I would like this because it does feel a bit too oily for me. However, I waited a few minutes & as it dried, it no longer felt Vaseline/primer like. My face felt quite smooth and I forgot I had sunscreen on lol. Overall, I would say it is a good sunscreen.
Its a good sunscreen, dries matte, great primer, just super expensive for the amount you get. It lasts me a month.
reviews.review_title: Way too expensive for what it is

reviews.review_text: I’ve never come across a product that ticks all the boxes and I mean ALL! This sunscreen is THE BOMB! I’ve tried almost every sunscreen ever made and this one is perfect for combo/ oily skin! It feels like a primer, absorbs like a primer and leave no grease or cast whatsoever! This is the only sunscreen that gives a matte finish and is very lightweight.
Seems to work and feels like a primer which is nice because it’s not oily and greasy.

I like that it’s clear and the texture is not bad it’s has a natural finish. I would have live it but during the summer I was sweating a lot and it ended in my eyes so NO!!! The sweatproof
Claim was a lie!!!
reviews.review_title: Good but definitely not sweat resistant

reviews.review_text: i absolutely love this sunscreen - it goes on so satiny smooth, it makes it fun for me to wear sunscreen :))

I'm not sure who wrote the standards for "clean" beauty but this product does not meet my personal standards. I enjoyed using it, it goes on smoothly and you don't need a large amount, but once I actually looked up the ingredients I realized I can't continue to use this product. It is not reef-safe, as it contains Octocrylene (can cause brain deformities in fish larva and reproductive toxicity - imagine what it could do to humans applying it regularly on their skin - and there is evidence that it can bleach coral). It also contains Homosalate, which doesn't break down easily and has been found on sea life and corals. Bummer.

I was skeptical because I read the bad reviews, but it really does go on clear. Obviously I have to reapply throughout the day. I can’t expect it to work all day after one application. I wish it was cheaper but if I have to spend the money on it, I will.
I always had problems to put any sunscreen because most of them was to sticky and have a smell. This sunscreen is very smooth whiteout any smell . I love it

I bought this sunscreen because I had seen good reviews and I needed a new sunscreen as summer is approaching. I’ve used it for about a week and started breaking out. At first I wasn’t sure what in my skincare caused this but I’m pretty sure it’s this sunscreen! Not to mention that I’ve also gotten more tan after one week from using this product, I don’t think the spf was affective enough on my skin. Most sunscreens I’ve used have never caused this so I’m not sure why this one is different. Sad that this product didn’t work for me.

First sunscreen I’ve used that doesn’t burn or sting my eyes. Even with the most careful application other high end sunscreens make my eyes water & burn just from the scent of it. I will be repurchasing this to use year round!
if you have oily skin this is a BIG NO! consistency is weird and just makes your face oilier. if you have dry skin i think it’d be better

I’ve used this daily for the past 2 weeks and I just really love it. I have really sensitive acne prone skin that always breaks out within the day from the other sunscreens but this one works beautifully with my skincare routine!
I had so much hope in this from all the hype I see but it literally broke me out so much don’t use if you have sensitive skin

Unfortunately this product was very clogging to my pores, I am assuming due to it being so silicone based although my skin seems to handle other silicone products just fine so I am not sure! I got a ton of under the skin bumps on my chin after using this but with some skincare I managed to get rid of them after about 3 days! It’s a shame because I really liked the finish and it didn’t pill under makeup.. The texture was also a bit strange/unique. Hopefully it works for you! If you notice small bumps under the skin stop using it!
Amazing stuff! Super lightweight and doesn’t clog pores or leaves skin feeling greasy.

One of my favorite unscreens! So easy to reapply during the day to the natural matte finish and LOVE that it doesn't pill. Also decent under makeup, recommend letting it sit for 10 minutes before applying any face makeup unless you only wear powder.
reviews.review_title: Love it for a non-oily finish!

reviews.review_text: I love this products because it protects my skin and doubles as a primer.

I love this so much on its own or as a primer before makeup, and have been using it for years! It can pill up a little if you don’t give your skincare a chance to absorb prior to applying, just a heads up.
The consistency is slippery but dries down and leaves your skin soft so far I’m loving this I also wear under my makeup.
my favorite sunscreen, i never go a day without it. i don’t recommend this if you have oily skin.
This is my go to sun screen. It leaves my face feeling flawless, matte, and like I don’t even have anything on. It doesn’t have much of a scent.

I absolutely love Unseen Sunscreen and have been using it for years, since it first came out. The texture is super unique and blends into skin nicely. It's my everyday go-to sunscreen, whether I'm wearing makeup over top or just spf. Sometimes in winter I switch to Superscreen if my skin is overly dry, but most of this year this is all I need. It's also a must-have at the beach and keeps me sunburn free- I love wearing it, so it helps me remember to reapply all day!

I bought this sunscreen twice and it works great; however, be aware that it does not pair well with the Sephora nourishing moisturizer; it does not absorb well and caused me to break out, and I had to cleanse my face before reapplying the sunscreen due to the white cast. However, it compliments my other moisturizer (Malin+ Goetz, which is not available at Sephora).

I have generally been underwhelmed by Supergoop products as a Certified Sunscreen Queen. This is the exception. If you want something that will look good no matter how hot it gets and will not stain even when you sweat, this is the best thing out there. It is also one that you can reapply without it feeling too gross. I can apply it over tattoos without any weird color issue as well. Usually I would assume that something of this tone and consistency would be awful for oily skin, but this isn’t bad. Obviously, it’s not matte, but it’s not crazy “dewy.” Definitely apply enough though. This is not an “a little goes a long way” product at all.
Felt like a silicone makeup primer.  It left my skin feeling congested and broke me out after about 5 days.  I felt the need to get a facial to clear the congestion.  Had to return
Amazing sunscreen - blends right into the skin without any of the typical greasy sunscreen residue.
Stays on and you cannot feel it on your face :) it does not make your face oily.

This is thick when it comes out but glides on smoothly. It is almost like a primer. Not oily at all! Excellent product. I absolutely love it. I have rarely used facial sunscreens due to the oily residue or chalky dryness of the sunscreens. No issue with that here. Truly impressed.

I have been reading amazing things about this sunscreen but I was not expecting too much because I don’t tend to like chemical sunscreens but this one is amazing!
PROS:
- Great texture: although it has a strong silicone texture, it spreads easily and absorbs quickly, even applying quite a lot.
- It leaves the skin feeling silky soft.
- It leaves a soft matte finish immediately(not greasy at all). 
- It works amazing under my makeup. This is what I like the most about this sunscreen, that my foundation always looks amazing over it. It seems to work as a primer because it even minimizes the look of my pores.
- It is a non scented formula.
- Clean at Sephora
CONS:
- It is a chemical sunscreen: this is just because of preference, that I prefer physical sunscreens, because this is an amazing product. 
- It is a little pricey, but the quality makes it worth it! 
I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador
i like this product but the price is really high even the travel size is expensive
Goes on smooth, not at all greasy. A tiny bit goes a long way. Great under makeup.

Feels like you’re wearing nothing at all! Not greasy or oily. I have very sensitive skin and this does not affect it in a negative way. The only caveat is that it does sting my eyes (even though I didn’t put it near them at all). But I also have very sensitive eyes. Works well as a primer too.

This product is amazing! I’ve always had problems with sunscreen being too harsh on my skin or leaving a white cast, but this sunscreen is next level. It glides on my skin so well and my skin absorbs it instantly. Not only that, but the sheerness of it is fantastic, it is practically invisible. Will be purchasing again.

Beautiful finish. Easy to blend. Excellent under make up
Good primer . No white cast . Truly unseen
Love this sunscreen, I have been using for years! There is no white cast!

Love this sunscreen. Goes on so effectively and leaves a natural finish. Love the way it feels and looks on the skin. Doesn’t give an oily, greasy shine like how some sunscreens do. Also, works great under makeup.
It came with Sun Safety Kit. I am using it at home but I hate this product. My skin can not absorb it, it feels like something greasy on my face. I have never used a product like this.

Omg I love this!! I was hesitant to try chemical sunscreen because I heard mineral is better for your skin and that there’s not enough research on chemical sunscreen. But I wanted to try this out after reading so many good reviews. I bought the mini size to try it out and I’m in love with how it looks on my skin! Texture is silky and feels like primer. It’s invisible and not greasy. It’s easy to apply make up on top. This is going to be my new fav sunscreen :)

I want to like the Supergoop sunscreens but they all contain Avobenzone, Homosalate, Octocrylene, and Octisalate which are all known toxic hormone disruptors. Not sure why it’s marked as “clean” when these are some of the worst ingredients in sunscreen. Besides that, I love the variety of styles/finishes

I love this stuff! It doesn’t feel oily or heavy on my skin and it doesn’t transfer. I like how it layers well with other products, even makeup. So far it gives me good protection from the sun even without reapplying. Only giving it four stars because the yellow cap is about the same size as the package. I think I should’ve gotten a little more product for the price. I was not expecting it to be this small.

you literally cannot feel it on your face. i will put it on my face and i don’t even know where i put it because it just disappears on the skin and you can’t feel it. it doesn’t feel greasy or liquids which is so weird. i highly recommend this product!

This stuff is amazing! It goes on smoothly and clear-colored, and it feels very light on the skin, not greasy, sticky, and white-streaked like regular sunscreens. Plus, I love that it works as a primer too, so I don’t have that extra step in my routine.

I had high hopes for this product. I used this as a primer, with Armani luminous silk foundation. My foundation appears darker. And within one hour, my face becomes oily and my pores were SUPER VISIBLE. It’s insane. The hourglass primer has never given me this problem.
I would return this if I didn’t throw out the package.
new fave sunscreen! I love the texture and consistency. It is very smooth. first time ever seeing a sunscreen with this texture. it is great to use under makeup.

Love this stuff!  The best sunscreen is the one you’ll use.  This is usable every day, with i or without makeup.  In fact, it acts like a primer for your makeup.  It disappears without a trace—no white, streaky look, no sunscreen smell.  It’s just perfect.

Honestly wanted to love it because it feels light but it left me really greasy and separated under my makeup. I wore this under the Estée Lauder foundation, after a few hours, everything separated and I looked sooo cakey. It may because of the formula differences of both but since that is my go to foundation, I don’t see the point of forcing it. I use this sunscreen for my arms now (LOL). If anyone is looking for other sunscreens, I recommend the Bondi Sands Face SPF 50 sunscreen and Bliss spf 30 sunscreen. They’re cheaper and dry down matte with no white cast. I’m Indian (light medium skin tone) with acne prone skin <3. Hope this helped someone.
Loooove this product! No fragrance and no weird white streaks like others, it’s clear and the consistency is smooth. Will melt into your skin effortlessly. They also carry make tinted sunscreen !

Wow, just wow. I rarely say this but this product is very good. Finally found a facial sunscreen that doesn't feel greasy, doesn't leave white residue all over your face, is not tested on animals, and works well as a primer for foundation. It works as a blurring pore-perfecting primer, makes the skin look matte and smooth, minimizes the appearance of pores, and works really well with my foundation. I'm actually really surprised that it worked so well. Works really good on oily T-Zone as well. I got a tester when I ordered a spray from Supergoop, definitely going to buy a full bottle now.
pricey, but if you need a no white cast sunscreen worth it!
reviews.review_title: No white cast, no highlighting of weird texture

reviews.review_text: Clear, doesn’t leave skin feeling greasy or with a white sheen.
This goes on clear and without feeling heavy! It just feels like skin!
reviews.review_title: only sunscreen I’ve liked so far!

reviews.review_text: As soon as I put this on it instantly makes my face feel slimy. It’s so slick that I can’t tell when it’s been absorbed or not, doesn’t absorb fast, and makes my already oily skin feel oilier. I was excited to try it because it has tons of great reviews, but I guess it’s just not for me. A shame, because $48 is a lot for a tiny amount of product, save your money.

I like this sunscreen. Goes on clear & I haven't broken out or had any problems. Plus it gives me a bit of a matte finish on days I just use my serums and this and no makeup. Will definitely purchase again and going to look at some other Supergoop! products as well!
Love this stuff! Goes on smooth and clear, no fragrance, is a good primer and sunscreen combined. I took off one star cause the product is pricey.

I've tried a lot of different sun screen and this ones in my top 3! Leaves my skin looking dewy and hydrated, and easy to wash off with most cleansers. My favorite part of this sunscreen is that is clean unlike most sunscreen that are white leaving you skin with a white case.

I have tried so many sunscreens. I understood a long time ago that I needed to use sunscreen, but it was so difficult for me to want to apply sunscreen when it would always make my makeup look oily or slip off. However, this sunscreen was a game changer! It is the first sunscreen I have found that doesn’t impact the way my makeup wears throughout the day. I will definitely be repurchasing!
Love this sunscreen! It goes on so velvety smooth and helps keep my oil at bay as it’s more matte. I also haven’t noticed it sting my eyes either. Definitely will be repurchasing!
Love this. It doesn’t leave a white cast over my face
Love how this product goes on matte and protects your face. It's just light and goes on smoothly

I’ve searched everywhere for a good sunscreen that won’t turn me into a grease ball since I have extremely oily skin and this is ittt!!! It doesn’t even pill and looks great under makeup. Pricey for a sunscreen but SO worth it

I love this.. It’s definitely different than I expected but in a good way. It goes on and feels really smooth and makes my face a little shiny/glowy (but not too much) which I think looks pretty and natural. It might seem like an expensive amount to spend on a sunscreen but it’s honestly worth it to protect your face and a little goes a long way
Love how this sunscreen feels, goes great under makeup. Will not burn your eyes.
Feels smooth and silky and works great.  Will definitely buy again.
feels amazing on the skin, completely invisible. really easy to reapply throughout the day
Very pricey but an amazing product for people with darker skin. I’ve always struggled to find a sunscreen that doesn’t leave a white cast. And it works great as a primer too!
reviews.review_title: Expensive but great for people with darker skin

reviews.review_text: BEST SPF EVERRRRRR, I have super oily skin and with this product my face looks AMAZING. Highly recommended

This is the only facial sunscreen that my skin has been able to tolerate.  I have no issues with rash/blotches/ redness.  It goes on clear and stays clear.  It’s also been my primer.  So far, any makeup that I have put on stays in place.
Holy grail sunscreen. My forever go-to! I have oily skin and this doesn’t contribute AT ALL.
The best sunscreen there is love it hydrates also gives me most compliments leaves nice glowy skin.

Couldn’t love this sunscreen more. I apply it over my moisturizer and it glides on super smooth and is completely invisible. It’s kind of mind blowing how amazing this sunscreen is. It leaves my face feeling silky soft.

I’ve been using this sunscreen since 2020 and I haven’t gone back since. I am of medium complexion and bike often during the summer. No cast, feels good, and great SPF! it is pricey, but it’s absolutely worth it!!
Absolutely perfect for protection as well as achieving a flawless base for makeup application

I LOVE this sunscreen! There is no white cast, it’s not too oily for me. I will say if you have oily skin it might be too much but I have combination skin and it’s great. It’s also kind of pricey but I’m willing to spend money on a good spf
reviews.review_title: A very good sunscreen but maybe a little pricey

reviews.review_text: This is probably one of my favorite sunscreens I've ever tried! I've tried buying other sunscreens, mineral ones that "don't leave a white cast" and cheaper chemical options, and I just purchased this sunscreen for the fourth time. I also come back to this because it's a reliable choice and have had no problems. I'm Southeast Asian with a skin tone that's on the lighter side of the medium/tan range, so if I wear a 100% mineral sunscreen, my skin is light enough that it blends in but also dark enough for someone to tell that my skin tone looks off (sort of like a white cool-toned tint to my warm skin?). In other words, I just look a bit paler than usual and it looks unnatural. With this sunscreen, I don't have to think about if you can see it on my skin or if it's not blended. I usually put on more sunscreen than suggested (just to be safe), and this glides on extremely easily over my skin ( and I also didn't notice any scent/an unpleasant chemical smell). It is a bit slippery (no oils are in this, just silicones), but your skin will feel soft after rubbing it in. Speaking of which, you don't need to put in a lot of effort to apply! I had recently gotten jaw surgery and had switched to a different sunscreen (chemical, but had a white color that disappeared after rubbing in). I had incisions on the left and right side of my bottom jaw, which sunscreen would be necessary to prevent scarring, and I found that I had trouble rubbing in my sunscreen (walking into harsh lighting, I'd see white along the sides of my jaw from not blending well enough). I switched to this instead and had no problem, nor did I have to worry about having any weird coloring. The finish is a soft matte, almost similar to the Fenty Pro Filter Instant Retouch Primer. Overall, if you want an SPF that you would enjoy applying and wouldn't have to worry about looking weird or greasy, this is perfect!
reviews.review_title: An SPF You Won't Have to Think Twice About!

reviews.review_text: My favorite facial sunscreen! I use this all the time. Doesn’t feel greasy. Also works great as a primer, as it has similar consistency. Highly recommend!
Already in love with this product!! Definitely going to be buying some more! It doesn't look like normal sunscreen in the slightest it's so perfect!
it’s goes on skin so smoothly, easy to apply. and a little goes a long way.

This is amazing!! I honestly didn't think I would like it at first because my skin tends to get oily throughout the day, and I thought this would just make it worse. But honestly, after a few minutes of applying it, you can't even feel it. This is the only SPF I've tried that I don't dread putting on my face. I just went ahead and purchased the jumbo size during the sale, because it's really that great!!!

Giving it two stars because it feels heavy on my face and suffocating to my skin. I put it on and as others have said it doesn’t soak in. It doesn’t feel like other primers that I have used with SPF. I can still feel it on my face. I got it because my skin is dry/oily. My T zone gets oily while my cheeks and neck get very dry. I tried Elta 46 for face but it dried out my cheeks and neck and I had very visible dry patches. I read it was because of the zinc oxide. So now I’m back to square one trying to find a face sunscreen that works well under makeup and works well with my combo skin and doesn’t feel like I have a face mask on. I’ve tried Cerave AM and my makeup just slid right off.
This sunscreen is so lightweight and a little goes such a long way. Not greasy and doesn't make me look shiny. Sits nicely under makeup. Will definitely purchase again.

I’ve used only Japanese sunscreens for years. I’m running low on my usual so I decided to pick this one up when I was in-store shopping during the sale. I love this under make-up. I still will use it alone without make-up but this one is so good under make-up. I ordered a second bottle online during the sale and don’t see myself going back to my “usual” sunscreen when that bottle runs out.
It says for sensitive skin but it made me break out. It felt heavy and made me look super oily. As soon I put it on my face would tingle. Tried for three days but I had to return it

PROS:
-transparent/no white cast
-great primer 
-easy reapplication 
-no strong scent 
-does not break me out 

CONS:
-price but it’s honestly worth it

This product is gel-based and does not feel as thick and streaky as any other sunscreen that I have used. I love the way it goes on and the way it dries while still keeping the glow of my skin. It also works really great as a primer underneath makeup after you've done your skin care.
One of my favorite sunscreens for dry skin. I alternate with this Renee rouleou spf 30 and elta md spf 46. This is a great option during summer when it’s hot and humid.

Okay, so I waited to write my review because I wanted to test the product out on a face with foundation, a skin tint, and also bare face. I didn't like it bare face because my face started feeling very greasy. However, with the foundation and skin tint, as a base, this product pairs very nicely! Gives a flawless finish and held my makeup in place. I do believe it pairs best with a skin tint, though.

My favorite to wear every day. I HATE the feeling of being able to feel my sunscreen. This feels like a silicone primer that dries down smooth and basically undetectable. No white cast or heavy feeling. My go-to sunscreen because I know it will work in all situations whether I go bare faced or add makeup. I don’t think it has added skincare benefits like other coming on the market; however, I will continue to keep repurchasing. As a normal skin person with tendencies to get oily in the T zone, this is better for me than Glow as Glow makes me feel like a disco ball when alone.

My favorite sunscreen i’ve ever used! I have been wanting to try this sunscreen forever and finally bought it last week. I have combo skin and every sunscreen i’ve ever used has either made me super oily, left a white cast, pilled or made me break out. This leaves my skin glowing and no white cast. I’ve never liked a product this much, will 100% be purchasing again!!

honestly i’ve never found a sunscreen that goes well under makeup. i have very dry skin and every sunscreen i’ve tried have made my makeup super oily or even dryer! this sunscreen not only works well under makeup but makes my makeup look even better! it’s smoothness makes it work almost like a primer and it helps blur my pores i honestly love it
Best sunscreen. The name speaks for itself, very lightweight and non greasy. Highly recommend!

This sunscreen is quite interesting. I've gotten 2 tubes of this product and the first tube felt a little gritty, and the second was buttery smooth. In terms of application it's smooth and weightless. And though yes, it is as advertised on the name and is indeed unseen I do feel that my face feels...slightly greasy. I believe the package does say it works as a primer so perhaps that's why it feels like the way it does. I can see the appeal, but it's not for me.

Can’t (wont) leave home without this on! Holy grail product, I’ve been through probably a half dozen tubes, can’t get enough. Even got my Ma hooked! 

Smooth, applies like a dream, no cast, no smell, no taste, stays put, wont f up your makeup, easy to reapply! Love!

Unseen sunscreen is what dreams are made of! I near exclusively use Supergoop for my sunscreen needs (face and body, baby) and this is no exception. Weightless, cuts down shine, wont budge when applied, good oil control. I have a mini in each purse, at my desk at work, and TWO in my camping bag. Obsessed.
The best sunscreen ever. No pilling, no white cast, no stickiness, no greasy after feeling. Just perfect, I do wish it wasn’t so expensive.

I loved this product and how it operated almost as a primer. But I recently have been doing research on harmful chemicals in sunscreen and this has avobenzone, which can disrupt your hormones and is toxic when exposed to chlorine. I wanted to use this all summer but don’t want to put those chemicals on my skin. I’m currently looking for a cleaner alternative.
reviews.review_title: Feels great but don’t love the ingredients

reviews.review_text: This sunscreen is absolutely divine! Because this sunscreen is translucent, it works on every skin tone! Beautiful filtered finish, and great makeup primer as well!
My go to all year around!!!! LOOOOOVVVVEEE! I put it under my make up and it’s never failed me:)
Second time purchasing this sunscreen. Love the texture and the matt finish. Amazing sunscreen to protect my skin!
reviews.review_title: Love the unseen and matt finish of this sunscreen.

reviews.review_text: Nice base for makeup but Slides around even with setting spray.  and pills above moisturizer . Not for combo/ oily skin!!! Pretty decent alone with powder on top
The scent of this killed me—I'm talking, I just constantly smelled it all day. If you're sensitive to scent/get migraines, I'd avoid fully. It's one of those "unscented" scents. Awful.
This product has a ton of silicone in it, so much so that it feels gross on my skin.

This is so sad because I love this brand but this sunscreen gave me so much acne, it’s insane. I’ve been on curology for two years, my skin has been flawless since I started. I used this sunscreen for almost three weeks and my face literally hurt from the acne. As soon as I stopped using it my acne cleared and now my skin looks good again. That was also the only new product I added to my routine so it couldn’t have been anything else. Too sad

I'm picky with sunscreens, but this is my favorite! It's got a smooth, silicone-like texture that dries matte and silky. No white caste at all. Good for dry skin (though I use a moisturizer underneath). I burn easily, and can sit in the sun for 2+ hours with this without burning.
reviews.review_title: silicone texture, no white cast, good for dry skin

reviews.review_text:
I loved this when I was NOT wearing foundation, and I guess it's not the worst primer in the world, but it definitely does not grip the way most silicon primers (like Smashbox) grip. I found that it usually looked okay at first, but by the end of the day my makeup had moved or settled; and since I wear an N-95 or other close-fitting mask off and on for work, it REALLY inspired my makeup to move and wear off.

Since my whole goal was to reduce one stage in my skincare/makeup application routine by combining an SPF with some other product, this did not do it for me and I returned it.

If you like silicone primers and stuff you may like this! I personally can’t get over the texture. It’s very silicone like and slippery and greasy. It feels like it’s clogging my pores. Did not do well on my oily skin, It also doesn’t sink in or anything, so it feels heavy. To me at least. I think it’s a to each their own type of product. For me, the Innisfree one worked way better. In every situation. And that one is only $15. Definitely give it a try if it’s been on your mind, but for me it was pretty lackluster.
Best sunscreen ever. Not oily at all. Goes on so smooth.

Loved this when I was in Puerto Rico! Easily reapply (and you don't need a ton!) during the day and not worry about if you rubbed in the white sunscreen! Clear product with a clean primer feel. Great with my sensitive skin.

Best sunscreen for under makeup!  It feels very smooth on the skin and is a gel like texture. 
It’s not sticky nor does it leave a cast. 
Definitely will repurchase , as I also bought supergoops resetting spray!  I love supergoop!
