My everyday sunscreen - love that it mattifies my moisturizer instantly while keeping my skin looking fresh. It also acts as a primer for my foundation!

This is absolutely my favorite sunscreen I’ve ever tried, and I’ve tried A LOT. I love sunscreen and I work outside so I use a lot of it, reapplying every 2 hours. It is so light and sinks in and leaves such a nice texture, it’s not too heavy even under my mask when I am inside. Not sticky or drying or greasy at all. So good!

This is the best sunscreen I have ever used.  It took me by surprise that it came out clear but never in my life have I not burnt my face until now.  I just spent 4 days in Florida (from New England) and the only part of my body not burnt is my face because I had put on the supergoop before and while I was in and out of pools and the ocean.  10/10 recommend this product
reviews.review_title: safe your face and buy this sunscreen

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the texture of this sunscreen, and the fact that it doesn't leave a white cast after application. I usually mix it in with my moisturizer - a little goes a long way!
reviews.review_title: No white cast, no sticky after effect

reviews.review_text: 5 star product for sure, especially for my ladies of ethnicity. We’ve got to protect our skin from sun light as well as indoor lighting, this goes on clear which is the best part.

Love it. I only wish it was less expensive. 
Leaves a slight fragrance which makes it even better. 

Little product goes a long way! 

Must try!  

My husband loves this too.

I love this sunscreen. No white cast or color left around. Makes my skin glow and doesn’t break me out. I have sensitive skin and experienced no problems. No stinging around the eyes. No pilling. It was also easy to wash off at the end of the day.
This is probably the best sunscreen. Most make me look half dead with the cast that it leaves. It’s not super oily for my oily gworllls however it will leave a little glisten.

I was devastated by this product. I, like many, got very excited by the hype I was seeing on tiktok about this sunscreen and decided I would try it. I did a trial test by wearing it on a day I would be on the sun and reapplied like the directions said and still got very sunburned. Not to mention the texture is awful and whatever is in this broke my skin out.

Love how it feels on my skin and there is absolutely no white cast. Little bit of a weird smell. I’m also no dermatologist so I’m not sure how well it is at protecting my skin from the sun but as far as I’ve used it it has worked pretty well.
The texture reminds me of a silicone primer, but more slippery and a tad drying. Couldn’t get over the feeling, I prefer something that sinks in more.
reviews.review_title: the texture is not for me

reviews.review_text: I love this sunscreen. Super lightweight, blurs out pores, and doubles as a makeup primer.
Best sunscreen I have ever used, I don’t react well to sunscreen usually but this doesn’t make my eyes water or make my skin feel gross. 9/10.

I don’t like writing bad reviews but I think this needs to be said. The idea is great! And this actually doesn’t smell bad nor does it have a white cast. I believe this isn’t for everyone. My pores were more noticeable when I applied this and I did try giving a few more tries but it just made my skin looked texturized. It might be that I have dry skin that this doesn’t suit me the best.
Love the idea but you can’t use this over any other product without it pilling.

Amazing, amazing, amazing. I cannot say enough good things about this sunscreen. Does not leave a cast since it is clear but I will say it does leave my face a little glowy. I don’t mind though since I have dry skin and it dries out pretty quickly.

I love this product as a face primer, but hate it as a sunscreen. If it's worn as a sunscreen it leaves me face matte, and slightly sticky. If I use it before makeup in addition with a different sunscreen underneath is provides unbelievable staying power for my makeup.
reviews.review_title: Works great as a face primer

reviews.review_text: If you know anything about proper sunscreen application then you’d know this can only be used under a foundation that also contains SPF. Because of the silicone feeling in this sunscreen there is no way that someone is going to apply to right amount to get adequate coverage from this on its own because they would be an oily mess and acne prone skin would be at high risk for a breakout. Please don’t use this as a stand alone sunscreen thinking you’ll get decent coverage. You may not burn but you’re still risking sun damage.

This product left my face feeling oily and greasy. I have dry skin so I didn’t think I’d have this problem, but it feels like I haven’t washed my face at all today. It’s so heavy and it does not dry down. I’m very disappointed. I’m going to stick to Korean sunscreen, as it seems western sunscreen is still as subpar as it’s always been.

This stuff is amazing.  I love this for my daughter to put on her face. It goes on smooth and feels like butter,  it just melts into the skin and doesn't feel heavy or greasy like most sunscreens do. I use the the glowscreen daily and it gives me a beautiful glow.
so good under makeup! doesn’t leave a residue or me oily at all!

i liked it at first but it broke me out. i had the sheer screen which didn’t break me out and repurchased this one bec it didn’t have a white cast or a weird smell. this made my forehead rly breakout in acne :(
Bought this about a month ago and I am absolutely in love with it. The feel of this sunscreen is like no other. It sits perfectly with or without makeup, completely smooth! 10/10 recommend
I usually am extremely sensitive to sunscreen - this is currently the ONE sunscreen that doesn’t cause my face to break out in hives. It is even an amazing make up primer. Worth the price/hype!

My favorite sunscreen of all time. Its the perfect end to my skincare routine every day and makes for the perfect primer. I love the way it feels on my skin and has the perfect matte finish. This will always be an everyday staple.
Three stars because it applies evenly and I liked the way it looked under my foundation. Unfortunately, this product clogs my pores. That’s a deal breaker.

I have been using this for a little while now and honestly love it! I use it with the youth to the people adaptogen deep moisture cream moisturizer and the two together leave my face feeling so soft and so smooth all day! I didn’t think I would like it as much as I do so that’s a nice surprise! The only thing that would be better would be if it were reef safe! But other than that it’s awesome! I would recommend.

Got this to try as a reef-safe, clean sunscreen.  Not a terrible product.  A little slimy but dries ok.  That said it is NOT reef safe!  It has Homosalate 8%, Octocrylene 4%,both are on the banned list of ingredients.  Savethereef and Surfrider both have easy lists to access.  I can't understand how Supergoop writes that label and Sephora sells it with that label.  Do better!

the definition of a sunscreen without a white cast. i took one star off tho because of the price; it's far too expensive! but it's super lightweight and applies easily. doesn't irritate my sensitive, acne-prone, combo-dry skin. very interesting gel-like (almost silicone-y?) texture. honestly love it!
I use this daily under my makeup. I love that it actually does work as a primer! Makes my skin very smooth. I deducted one star because it’s not reef safe and is a chemical sunscreen :(

The price is painful for me but it’s stupidly good. The only sunscreen I’ve ever used that doesn’t feel like I poured melted butter on my face. Will I buy it again? Probably. Will I hate the price every time? Definitely. It actually is unseen! I can’t feel or see anything on my face. Makeup and other products go well over it but let it dry for a few minutes for best results if you’re layering products.

I was able to convert my mother to using this product as her primer for Florida days. 

I like this because it provides a solid sunscreen in a medium that can double as a primer and if you set it properly with powder I find it has solid lasting power for oily skin types. Not cheap but for me sunscreen and moisturizers are the 2 components of my routine I'm willing to spend more on. If you need a daily sunscreen I would highly recommend this.
reviews.review_title: Great sunscreen for your daily skincare regimen

reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved the product. It applied well and did not make me look greasy

i never believed in this product. for how much money it was, i couldn’t fathom that it wouldn’t irritate my face and go on so easily. i am so impressed with this product and am actually excited to use sunscreen now. it is also a great makeup primer! the reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is that i had some slight eye stinging but it was nothing compared to other face sunscreens i’ve tried.

Have been using this sunscreen since the late summer or fall and probably getting close to finishing but somehow it keeps giving. This is the first sunscreen I've tried that is on the pricier side -- previously used drugstore ones like Sun Bum or Neutrogena. The product itself comes out transparent/clear and almost gel like. I do the recommended dime sized amount for my entire face and neck. It absorbs really well and isn't noticeable throughout the day if I am going barefaced. It works well as a primer too and helps makeup glide on and stay put.

Was very skeptical before i got it… but then fall in love
Best sunscreen by far

I wore this on my face, arms, and chest. I was outside for two hours and became crispy crunchy on all exposed skin (see the attached photo). I don’t know if I received a bad batch or if it isn’t compatible with my body chemistry. I would not recommend this product.
I was looking for the best sunblock for my sensitive skin. I found it! Excellent sun protection and doubles as a primer. I will continue to buy it.

I bought this sunscreen after hearing all the hype around it, and unfortunately I'm not blown away. I was hoping for better.

I'll start with the positives: it leaves zero white cast on the skin. There is no noticeable odor to it. It's a higher SPF with it being SPF 40. It truly is undetectable on the skin. People say its a great base for makeup with its silicone primer like texture. 

The negatives: the texture is not pleasant, its like a silicone primer, but greasy feeling. If you use a decent amount of product (which you need to in order to get proper coverage), it pills up. I'd say my skin is slightly sensitive, and this completely broke me out- white heads, clogged pores, really deep, red pimples too. 

I don't see myself using/repurchasing this again, which is too bad considering how hyped it is and how many people seem to have success with it.
reviews.review_title: Caused lots of breakouts- was hoping for better

reviews.review_text: I was hoping this would be "the one" since it had so many great reviews. Unfortunately, I hated it. For me, it didn't go on smoothly. I felt like I really had to rub it in, which isn't great for mature skin. It was also just a little too matte for my liking. It played nicely with my makeup, but I felt like it dried me out a bit. The biggest downfall though is that it broke me out :( The very next day I had breakouts on my nose (?!) and chin. It took almost a week to clear those up. I'm so disappointed.
love this! it's so nice, doesn't leave a white cast on your skin, leaves my skin feeling super soft!! It does have a sunscreen smell at first but then it goes away. LOVE THIS 10/10!!

As someone with combination skin, I just think this feels too greasy. It doesn’t dry down completely and leaves a slick residue on my face that just looks like grease and makes me want to wash my face. I still used the whole bottle since it was $40, but I hated it every single day I put it on.

There are at least 3-4 bottles of this in my home on counters and in various bags because I never want to be without it! This is the best face sunscreen I have ever used, the only one that hasn’t made me break out. I’m obsessed with the super sleek texture and the it creates a great base for makeup when I choose to wear it. This sunscreen blends in and leaves no weird sunscreen shading. It is TRULY unseen.  As an SPF lover, this product is top of my list.
reviews.review_title: My one and only face sunscreen.

reviews.review_text: This is the most luxurious sunscreen I've ever used. It feels so nice on, it makes my skin feel so soft and I think it blurs my pores! It doesn't leave a white cast and it won't cause any other skincare to pill. I let my mother use some and she was blown away by the quality of this sunscreen too! If you aren't sure if you want to buy this, at least buy the mini version just to try it, although you'll probably end up purchasing the full size immediately after you try it! It's that good! You won't regret it!
it is a bit greasy and weird feeling at first but it sits well under my makeup and is a great sunscreen overall.

This is literally a silicone primer but with SPF. It feels very silicone-y like super slippery but in my opinion it does well with my foundation. It does not pill and it’s not scented which is a definite plus for me. The only downside for me is that it doesn’t go well with my dry skin and it’s not a hydrating SPF at all.
I have super dry skin and I use this as a sunscreen and primer.  It's been great under my foundation and I love the look of it.

FIVE STARS - I have dumped SO much money into different facial sunscreens, and have been disappointed with all of them. They either end up making my skin look greasy, make me break out, dry me out, or transfer & get into my eyes by mid-day. I bought the mini version of this because I was afraid to dump more money into something I wouldn’t like. I saw great reviews for this, so I was hopeful, but I wasn’t ballsy enough to buy the full size until I tried it. I WILL 100% be buying the full size now. This is hands down the best sunscreen I’ve ever used. It does not leave my face looking or feeling greasy. It feels smooth, lightweight and is perfect for me.

DO NOT USE THIS! I’m 32 years old and I’m lucky I’ve never had acne in my entire life. I got this as a sample and used it twice, a week apart. After the first time i used it I had little bumps and blackheads on my forehead, didn’t make the connection between the two yet. Then I used it again a week later and my entire forehead is covered in bumps, blackheads, whiteheads, and a couple deep pimples. And my pores look so much bigger than they’ve ever been all over my face. I’m so upset because it’s been a couple weeks and my skin still looks terrible. I never ever get breakouts and this happened.

I love this! I haven’t had any eye stinging, or skin irritation (I have extremely sensitive skin) I actually enjoy applying my sun screen now the texture is different more primer like and is something to get used to but other wise it’s an amazing spf!
I didn’t like the feel or smell of this sunscreen. I will finish the tube, but won’t buy again.

I thought this sunscreen was a clean product. I have no issues with the actual product but the ingredients. After scanning on my Yuka app this product rated 12/100. It contains a hazardous UV filter, octocrylene. This UV filter is allergenic and causes sun allergies in particular… avoid
reviews.review_title: not clean sunscreen. contains hazardous uv filter

reviews.review_text: I really didn't want to like this because it's expensive but now that I've tried it, I won't go back. I have combination acne prone skin and I've been trying to find a face sunscreen for a year with no luck. I finally caved and bought this despite the price after trying five other SPFs and they were too greasy, pilled, or broke me out. Not this one. The consistency is so nice, it stays put, it's comfortable on the skin. I like this product so much that I actually use SPF everyday which is something I can't say for some of the other sunscreens I've tried. Will be repurchasing when I run out

I will likely never buy another type of face sunscreen again. I've been using this product for two years now and am so happy with it. Some don't like it, but I absolutely love the texture of the product and it is pretty fast absorbing. The smell isn't noticeable to me and it has not made my acne-prone skin react in the time I've used it. Can't recommend it more.
reviews.review_title: My go-to for my sensitive skin

reviews.review_text: Word in the makeup world is that Kylie's brand reverse engineered Unseen Sunscreen for her line, that's how good and dependable this product is. Goes on great under makeup and there's no fear of looking like a Picasso after an hour, this stuff stays put.
The consistency of this product is so weird. It’s like those pore blurring primers but greasy. The pillage from this stuff is unbearable. I’m so bummed because I wanted to love it.
I got a sample size with purchase.  It’s very greasy like the texture of an ointment. I can’t use this under makeup.  Its definitely not “grippy” like a primer as stated in the description.

I honestly hated this sunscreen, I had to return it. I heard/read soooo many good reviews on this and it was definitely not what I was expecting. It feels heavy and sticky once applied and leaves your skin looking oily. I wouldn't care all that much if it was just leaving my skin looking oily, but it physically felt like it was clogging my pores. No amount of rubbing it in helped. I had to re-wash my face to get the feeling off. I also tried it for a full day just to see how it would wear, and I swear it feels worse in the sun! It was like I was wearing a heavy face mask all day. Maybe that's what helps protect your skin, but it was not something I was used to and probably won't ever adjust to.

Amazing. I have medium toned, combo, SUPER sensitive skin and this covers all my bases. Doesn’t leave my skin looking ashy bc it’s completely clear, doesn’t make my t zone oily, and most importantly doesn’t irritate my skin at all. It feels weightless, like you have nothing on. Also, it’s great under makeup as a primer, the only thing I can compare it to is the milk makeup primer or the elf silicone primers! Definitely a good buy especially if you’re tired of sunscreen not blending into darker skin!

This is by far the best sunscreen I’ve ever used. It’s like it’s not on my face. It’s almost so suspiciously amazing that I question whether it’s truly working. Like someone look into this because there’s no way sunscreen can feel like this & actually work. Just buy it.
reviews.review_title: So amazing I almost don’t believe it’s even worki

reviews.review_text: I received this product as a sample. If I could this product a zero I would. This product was oily and took off all my other products that we’re underneath it!
Best facial SPF I've found on the market, especially for Black and brown people. No gray cast, goes on like Smashbox primer. I keep this on me!
This is a nice formula; however it didn’t do much on my uneven texture. I won’t purchase again.

This has a strong silicone feel, but that works great for me as a sunscreen/primer duo to cut down steps when I am in a rush.  I appreciate the fragrance-free formulation and the spf 40 for my mature skin.  I would purchase again.
No white cast, but it smells a little strange and does feel a bit heavy on the skin.

Have been using for about a week. Live in Florida. Outdoor a lot. Loving this product. This is more of balm, so I do not feel the greasiness or stickiness of lotions/gels. I have started using their other products and am pleased with them as well.
reviews.review_title: Living the dream in SWFL with Supergoop!

reviews.review_text: So smooth, so great. Great for brown girls! I am terrible with sunscreen, but I finally found one I trust on my sensitive skin.

AMAZING PRODUCT!  I have pretty bad oily skin so always worried about certain products on my face.  This is amazing.   I have started to used this with just a little bit of foundation mixed together and its PERFECT!   Even that mid-day shin I used to have is minimal.   I am a fan!!

Hands down the best sunscreen out there! It goes so smoothly and easily on the face and doesn’t leave a sticky white residue. It looks like a yellow balm, which is different from the usual sunscreens I am used to. I have tried many sunscreens from Dr Dennis Gross (which was great), Murad to drugstore brands like Neutrogena and this one beats them all.
reviews.review_title: The best sunscreen I have tried!

reviews.review_text: I was disappointed in this product. It feels like thick silicone and pills no matter what I do. It’s unusable for me.
I love this stuff. It is sheer and light weight. I have bought is for pretty much everyone I know and they all love it too. Great Juno Super Goop!

This is my new go to sunscreen for every day when it’s winter or fall. The feel is weird at first if you’re used to regular white sunscreens. Wouldn’t use in summer or spring when the sun is more intense but good starter sunscreen for those new to using it everyday.
i like how it doesn’t leave a white cast at all but it feels kind of silicone like. i haven’t found a sunscreen i love yet and this one was alright.

This is one of my all time favorite sunscreens and I’m so excited that it now comes in a Jumbo version! It leaves absolutely no trace on the skin and is really comfortable to wear. I love that it smooths out my skin texture and provides a slight glow so it’s great as a primer as well! Definitely recommend getting this, it’s worth the hype.

Literally the best product ever!! I’ve tried so many different sunscreens for everyday use (especially living in Florida) but my face always ended up being super greasy and smelling like sunscreen. My friend recommended this product and I’m so glad I bought it. This product didn’t make my face greasy and it doesn’t even smell like sunscreen. My face feels soft with a matte finish!

I've even tried waiting 15 minutes between applying my moisturizer and applying this sunscreen, but it STILL pills as you're putting it on. It's a shame because once you wipe off all of the pilling, it has a nice blurring effect similar to the smashbox makeup primer. I wanted to love this, but I won't be purchasing again.
Everyone raves about this sunscreen and I now see why. It’s great. No weird residue, and a tiny bit goes a long way.
I'm totally in love with this sunscreen. It flows and sets perfectly on my skin. One of the best products I bought from Sephora so far.
The only sunscreen I’ll use on my face. It glides on effortlessly, acts as a primer or standalone. Effective at protecting skin.

Love this SPF, great protection. It doesn’t leave my face or hands oily from application. I live in FL and wear it everyday because I’m outside a lot. I use this as my primer as well for the days I’m out in the sun and wearing a light amount of makeup. Works very well

very very very good. go and buy it right now. if i had known how good this product was i wouldn’t have gotten the innisfree one i would have stacked this one up. i heard it was a very win product, meaning everyone loves it, it works for all skin types, very smooth and clear and it makes your face more shinier and moisturized, it makes it look dewy highly highly recommend. i love this product so much next time i go i will defined stack it up and buy a whole bunch so that i don’t run out it’s a very very good product. get yours right now it’s the best sunscreen you’ll ever come across. 10000000000/10.
Still got a burn and it was very oily under makeup. Weak SPF protection.There are better sunscreens and make up primers out there. This failed on both ends.
Not good under makeup, it makes your makeup slip around
I love this way better than the glow screen and that says a lot because I have dry skin. Definitely gonna repurchase again when the glow screen is done.
I really love this sunscreen. It can double as a primer. It is slightly mattifying.

I’m using retinol at night so my skin is very sensitive and dry, this sunblock doesn’t looks oily. Is perfect using at the beach. Apply every 2 hours even if you are wearing makeup. Everything make me acne and this doesn’t.
Love this sunscreen. Works as a primer and smooths out pores. Kind of reminds me of the porefessional primer. Not greasy at all and goes on smooth under foundation.
So far I have been loving it! I was a little unsure about the texture but my skin feels so smooth after applying it! I definitely recommend!!

I haven’t used it with makeup yet (I don’t wear a lot) but for So far I have only used it for hydration and everyday use -  it is fabulous! Super smooth and makes your face feel like baby skin. Face stays moisturized all day!

Simplemente el
Mejor! Super ligero, sin sensación grasosa.
The best Sun screen I’ve ever had. This has turned into our family signature Sun screen. I have recommended it to many of my friends, and they all love it!
I really liked the texture and look and but it made me break out

Coming from someone prone to breakouts who is known to break out in hives if exposed to the sun without some form of protection, this sunscreen is wonderful and does its job. The formula is so creamy and easy to put on, I have combination skin and you can't even tell I have any on. I can tell a huge difference in my acne scars and the only thing I have been doing different is using this product. If you relate to my at all and are looking for a nice sunscreen I hope you try this!

How is this sunscreen??! I got this as a deluxe sample, and I have not gone a day without using it since I received it. The formula is like a primer, and it makes my makeup look beautiful. I have never used a sunscreen like this, but this will remain a daily staple for me, no matter what time of year it is!
This is my holy grail SPF! I seriously have one of these bottles with me wherever I go! And now that there’s a jumbo size, it’s even better!

So I never write reviews for product on here, but I had to just for this product. I’m fair skinned and hate wearing sunscreen mostly because it makes me look greasy or smells like sunscreen and I just don’t like it. This product is perfect for me. It goes on evenly, has no smell, and does not make you look greasy. It soaks into your skin and you don’t even know you are wearing it. I’m so happy I found this product.

Just finished this up. It’s a good sunscreen but I wasn’t too crazy about the silicone texture. It feels like a primer but do not use too much or it will feel heavy. I don’t notice my makeup looking particularly better when I use this underneath since it doubles up as a primer. I much prefer the Glow Screen from the same Supergoop line . It looks amazing on its own and underneath as a primer
It’s my go to for sunscreen and I love that it doubles as a primer!

I’ve spent the past year seeing this sunscreen go viral and I haven’t had a chance to try it until now. . . and all I have to say is, i’ve been missing out. This formula is IMPECCABLE ! i’ve never felt a product- let alone sunscreen, that’s as weightless and soft as this one !! As I’m rubbing this in my face, it just disappears; no scent, no weight, no stick, just nothing; the only thing I feel after is the velvety, (& invisible) soft finish it leaves on the skin. The formula is also oil-free which I’m so happy about as my typical biggest problem with sunscreens is how grimy and oily they can make my skin feel.

I love this sunscreen! It leaves no white cast, doesn’t leave skin looking overly shiny, and is non-greasy. It has a gel-like texture and applies clear so no white cast. It goes on my skin smoothly and works well as a primer too. I love this jumbo size as it will last me a longer time! I have found my holy grail sunscreen!!
I ordered the mini not knowing if I’d like this- sits beautifully under makeup and alone. Silicone like feel. Will be wearing all summer long.
i have really oily skin and have had really bad luck with spf. but this… I LOVE. no white cast, absorbs really nicely and doesn’t make my skin oily! the price hurts a little but i keep coming back.
Goes on easy, acts like a primer under makeup or used alone. Smooths skin and minimizes pores. Great sun protection. Invisible and drys quickly with no odor. I use it year round. Pricy but worth it.

Okay.. this stuff is amazing. It's clear, has zero peeling, and doesn't feel like you are wearing anything. It's a dream. I've tried other brands and nothing else compares. Do yourself a favor and try it out.
Usually sunscreen breaks me out really bad. This has not done it and it does not even feel like an actual sunscreen

Totally worth the hype! I’ve tried so many other SPF products, and this is the ONLY one that works best for my skin. I have dry/normal or normal/combination skin, depending on the season. It blends so smoothly. Works amazing as a primer before applying makeup. It goes on clear which is what I was looking for in a sunblock since I have tan/dark skin tone and other sunblocks leave a white cast causing my skin to look purple-ish. I’ve already repurchased this item 4 times and I’ll keep purchasing it over and over again!

The only con I have with this product is that it does stings the eyes. It’s a chemical sunscreen which is expected to happen if it gets near the eyes.

Wow, it's amazing how it melts into the skin so easily. It feels super smooth on my skin, as if it disappeared, but no, it's there taking care and protecting my skin. It does not leave my skin oily. Works perfectly under my makeup and does not pill off.

I have extremely sensitive skin, rosacea and acne, which means it’s almost impossible for me to find products that work for me. I used my points to get a sample of this and it’s been working really well for me - no breakouts and this goes on perfectly clear. A little if this product goes a long way, so make sure you only use a little bit - otherwise it will be greasy and won’t absorb properly
reviews.review_title: Amazing for non-white skin if you use it correctly

reviews.review_text: I was disappointed at how oily and greasy I felt.  It seemed to never fully absorb into my skin. Definitely invisible finish but the residue was really not good and felt slick all day
Love this sunscreen sort of wish it was a bit more affordable but I so far have had a great experience with it no white cast and not oily
i love this!!! i like how it’s super light weight and not super thick. definitely will buy again
My favorite sunscreen. Helps protect my skin and gives my skin a healthy glow.
I can see how others would like it. The texture feels like the smashbox photo finish primer. Which isn’t my favorite but I know a lot of other people like it.
This made my skin break out. I had a clear skin but i got acne and couldn’t figure out why. I stopped using this and finally my skin is getting better.
Understands the assignment. It has no white cast, no pilling, no stickiness and no complaints. I previously used BG Sunscreen 45 spf from Target. I like that one also, but this one better.
Love the way this goes on and feels on the skin.   Not oily and you can put makeup on top of Goop.
This is my favorite facial sunscreen. It goes on smooth and never burns my eyes if some of the product ends up running due to sweat. Have repurchased many times!

This sunscreen works great! I love the texture and the sheer application. There is no white cast or residue. I apply it after my skin care routine and it gives a beautiful glow, and it also works as a primer for my makeup. Great sunscreen that’s tolerated well by my sensitive skin.

I already emptied a bottle and got a complimentary from supergoop! So exciting as this is my go to SPF when I go to work if I am applying make up! Literally unseen no peel off no I mean no white cast and best part non fragrant and super easy to apply! I have a oily skin and haven’t experienced any break outs so loving this very product!

LOVE this sunscreen. Last summer I got a sample from sephora and wow. I have very fair skin because I’m super Irish and I always burn on my nose and under eyes, but this sunscreen kept me from burning and prevented any acne like sunscreen usually gives me!
So perfect for using as a primer under makeup! Blurs and minimizes pores. The fact that it’s a sunscreen makes it so much easier to use on the daily. Does not sting around the eyes!
Silky smooth and easy to blend. Love this sunscreen is glowy and doesn’t break me out.
i love this sooo much. i have sensitive acne-prone skin so it usually reacts harshly to new products but surprisingly it didn’t with this one! would buy again
It doesn’t smell bad, and doesn’t make my face look oily! In my opinion, that’s a win-win. It spreads really well, and just dissolves into your skin. Definitely buying the full size!

In two years of using this it has never messed with my skin — doesn’t break me out, doesn’t sting my eyes. Works perfectly under makeup and doesn’t have the oily finish that a lot of sunscreens do. If I had one wish it would be for supergoop to change the packaging because it gets v hard to get product out when you’re down to your last 20% (supergoop please hear my prayers why is the bottom of the tube a 90 degree angle)

I love this sunscreen!! It also works great as a primer. It’s literally a 2 in 1! I’ve noticed my makeup stays, doesn’t smudge, crease and looks flawless throughout the day. Like perfect skin. I got most of the girls in my family on this. They love it as well.
Breakout central from the whole supergoop line and just overpriced try the Japanese skin aqua sunscreen
Really pretty finish but made me break out like crazy

I think alot of people love this spf because it doesnt leave a cast, its a chemical spf so of course it wont, but a lot of girls are using this and loving that it works as a primer and im inclined to believe yall are not understanding SUNSCREEN. chemical spfs break down through out the day so you should be reapplying every 2 hrs ( which i doubt yall are as most reviews talk about how nice it is under makeup ) so this really isnt protecting you especially if youre applying it like a primer and not with the correct amount needed to give you spf 40.
reviews.review_title: this really isnt going to protect you from the sun

reviews.review_text: Amazing product so far. Leaves an amazing matte finish to your skin. Great amount of spf. Best sunscreen I’ve ever used on my face.
Love this sunscreen. I was worried it would be too greasy but it melts into my skin well.

I liked this! It does “matify” your skin, and I didn’t get any shine throughout the day, it doesn’t move any skincare products that I put on before the SPF, my only issue was the sandy feeling, other than that, I think it would be perfect for greasy skin types  and to use it in summer time!

This sunscreen is beyond anything I’ve tried before. It has a dewy texture but dries matte. I seriously love it. I have super dry skin and it never causes flaking like most sunscreens. No pilling or break outs either. This is my HG!

I wanted to like this sunscreen a lot because it’s the first clear sunscreen I’ve used and was super excited. But it felt SO greasy and just oily on my skin. I’ll continue to use until empty but wouldn’t repurchase.

love this sunscreen! i always used the CeraVe moisturizer combined with SPF and it always left a white cast and got oily throughout the day, not mixing well with ongoing acne and sensitive skin. but this sunscreen, feels like heaven.

This sunscreen has changed my life. It has an amazing formula that blends effortlessly, absorbs quickly, and leaves your skin looking RADIANT with a healthy glow. Bonus points that it’s 100% clear, so no white cast or spending ages trying to blend. Plus, it’s not greasy and feels incredible on skin (not heavy). I have dry, sensitive, textured, acne-prone skin with mild rosacea. I’ve been using this product for about a month with no breakouts, irritation, or dry patches. It doesn’t bother my eyes either (which are usually insanely sensitive). Easy to reapply with no pilling. It’s hydrating, but dries demi-matte. It wears PERFECTLY under makeup too! I was using the COSRX aloe soothing sun cream but it caused my foundation to separate around my eyes/nose and it burned my eyes like crazy. 

This stuff has been a game-changer under makeup. My foundation applies so much smoother than before! I do add a primer on top though just for that extra long-lasting effect, but even without an additional primer it DELIVERS. Cannot recommend this sunscreen enough! 100% worth the cost.
reviews.review_title: HOLY GRAIL! Works super well under makeup!

reviews.review_text: I love the invisible finish. No marks or residue. It applies like a primer or the Maybelline primer that’s like the blue packaging. Honestly love it and constantly wear it. But no greasy feeling or moving. Though I wear minimal makeup so not too sure how it works with makeup products.

I loved it! I have a sensitive skin with sweaty face :) and every sunscreen i’ve been used make my face more sweaty and that embarrassed me a lot! But this sunscreen OMG! It’s control the sweat and keep the makeup on all day
A lot more gel consistency than I thought. It almost reminds me of the Porefessional primer from Benefit. Once on, you don’t really feel it. I like it!
absolute favorite sunscreen for my oily T-zone skin in the humid months!
Awesome sunscreen and is awesome for underneath makeup. Definitely follows the name as it’s very unseen and just helps hydrate the skin . Totally recommend but just a tad pricey for a sunscreen.

I have mixed feelings about this sunscreen. I like that it protects against blue light as well (or at least it should).
It’s got a greasy-ish texture but I have normal-dry skin so even though there was a bit getting used to it, I didn’t mind too much. There’s no whitecast, it is “unseen”. However, after about an hour or so, it starts to peel off and I have to keep taking these small strands/balls of product off my face. I don’t wear makeup so I’m not sure how well it does with it, but if it peels without makeup, I feel like it would be worse with makeup. I will use the rest of it, but I won’t be buying another
Love the Unseen Sunscreen because it doesn’t leave a white cast!
i love how there’s no white cast, no typical sunscreen smell, and it doesn’t feel greasy on my skin, but it clogged my pores & made me break out. :( check your ingredients before purchasing!
My favorite sunscreen ever. Perfect for under makeup and does not make you look greasy. Pretty much serves as a primer. Would give it 5 stars but it is not letting me lol

I use this everyday & I'm only done with about half of the bottle. I use the 2 finger method (apply 2 fingers length to face) to apply & this has lasted a very long time! Gives great coverage, doesn't sting the eyes, & leaves a nice glowy finish. Even on breakouts, it looks nice & doesn't feel heavy.

So far I really love this product. I struggle with sunscreens leaving a white cast so this one being invisible is amazing. I have acne prone skin and this doesn’t seem to effect it. Love it! It also doesn’t leave that thick goopy feeling.

this sunscreen is good to go under your make up because it is so tacky once you put on. i don’t like how hard it is to spread and it’s hard to tell if it was evenly spread but that is what you’re getting if it’s clear
Absolutely amazing. Feels nothing like sunscreen and is perfect for super sensitive skin.

When I first tried this I was so confused with the texture. It made my skin feel very silky and smooth, which is not what I am used to with a sunscreen. This sunscreen texture is actually what makes me excited to use sunscreen everyday. Since using, I have not skipped a day using sunscreen. It also doesn't make your skin look oily nor does it make it look dry. It's perfect!
Lightweight and very easy to use. No white residue which is a huge plus.
I have acne prone and sensitive skin. This is the only sunscreen doesn’t break me out. I mix it with my foundation and I’m on my second tube now. Loveeee
reviews.review_title: Works best for acne prone skin

reviews.review_text: I absolutely hate the smell and texture of sunscreen but this is worth the money. And it doesn’t mess up my makeup

The formula is easy to apply and has no order. A little heavy and I noticed it clumps sometimes under makeup. I mostly use it on the days I am going makeup free or on days where I am going to be outdoors. Leaves a shine after application.

Really good sunscreen that feels light and hydrating on the face. It has a matte finish which I love for the summer. It also works really well as a makeup primer because of the texture and consistency. I only take 1 star off because it's expensive for so little product. I prefer to buy the Play given the size options and because for winter, it gives a super dewy finish.
Sunscreen feels light and not oily. Perfect for everyday wear. Love it!

love this sunscreen, doesn’t make my face oily and it didn’t make me breakout like the face stick did . going
to buy a second bottle !

Really enjoying using Supergoop’s Unseen Sunscreen. Feels so lightweight and amazing on the skin after my skincare routine in the morning. It’s hard to believe it has SPF! It honestly feels more like a primer than anything else and I’m all for it! I prefer this over their Glowscreen as that one burns my eyes when I sweat. This is a holy grail SPF for sure, people!
reviews.review_title: My holy grail SPF! Hands down

reviews.review_text:
This is hands down my favorite sunscreen for my face. It doesn’t feel heavy or greasy and leaves a good texture on my skin—either for going bare or as a makeup primer. I wouldn’t call the texture matte or luminous, but rather blurred. 

I love it so much, I buy it for my friends and family now. Even my mother, who hates all sunscreen and generally avoids skincare, raves about this stuff.
reviews.review_title: I buy this as gifts now

reviews.review_text: love this stuff! I burn easily and have never had an issue using this. the silky feeling texture is nice and I like that I don't need to basically scrub my face to apply since it does not leave a white cast like other sunscreens I have used.
Best face sunscreen product I’ve found. Doesn’t sting the eyes, emollient, and really does leave a nice finish for applying makeup - a good primer.

You might be thinking: will adding sunscreen to my morning & face every few hours really make that much of a difference? I’m here to tell you: it absolutely will. My skin is on the dry/oily side depending on the time of year- but in the winter my skin wants to match the intensity of the frigid cold snow and crumble away like that granola bar you forgot is in the bottom of your bag as a safety snack. It’s not cute friends, not cute. The unseen sunscreen revitalizes my skin & lets me have peace of mind that it’s protected from not only the blazing rays of the sun- but also adds a little extra punch of hydration so that I know that despite my genetics- there’s an improved chance of my skin looking younger for longer. 

I cannot recommend this product enough! I apply it after washing, toning, adding my serum, and moisturizing to really lock in the moisture. It’s comfortable under makeup & doesn’t affect the texture of my BB cream. I use Supergoop!’s mineral powder to reapply sunscreen after a few hours if I am wearing makeup- otherwise if I’m not I’ll slather this on again and hit my face with a lil setting spray to feel fancy. It’s worth the money! I’m inconsistent (despite my dedication to not look like a dried up raisin) so the full sized version will last me two months. As an added bonus: You can ALSO recycle the bottle after you’ve used all of the product so you aren’t contributing to landfills while trying to keep ya skin fresh. (I may have imagined that last part but I’m nearly 87.5% sure you can recycle the type of plastic through some method or another). 15/10- recommend
reviews.review_title: You bet this product saved my skin

reviews.review_text: LOVE this product! It is so light and easy to use on the face. 2nd bottle has already been purchased. Not heavy at all. Great under makeup.

On my second bottle now. Love It!
It has a very smooth feel when it goes on. Great for under makeup or alone.
Product was alright  didn’t like the sticky feeling it feels just like the Porefessial primer from benefit  and it made me break out :/  would  not recommend.

Works well, no cast, and my makeup doesn’t run when I use it with this. Feels like smashbox primer. (: a little goes a long way so I can’t help but wonder if that’s enough to provide the spf coverage. But if it works, it works

I've been using this for about 3 years now. After trying many different sunscreens (Korean brands,  high end & drugstore brands) this has become my holy grail sun screen. It doesn't leave a white cast on my skin and doesn't irritate my face (my skin is acne prone). Plus it's 2-in-1 product, and works great as a primer for makeup. I'll be buying this for a long time. Glad they came out with a larger size.

Ticks all the boxes for me! Doesn't break me out (even with a slight coconut scent and silicone-y feeling), easy to blend in, works for all skin tones, and wears well over my skincare and under makeup. I wore this on vacation in San Francisco this summer and my makeup looked flawless after 10 hours of windy cruises and sweaty sightseeing.  Had to knock a star off for the price, wish it was at least bigger.
This is so greasy on me. I have normal/combo skin.

I have the hardest time finding a sunscreen that doesn’t pill up with skincare and makeup, but this one is my holy grail.  No white cast, no pilling, doesn’t sting my eyes.  It is 100% percent worth the price.
Love this!  Feels so good on my skin. Doesn’t run into my eyes like other facial sunscreens.

leaves a piling residue on my skin. I don’t like that. I do like the texture and it doesn’t smell like anything which is nice. I’ve also never gotten sunburnt with it on so it does the job. But because of that residue I don’t like it.

Love the transparent finish but contains cross polymer which is silicon that will clog your pores and octinoxate which is a skin irritant and toxic to aquatic animals. Why is this product considered clean beauty?
this is the best sunscreen ever especially for oily skin it leaves a velvety finish and works great as a primer

I absolutely love this! I got a mini one for Christmas and have been using it the past few days. My skin looks smooth and clear, not greasy for me at all! I've been using the Glowscreen since June and loved that one just as much!
reviews.review_title: So soft on skin and lightweight!!

reviews.review_text: Does exactly what it says it does! No streaking and no fragrance! Felt like I was putting on a primer! A little foes a long way.

I wanted to love this. I love the formula and how it goes on. It’s really a wonderful product. But whatever is in this makes my skin break out. my pores get clogged with oil and I get this tiny white heads all over and some red irritation. Not sure if anyone else experiences this but would love to know what ingredient(s) might be causing this. So off to find another spf product for my face. The quest continues.
I love this stuff! I have repurchased over and over. Sunscreen is essential to my skincare routine and I love that this goes well under my makeup.
Felt good as a pore filling type texture, but I did not love how this felt sitting under my makeup

I bought the mini for a December trip to Orlando. I was hoping for a lighter sunscreen in warmer weather since I was coming from a cold dry climate. I love how it applies and my makeup looks beautiful over it. However, after about 30 minutes my face was so oily!  I even powdered it. I am a normal to dry skin type and was so surprised to see how oily this made me. I had to use blotting tissues all day. By the end of the day, between my masks and blotting tissues, most of my makeup was gone.  I’ll finish it, but it’s not for me.

I have tried what seems like EVERY sunscreen and this one is just superior to all of them, in my opinion. It goes on effortlessly, has barely any scent, no cast, and doesn't interfere with makeup. It sits nicely on the skin and doesn't feel heavy under makeup like some sunscreens. I've used it under different types of foundations and powders and it always worked well. I really love how it feels moisturizing as opposed to greasy. Definitely my go-to facial sunscreen!
Goes on smooth, isn’t oily, and it doesn’t leave a white cast on me like many other sunscreens
Absolutely amazing and lightweight! no white cast!

Applies evenly - I think. One thing about it is it comes out totally translucent so when you apply it to your skin you have to have a lot of trust in your ability to apply it evenly. Other than that it has worked really well on my troublesome skin. No breakouts or pores clogged more than the usual.

Dig the products but Sephora is misleading with their offers. Was supposed to come with a free $20 mini wasn’t included in the package and then it was “sold out” so I’m super frustrated I went with Sephora! They wont honor it. Won’t make that mistake again.
Love this product. Suggested by Sephora employee. Love love love. Sometimes I wear it by itself and it gives a matte natural look
decided to try and it was not for me!! made me breakout/get a rash.

This sunscreen is S++. Like seriously, it’s worth the price. If you can scrape together the coins for it DO ITTT. Treat yourself because one thing I will say is that in the summer when I don’t want too many products on my skin I use this one and it doesn’t feel heavy on my skin.

Some people say they don’t like this but idk what’s wrong with them because this product is so great. I’ve never used a better sunscreen before. Okay, so maybe mineral sunscreens are better, but for something that you can wear both under and over makeup that does not look greasy, does not dry you out, and does not break you out, this is the best.

I don’t think there’s a better facial sunscreen than this. It disappeared in my skin and protected it from sun at the same time. It sits nicely on top of other skin care products and lays completely underneath makeup.
Love this sunscreen! It’s super light and feels like it disappears after application. Doesn’t leave any stain or white cast

this is my holy grail sunscreen. i have insanely sensitive skin, especially to sunscreen, and this one is weightless, doesn’t irritate my skin, and it such a smooth application 

supergoop as a whole is the only brand sunscreen i can wear. i dont know how they do it, but ive tried products with the same active ingredients as this that have given me a full on rash, but this magically does not! it might be the quality of the ingredients that they use or something else that they add in to soothe, i dont know but whatever it is that they do, my skin loves it

there are other supergoop products that i like (the matte screen and glow screens are both great for my sensitive skin) but if you want more of a primer feel with no kind if tint (like i do) then unseen is ya boi

I am South Asian with medium skin, so I often deal with the white cast that comes from most sunscreens. This is my favorite sunscreen EVER!! No white cast whatsoever and goes on SO smoothly! This makes a great primer for makeup as well. I feel like my skin somehow looks smoother when I wear this. One of my favorite products of all time!
reviews.review_title: My favorite sunscreen as a POC!

reviews.review_text: great product, sits well under loose powder, in the summer I follow-up with their setting spray . I have dry and sensitive skin and this is the only product that  doesn't break me out

This sunscreen checks off all the boxes for me. Before this I was wearing SuperGoops City Serum sunscreen which left a weird residue and white cast on my already fair skin. The associate at Sephora recommended the Unseen Sunscreen and I have been using it everyday ever since. It leaves no residue or white cast since the product is more of a gel consistency. It is a tad greasy when you apply it but does not leave my skin oily after it’s been absorbed. I keep a mini size in my purse for reapplication when I’m out during the day.
Ok wow i get the hype now. I received a sample and i used this on my skin in Florida. I didn’t sunburn and my skin felt so soft. It felt more like a primer than icky sunscreen. Def will buy again!
I must be on my 10th tube of this product. Highly recommend for African mature oily skin. I don’t leave home unless I have this product on my face. It is a great base for your makeup.
This sunscreen has an invisible finish and feels great on the skin, with or without makeup.  It's a bit pricey, but you get what you pay for with this one.

It’s super invisible and good wear over other moisturizers and creamed during the day. Although honestly it is way too small for the price. I think there are a lot of other similar formulas for way cheaper :/

After trying different Korean, Japanese, and American sunscreens (top brands like Elta Md, La Roche Posay, etc.) I have found my holy grail! I always wash my face before using sunscreen and it just applies so smoothly !! It’s not greasy, not sticky, not thick, not liquid-y and thin, it’s JUST RIGHT. I actually got the sample size from a family member and never used it but I’m so glad I ended up using it! I use every single day!! I’m so so happy to have found a holy grail sunscreen after searching for the past two years!!
All the good things about this product. It’s a must have.

it does the job, it sort of feels like a primer when applying since it is a jelly like texture and it doesn’t leave a white cast but also makes my skin look a little dull. will continue using because the glow sunscreen makes me too shiny.

Honestly, I’m not really impressed with this brand. Not only is this product greasy it pills with the rest of my makeup. If You plan on using it be careful mixing it with certain water Based primers. However, this sunscreen gets points for being poc friendly. At the end of the day I recommend a Japanese or Korean sunscreen tbh.
reviews.review_title: not worth it for the price

reviews.review_text: Love this. I feel it blurs my face and provides a nice even canvas.

I’ve tried so many sunscreens on the market. Nothing comes close to this. I have combo skin and many sunscreens either give me a white cast or an oily face after an hour or so. This sunscreen goes on very silky has a bit of a matte texture, but soaks into the skin in a while and gives a natural finish. I am not easily impressed by sunscreens, but this one is pretty good! Pricey, but if you’re gonna invest in one expensive skincare product, make it a sunscreen that you actually enjoy using. I don’t know how its under makeup cause I barely use any. But I feel like it’ll do well since it has primer like qualities. Knocking off a star cause its not really cheap. Hope this helps!
This sunscreen is the best! I’m prone to breakouts, but this sunscreen doesn’t cause me to breakout and feels great on my skin. The bottle lasts a long time.

This sunscreen is awesome!! I was scared that with that texture it would feel like a Benefit Porefessional and be very drying, but it’s a lovely velvet texture. It doesn’t feel drying at all, but does take a little bit of shine off your face for a nice skin texture. My skin feels great when I use this!!
i was browsing for a good spf face product and decided to give this one a try since then it became a staple it’s so light and it doesn’t irritate the skin 100% recommended
You can’t see it but it feels greasy and whenever i put on my mask over it i break out like crazy

I know this is a holy grail for many so I feel bad giving it a low review, but on my oily skin it just did not work. I’m still forcing myself to use it all up, but it just makes me look like a donut if I don’t set it. It has a greasy and thick consistency too that just is unpleasant to apply, but obviously sunscreen is still sunscreen and a necessity for skincare.
The only way you can tell this is sunscreen is the smell.  There is no white residue and doesn’t make you greasy.  Love it
This sunscreen was just ok. I have dry, medium tan skin tone and I didn’t feel that this sunscreen just glides on so I removed two stars for that.

Totally awesome! My husband loves it for golf because it doesn’t run all over his collar when he’s sweating in the GA heat/humidity. Truly a clear sunscreen that works! The bottle is MICRO, though. The price could be lower, for sure.
Nice and smooth, super light on face, and does not make your face feel oily. I like that it does leave white cast on your face after applying.
Wanted to love it but it made me break out. Disappointed.
My favorite sunscreen, applies nicely onto skin but it’s quite pricey but overall amazing product.

Maybe my bottle was a bust ... but I have used it on 3 occasions. I went on a fishing trip, the dog park, and on a simple walk around my school campus. Gnats were attracted to my face and only mine! I've never had it happen before and I've done all those things without gnats swarming my face. I even tested it again at my dog park by using Sun Bum SPF and Innisfree. No gnats those times. Yeesh! I DEFINITELY DON'T want to try buying a replacement. It feels like a pore filler/blur application. Not really sure how to describe the feeling of it, but I much prefer a regular lotion texture. I guess this is just not for me whatsoever.
reviews.review_title: Attracted gnats ... yeah you read that right.

reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite facial sunscreen. It applies clear, smooths my pores, and primes my face for my makeup.

For an Indian skin tone, particularly prone to hyperpigmentation, I am always looking for a sunscreen/primer to seamlessly go under or over my make-up without leaving an annoying white film. This product is perfect! It feels soft and supple and it protects my skin.

I got the trial size.  I was upset at first at how small it was, but then I realized that the consistency was like a standard silicone primer, so I only needed a pea size amount for my whole face each time.  I was a little wary of the silicone texture (silicone based products often give me breakouts), but so far I have not had any unusual breakouts or angry skin because of it.  I really like how it blends into my skin.  I feel like I can wear this comfortably with or without makeup, but I like the way it grips my makeup as well.  I would reccomend this product to anyone who is in need of a good primer and cares about their skin's exposure to the sun.
reviews.review_title: Good spf primer, with or without makeup

reviews.review_text: Makes my face breakout if i use for a few days in a row. But a thin layer makes for a GREAT eyeshadow primer!
I always forgot to put sunscreen  when doing makeup because i never liked any under hut this works for me, i notice you have to make sure it dries in between layering primer this and foundation
Fair product. Has a weird texture but is truly is unseen. Blends well.
I love this product it feels so smooth in your face. It donar feel greasy. It’s my second bottle and I will purchase more. I LOVE IT SO SO MUCH
reviews.review_title: It feel so good into your skin like silk

reviews.review_text: I tried this product first in the smaller version on a bit of a trial basis…HAD to get the bigger version. Outside of SPF+ moisturizers, this is my absolutely favourite sunscreen for face. It goes on smoothly, it doesn’t pill, it doesn’t wreck makeup or show up in any way on the skin after wear without makeup either. It’s not shiny at all either. Doesn’t cause breakouts and I have acne prone skin.

This is one of the first sunscreens I’ve tried and I couldn’t be more pleased. It leaves my skin soft and not greasy like other sunscreens I’ve tried. It has no smell and the packaging is aesthetically pleasing.

I wear mineral sunscreen almost daily, but I find that it doesn’t always play well with some foundations and primers. I’d been debating whether to try this product for a while, then it popped up as a sample option at checkout for another purchase. I was so excited to receive my little sample packet a few days later. It is in fact completely clear and upon application feels just like any other silicone-based primer. I applied my normal skincare products first- vit C serum and moisturizer- and let them fully absorb into my skin (about 10 minutes.) Then, I squeezed out one small drop of Unseen Sunscreen and patted it on to just half my face for comparison purposes. Immediately, I noticed how much more even it made my skin. Like a fine putty, it smoothed over all my pores, lines and textured areas, leaving a flawless glowing canvas behind. I was worried about it being too mattifying since I have drier skin, but that was not the case at all. My foundation glided over this product incredibly easy, without clinging to any problem areas. I then worried that as the day wore on, my makeup would start to appear oily or slip off, but it didn’t move. Not even a little bit, and I maintained that gorgeous glow all day. 

Although the sample was enough for about 3 applications, I ordered a full size after just the first day. I’ve now used it 3 days in total, with 2 of those days having spent several hours in the sun. So far, no signs of sun damage whatsoever, even after one day where my neck and chest turned a bit red. I’m so beyond pleased with this product for not only saving me time spent applying sunscreen and primer separately, but for giving me a flawless finish. This will definitely be a product I reach for often.
Great sunscreen, not greasy and absorbs easily. Very smooth on face.

I don’t really know if it works it’s not one of those sunscreens that you feel them doing anything for you  as far of hydration or protection. I do like that it’s clear and you don’t get a white cast or it looks like you are wearing makeup like the tinted ones. I also like that it’s clean and made without toxic ingredients.

love this sunscreen so much. the only one i’ve ever used that doesn’t break me out or feel gunky after you reapply. sinks into my skin and doesn’t feel heavy. works great under makeup too. can’t think of a single thing that’s bad!
Always a favorite! This is my 4th bottle of this. My whole family loves it because its not actual lotion.

The best sunscreen. Perfect for putting on makeup. Sometimes I just mix with a drop of Drunk Elephant's D Bronzi drops and just wear that for a beautiful glow. It does smells like your typical sunscreen, but I actually like that scent

Love love love this sunscreen!! I have oily/ combo skin and this sunscreen is worth every penny!! 
It is very light and I don’t breakout like with other sunscreens. I love this stuff!

100000/10 sunscreen. Mattifying, invisible, pleasant smell. I wear this under my make up and have never had pilling. The bottle lasts for a while if you just put it on once a day like I do. I use their powder sunscreen to reapply throughout the day. This also doesn’t sting your eyes like most sunscreens so I am able to get it all around the sensitive eye area to keep it protected.
I had high hopes for this sunblock. I have combo skin but it does not work for me. Too drying.  If you have oily skin this would prob work for you. Returned it.
While this sunscreen has an amazing texture, it doesn’t stay good under the makeup and make it slide throughout the face. Additionally it is not good for acne prone skin.
I got this as a gift and can't tell you how much I love it. Its super light, not greasy, and goes on clear. I use it under my make up and acts as a moisturizer too.

One of my favorite sunscreens! (along with supergoop glow screen) There are definitely more affordable sunscreens out on the market but this sunscreen is so unique. If you are a makeup lover i feel like you will love it! Reminds me a ton of smashbox photo finish primer. It sits beautifully underneath makeup and I don’t even need to prime my skin. Super lightweight and I can hardly feel it. I’ve been using this for about 2 years now and I’m just now starting my 3rd bottle.

I want to try after the hype but was disappointed. I have acne prone skin and this didnt help. I like how easy it is to apply but feel like its just a layer on top of the skin and its moisturizing at all.  It also doesnt wear well under makeup and makes everything ball up and stick to my beauty blender.

This is a great sunscreen because:
You will not get a white cast (obviously)                               
You can apply it multiple times a day on top of foundation or other products
If you plan to only wear this sunscreen, it has no shine 
This sunscreen is not so great considering:
It's only SPF 40  and most people should wear at least an SPF 50 sunscreen 
It is too expensive
reviews.review_title: An expensive SPF 40 but great formula

reviews.review_text: Yes this product is great for no white cast and feels lightweight but after using the whole bottle it became clear I wasn’t getting any sun protection … my acne scars were getting worse and worse and not better like most sunscreens do to protect from sun. Switched a la roche posay sunscreen and within a week my sunspots are decreased

I had super high hopes for this but I feel like even though it went on matte, it wasn’t long before my face was super shiny. I also don’t think my makeup went on as well overtop of it than some others I’ve tried. I do appreciate the 40 SPF however so will take it with me on hot vacations for while I’m ocean or poolside

This is my favorite sunscreen - it doesn't leave a greasy mess on your face and really easy to apply (no excess rubbing to make "blend in"). I also think it is the easiest to use under makeup because it isn't slippery. Only downfall - not something to wear when sweating excessively (like hiking), it definitely slips and stings when it gets in your eyes!
got as sample and i love it. will be purchasing full size. i have olive skin and it doesn’t leave any sort of cast. it also doesn’t make me look greasy

Wanted to like this because of the positive reviews but just doesn’t work for me. The sunscreen pills on my face so I thought I’d let my moisturizer dry/absorb completely before trying again so waited 10am before applying, but it still pilled. Won’t be repurchasing.
Ahh, I love this sunscreen. Used it all of summer 2021!
cannot believe i did not try this sooner. my new HG sunscreen. so easy to apply and wears beautifully
YOU NEED THIS! So easy to apply and has a Matte looking finish!
Love love love this product! Goes on clear, swear/water proof for first 40minutes, dries clear and acts as a primer. Non greasy finish, doesn’t stain, mixes with all my products/no pilling.
Wanted to love this. It is a really nice consistency, sheer, works under makeup but made me break out

Got the mini one to try since everyone I knew loved these sunscreens. Tried it and I love it, doesn’t feel too greasy no white cast since it’s similar to a gel like feel. Feels super soft on the skin and doesn’t make me breakout. I’ll be buying the full sized once my mini runs out
Love it. I use it everyday and all day. Very lightweight. Makes my skin feel soft and supple
It is perfection! I love it. My husband loves it. Even my small children love it. It disappears on your skin.

I have oily/acne prone skin. This is not for you if you have these issues. This clogged my pores and gives me whiteheads every time I use it. As far as a primer goes it makes my makeup slip and slide and leaves me feeling very greasy.

The most amazing sunscreen I have ever used!  It doesn’t irritate sensitive skin, works perfectly on bare skin or as a primer under foundation. It’s lightweight and ‘unseen’ but works wonders. I have been wearing it daily nonstop and can notice a difference in dark spots and melasma fading and disappearing because I am finally consistent with sunscreen because of Supergoop!  Cannot live without it now!
I love this product! It's like if nothing happen ... invisible protection.
reviews.review_title: The best sunscreen I ever used!

reviews.review_text: this one right here is the bomb. you can barely notice it. it blends so well you can't even tell. very light and smooth with absolute protection. I'll be getting more
I’ve been in the market for a new sunscreen that doesn’t pill and this one is perfect for me. It’s a great primer under makeup too!
My favorite Sunscreen!! Very sheer and not sticky. Must try!!!
I didn't like the texture nor how it felt on my skin. The smell reeks of petroleum which is a huge turn off.
Left my skin very oily. Switched up my moisturizers to fix the issue just to come to the conclusion that it’s this product and there’s no fixing.
reviews.review_title: Wanted to like, but very oily.

reviews.review_text: When the Tatcha Silken Pore Perfecting Sunscreen was out of stock, I decided to give this one a try based on reviews. While I like the texture of the of the sunscreen and the matte finish, it ended up breaking me out. Luckily, I only purchased the mini. Off to search the internet for Tatcha.

I really wanted to love this product because I love the fact that it is a clear sunscreen and the chance of getting a whitecast from it is very minimal. But it broke me out so badly! I’m still suffering from it! So be careful if you’re acne prone

This is a seriously great product.  I use it over moisturizer for an overall matte finish that makes my senior skin look great.  With a little foundation in the T-zone and some blush, I’m ready to face the day.  I give it 4 stars because the SPF40 doesn’t seem to last quite as long as I would like in sunny So Cal.
reviews.review_title: Best yet for primer and protection without shine.

reviews.review_text: I bought the 20ml , my next purchase will be the larger one. Hardly any scent. Feels great under my make up.

this is my special occasion sunscreen. i love the texture and the fact that it doesn’t smell like anything and no white cast. i do not love the price hence why it’s for special occasions lol. i also feel like it doesn’t soak in well enough to be using enough to get full spf protection. great under makeup.
Feels like a primer, I didn’t like the feeling of it on my skin, also not for sensitive skin…

It feels lovely on the skin and leaves absolutely no white cast, but it turned my face completely red after the first use. There was no burning or stinging at all, but it just left a very vibrant redness that took hours to fade. If you have sensitive skin, I definitely recommend patch testing before using this sunscreen for the first time to ensure that your skin won’t react negatively to it. I was so sad because I loved how the product looked and felt on my skin, but my skin unfortunately had a different opinion on it!

Great for a less summery look. The texture is really interesting, in a good way! It is almost like a gel moisturizer, looks a little shiny but then dries down to a natural finish. I've been mixing this with glow screen for when I want subtle glow

Wears great under makeup! Doesn’t cause any issues with how my foundation or any other products apply over it. It is clear and reminds me of the Smashbox Photo Finish primer texture except I don’t notice a whole lot of pore blurring like others mentioned experiencing. This Unseen Sunscreen is pricey but unique for sure

I will forever repurchase this product. It’s amazing!! No white cast, smooths out your face, and doesn’t have a heavy scent. The price is a bit steep considering how much product you get, but I love it.

-lightweight and doesn't leave me feeling oily
-great for under makeup
Definitely worth it, left no white cast and helped with my dark marks

Yes, it feels like a primer. But what’s so bad?! It works as a primer! It blurs pores in my T- zone, doesn’t burn, and no pilling. Wear it everyday. Wish it lasted a little longer, but oh well. Still worth it. Best I’ve found so far!

I wanted to buy this sunscreen since many derms I’ve been following recommended it. The cream itself is a very light liquid, and you cannot tell if you’ve applied anything on your face! It also works as a primer, giving the face a very nice and smooth appearance. One star less for the quantity given the high price point!
Great sunscreen. The texture going on the skin is very smooth almost like a makeup primer.

It's a great product, I only chose to give it three stars because I don't agree people with oily skin should use this. Personally I try everything to get rid of the oily-look, only to layer this on as my last step and just. . . Look oily.
no cast, but ever so slightly drying. the texture does feel smooth and nice to put on your face. I think it’s expensive for what you get though and prefer to use Neutrogena’s Hydro Boost sunscreen.
Omg!  This stuff is amazing!  It goes on smoothly and absorbs quickly into my skin.  It’s light and not sticky like most sunscreens I’ve used.  I absolutely LOVE it!!!

I love this sunscreen. It’s completely invisible, leaves you matte but moisturized. It doesn’t feel like a lot of buildup when you reapply the recommended sunscreen amount. It does leave a slight clear film on your face but nothing crazy. My only gripe with this product is with the price. You don’t even get a full fluid ounce for $20.
Although it has a nice consistency and feels smooth, this product broke me out horribly. I believe it was the silica. I’d be aware if you have acne prone/sensitive skin.
the BEST sunscreen imo ♡♡♡ I love how it feels on my skin
I like using it when I dont wear any make up. However, I noticed I break out. I'm just trying to use it up. When I apply I don't use a moisturizer to help with the breaking out.
reviews.review_title: It's ok but not for me

reviews.review_text: I have mixed feelings about this sunscreen. I love that it’s clear, no white cast, no scent. On the other hand, I hate that it has silicone and it feels like i’m putting the Smashbox Photo Finish primer on. It’s also hard for to tell exactly how much i’m actually putting on my face. I do love that it’s at least 40 SPF although 50 would be even better. For me personally it did not work well under makeup. I haven’t had any issues with using this sunscreen, it hasn’t broken me out or anything. The texture and consistency just feels weird to me. Overall I do like the product and would recommend it if you don’t mind the silicone primer consistency.

The best sunscreen/primer combo. I use this every single day whether or not I wear makeup and know my skin is protected, while also not looking greasy or shiny which happens with most other sunscreens. The texture is amazing. It works great as a primer as well, I use it with the Illia skin tint and it makes it go on soo much smoother.

I’m 42 and still break out. I’ve been working hard at diminishing my sun spots with retinol. I really like this product because it’s not greasy and does not break me out!. I wear it when I don’t wear any make up, after my moisturizer. Initially, It has a ointment-like feel but goes on smooth with a powder finish. Starts off settling with a matte look but absorbs quickly with no residue. I am planning on trying more from Supergoop.
Best facial sunscreen I have ever used.  Balm-like texture does not run, or whiten your face. Does not make my sensitive skin break out!

Wow I just simply loved this product!!
It’s transparent, I feel it very hydrating kinda like a velvet feeling.!
I love this brand! (I bought all of them)
Amazing sunscreen doesn’t give a white cast and it blends to your face so seamless. Also it’s for any skin tones which is super !!! Fourth purchase of this stuff!!
Clear sunscreen and applies so smoothly. Leaves skin feeling clean, I love it.

I have been using this sunscreen for three years now and it does not disappoint. It feels like a silicone primer and pairs well with my oily skin. It doesn’t break up my make up or irritate my skin. Also it doesn’t break my skin out or clog my pores. Will repurchase always.
Great sunscreen especially for American American akin. Used while on trip to Cancun and didn’t burn once!

I haven't had a sunburn, so it must be working. I don't know exactly how much to use and the product is clear, so I'm always afraid I'm missing a spot when applying. This is a terrible, terrible primer. I actually can't believe it's labeled as such. I don't think I'll repurchase.

As a first timer to Supergoop, I tried Unseen Sunscreen thanks to the great reviews. Given there's dimethicone in it, I was hoping that the formula would yield more of a matte finish--Nope! I have combo/oily skin and after slapping this stuff on, I looked and felt shiny/oily all day. I use less than a dime sized dollop and so it has lasted quite some time. It feels like the sunscreen is sitting on top of the skin. Just not for me. Trying Supergoop's Mattescreen next and hoping that's a better option for me.
reviews.review_title: Don't love it for combo/oily skin

reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this but it really didn’t work for me. I don’t know how other ladies are loving this but I will never use it again. I normally use sunscreens with moisturizers because I have dry skin. I found that wearing this under makeup and alone will cause issues. When I wore it under makeup, it made my skin dry and caked up throughout the day. Not only that but if you sweat and the weather is hot out, it will look horrible! It basically built up my sweat and makeup and did not make me look cute at all. When I touched my forehead where I sweated, there were small clumps of sweat and makeup rolled up. Even alone it has this issue. There will be this weird texture. If you sweat or the weather is hot, it’ll look gross if you happen to touch your face. I do not recommend. Worst sunscreen I’ve used yet.

THIS IS MY FAVORITE SUNSCREEN EVERRRR it's colorless & scentless but it leaves your skin looking so soft! I decided to try it because my neutrogena sunscreen was making me break out and I saw this one is clean. I will
Keep purchasing this sunscreen! It's also great under makeup!

Truly the best sunscreen I’ve ever tried. The consistency reminds me of a primer! It leaves my skin moisturized and hydrated. It leaves literally NO cast. It also doesn’t make me oily (which most sunscreens do)
It is wonderful and not greasy so I recommend it really helps with your face not getting sunburn

Best sunscreen for dry skin!  Wish it were cheaper.

I have tried almost every sunscreen.
Usually a mineral sunscreen kind of person so I was scared to try this out..ending up loving it...other than the smell..

This is the best sunscreen I've tried.  Glides on so smooth and does not show like most sunscreens do.  I use it as a primer and it works amazingly well!  The only thing I would change would be to have a bigger tube!
reviews.review_title: Yes! A sunscreen AND primer all in one! Thank you!

reviews.review_text: Great sunscreen! Doesn’t brake me out and the soft feeling after you put it on your skin is amazing

Wow, super impressed. First time I used it today and it didn’t break me out like other sunscreen does and I like the fact it sticks to your skin. I was like eh at first cause it’s slippery but it honestly worked out good with my moisturizer and concealer :) .

Wanted to love this but I just didn't. It feels like I'm wearing Smashbox primer on top of makeup. I solely reserve this for when I'm not wearing any makeup at all now.
