Pros: makes your skin look matte with out drying. I don’t use make up but my CC cream goes over it with no complaints, and looks better than normal! 
Cons: Pricey and does not spread as well as I wish it would

This is the best sun screen I have ever used. It works great to protect my skin and it wears very well under my make up on my oily skin. I've been using this sun screen for a long time now and wouldn't use anything else.
Leaves a fine layer of grease and made my eyes burn so much
Blends in perfectly with a smooth finish. No white cast on dark skin tones.
reviews.review_title: Works well with dark skin tones

reviews.review_text: I think I've tried most products from Supergoop at this point, and this sunscreen is the best one. The texture is scary at first since it is literally like putty, and feels greasy in the palm of your hands but it is really not like that at all. It just feels like a make-up primer (this can be used a primer tbh) that dries down. Does not leave you looking shiny or greasy. I love that it is CLEAR and dries like it! Even as someone with a lighter complexion, I don't like sunscreens that leave a white cast and this does not do that since it dries down clear. It's kinda spendy for what it is, but the tube has lasted me quite a while.

Bought this just last week and I’m super impressed already. My skin is oily on my nose and forehead but very dry on my cheeks and near my hair line so a lot of skincare products are tricky for me. This smoothed my skin out very nicely, even without makeup on top! It doesn’t feel or smell like sunscreen. The feel of it actually reminds me a lot of Smashbox photo finish primer but not as heavy. I’ve gotten a lot of face burns in the past from not wearing sunscreen like I should but with this I don’t even feel like I’m wearing sunscreen! Love it!
reviews.review_title: perfect if you hate sunscreen smell

reviews.review_text: I was skeptical using it as a primer just because I am a combo oily girl and a lot of things turn dewy, surprisingly this was not the case! Did not pill, slip, or slide! stayed matte all day!

I love love love this product! great daily either alone or under makeup! the only hang up i have is the packaging- the iridescent print comes off onto hands if you have any kind of residue from other products like moisturizer or oil so sometimes i find the little sparkles on my face but eventually the entire print "unseen sunscreen" wore off. either way i its a small price to pay for a bomb product
I absolutely love this sunscreen!! My go to. Its a bit pricey but you dont need alot. I have very oily skin and it keeps it very matte. You wont be disappointed.

It feels a little greasy when you first apply it, but absorbs into the skin into a matte finish. I think I'd keep using this if it didn't have the scent that it does. The lack of fragrance (which is great, don't get me wrong) combined with the clean ingredients makes for a plastic-like smell that I don't like. The smell thankfully doesn't linger, but it ruins my experience using the product so I won't be repurchasing.
The best sunscreen for women of color! No white film left or greasiness left behind! Get it already and wear it everyday ladies!

Just amazing in comparison to all other sunscreens I have tried! Doesn't feel nasty on your skin, really feels like nothing is there. No shininess whatsoever and totally clear so you don't have to sit there rubbing the cast away. I can't believe it took me so long to try this.

Great sunscreen especially for women of color. Absolutely no white cast. Mimics the feel of a primer so application is smooth and a little goes a long way. Does leave the skin feeling a little heavy and greasy but leaves a minimal shine. I assume it’s a good base for makeup application. Will buy again.
I bought the smallest size originally to try it out, and it’s amazing! Does not irritate my skin and goes on flawlessly. Has no scent and very light. Easy to wear.

I love the fact it’s transparent . I have combination skin and it leaves my face a tiny bit oily if I touch it, after using (it has a primer consistency) but I love that it’s vegan, doesn’t leave white cast at all, fragrance free and PA+++. It’s probably the best sunscreen I’ve ever tried, I’ll definitely be buying again and recommending to friends

Almost finished with my first tube - time to review. I am very impressed with this formula! It looks and feels like a makeup primer, so there's no white cast or oily residue. It glides on smoothly and has a slight mattifying effect that looks great with or without makeup. I've been acne prone this year, and this product doesn't have shady ingredients/hasn't made me break out at all.

All around winner! This is my forever go-to sunscreen.

The sheer amount of SHOOKETH that occurred this very morning...I'm a sunscreen junkie/Esthetician that is always on the hunt for a sunscreen that will work with my dry dermatitis face. Every one that I've tried either pills, leaves a white cast, is greasy, feels gross/heavy, is shiny, or is so mattifying that I can hear the silent screams of my epidermis for any amount of hydration it can grasp. When trying it, it came out as a velvety gel. And when I put it on, it went on super smooth and clear. After it set, it wasn't shiny or mattifying, but left my skin with a slight glow and felt super soft and velvety. It felt and looked like I was wearing nothing! It also had a slight blurring effect and is basically like a really nice primer as it suggests. There was also no pilling! I am now obsessed and am fully prepared to become even more broke for this sunscreen that was officially wrapped, sealed, kissed and mailed from heaven.
I really like this product as it doesn’t have white cast. It’s easy to apply and doesn’t smell. Use it everyday multiple times

I appreciate Supergoop's overall goal of making sure everyone takes care of their skin under the sun. But, their prices are high for the amount of product you get with Unseen. Also, the smell is very synthetic/chemically and not pleasant. I like the smooth application and it does protect well. But, since I have oily skin, it does need to be re-applied throughout the day to maintain the coverage. Great as a make-up primer!
I’ve been a supergoop stan for the longest time and this I’m my favorite face primer/spf I’ve ever used!! 100% recommend
Goes on smooth and good primer for make up.  I’ve been looking for sunscreen that would work well with make up. I think I found it.

I've been using this sunscreen for about 6 months now and I have enjoyed it. It does not leave a white cast and does not feel too greasy. Like other reviews, I will say that this sunscreen is kind of finicky when it comes to layering with other products. I find that if I use a heavier moisturizer such as First Aid Beauty Ultra Repair cream under it, my face feels greasy and I break out all over but if I use something lighter like Cerave or hyaluronic acid serum and skip moisturizer, my face feels just fine and I don't have any break outs. It can also be finicky with serums. I used the Ordinary's hyaluronic acid underneath this sunscreen and after about 20 minutes it began pilling, but if I used Glossier Superbounce, I have no issues. With that being said, after experimenting and finding what works with this sunscreen, I do think this is worth it due to its sheer nature and matte finish. One tube has lasted me about 5 months and I am now on my second tube.

Very very very impressed with this sunscreen! Extremely subtle spf smell and glides right on your face. ZERO white cast! It has the same consistency of the ELF primer I use. Not greasy at all and zero shine! The only downsize is the price. I will say you don’t have to use much to get a good layer on your face. If you want a really great sunscreen and have oily/acne prone skin like me, then this is PERFECT!
reviews.review_title: My search for SPF is over!

reviews.review_text:
I am so happy I found this product.  It's very similar to a murad product I love but at a carr price point.  
I've only used it a few times in the winter at a low elevation so i'm not sure how the spf holds up in a high elevation or in the summer, but it is good for daily use here. 
It goes on so smoothly and makes my skin look so smooth.  I don't even wear foundation right now.  
I haven't noticed any issues with it mixing with my other skin products but I do recommend waiting until all your other skin products/moisturizer is completely dry since it's not a typical sign screen consistency.
I held off getting this sunscreen for the longest time but it is a holy grail. It lays so smoothly on my face and makes my makeup look even better than when I use a primer. I’m a forever fan!
Really interesting texture for a sunscreen! I love the way it’s clear and feels like a silicone primer. I’m really enjoying this so far and will continue using as long as I don’t have any breakouts
This is by far my favorite sunscreen I have ever tried ! It’s so velvety & soft on the skin & it doesn’t make me breakout!!

This is the best primer I ever used, it makes your pores completely invisible, I follow with SUPERGOOP GLOW SCREEN and little Glossier cheek color. My make up is done for the day. You protect yourself with sunscreen and look fabulous.

This product glides onto the skin like a primer and really does blur fine lines and pores. Makeup sits pretty well on top of this product, However, when combined with certain skincare products I noticed pilling?? Little balls of the previous products left on my face. Examples would be the Volition Vitamin C serum and REN evercalm day moisturizer. Overall for a chemical sunscreen this preforms extremely well!

I’ve searched high and far for the perfect sunscreen and this is as close as I can get. I love how weightless and clear it is. It doesn’t feel heavy on my face whatsoever. Sometimes I do skip my forehead because it can make it too oily but that sounds like a personal problem. It’s great under makeup and doesn’t pill like other sunscreens for me.

The best part about this sunscreen is that it’s safe for the coral reefs.
I love supergoop products and the unseen sunscreen is beautiful. it goes on feeling like a primer and has great sun protection.

5 stars. It does not feel like a traditional sunscreen. It isn’t thick. It applies exactly like a primer. It is so so so soft and lightweight. It honestly makes my skin look lovely. I will buy this again and again it’s a new staple for me.
Whenever I run out of sunscreen, I go back to this one! It glides on my skin, matte, and doesn’t have a tint that I have to aggressively rub in. I don’t think I will ever go to another brand.
Love at first try. This is a super light weight sunscreen that applies more like a moisturizer. No white cast whatsoever. I also like the scent. Will repurchase when I run out.
I love how this sunscreen feels on my face. It feels like a primer or light weight moisturizer your skin. And of course unseen means no white cast. One the best sunscreen I ever use!

This is the first face sunscreen I’ve used that hasn’t left my face feeling like an oil trap. This product goes on amazing and doesn’t have a white cast in photos. I first bought this when I was working outside everyday in the Florida heat. Never broke me out or overly clogged my pores.
This is soo worth the price. The consistency is amazing - nothing like the usual sticky and oily texture of regular sunscreen. Great makeup primer as well!
The best sunscreen! Doesn’t feel greasy and didn’t make me break out. Wears very well under makeup. Highly-recommend.

Its the only sunscreen I use and haven't tried many others but there is no need to because I love it. I just bought their hand SPF, body butter to try for summer and their SPF lip gloss. I love it all.

Honestly one of my favorite sunscreens! I love that it doesn’t make my skin shiny and it doesn’t have a white cast. It also has the texture of a primer and it works great before putting on any makeup. Not greasy either which is great

This is my FAVORITE makeup primer ever (even though its a sunscreen)! I have always struggled to keep my foundation in place, it seems to disappear after only an hour or 2. With this, my makeup actually stays on all day! I have purchased it several times and given it as a gift to my mom, we both love it. It has very similar consistency to Smashbox Photo Finish Foundation Primer but with the added bonus of sunscreen. There is no white cast (although my skin is pretty light). This sunscreen somehow blurs your pores so I use it daily even when I don't apply makeup. I haven't burned when using it but if I'm going to the pool or beach I usually take more precautions, using several layers of different sunscreens on my face because I'm sensitive to burning. 

Side note: If you use this and experience pilling when you apply it, it is not compatible with whatever product you put on your face beforehand. I have one lotion that causes this - all others have been compatible.
I’ll never go back! No white cast! Only the amount the size of the tip of your finger is needed!
reviews.review_title: The Best Sunscreen On The Market!!!

reviews.review_text: I LOVE this sunscreen! As a women of color I’ve struggled to find a sunscreen that doesn’t make me look ashy and is easy to apply and this is it. Many other brands claim to have have a sheer and “unseen” look but this the only one that lives up to the name. It applies literally invisible and gives me a glowy look and works great as a primer for make up. And doesn’t make my skin feel dry.
I love how this goes on so smoothly and has none of the oiliness I get from nearly any other sunscreen. It’s the only one I’ll use on my face daily.
Really really love this. It’s just like a primer but it has great SPF protection. I use it with or without makeup. It makes your skin look and feel smooth, also it completely translucent!
Liquid Gold!  I've cut down on foundation due to the masks, but this primer actually blurs the imperfections and a lot of foundation isn't needed at all!

Every single SPF I’ve tried makes my face super itchy and I can’t stop scratching when I wear it. This stuff, however, doesn’t even feel like it’s on my face and doesn’t irritate my skin at all. I will forever re-buy this.

I love this sunscreen. It feels and preforms like a makeup primer and it has a blurring effect on my skin. It leaves a natural beautiful glow. It’s also hydrating. The only downside is it does smell like sunscreen, but I don’t mind that smell and it goes away. I also can only use a dime sized amount so I have to layer it with other sunscreen to get the full protection. If I try to use too much it feels thick and greasy.

I love sunscreen so I’ve tried a lot. And nothing really compares to this one. No white cast whatsoever. Feels soft and smooth, and just melts into the skin. For the price, little goes such a long way. Couldn’t be happier with this product.

great product. I'm almost 30 years old and I have finally found my go to face sunscreen! I have tried countless moisturizers with spf and nothing has been worth buying twice until this! I have combination skin with a lot of freckles so spf is a must. other lotions feel greasy and heavy and leave a white film on my face. but this is awesome. it doesn't feel oily and it slides on nicely. it's even better than other sunscreens because it's spf and a primer in one product. I wear with or with makeup and it lasts a while. definitely worth the price. just remember to pair with a silicone based foundation.

Having fair skin that easily burns, I’ve tried so many sunscreens and hated how they’ve felt. Basically, sunscreen has been a “chore” for me; I have to wear it, but I’m not going to be happy about it. Until I found this! This feels so nice and not greasy. Also, it’s freaking clear! I’m already on the borderline where power and sunscreen can make me look ghostly, so the fact that this is clear is a game changer for me. Been using this for a week so far, no complaints only recommendations.
Clear and smooth, doesn’t pill, and doesn’t burn my eyes

I have sensitive/oily/acne prone skin, so finding the right SPF can be tricky. I’ve tried just about every facial sunscreen on the market and this is the only one that works for me. 
I’ve used this for almost a year now and Ive experienced no breakouts or irritation from this. It doesn’t exacerbate the hormonal acne I get occasionally on my chin. The consistency is very much like a primer and it sits on my face comfortably. It is not heavy at all and it’s invisible under makeup.
I took me many years to understand how important SPF is and now I can proudly say I wear this every day, regardless of whether I’m inside or outside.
reviews.review_title: Only SPF I Use On My Face!

reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best daily sunscreen to use. It is smooth and sits on the skin as a dry oil that is absorbed in seconds. I originally had used Glossier’s sunscreen, but am happier with this one. I wouldn’t recommend you rely solely on this sunscreen when at the beach all day, but you can’t even tell it’s there on a daily basis. Hydrating and blends well with makeup on top of it.

Amazing! Favorite sunscreen ever! Lightweight, smooth, and great protection. It's also perfect for under foundation, the texture is almost like a primer but it doesn't break me out the way most primers do. It's a little expensive but worth the the extra money.

I’m so glad I bought this! I wanted a good SPF primer but everything else felt yucky. This offers great SPF protection and goes on silky smooth so I don’t really feel like I’m wearing anything at all. Great alone or under makeup.
This product gave me horrible cystic acne I still have scars from. It took me too long to figure out it was this sunscreen.

Love this product! Supergoop makes the best sunscreen products and this is no exception. I wear it everyday as a primer. I have repurchased a few times now and really enjoy it. The texture is great and it does not smell like a sunscreen at all.
This is my new favorite sunscreen! It is not shiny and looks good natural or under makeup.
Made me break out with tiny pimples along the edges of my face and jaw line. I think this is because of the silicone. Went on very smoothly, and layered nicely with other products.
reviews.review_title: I wish it didn't contain silicone

reviews.review_text: I’m so confused! Everyone loves this but it really pills on me. I’ve tried letting my moisturizer sit for longer, but I just can’t get this to work consistently on me. I’ve kept to using only on a hike or run when I don’t care as much about the finish.

This sunscreen is amazing. I have a very oily t-zone and I’m dark skinned. Usually my options are mineral sunscreens that make me look like I threw flour on my face, or oily chemical sunscreens. This is is lightweight, fragrance free, and finishes matte. I would’ve never paid this much for so my screen if it wasn’t so amazing!
I absolutely love this sunscreen. It doesn’t make me oily, or cause skin irritation on my combo/ sensitive skin. My first holy grail skincare product!

I love this sunscreen! The feel is indescribably amazing. In your hand it feels lush but once it’s rubbed into your skin it feels soft and disappears. It doesn’t leave any greasy residue or white marks. It’s become an everyday love!

I love that there is no white residue left on my face when wearing this. I have oily skin and it leaves a nice matte finish (almost like primer) with no additional shine. Definitely a go-to brand for me when it comes to sunscreen. I’ve used 2 of their other products.

I love that there is no white residue left on my face when wearing this. I have oily skin and it leaves a nice matte finish (almost like primer) with no additional shine. Definitely a go-to brand for me when it comes to sunscreen. I’ve used 2 of their other products.
This has definitely helped my foundation a lot !!! I don’t get those dry splotches anymore with this sunscreen used as primer !!
Feels like the Smashbox Photo Finish Primer (one of my favorites) AND has sunscreen!

I love this sunscreen!!! It applies like butter over your moisturizer and feels super moisturizing, it also lasts forever because you don’t need much (a dime size or less). I’ve been using the same bottle for 6 months and I’m still not out yet, just ordered my second bottle because I don’t wanna go without it! Highly recommend. FYI I’m a 20 something year old black woman with combination/oily skin and am highly prone to acne (not poor clogging at all)

It gets the job done, and I like that there is literally no white cast with this (it looks like a clear silicon primer). There is a very obvious chemical sunscreen smell to it. It's reassuring that this is labeled as "clean" by Sephora, and the smell doesn't last very long so I can live with it. I have drier combo skin, so I don't get oily nor shiny with this. I only wish the skin protectant ingredients were mineral, rather than chemical, but I suppose I wouldn't be able to have the "no white cast." So hence my mixed feelings, but will lean more positive considering I have been using this on the daily moreso than the mineral Play that I bought before it was removed from Sephora.
i love it. a little pricey but it lasts so long it’s worth it. no white cast and it is super smooth. no greasy feeling. it feels kind of tacky but it dries down super quick. 10/10 would recommended.
I will l literally never use another face sunscreen as long as this is around. Seriously love so much. Easily spreadable, no smell, no breakouts or oiliness. I wear this every single day

I have dry-combination skin that is reactive to SPF. This product was no exception. I would get one to two large cystic breakouts per week from using this. Seemed to provide good UV coverage and stay on nicely when being active outdoors, but wasn't worth the acne. If sunscreen never breaks you out, then maybe this would be OK for you. Classic silicone feel when applying.
great product unfortunately it made my oily skin so much more oily when applied with my morning skincare routine! If you have very oily skin, this product is not for you. Disappointing:(
I love this sunscreen!!! My skin doesn’t look greasy at all. I also like how my skin feels. Highly recommend.

I’ve always been told to wear spf every day but could never really commit until I found this product. It literally goes on so smooth with no white cast whatsoever, completely clear, and none of that typical sunscreen smell. I even find it helps blur out my pores which I really love because it doubles as a great everyday primer. Definitely changed the way I viewed sunscreen, now I can’t go without it.
reviews.review_title: A SUNSCREEN YOU’LL ACTUALLY WANT TO USE

reviews.review_text: not oily or thick, but it pills. not perfumy, sunscreen smell is minimal. the texture is great, but its just not it.
LOVE LOVE LOVE this sunscreen. Very lightweight, and doesn't leave my skin looking/feeling greasy. Highly recommend as an addition to your daily skincare routine.

I didn't care for this. It definitely feels more like a silicone base primer when applied vs a sunscreen and seemed to sit on top of my skin. It just wasn't for me but if you want a sunscreen that feels more like a primer this is for you!

I'm enjoying this. I am an African-American woman that was looking for a sunscreen that doesn't leave a white cast. It does the job. It is not greasy and doesn't break me out. I put this around my eyes and have not had any sensitivity and I am a contact wearer.
It leaves a film all over my face that never really goes away. And because of this, makeup application was near impossible. I had to remove it before re-applying my makeup. I’ll go back to my EltaMD.

This is a fantastic product, especially given all the limitations that chemists and formulators are constricted by when creating a sunscreen for the US market. The US is notoriously behind when it comes to sun protection — the FDA hasn’t approved new filters in decades, an issue that doesn’t appear even close to changing anytime soon. With all these limitations, Supergoop still managed to create a very elegant product with no white cast and with a texture that most people will find enjoyable to work with. 

Better yet, this doubles as the perfect blurring primer for people who wear makeup. Even if you don’t wear makeup, you’ll probably appreciate the diminished appearance of your pores. The finish of the Unseen Sunscreen isn’t dewy nor mattifying. Instead, it’s got a natural finish and a velvety feel. 

I’m not giving it five stars because, while this has pretty high protection against UVB rays (the ones that cause burning and cancer), it doesn’t offer much against UVA rays (the ones that cause wrinkles and other signs of aging). At $34 for 50ml, it’s also very, very expensive, especially when sunscreen is something that needs to be reapplied throughout the day. If you can afford it, though, I recommend!
Goes on smooth, not oily, almost no fragrance. This SPF will be a joy to apply each day since it does not have that typically “yucky” SPF smell, texture, and heaviness.

LOVE LOVE LOVE!! This is by far my favorite sunscreen on the market! I have combo skin and this works wonders by leaving me with a smooth matte finish. I love that its clear because who likes that white pasty finish? And it also works as a primer! Also this bottle lasts me soo long. Absolutely love this product.

I am IN LOVE with this. I was never a sunscreen person until this one! The finish is very smooth like the photo-finish by smash box, and I was a bit worried since I have dry skin and it’s wintertime but my skin survived well! Never been so in love with a sun screen. And it acts well as a primer too oh woah:) plus it’s cruelty free and reef safe. Who doesn’t love a functional product that does not hurt others species?
reviews.review_title: a product does not hurt others!

reviews.review_text: Too thick. Leaves a coat on my skin and makes any makeup application or wearing a mask uncomfortable and look messy.
this has been a great sunscreen! Every now and then I do experience pilling but I think that is more about the products under the sunscreen than the sunscreen itself! Can't wait to try glowscreen!

One of the best facial SPF’s I’ve ever used. I love that it glides on so smoothly, has a blurred effect and my makeup sits on top of it nicely throughout the day. Cant say enough good things about this product- give it a try!
This stuff pills pretty badly. I was looking for something that was good for sensitive skin and this was ok. I tried waiting to put my moisturizer on but it pills no matter what. I have combo skin.

One of my favorite chemical sunscreens! I typically go for physical ones, but my sister persuaded me to get this. It goes on really well on under makeup or just by itself. The best part? It’s scent free, oil free and reef safe! Perfect for my sensitive skin!
Great for brown girls because it doesn’t leave a white cast. It’s similar to a matte primer, very light weight.
Made me breakout with little white bumps on my chin and cheeks. I have oily acne prone skin. I don’t recommend.

It does the job and is so much better than a traditional sunscreen. I feel protected with it on. I have oily skin and it kind of goes on like a primer or mattifying gel. However! It does smell like traditional sunscreen if that bothers anyone.
Yea pretty good! It’s texture is like a matte primer. Doesn’t feel heavy on my face. No zinc
I wanted to love this product more, but I found that it made my face greasy. I appreciate what an invisible and light sunscreen it is... but I don’t think I’ll be repurchasing
very light weight, non greasy, doesn't break me out, easy to apply through out the day over make up.

This is the best daily sunscreen! It feels like a primer and goes on so smoothly and easily. I also have super sensitive skin and it doesn't break me out, I just layer it over my oil-free moisturizer. I don't mind the scent - it smells like sunscreen and goes away quickly. 
I just wear this day-to-day. For real sunny beach days, I'd probably use something stronger, since I feel like I could get burnt through this if the sun was super strong.
Really great for oily skin.i can reapply every 2hours with it feely heavy on my face.. the only reason i gave it 4 stars it s because of the price.it s very expensive. Otherwise i recommend it.
Absolutely love this sunscreen!! Completely invisible, goes on smooth, and has a fantastic matte, non greasy texture...I’m literally so glad I splurged on this sun screen
Perfect sunscreen to mix with my lighter weight moisturizer. The combination gives me the best of both!

I have not found another sunscreen as good as this one. It isn’t greasy. It leaves your skin with a soft matte texture. It does work as a primer, but I only use a light coverage cushion. I didn’t see any changes with you new formula didn’t have any side effects. I have very sensitive skin and break out with most sunscreens or have a very uncomfortable greasy feeling. This is, perfect. It is pricey, but really a two pea sized drop covers my face and chest. Takes forever to go through the container. Well worth it for the quality.

This product is completely worth the price! It can be used as a primer and leaves my pores looking smaller and my skin tone looking even. This is the best sunscreen I have used so far and it can be worn seamlessly under makeup. It is not irritating at all and has a high spf content. This works well even if you have acne prone/sensitive skin and it leaves absolutely no white cast. I highly recommend using this.
I cannot stand the smell of this stuff :( I bought it because of all the amazing reviews and have found that I dread using it because of the scent.
I love this sunscreen! It's light and odorless. Goes on smoothly.

I have sensitive combination olive skin so all sunscreens even tinted ones make me breakout and annoyingly leave a white film on my face to the point to make me want to not use sunscreen. This product is transparent and feels a little oily  and even though it made my sensitive skin red when I first applied, my skin quickly settled. This is the sunscreen I had been waiting for!
This by far the best sunscreen i had. Very light and it didnt break me out.
The only complaint is that I still tan when I use it, but overall I think that is a good sunscreen if you don’t tan.
Not ideal for layering makeup over (at least for me). But worked well on my daily runs. I loved how it felt on my skin. Would definitely repurchase.

Love this sunscreen! I first tried this as a sample size and I’ve been hooked since! Great sunscreen, easy to apply, no mess, and it’s undetectable on the skin! Will never buy another white tinted face sunscreen again.

I think the Unseen Sunscreen is a great primer-like sunscreen in the sense that it really helps blur my pores a bit and smooth out my skin before applying any base makeup product and I find that on my skin it also helps the longevity of my makeup although I haven't actually tested this theory out. I keep returning to this sunscreen anytime I want to apply makeup afterwards because of what it does for my skin's appearance apart from providing SPF. The best part? NO WHITE CAST!
reviews.review_title: My Go-To Sunscreen (for the most part)

reviews.review_text: This is my favorite supergoop product I've tried. It really does feel invisible on the skin. I have oily skin and it doesn't affect that in any way. However, since it's silicone based, it does not perform well with the Kosas tinted face oil I've been using for the last couple of months. I'm not sure how it performs with normal makeup because I usually don't wear anything unless it's a special occasion (and because of wearing masks religiously these days)
I love this sunscreen doesn’t break me out and it’s so  smooth it can be worn as a primer !
It feels light on my skin, not hydrating and it burns my eyes. I’m going to look for something else that won’t burn my eyes.
Amazing primer with a smoothing effect and is truly unseen even with such a high SPF protection - which is great! This 2-in-1 product is really worth it.

I wish the product was more hydrating.  It feels more like a primer than lotion. It’s smells like spf a little strong at first then diminishes in about 5 min. 
Kept make up on, but my preference is to have more hydration. Overall okay product for me, not in love though.

Fair warning: this really does make your skin feel like velvet after you apply it, this is something you either really enjoy or dislike, because it’s a unique feeling but it’s not at all greasy or oily like a typical sunscreen. I personally like the velvety feeling a lot, so it’s a plus for me. 
Another thing, it has kind of a weird smell that isn’t nice but doesn’t linger for too long. It’s not the smell of a typical sunscreen and it’s not the smell of a perfume, it’s incredibly hard to describe but I don’t think it’s too offensive. 
I really enjoy this product overall, it doesn’t irritate my skin and it does work really well as a sunscreen even when I’m sweating and swimming. I’m giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because the price is a little ridiculous even if I find the product worth it, and because the smell when first applied can be off putting. But overall it makes my skin look good, a little of it goes a long way, it doesn’t pill when reapplied, and I will buy it again.
reviews.review_title: It’s good and doesn’t feel like normal sunscreen

reviews.review_text: This helps me incorporate sunscreen into my routine. I love the texture and how it goes on clear. It feels so beautiful, i just wish i came in a bigger size/at a cheaper price.
I wanted this product to work for me , but it didn’t work for me , I like the clear application, I didn’t mind the texture ( silicone/ velvety) this product break me out really bad.

I had been using the tinted version of this, which gives a nice glow. But, it was starting to rub off when I'd get sweaty, during the summer. Figured I'd try this version instead. Not greasy, rubs in well with no whitish tint, and doesn't make me break-out like so many sunscreens do. Now that its November, it seems a bit drying, so I've added my Fresh Seaberry oil beforehand. No problems now.
I wish it had a higher SPF, but this is a great everyday face sunscreen. I have purchased several bottles now, it lasts me about 4 months.
Used it during golfing instead of usual primer, make up goes on well on it and liked it.
Best spf I’ve used in a while. Goes on super smooth and works just like a primer. 10/10!

The name definitely isn’t a lie! I don’t feel it on or smell it at all, which is great! I can definitely tell a difference after using this that my skin is less dry and isn’t developing any new sun spots.

First, I've purchased this multiple times thinking if I just keep using it, I'll eventually like it.  Sadly, it's not the case. It's very light and smooth but it takes a lot to get the coverage needed and for this price point, I would expect more product. 

Second; formerly, I would use mineral based sunscreens not only because they tend to be reef safe but also because my eyes are sensitive. Unfortunately, the white cast is inescapable and Mark Zuckerberg surfing isn't the brand of sexy I want. The tinted ones are messy. Many of the experts from reddit told me this one didn't sting because of being fragrance and dye free but it still stung a bit when it got in my eyes on a sweltering, humid summer day. So far, supergoop products are 3 for 3 in disappointment.

I added a star because the supergoop customer service team is phenomenal.

Perfect. I love this product. It feels so good on my skin and it’s not hard to absorb. I love that it doesn’t have the typical sunscreen smell and texture but rather has no smell which works well with my sensitive skin. No breakouts at all. Will keep purchasing.

Love this product! Remember - it is sunscreen, so you should be applying every couple hours if you are out in the sun for coverage! For me, it did not work well under makeup - but I love the way it looks on its own! Dewey and fresh with a little shimmer
Sits on the skin very nicely, doesn't look like you're wearing anything.
I really wanted to like this, but it seriously dried out my skin and did not provide the protection I was looking for. If you have fair and sensitive skin, I would find something else.
Unfortunately, at least one of the ingredients listed is deemed not pregnancy safe.  Stay away if you’re pregnant or breastfeeding for the safety of your little one.

CALLING ALL MURAD INVISABLUR LOVERS! this is basically a dupe with a better price tag on it. same consistency, that amazing, lightweight clear gel that basically melts into your skin. PLUS, this is SPF 40 - the Invisablur only has 30, i believe. I think the only difference may be that the Murad one has some anti-aging benefits but i'm in my young 30's and am using Dr. Dennis Gross peelpads that have great anti-aging benefits already. might as well save some $$ where I can and stick with this! I cannot tell the difference between the two. and plus side, for being filipino and olive-skinned...NO WHITECAST! :)
The only face sunscreen I use because it is light and easy to reapply!
Great SPF! Has a great feel and a little goes a long way. Does not leave a white cast at all.
I love how it makes my skin feel, it doesn’t smell like sunscreen or leave a white cast. It was my first time using it and will purchase again.

I thought I had finally found the perfect sunscreen. I loved the finish it gave me and I really felt like it protected my skin from the sun till I realized that this sunscreen was breaking me out terribly. I don't even break out like that. I wish I could of kept it. Unfortunately, it was NO-GO for me.
reviews.review_title: I WANTED TO LOVE BUT IT BROKE ME OUT.

reviews.review_text: I like how this product makes my skin look.  It’s like a primer. It disguises pores and leaves a matte look without drying.

I am super picky about moisturizers with SPF but this one is perfect! Not heavy or greasy, doesn't smell or feel like sunscreen.
Goes on so easily and is so lightweight!
Definitely recommend!

I absolutely hate wearing sunscreen. I’ve tried so many and every one makes my makeup peel and just looks and feels terrible. I love this one! It’s so light and smooth while providing great protection from the sun. I love that it acts as a primer as well, making my makeup look flawless. It couldn’t be better.

I think it layered under my makeup nice enough as a primer, but I could never get it to apply without pilling, no matter how long I waited after applying moisturizer. It bothers me enough that unfortunately I’ll be looking for a different sunscreen.

I love this product! I have tried many other sunscreens (drunk elephant, ilia...) but this one is perfect. My skin doesn’t get oily, make up goes on smooth, the scent disappears almost instantly. Purchased it again!

I got a mini version of this SPF in the Sephora Favorites Hello! Holy-Grail Greats bag of trial sizes and I absolutely love it!  I am a dark skin black woman and every other SPF purchase I've made either made me look and feel greasy or gray.  This clear formula SPF allows me to properly protect my skin, too, which is ALWAYS a struggle for darker skin tones.  This formula is AWESOME; it goes on clear and does not feel or get greasy.  It is absorbed into my skin, completely, and doesn't block the absorption of my moisturizer.  I think it is also good for lighter women who simply don't want to look greasy from their SPF.  Great product!
reviews.review_title: Non-greasy. No Gray Film. Absorbs into skin.

reviews.review_text: Best sunscreen I've ever tried by far! Makes the skin super matte, works as a really good primer, doesn't leave any cast, and actually protects from the sun extremely well!! I live in a really hot/sunny place and this keeps me from burning. Honestly doesn't have the best smell, but it fades after you spread it, and the effects of it are worth the temporary smell.
reviews.review_title: Best sunscreen I've ever tried by far!

reviews.review_text: A perfect and strong SPF for all day wear. Lasts on my longest bike rides and beach days. Non scented and easy on the skin. A smooth application and gives the skin a soft matte look and is silky smooth to the touch. Will repurchase over and over again.
I can tell a huge difference right away using this product. It blurs all small imperfections. It’s a little oily but I think going into winter time it’ll be perfect for all day hydration!
I love this sunscreen. It has the best application of any facial sunscreen I’ve tried- very smooth, almost like a makeup primer.

I liked the idea behind this sunscreen but it wasnt for me. As I applied it on my skin, I felt it just disappear and I wouldn't know which are of my skin it was applied on. also depending on the moisturizer I used beneath it, it would roll off the moisturizer..which was a weird feeling
this feels like pure silicone. it looks great on the skin and has no white cast, but it's not pleasant to put on or wear.

Wow am I great full I discovered this sunscreen! It is just as it says "unseen sunscreen" and super light weight! This has quickly become a staple in my skincare. I would describe the consistency of this sunscreen like the smash box smooth and blur photo finish primer except that this is a sunscreen!! Mind blowing I know!?!? I love this stuff I'm sold!!

Because of the reviews I thought I found a perfect sunscreen for my combination skin that is dry, oily & sensitive but sadly this sunscreen just made my face more oily, made me breakout more from my forehead it has a really funny smell to it & the texture is really weird it's like rubbing olive oil all over your face lol. I tried this sunscreen for about a month without using new products on my face other than this sunscreen.

So good! This goes on so cleanly and without a white cast. I use this everyday and it serves as the perfect primer for under make up. I have very sensitive skin and this doesn’t irritate it at all. I will be buying again and again!
I tried this sunscreen as a sample and loved it! It offers great SPF protection and doesn’t leave a purple tone on my skin.

I received a sample size of this sunscreen a couple of months ago and finally got around to trying it. All I can say is wow. It’s clear and leaves such a smooth finish. It has that silicone feel so this is great if you have super oily skin like me. Doesn’t leave me super shiny like most sunscreens do. Absorbs quickly as well. I can’t speak for how it sits under makeup but I don’t see there being a problem honestly. Unfortunately, it’s not a mineral sunscreen so I will not be purchasing the full size. If ingredients don’t matter to you, definitely pick this one up! You’ll love it, trust me!
It gives me little pimples :( but it doesn’t give my boyfriend pimples. It’s great for his skin, so I gave it to him! It’s worth a try.

Love this sunscreen!  It’s the first that stays in place and doesn’t sweat off. It does leave a bit of a texture on your face and feels like it stays above the skin surface rather than seeping in. Again, love this for when I’m out in the sun by the pool or working out outside but wouldn’t love the texture if I ever tried layering it with makeup all day.

Oh God don't do it. SuperGoop is a very appropriate name as   I could feel my pores clogging. My skin was so greasy with this, and I already have oily skin so I don't need help getting the dewy look. A friend of mine is a skincare biochemist and she and her colleagues do not think highly of this brand. I just wish I had known that before spending the money. Please learn from my mistakes.

This would be good if you could actually put the proper amount of sunscreen on your face while using it (about 1/2 a teaspoon). There's just no way I can put that much of this stuff on my face without feeling like my skin is drying out or cakey. If you want to use it just as a thin layer of primer as added protection in combination with a proper sunscreen, then it's fine. But there's no way I would use this as my only sunscreen.
reviews.review_title: Okay as a primer, not as a sunscreen

reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and hate most face sunscreens because it tends to make me so greasy and shiny. This sunscreen has become my go-to! Gives a nice soft matte finish that I can apply makeup over. Doesn’t burn or sting. Lasts a long time and I’ve found I burn less when using this (maybe because I’m more apt to use it), but still, great find.
love this product! it definitely has a primer feel to it.

This sunscreen is everything people talk about and more. It feels and looks like that of a pore-filling primer, it has a nice thick texture but spreads evenly and smoothly on the face. To be honest my boyfriend and I even questioned if it would work because it was so invisible. We were thoroughly impressed to say the least after a full 8-hour beach day and all we had was glowing sunkissed skin, not a burn in sight! Absolutely zero white cast, wonderful sunscreen for all skin tones!
reviews.review_title: Better than the comments even suggest!!

reviews.review_text: What a great concept and product. Your skin feels so smooth and your makeup glides on and stays on!
Goes on smooth and clean. Not greasy. I ordered a larger size.
I like this item, it does not leave a white mark. Makeup looks good with it.
Should be a cult classic. This goes on totally weightless and non greasy. It’s so soft and smooth you don’t even feel like you’re wearing sunscreen. Just wish it had a higher SPF
It has a weird smell. Reminds me of when I would paint with oil paint mixed with linseed oil. Absorbs well and is definitely clear.
I love the feel of this sunscreen! Feels so smooth in my skin, almost like a lotion. Doesn’t feel greasy at all. I knocked off a star because it is super pricey for the size.
Love this. apply smooth. Only one my toddler will put on his face without fighting. I will apply over makeup mid day to keep me protected.

Amazing!  Completely disappears, matte finish, not greasy, and doesn’t sting my eyes. The one thing to note is that the smell is a bit odd when you first apply but it goes away almost immediately.  Probably because it is not “perfumed” like other products. I have used other clean sunscreens and this is the only one that does not leave a white residue!
Absolutely lives up to the hype! Goes on easily an absolutely sheer no shadow or ashy effect. Doesn’t clog pores and works well with makeup.
Love this stuff! Does not clog my pores or smell weird. Doesn't leave my face feeling greasy. Def recommend!!
Not greasy. Leaves skin soft and smooth. Feels like silk. No grey undertone. Will never use any anything else.  Might try other formulas of this brand.
I love this sunscreen. I have very sensitive acne prone skin, and this doesn't make me break out and it's so soft! I feel like it just melts into my skin and protects.
Little pricey but glides on smooth under makeup. It’s. A must for every day use.

This sunscreen is fantastic.  The smooth gel, invisible formula feels great on my face and really is invisible.  The 40 SPF makes me feel like I have coverage.  It has a matte finish, one of the few sunscreens that does not make my face shiny and greasy-looking.  Love this!
I liked it! I can’t stand sunscreen but this one didn’t bother me.  It works really well with makeup and it’s great for the summer since it never feels greasy. I recommend it.
Texture and coverage are amazing. Never had a better experience with a sunscreen.

Great product. Clear, thin, non-greasy and provides great protection. Easy to use with or without face makeup. This will be a staple in my beauty routine. I'm just sorry it took my=e so long to find it!

I can’t say enough good things about this sunscreen. I love using it as a makeup base, and my kids love the non-sticky and non-greasy feel of it on their face. I know it’s pretty pricey, but if the smooth formulation is what it takes for my kids to wear sunscreen, then it’s worth it for me.

I wish they made this in the big pump version! I’ve purchased 3 bottles so far and love it!
Great as a makeup primer as well. Love how it's invisible.
this is the best sunscreen. applies so comfortably and beautify. feels like a primer IMO. I love that there is no white cast ❤
I've been looking for a sunscreen that isn't scented. This one is amazing! Feels great on the skin and even acts as a makeup primer. Would buy again and again!
LOVE LOVE LOVE! I have oily skin and this sunscreen has an amazing matte finish. Perfect under makeup or just to wear without. I wear it EVERYDAY. Couldn't ask for a better sunscreen.

I LOVE THIS SUNSCREEN AND I DONT EVEN WEAR MAKEUP ! it’s so smooth and natural looking. It’s truly the best and most different sunscreen I’ve ever encountered. And I’ve been searching forever ! It comes out clear and goes on clear. No cast or flashback what so ever. You literally can put in as much as you’d like and it won’t look ridiculous.
reviews.review_title: YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT lol JUST BUY IT.

reviews.review_text: I bought this months back, but never got the chance to use it. (I’m a spf Junkie) anywho, I seen this sitting back in my cupboard, and I decided to try I absolutely love this sunscreen. Being a dark skin woman and finding a sunscreen that doesn’t make me look like a ghost, is extremely hard. This not only leaves no white cast, but doesn’t break me out. I do not use moisturizer when I use this sunscreen, I feel like if I do, I will be a tad too greasy looking. So if you are on the oilier side, skip the moisturizer and head straight to this

It's very smooth and my makeup doesn't slip off. It doesn't smell bad and it doesn't leave a white cast at all. It's doesn't feel like a light weight moisturizer if that's what you're hoping for but it's still comfortable to wear and doesn't feel heavy.
Everything works, except it’s a bit shiny/slippery on me.

This used to be my go-to, holy grail sunscreen. The new formulation (while now reef-safe) is not quite as coveted as the old formula. Something about the new formula that feels more oily and sits on the skin whereas I didn’t experience that before. For the trade off of being reef-safe, I still like this product but hope that supergoop continues working on their formulation!

Favorite sunscreen ever! Applies nicely, good finish, never had a sunburn. And best of all - it works well with makeup. It’s smooth enough that it doesn’t interfere with application. But makeup doesn’t slide off of it. I mostly wear it with Clinique’s “even better” foundation, but I’ve tried it with several.

I really enjoy this primer. It does have a quite silicone-y feel, which I like. I find it smooths over my skin texture well. I like that this primer does not give me flashback like other products with sunscreen. My foundation applies nicely on top without sliding around my face.

I wanted to like this so bad! I had heard great things, but it was a no for me. I only used it twice and i broke out in red bumps all over my forehead. I have normal to dry skin and i don't really have sensitivities to any ingredients, so i'm not sure why this happened. I also prefer more of a lotion/creamy texture in a sunscreen and this just felt exactly like a makeup primer. It also doesn't smell very good,
Fabulous. Non-greasy, goes on easily and is invisible. Best of all: I use it on top of my beauty regime, and before foundation, and it’s a great primer. Doesn’t pill-up.

I really want to like this, but it isn’t working for me. It goes on smoothly, but throughout the day it feels like it’s not really set. My skin is weirdly sensitive to sunscreen, and it’s not loving this one. I’m glad I tried it as I know many, many people love it, but it’s not for me.
Best sunscreen ever! Love how it feels and it goes on and absorbs quickly using two fingers worth of product for neck and face

Harmful sun rays? Don’t know her. White cast? Don’t know her. Greasy feel? Don’t know her. 
This is the best sunscreen I have ever used, I’m on my 6th repurchase, I won’t ever use another face sunscreen, because this is the best of the best. Can wear it alone, under makeup, in a pandemic, at the beach, at a ball, you name it

I just bought this from south coast plazas sephora and I decided to apply it to my skin but its pilling a small bit in the dry areas of my face aka the sideburn area which I'm not loving that and tried my best to wipe it off because I don't want to see gel pieces on my face. They mostly came off when I gently wiped it with my finger but it still bothers me that I cant rub in the sunscreen for fear of it pilling in the dry areas. I do think that its not clogging and didn't cause any irritation and it does make my skin soft. So if you don't mind having to deal with minor pilling in the dry areas of your face then going for this product is fine. The smell is nice and light and Im curious to see how this will perform under makeup because I bought this for more protection under my dior makeup but if the pilling shows up once I put the makeup on I will be returning this. Just  make sure to put the product in ur hands and then pat it on to your face light until it absorbs to hopefully cancel out any pilling.
reviews.review_title: great for sensitive skin but minor pilling

reviews.review_text: My new favorite sunscreen! It feels like Smashbox Photo Finish primer—it’s a lightweight gel feel but not greasy or clogging.

Love this product! I was used to wearing full coverage foundation. It has great buildable coverage for a cc cream. I paired it with the primer in the line! However you need a setting powder if you have textured skin! The color range is fantastic also!

Amazing! I bought this to replace my Laura Mercier foundation primer and this is next level. Not only is it SPF 40 but it might be the best foundation primer that I’ve come across. Held my make up all day from 7:30am and to 10pm which is actually a miracle bc I have very oily skin. I will definitely repurchase. No need to try anything else!

This is such an amazing product! I love that a little goes a long way so I dont have to worry about constantly replacing it. Goes on clear, soaks in nicely without feeling greasy and wears SO nice on top of my moisturizer and under foundation. I will absolutely purchase again!

I have been a fan of this sunscreen for some time now. The smooth texture is addicting and I love how it smoothes out my skin as my final step in the morning.  It has a clean, easy scent and the small bottles are perfectly easy to throw in my purse.
I recently fell ever further in love with this sunscreen after a recent trip to Palm Springs, where it protected my skin after 4 days of 112 degree weather and pool-time. This sunscreen seriously protected my face from what I am sure would have been sincere sunburn in that weather but I applied after every few hours and my golden tanned face was protected.
reviews.review_title: Protected My Skin in 112 Degree Heat

reviews.review_text: it works. it goes on well and at first it has a smell but it goes away quickly. it works well under makeup. i am not wild about the ingredients though.

Purchased the limited edition size. I love that the product is completely clear and is invisible on my skin. The texture is nice and easy to blend. I find myself applying more than I would with other brands I’ve used. Not sure if it’s because it feels so silicone-like and applies so smoothly. Or if it’s because I can’t see it on my skin. Either way, I think it’s a good thing that I’m applying more to ensure I’ve got good coverage.

This is the best sunscreen!! I usually break out a lot from creams and sunscreens but this one didn’t break me out at all. After I tried this it was so smooth left my skin looking beautiful and soft. I’m ready for my second batch !
Love this!  Feels like primer and just disappears as you rub it on your face. Not sticky and no scent.

I didn't realize how good face sunscreen could be until I tried this one. It's a clear gel that goes on light and feels so smooth on your face. It isn't greasy at all and has a nice scent (nothing strong). I feel protected when I wear this and I will definitely keep buying it!

I wanted to start using a higher SPF on a daily basis (right now I use SPF 15) so I picked this up! Unfortunately, after two uses, it caused a rash around my mouth - that's the only thing that changed in my routine so I assume it came from this product. Super bummed about it! Even more bummed I don't have the box to return it anymore :-( I think the active ingredients that caused the rash were Homosalate and/or Octocrylene as my typical SPF moisturizer doesn't have either ingredient in it. I will say that it went on smooth, wasn't greasy, and acted as a great primer though!

This is a great product and worth the price. It looks amazing under makeup and doesn’t leave any of that pesky white cast. The only reason this gets four stars is because it caused me to break out. I’ve been sensitive to SPF in foundations before but not all SPF so I never know which one’s going to affect me. But this one unfortunately did. If you have sensitive skin maybe check the ingredients extra carefully before buying. I’m so sad I can’t use this. :(
This makes my skin feel matte and clean, not greasy!

So I don’t want to give this product a bad review because I have tons of friends that love it, but unfortunately it did not work out for me and wanted to make note of my experience for anyone that might be dealing with the same thing. I started having break outs and could not figure out why. Basically simplified my skin care routine to only using gentle cleansers and moisturizers and still the break outs remained. I have DRY skin and I also thought it was weird that by mid-day I would feel like a grease ball and felt like I needed to wash my face. Then I had the aha! Moment where the only thing I hadn’t tried to eliminate was this spf. Went a week without wearing this spf, no longer felt like a grease ball and the break outs started to clear up. Decided I can’t continue to not wear spf and after that week of not wearing this I went back and literally by the end of the day I became a pizza face again. So - long story long - it cause my dry skin to feel greasy and caused break outs.

It truly is unseen! Goes on like a smooth gel and doesn’t leave any white chalkiness to the skin. Feels almost like a primer so it sits well under makeup! After years of searching for a face sunscreen that I didn’t hate the feel of, I’ve found it.
This product clumps up right away. It makes your makeup look so bad and it does not go on easily. Additionally it feels greasy on my face. Find another sunscreen

I really liked this sunscreen. I felt that it glides on nicely either on clean moisturized face or even over some makeup. What is great about this product was how quickly it synced into my skin. The texture was a little surprising like it had a gel like feel, but rubbing it in, I could hardly feel the product. For me, I don’t wear much make up so I usually pair this with a simple moisturizer.

Feels very nice... It is one of my favorite face products, I'm in the sun almost every day gardening and I need something to protect my skin. My skin is very sensitive and some products make my skin irritable but this is the best. 

To me it feels like it melts into your face! It hydrates and has zero irritation! I got a mini of this in a set but am back to buy the full size!
This is awesome! Goes on well under makeup. I have oily skin so I also use a primer but this is great for layering and having an SPF under makeup.

I usually use Asian sunscreen. But this one claim that red algae can filter higher energy visible light (blue light) which causes freckles on darker (tan to dark) skin. This sunscreen does not dry my skin. It is non-sticky and non-greasy. But it is slightly oily because of the dimethicone and slica. 

If you don't like dimethicone, look for other sunscreens. Even it contains dimethicone. I feel a increasing friction if I apply more layers on. The most disappointing is that I developed tiny pimples and allergy reaction after using this sunscreen. I find myself not good with transparent sunscreen. Anyways, I am going back to Asian sunscreen. 

But, I won't return or throw it away. I mean it is a ok sunscreen, I can apply it on my body especially hands (i hate my car wheel turn white because of mineral sunscreen)
Love this product! keeps my skin protected from damage !
This is the best stuff ever! Primer and protection in one. It's truly perfect.

This sunscreen is great for oily skin! I loved wearing it under my makeup or alone. It feels like nothing is on your face, plus it has a slight blurring effect, so wearing it alone makes your pores look better!
Wonderful product that blends in well and adds a glow. I particularly like the new version of this product that has a luminous tint.
AMAZING!!! Love this product because leaves no white cast and is very light weight . Does not cause irritation also and good for oily skin

I’m not afraid to confess that I thought I didn’t have to wear sunscreen (bc I’m black). It wasn’t until I fully emerged myself in skincare a few months ago that I learned the truth! Everyone needs protection from the sun, regardless of your ethnicity. I struggled with finding an SPF that didn’t give me that yucky thick white cast OR leave my skin feeling greasy. Let me just say...this formula is AMAZING and ALL SKIN TONE INCLUSIVE. It’s very light + gives a nice velvet matte finish. I was concerned that the sunscreen would clog my pores, cause breakouts, etc. But it’s so light, it seems impossible that it would do that. It also makes for a great primer, my makeup has never flaked or felt different with this underneath. I can layer additional primers and my makeup still feels and looks great. My skin actually feels softer with this product and I love the feeling of walking outside knowing that I am protected from the sun!! 

I’d recommend this product to everyone w/ any skin type or concern. As long as they continue to make this product, it will remain a staple in my skincare routine!

This sunscreen is mediocre at best. I bought because of how many people raved about it. I have this one and the glow screen. The glow screen product is 5 STARS I absolutely love it. I am not going to lie this product feels like smearing expired canola oil over your face. It has a very bizarre smell but definitely chemical-y. The glow screen is a bit thicker, doesn’t smell and dries quicker. The unseen does mattefiy over time but it takes about an hour. I would not use this under makeup as it is a little too slick. I have combo and acne prone skin. This did not make me break out which is great, but the product is not worth the price. Go buy the glow screen instead!!
reviews.review_title: Smelly and oily. glow screen is better

reviews.review_text: I own many primers and this has become my favorite because it serves a dual purpose as a sunscreen and makeup primer.  This primer left my skin velvet smooth and left no white cast while still keeping my foundation in place.  The consistency of this primer is almost gel like and is undetectable once on the face.

I’m beyond disappointed in this sunscreen. It smells like seafood, like really bad. I really don’t tend to leave bad comments but this sunscreen was definitely not worth it. Save your money and buy EltaMD sunscreen. This one was so tiny I couldn’t believe it was $30.
the coolest product ever! It is completely clear and it was unexpected for a sunscreen. It reminds me of a primer and it is easy to apply during my morning skincare routine.

I have sensitive skin and eyes that are easily irritated.  I tended to stick with physical sunscreens because until I found this one, all the chemical ones irritated my eyes so much I couldn't wear them due to constant tearing if sweated at all.  This one however leaves my eyes and skin happy with no irritation at all.  Also no white cast whatsoever on my caramel skin.  It also serves as a wonderful base/primer for makeup.  I have repurchased twice so far.
Almost like a gel, goes on very smoothly, not oily, minimal shine, invisible, a little goes a long way. Feels good. Also, not sticky. Washes off with a little soap and water.
I have very sensitive skin, and this sunscreen was perfect for daily use. It goes on easily, and soaks into the skin quickly, I also like that it's clear. Great buy!
No white cast on skin, it blends seamlessly, and it’s a makeup primer. Can’t. Beat. Performance. Get it!
reviews.review_title: Where have you been all my life?

reviews.review_text: Love it..does what it says it's supposed to do. Leaves my skin really soft too.

This is The Best sunscreen on the market. It's a chemical sunscreen, not a physical one, but it's truly matte, goes on smoothly, and has no white cast. I massage it in like a moisturizer, then apply my other primer (this is not the greatest primer out there, as it's a bit porous). My layers: moisturizer, sunscreen, primer, foundation. It's also effective all day. I'm in the sun every day and it works to block pigmentation.

I always appreciate any face product that has SPF, especially without the sunscreen smell. I honestly can't accurately describe the consistency, but it's between a thick matte gel? I don't feel it spreads as well as a lotiony primer. My make up lays nicely on it and it doesn't pill up.

I never wore sunscreen on a daily basis because I couldn't stand the scent or the white cast it gave me. This is completely scentless and you cant tell it's on your face. I love it and highly recommend it.
This is comparable to Murad invisiblur! It’s so good for half the cost!

This sunscreen is amazing. I use it as a primer under my foundation and it evens my skin out perfectly! I also wear it on no-makeup days because I love that it doesn’t leave any white residue on my face.
Love this product! I decided to try this next after using the Matte Screen first. Highly recommend both.

I love this product and will continue to repurchase. I was hesitant because I avoid products with silicone, and this product definitely has that silicone-y texture. Although I do not love the texture, this is great for sun protection on my darker skin. It does not make me look greasy or ashy after applying. I pair with with the Sephora brand matte moisturizer and its great even for my oily t-zone. It also serves as a primer and sits well under foundation. It may pill up, but a trick to make this work is to squeeze a dollop on your finger, then dot and smooth outwards on the face lightly, instead of rubbing in and rubbing in circular motions.
Favorite sunscreen. It feels greasy at first but it absorbs into the skin nicely. It doesn’t leave a film behind. Works great!
By far my favorite SPF. I finally was able to convince my husband to use SPF using this product. I think because there isn’t a chemically smell, the consistency is amazing, and it’s light weight.

Nice everyday sunscreen. No white cast, no sunscreen smell, goes on clear stays clear. Doesn’t pill under makeup. However, if you’re expecting a moisturizing sunscreen, this ain’t it. If you’re expecting it to “grip” your makeup like say the milk hydro-grip primer, also not it. This goes on with the texture of a standard silicone primer. I have dry skin so, I was hoping it to feel more moisturizing, so on quite 5 stars for me
This is the best sunscreen I’ve ever used! Goes on matte with no white cast. I have oily, acne prone skin so I’m always wary of face sunscreen but this is a dream!

Awesome sunscreen, feels like a pore primer :) 
Not sticky and no white cast

I received Super Goop Unseen Sunscreen in a collection I purchased, and it's very lightweight, and doesn't make my face oily under my makeup with 40SPF. Water, and sweat resistant, vegan, non irritating, scent less, and colorless, perfect face sunscreen.

Yuck, this felt like smearing gunk all over my combo-oily skin but I kept thinking it would be worth it if it felt light on my skin and kept my makeup on better like a primer in the summer..it feels like a thicker goofier version of Benefit’s porefessional but definitely does not work well under makeup for oily skin. My makeup got all floaty and smudgy half hour into it and looks better without this “primer-like” sunscreen even on a hot sweaty day. Also felt like the silicone texture was blocking my pores and my skin looked much agitated than when I started the morning with smooth clear skin. Nope, not for me, but I love Sephora for saving me the purchase and giving me this sample!

I had been looking for a sunscreen to go under my makeup for awhile and was having trouble on which one to order. I decided to order Sephora's sun safety kit and Supergoop was one of the samples. Out of all of the ones I tried this one was my favorite. It is super lightweight and doesn't leave a white cast. I will definitely be buying the full sized bottle.

I have vitiligo, so I am constantly applying sunscreen to my face.  This applies seamlessly over my skincare and never gets pilly or thick. I apply it multiple times while Im out mid day or at the beach and never think anything but lovely thoughts while applying.  Everyone should own this.
One of my favorite facial sunscreen. Not at all greasy!
My ace! The best sunscreen ever! Goes on smooth and clear and protects from the strongest of UV rays without reapplication. Look no further!

I got this as a sample for an order I made and I am totally buying it! It made my skin so soft and was basically a primer. I have SUPER sensitive and dry skin so I'm very particular about what I put on my face, but this makes my skin feel amazing and naturally protected.

Love love love love and nothing but love. I would give it 5 stars but the price for the size doesn’t match up. If you darker skin I HIGHLY recommend this sunscreen. *whitecast has left the chat* 

It has such a smooth coverage and personally I love the smell, it’s weird but in a good way. Anyways 8.5/10

Below is a before and after applying the sunscreen

This stuff is amazing! I have used it on my face and hairline all summer and I have not burnt once (and I am in the sun A LOT). It goes on clear so you can easily use it on your hairline, it leaves my skin so smooth, it doesn't make me breakout, and it doesn't smell like sunscreen. I don't have anything bad to say about it.

This is a great primer; it goes on clear and leaves a soft natural finish, blurring my large pores on my cheeks, forehead, chin and nose. I love the SPF which means I can cut out the sunscreen step from my routine. This is a two in one product that is great. I tried it on my eyelids too but it made my eyes sting and water; so heed the warning to keep away from your eyes. My favorite primer and sunscreen!
This is a great product! I usually get super red when I go out in the sun but this product made everything so much more better.
Love the product. Light on the skin and doesn’t leave behind an oily residue
Amazing product. Love the feel of this on my skin. Also serves as a great primer! This is my 3rd bottle!

I love the way it feels. The smell is eh, not great, but not fragranced. My problem is using this under my makeup would be awesome! If it didn't leave patchy white spots all over my face when I use it under foundation. I hate it.
Ohh i think this is the best face sunscreen ever! Superlight,not sticky at all No color no smell, you can keep it for the whole day and not feel it in your skin!

This sunscreen is so perfect! The product itself is clear & has a similar texture to the smashbox photo finish primer. It's not heavy at all & honestly I feel like there's some light blurring effect. 100% repurchasing!
You can even wear it as a primer! It is that good!
Luv this sunscreen. I have oily skin and this SPF makes my skin feel like silk.  ❤️

I thought that this would be similar to the Muard  product but this is way better. It’s invisible, blurs and has a velvety smooth finish (Will not peel!!!). I can easily wear it under makeup or alone.
I upped my sunscreen regimen after experiencing skin cancer. This is my favorite sunscreen. It absorbs quickly and leave the skin soft like you aren’t wearing anything. Absolutely love it!!

I was searching for a sunscreen that didn’t clog my pores and I finally found it! This sunscreen goes on clear so there’s no white cast and feels invisible once it’s rubbed in. It feels like a nice primer. Worth every penny

Best sunscreen ever!  I have been waiting my whole life for a sunscreen that doesn’t make my already oily skin even shinier.  This one mattifies beautifully and protects from the sun.  Will be my go-to sunscreen from now on!

I love this sunscreen! I have oily, acne-prone skin and apply  this every day. Personally the silicone texture doesn’t bother me, and the slight scent goes away after a few minutes. I love how it doesn’t feel thick or smell SPF-y like my other sunscreens. And I haven’t experienced breakouts or reactions in the weeks I’ve been using it, which is great because a lot of other sun products have irritated my skin. Highly recommend!
This sunscreen is amazing! Once you put it on, it  becomes invisible. Really lives up to its name!
Feels like nothing once its on your skin. Perfect primer.
I love this SPF! If you’re worried about it making your skin oily, don’t worry it won’t! It gives absolutely no shine, I like to say it goes on matte! No crazy scent!
Perfect, by itself or as a primer before makeup. I'm an oily girl so this does a great job of protecting my skin while keeping my skin matte, yet with a healthy glow!
This is by far my favorite sunscreen. It's light, feels nice on my skin, and doesn't make my skin look off in any way. I wear it on its own or under make up. Absolutely love this product.

I got a sample of this & was excited to try it because of all the hype. I was very disappointed. I like that it’s clear, but it’s got a very silicone-y texture that never melted into my skin. It’s like heavy primer, which I never wear because I hate the heavy, weird texture. It made my forehead feel greasy all day, and the scent is really strong sunscreen scent that didn’t fade. I much prefer fluid face sunscreens like LaRoche-Posay and Shiseido to this bc those feel like nothing once they absorb.

I could not recommend this sunscreen enough. This has gotten me to actually apply sunscreen everyday. I do have oily skin, but I don’t find that this sunscreen makes me oilier or has made me break out. It is truly “unseen.” Don’t think, just buy.

The best sunscreen in the mainstream market! I love this sunscreen! It’s VERY silicon-y. A lot like Smashbox’s primer. I like that though. It makes my face powder lay on my skin perfectly. Completely invisible. Kind of a strong scent — dissipates after probably 1/2 hour though. Highly recommend! A bit too pricey for the size though :(

I bought this product because I ran out of my Murad sunscreen and I saw this everywhere and it had tons of good reviews but when I got it for myself I hated it, I have normal/oily acne prone skin and this made me break out super bad I didn’t mind the texture it was almost siliconly but I definitely don’t recommend wasting your money on this. It just had hype. I definitely will be going back to my Murad sunscreen.
reviews.review_title: Not for normal/oily acne prone skin!!

reviews.review_text: This product is great. It feels like a make up primer but feels weightless when you apply it to the skin. I wear it on my face and neck, and then apply 100 spf melt in milk by La Roche-Posay on ears and body. The scent of this spf is mild and seems to disappear once applied. It is non-greasy. I usually apply Nars tinted moisturizer on top, and have not noticed any pilling of product. I would recommend this product.
reviews.review_title: Great sunscreen for all skin tones

reviews.review_text: Never once in my 30 years did I think to use sunscreen in my daily routine. I only ever used sunscreen when I'd have to be in direct sunlight for a long period of time and I had no idea you could buy sunscreen that isn't disgusting and from your local store. After doing research on anti-aging and looking for the right sunscreen, I have decided that Supergoop is undoubtedly the one for me. I did have an extremely hard time paying this much for sunscreen! Thank goodness I did! It feels amazing and truly is Unseen. It looks like vaseline but you immediately find out it's not. I obviously haven't seen any physical effects, but I know I'm decreasing my chances of seeing damage by using it. I'm so thankful for finding this product. It's worth every penny.
My skin looks better after using this. It is an amazing primer as well as spf.

Awesome consistency! Really easy to blend and makes your skin feel silky. Looks great under makeup and gives a blurred effect on its own. 

One star off because it doesn’t absorb like traditional sunscreen: I used the same amount as I would with other sunscreen & had to apply it half at a time so that it wouldn’t be greasy. But small downside to a great sunscreen.

Wish it came in SPF50

The best face sunscreen i’ve ever used. It doesn’t feel greasy, it’s literally invisible once it goes on. No smell, either which i love. If you decide to wear makeup, it sits really nicely on top of it.

I received a sample in a recent Sephora purchase and WOW! I'm amazed at this sunscreen. It goes on almost like a thick oil....kinda like vaseline but hydrating and it doesn't clog pores. This is great for someone with dry skin and it's also great for all skin colors because it is clear! I've taken off one star because the price is outrageous! I do love this but I'll likely stick with Korean sunscreen like the Purito Centella Unscented or Purito Comfy Water or even the Klairs Blue UV Sunscreen. All great options if you're looking for something more cost effective.
This is my new favorite sunscreen for the face. It doesn't clog like my last one, there's no residue, and it feels great!
I love it!!!  I recently went to my Sephora and that the first thing I saw. I saw that my favorite aesthetician had approved it so I needed to try it ASAP! Overall great product love it!

I’m so glad I found this sunscreen!!! It is a clear sunscreen that applies beautifully. It sinks right into the skin and there is no greasy residue or dreadful white cast. There is a scent initially (typical sunscreen smell) but goes away soon after.
Love that it doesn’t feel like I’m wearing sunscreen at all.
I love this sunscreen! It goes on so smoothly. It doesn't leave any white residue. Its perfect! I already recommended it to my mom and aunt.
nicest sunscreen i’ve tried to date! very lightweight and doesn’t burn your eyes like the murad one

I got a sample and I instantly loved this product. It went on so smooth on my face, it felt super lightweight and it had no smell! (I hate smelling like sunscreen) this will be my new go to sunscreen.

Not greasy, no noticable smell, very minimal flashback in photos, goes on smoothly (not too watery), and sits great under my full-coverage foundation. No irritation to my eyes--can apply directly to the lids and undereyes. Worth the prictage in my opinion, considering no other high-SPF product works this well with such faint scent. 5 stars.

I alternate between this and the glow screen depending on what look I want. This is clear, I am fair but do not notice any color once it has dried. It finishes soft and matte, a great primer for foundation or cc cream. I am on my second tube.
