I did not know what to expect when I purchased this but I guess I should have expected perfection. Went beyond my idea of what a functional sunscreen should look and feel like. It leaves no residue and makes my skin feel matte without losing any moisture and softness. It’s kind of hard to explain. I actually like to use it just to make my face look softer and less shiny.

I was excited to try this product, and finally purchased. I really hate the texture. Unless you have perfect skin (which I do not) this feels weird as you massage over rough, bumpy, or sensitive patches. Almost like a dry powder liquid. Will return ASAP.

I love how this SPF is clear and applies so effortlessly. I have oily/combo skin, and I hate wearing SPF under my makeup, even the oil-free kind, because no matter what, my face shines like new money. I use this as both a moisturizer and primer. It helps blur and minimize my large pores. It’s definitely not very moisturizing but it works for me, and it’s not 100% oil-controlling with makeup applied over it (what is?), but it does a much better job than any other sunscreen I’ve tried. I would recommend ordering the 0.5 oz if available to try out. I’m sure I’ll buy again!

Took a week for my sensitive skin to get used to it, but now it’s great! I love that it’s clear and has a natural finish. I used to never wear sunscreen because of the oiliness, but I wear this now! Thankful I found something that works for me to protect my health.

Highly recommend! I was looking for an everyday sunscreen for the face and this is perfect! It's so smooth, goes on completely clear, and you don't need too much product. Not to mention, I break out super easily and I have not broken out at all with this. I also have redness and  feel that this evens out my skin tone and reduces some of that. Also works well under makeup as a primer!
reviews.review_title: So many benefits to this sunscreen!

reviews.review_text: Love the texture and everything, but how is it claim to be reef safe when it contains Avobenzone (a toxic ingrediant) which is not only harmful for the coral reefs but it absorbs into the skin and can lead to serious issues? I love this sunscreen I just wish it was mineral.

Amazing. It’s clear and goes on clear. Doesn’t look shiny or feel sticky. I think it’s very expensive but definitely is without the problems that typical sunscreens come with. Only lasts 40 mins in water/sweat, so might have to reapply more often (which makes it even more expensive) but it does feel really comfortable compared with typical sunscreens and has a cleaner look on the skin.
reviews.review_title: Didn’t expect how nice it is.

reviews.review_text: This stuff is incredible. I got the sample size and used it daily for a few weeks, so I just bought the full size, and boy oh boy. Today, after about 5 and hours of walking and biking in the sun, this stuff holds up. It looks like I’ve gotten just a touch of sun on my face (after 5 hours outside and sweating, I expected way worse). Compare that to the rest of my body, where I wore no sun protectant all day—everywhere I didn’t use this sunscreen, I’m a total tomato. Bright red. Ouchouchouchouch. As someone who shows sun ok their face first, this totally saved me from not being able to move their face for days. On top of that, I love the way it makes my face look. The blurring effect is enough for me to forgo foundation, and it’s super lightweight, the answer to my prayers and years of not properly protecting my face.

I've tried looking for the right sunscreen that doesn't give me breakouts. Name it - Neutro. Aveeno, Innisfree facial SS. all gave me breakouts to my combination skin. Supergoop has not given me ANY breakouts even if a portion of my mask covers the applied skin during the day at work. LOVE LOVE LOVE!! Upon applying it feels like a matt texture, its transparent so no need to worry about the white glow. I only use concealer under my eye and even with the SS the concealer still applies well. Sweating with the SS still didn't lead to a single pimple :)
reviews.review_title: I think I found my soul sunscreen...LOVE!

reviews.review_text: This is the perfect sunscreen. It goes on silky smooth. There is no smell to it. It has absolutely no color and I really appreciate that. When I use the wrong sunscreen, it makes my dark skin glow white. I look like a ghost! Supergoop get it right. I could use this product forever.

I need to use facial sunscreen if I’m outdoors but I hate putting it on since most are thick or leave a white shadow. I tried using tinted but I don’t like sweating with tinted sunscreen. Supergoop Unseen solves all my issues!! I can’t put it on without a mirror, never leaves a white overcast, no tinted residue on my hands. I use it all the time!! Love it!!

The best sunscreen! I wear sunscreen everyday, even inside (because of windows) and this is the easiest, fastest absorbing, hardworking sunscreen I've ever used. Love that it's cruelty free! Easy to put on over skin care and under makeup. I wish the SPF was higher, but otherwise it's perfect.

I've worn this twice to go for a walk and I've gotten burned both times.  I have oily skin and it wears off quickly across my forehead and on my nose.  It might be good under make-up with additional SPF, but as a sunscreen alone, I was really disappointed.

I ended up returning this because I thought it made me breakout, but I discovered afterwards it was something else. This felt really nice going on, invisible and didn't feel oily or greasy. love this brand

I wanted to love this product. While I can appreciate the non shiny finish, I still don’t like how it feels on my skin. Feels like a dimethicone based makeup primer that never “dries”. It is also slightly irritating to my sensitive skin. I don’t think I can keep and use this one, sadly. If you don’t have sensitive skin it’s probably okay.

I LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS STUFF! Not only as my primer but for my moisturizer and for the SPF. This is the best smelling and feeling face moisturizer I’ve used hands down. I keep having my friends buy it.

I’ve been using this product for a little over a month and when I first put it on, I was ecstatic. As a person with a medium/dark complexion, and combo/oily skin, I always have trouble finding a sunscreen that doesn’t leave a cast, and doesn’t leave me oily. This one fits the bill! It reminds me of a primer, and I often use it that way. It’s smoothing on the skin, and gives a satin/matte finish.

That being said, I saw the ramifications of this product after a few weeks of daily use. This product contains high level of dimethicone (that’s what gives it the smoothing quality), which can clog pores. I was hoping that when applied on top of my other skincare, this wouldn’t break me out, but alas, it did. I don’t have sensitive skin, but I do have acne prone skin, and as a result I can’t use this product daily.

It’s not a wash though! I will continue using this product occasionally on days where I plan to wear long wear makeup, but only sparingly.
reviews.review_title: Recommend, but not for acne prone skin

reviews.review_text: This stuff is great! I have stage IV melanoma and am super scared of the sun now so I have used a TON of different sunscreens. This is my favorite for the face. I don’t break out when I use it, and the texture leaves my skin looking just slightly blurred/matte, not shiny like a lot of sunscreens. I’ll even put it on over my makeup later in the day if I find myself outside. My only issue is that it does seem to dry my face out a few hours after putting it on. Still awesome stuff!

Love the texture/feel of this sunscreen.  Be sure to use a generous amount before swimming or running.  It is not sweat proof and seriously stung my eyes.  It was fine for swimming but ignore the reviews that you only need a small amount.  Apply the same amount as you would with any other sunscreen.  I'm returning because of the stinging factor when I run or go on my long walks.  I would keep for use during my swim workouts except it'll be gone in a couple of weeks.  For $34/tube (1.7 oz.) it's too expensive.
reviews.review_title: Use for swimming, not for running/walking

reviews.review_text: Buy this sunscreen! I have rosacea and sensitive skin, so it is difficult to find a sunscreen that provides enough coverage not to make my rosacea red and be gentle enough not to irritate my sensitive skin. This sunscreen has been a lifesaver! Now I wear sunscreen all the time as it is so light and barely noticeable. It feels like a mix between a Smashbox primer and a Tarte CC cream (of course, this has no pigment though). I highly recommend this sunscreen for everyday wear.
reviews.review_title: Great sunscreen for rosacea and sensitive skin

reviews.review_text: I usually hate wearing sunscreen because it feels so heavy and causes breakouts but this one is lightweight, goes on velvety smooth, and doesn’t leave you feeling greasy. My only wish is that it lasted a bit longer so I didn’t have to reapply throughout the day in the Texas heat! Would definitely recommend for those that want a daily lightweight sunscreen!

This product is everything I thought I could never find in sunscreen! I am in LOVE with the SuperGoop Unseen Sunscreen. Like the name suggests it is truly unseen when applied. I have breakout-prone skin but this product does not break me out. I've also put this to the test in the past by spending a whole day at the beach and laying out to tan and I don't burn my face. This sunscreen is magical and I can't live without it!

This product literally revolutionized my makeup game, no joke. As a fair skinned Russian girl, I need to make sure I’m always wearing sunscreen. Coincidentally however, I’m the kinda girl that always feels the need to wear makeup as well. At first the two ideas sound incompatible, no? Not with this product, after I use this formula I feel as though I combined a moisturizer with a makeup primer, which creates the perfect canvas to do a beautiful, bronzed look, all while protecting my delicate skin in the process. My new cult favorite in both skincare and beauty. Thanks, SUPERGOOP!

I’m an oily girl and usually dislike wearing sunscreen but this sunscreen is absolutely amazing. It has a light gel like texture  that leaves no white cast and is quite comfortable to wear. My skin does not feel greasy and makeup wears extremely well over this sunscreen. I love this sunscreen.

SPF + No-budge makeup = dream come true. I've tried a lot of primers, but this one is BY far the best so far. I got it because of the SPF (I dont like foundation with SPF) and WOW I was surprised at how well it actually kept my makeup looking good all day long and not melting off my face. Forcomparison, I didn't feel like the glow screen did as good of a job holding my makeup in place but does offer a pretty glow from within.

I really thought I liked this product at first, it didn’t have the white coat and went on easily. I would just wear it every once in a while for a day in the sun. I recently wore it 3 days in a row and had the worse break out I have EVER had. My skin NEVER breaks out, I overall have very clear skin. I have 16 zits on my cheeks and one on my forehead. Super disappointed:( I’m not even sure if they were zits because they didn’t surface and then cleared after 2 days of not using it... but I had some sort of awful reaction.
excellent sunscreen. once i tried it a year ago i never went back. it’s unlike any other sunscreen i’ve started — absolutely love it for daily use! and it wears well under makeup too.
The texture is super weird and feels odd on the skin as it just sits on my face instead of soaking in and moisturizing. It also broke me out so it’s a no from me!

If you wear heavy makeup as i do you will understand the pain of doing your base then suddenly when you take a photo there’s so much flashback lol. This literally saves the day and my holy grail product!! The most invisible sunscreen you’ll ever had! Thank goodness sephora employee suggested this to me *even she looks like i force her to help me lol*

I've been using this product for over a year now and have recommended it to all my friends - it is lightweight, not greasy, does not leave residue, works as a primer, protects and does not irritate my skin - also can use as a moisturizer/sunscreen during hot summer days - this is just the most fabulous product, I love it!!
reviews.review_title: The best sunscreen for your face!

reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this! It feels so nice on my face. Not too greasy at all. It honestly just feels like a primer. I went running with it on too and I didn’t have a burning sensation around my eyes.

I used this product for a few weeks with no issues, but then my face started breaking out SO BAD! Horrible, painful, cystic acne on my cheeks and forehead. My acne hasn’t been this bad since before I started birth control. l really wanted to like this product but the acne is making me wanna end my life
Don’t do it!! Omg my skin has broken out like I am a middle school kid that just hit puberty. I’ve broken out to products before with initial use, this is on another level. Terrible experience.

I heard so many great things about this sunscreen so I was super excited to try it and to say it fell flat was an understatement. I would give 0 stars if I could. It didn’t apply nicely at all. You would think the velvety feel would mean it goes on like a dream, but when I tried to spread it on my face, the product start breaking up. Additionally, I have combo-oily (heavy on the oily) skin in the summer and it barely mattified my face, it just felt kind of like...velvety wet. I don’t even think it fully absorbed tbh. It didn’t mix well with my Smashbox Photo Finish primer at ALL. I was halfway through my grad shoot when I noticed my makeup moving like never before, it made my base patchy af. It’s a strong no for me.
I really wanted to like this, but I broke out all over my forehead and cheeks after a few uses. It also made me look really greasy a few hours after application.
This works great! No scent. Goes on smooth. It feels a little oily at first but it dries down shortly after application. (I have normal/dry skin)

I bought this in the BI sale, and I am a big fan.  It gives me a nice glow - I wear it on its own on the weekend, but I know it can be used w/ makeup as well.   I love supergoop products and am happy with this one!
Absolutely love this stuff!   Makes face smooth and soft.  Makeup looks great.  Wonderful primer. Provides excellent sun protection.  Not greasy.
Love this sunscreen. It’s a great primer, too. No strong smell and quickly absorbs. Best of all, it is an excellent sunscreen.

I have gone through A LOT of sunscreen for under my make up in the past. Most of the time it reacts poorly with my foundation or breaks me out. With this bad boy I don’t need make up primer and it sets my make up beautifully. It doesn’t break me out, and a little goes a long way. I can use it on days when I’m bare faced as well and it doesn’t make me oily. The tube has lasted me about 2 months so far and I have a bit over half left, so it does last a good while. A+ from me!
Very light and not heavy at all! Really a fan of this formula.
reviews.review_title: Just what I was looking for

reviews.review_text: this was a game changer sunscreen for me! i have oily skin and this is the perfect matte sunblock for me!! also is an amazing primer base for your makeup!

I've hated every single type of sunscreen I've ever worn to the extent that I would just try to wear a hat to avoid having to put it on my face just because I hated how it always felt on my skin. That all changed after I started using this product. Now I not only am able to wear sunscreen comfortably, I LOOK FORWARD to wearing sunscreen because I love the way this product makes my face feel -- like my skin has been smoothed and all the oiliness removes. I cannot recommend this product enough.

I recently moved to Arizona so I knew I needed up step up my sunscreen game and decided to try this one out. It has a light sunscreen scent but not irritating. It’s literally just as the name says “unseen.” You can barely feel it’s there! It layers well with my primers to wear under makeup but I love it on its own because you can’t even feel like you’re wearing it! I wish I would have gotten the larger size!

the name sure fits the product it felt like some sticky 
vaseline like product i didn't like the texture or the residue
that it leaves when attempting to do my skin  routine

I purchased this to replace my Tatcha spf and I wish I hadn't done that. It's a good sunscreen and I like that its a higher spf but I don't like the feel of the silicone and when I touch my face, the product transfers onto my hands. It has an unscented scent that's not horrible but also not great. I will finish this product and find something else.

I love everything about this product except for the fact that I breakout every time I wear it. I love the texture and consistency. It’s like a makeup primer for your face. I love the way it makes my skin feel. But every time I wear it, I break out on my forehead & cheeks.

Just popped by to add to the chorus: this stuff is legit. I'm usually a Japanese or Korean sunscreen snob. Unseen Sunscreen stands up to those brands. As others have said, it is 100% clear, has a very faint scent, and leaves a powdery matte finish that isn't unnaturally MATTE. It grips makeup like any good silicone primer, and it feels like nothing on the face. Love it!

This stuff is THE BEST. It is clear, incredibly lightweight, incredibly silky, it absorbs in a half second and goes on like a dream. I layer this between my usual moisturizer and my foundation primer and I can’t tell I’m wearing this stuff. Sunscreens always make my face break out, but this one hasn’t caused any negative change in my skin. And it stays put, it doesn’t slide off as I start to sweat—I mean “glow”. :) It is seriously awesome and I will be purchasing this regularly.

Hands down best sunscreen for my oily complexion 
Feels like silk going on and dries to a perfect matte blurred finish    I will never use anything else !

I bought the new larger size and the consistency is completely different than the original size :( It’s more watery and greasy in the larger version for some reason and it makes my face look oily. I guess I’ll return and buy the tiny original size again :( not sure if I just got a bad batch but disappointing that the quality isn’t the same as the last time I purchased

I really like the feel of this sunscreen and I purchased it because it is advertised as a clean product.  It also says that it is reef safe however I read an article that said avobenzone is toxic to coral reefs.  This is an ingredient in the sunscreen.  Is someone able to explain the discrepancy?  Thanks!

Wow, I've been trying to find a daily sunscreen that doesn't leave my face feeling oily or greasy for almost three years and I finally found it! This sunscreen is lightweight, totally invisible and protects your skin! 

If I were going out (to a beach, boating, etc), I would probably wear something hardier, but for a daily use sunscreen, this is perfect!
So sad it didn't work for me after hearing such great things from other people.

The fact that this goes on clear was the reason i had to try it and now i have become a loyal customer and this baby is a new addiction to my must haves. It goes on smoothly, evenly and you don’t need too much because it spreads out a lot. My pores are always a factor when i use anything on my face and this sunscreen doesn’t feel like it clogs me up and I’ve noticed it actually works well as a primer. I do have oily skin so i also consider that when i use things and this sunscreen doesn’t perpetuate my oily skin which is a huge plus for me. Sunscreen is a must for me and once i found this i can’t go back to anything else.

I don’t recommmend this is your skin is sensitive and acne prone. This product broke me out - a few days into using the product, I started developing  small bumps on my forehead. This sunscreen looks and feels like a primer (particularly smashbox) - I wish I’d taken a closer look at the ingredient list, which includes dimethicone and other ingredients that clog pores. Unfortunately it seems that most “clean” products contain pore-clogging ingredients not suitable for my skin.

Highly recommend. I have extremely sensitive skin where I pretty much avoid putting anything on my skin except for moisturizer lol. I needed to find a sunblock that won’t break me out or leave a white cast on my face. Bought this on a whim and for the Past two weeks haven’t noticed any breakouts. It soaks into my skin fairly quickly. For people who wear makeup I’m sure they would appreciate it because it hides pores too. Just purchased another bottle because I can’t do without it anymore.

It’s a good clean product if you want no residue from the SPF and if you want a good primer for makeup. It goes on very matte which actually clogged my pores and made me breakout. But if you’re not prone to breakouts, I recommend this.

Has a slight smell which isn't ideal, but the sunscreen definitely goes on clear and stays clear. Of course, you jave to pay attention where you've put it, because you can't see it! It is smooth, not heavy.
Best sunscreen ever!!! It doesn’t leave a white film, it is completely clear!!! Feels very soft on your skin, not oily at all.
Discreet sent, not greasy feeling what so ever. Perfect base for makeup, and leaves NO WHITE CAST. ❤️ Favorite sunscreen!

I actually bought this for my husband, I had the hardest time trying to find a sunscreen he would willingly put on his face and he loved the sample I had him try so I bought the full product and it’s a win. Now I just need to buy one for myself!

Great sunscreen!! Love how it also works as primer and isn’t heavy! 
It’s not greasy or sticky. It has a very silicone-y texture which is pleasant. 
It has a very natural to dewy finish on the skin which makes it look radiant but not oily. If you apply a matte foundation on top it won’t change the texture/finish of it. Will purchase again
I have darker skin. I love that this doesn’t leave a white, grey or purple cast.
Love this . This is my third purchase. Never want to be without this
Best face sunscreen I tried so far. Just finished one bottle and bought a new one! The use for under the make up it’s weird, but no problem on top of the face. No white cast either. I love it

I applied this about an hour before going outside. I applied a second application about 20 minutes before going in the pool. I was outside about 2 hours and never got my face wet. My face got burned! I was all red and this seemed to not provide protection. I applied a heavy amount. The feel of this product is very silicone and I don’t recall it having a scent. This was not a winning product for me.
Love this sun screen.  Usually can't wear chemical sunscreens because it creeps into eyes. This stays put and has an amazing natural finish.
Perfect as a primer. The  melts into your skin with no greasy feeling and totally clear. Even my husband loves this sunblock and I will be purchasing more.
Goes on smooth.  You really don't feel it.  Doesn't have that thick greasy feel like some sunscreens.  And I like that it has clean ingredients.  No issues with my sensitive skin. Worth the price.

I feel like I need to collect everything supergoop!
Works as well as any primer, makes it easy to never forget sunscreen!

I love that this goes on so smoothly and just disappears. I never used to wear sunscreen on my face because I didn’t want to use something sticky. This is completely opposite of sticky. I no longer use primer anymore either, because this acts as a primer. It’s an amazing product and I plan to use it forever. Also, I have really sensitive skin and am prone to breakouts. I haven’t had any issues.

I have been looking for a sunscreen that I can put on under my makeup for over a year. I have pretty sensitive acne-prone skin, so I've had a tough time, and most sunscreens have made my skin break out and/or develop white bumps on my face. Well, I've finally found one that works for me, and I'm so happy that it also doubles as a primer!! I can't recommend this enough. It didn't make me break out at all--if anything, it has helped improve my skin (in combination with all the other skincare products I use).

This product goes on super sheer and spreads easily. The texture definitely feels reminiscent of a primer, but I like that about it because it feels nice and smooth on my skin. It has a mild scent when you first dispense it out of the bottle, but it dissipates quickly once you apply it.

Debated for so long what face sunscreen to buy, and found this! Love this sunscreen sooo much! Works great to protect my skin and hasn’t broken me out. I’ve been using it for the past few weeks at the beach and I haven’t burnt my face at all!

This is the only sunscreen my kids will use on their face without complaining! It goes on silky soft which is why my kids love it. They ask for the soft sunscreen all the time! My redheaded child never burns on his nose or cheeks when we use this.
reviews.review_title: Kids WANT to use this sunscreen!

reviews.review_text: This is, without a doubt, the best sunscreen I’ve ever used. Leaves skin smooth, no irritation.
Great under makeup or for makeup free days. Non-greasy and has a nice natural finish on skin. I have acne-prone skin and this has been working amazingly!

The best part about this sunscreen is that it truly feels like there is nothing on your skin. I love using this on my face because it doesn’t leave any residue, it doesn’t feel sticky, it doesn’t need time to dry, etc. It also actually works! It keeps my skin safe from sunburn. It’s so great for everyday or periodic use.
reviews.review_title: Truly Feels Like You Have Nothing On!

reviews.review_text: I have very oily skin and this product tames the oils for literally the whole day (I’m typically blotting my face 3 hours post shower.) I love how it disappears into my skin and feels like I’m not wearing anything. Highly recommend.
The best primer/sunscreen for all ages.  I use it and my 13 year old daughter uses it too.  It doesn't clog your pores and leaves a smooth matte finish.  I wear it under my makeup.

I have fairly sensitive skin when it comes to sunscreen, but I have finally found the holy grail of face sunscreens! This is non-greasy, absorbs well, is virtually invisible and only has a very very faint sunscreen smell. I have been searching for so long to find the perfect sunscreen and now my search has ended!
I love this sunscreen! It is hard to describe but it goes on very smoothly, almost like an oil, but it isn't greasy at all (almost like a powder). Great under makeup or on its own.

Great product overall. It doesn’t feel like sunscreen - more like a jelly that glides on sheer and soft. I have been using it every day this summer - no break outs. No scent which is nice. Just be careful wearing to outdoor workout classes - if you sweat and the sunscreen gets close to your eye it can burn!

Love the texture and the finish on my face - it feels super lightweight and I can’t even tell I have it on. 2 stars because it broke me out like crazy (I have combo acne prone skin) and didn’t do much to protect my face from the sun.
reviews.review_title: Great feel and finish but that’s where it ends

reviews.review_text: I had high hopes from reading the other reviews. I got this because during quarantine I stopped wearing makeup with spf. i still need some spf though. this product gave me severe deep painful pustular acne. it is going to take 1-2 months to recover from it.  I stopped using it and the acne stopped.   I never have had acne in my life until I used this product.

Made my face look shiny and greasy. Didn’t provide the sun protection it claimed. My skin burned and usually I’m safe using SPF 30 with no problem. I would not recommend this product to anyone with fair skin.

This sunscreen is very light which is exactly what I was looking for. However, it had a strange smell- almost like chlorine which I have not experienced with other sunscreens. It also left my face looking really greasy. Will be returning.

My skin and sunscreen have never gotten along until this one. I have very fair sensitive skin, I burn in like 15 minutes out in the sun. My skins very oily, some rosacea and im very quick to break out if anything touches my face. this sunscreen is like a clear liquidy gel that goes on and seeps into your skin, it isnt oily but also give you a nice glow. I am so happy i decided to give this a try. I definitely recommend this to everyone.
reviews.review_title: This is alien technology that supergoop is cookin

reviews.review_text: I hate that this didn’t work for me.... I really love the feel of it and how truly unseen it is... however I think it’s clogging my pores because I’m getting breakouts :-(  if it was truly non-comedogenic, It would be a keeper

This is seriously the best sunscreen for wearing under foundation that I have tried. It has a texture similar to Smashbox primer when it goes on but dries out matte and kind of velvety. Foundation goes nicely on top. No weird or overpowering sunscreen smell. Doesn't make my face greasy. Love it - worth every penny.

I love this sunscreen! It is super lightweight and goes on like a primer. It has hardly any smell, I would describe it as lightly coconut-oil-like scented. The only downside I would say is that it seems a little pricey for the size.

I started using this sunscreen as my daily use sun protection approx. one year ago. While I don't love the silicone primer-style texture, it is by far the best daily use sunscreen I have tried so far (and I have tried several). It doesn't break me out or leave me feeling greasy and it seems to do its job well (I don't get sunburned when I have it on, even if I'm outside for awhile). I don't know how well it lasts with makeup, as I am not a daily makeup wearer.

When I put on this sunscreen, it looks like I applied vaseline it's that greasy. It takes about two hours to "dry down" to the point that I can apply makeup over it. But it still looks greasy. I actually had someone ask what was wrong with my skin because it looked so greasy. It looked gross. I have combination/oily skin. This product is not for me. The smell is alright. They claim it is "scentless" and I am sensitive to smells, but it isn't bad per say.

With the claim that it has "shine control" I can't stand behind that.
My favorite sunscreen!! It doesn’t leave a white cast and almost had a primer-like finish. Perfect under makeup or without! On my third bottle and I loveeee it!
I think the sunscreen works, but the product is tooooo oily! Gel texture
I want to love the sunscreen but it makes me super oily! I already have an oily T-Zone and recently haven't had much of a problem but this sunscreen makes me super oily!

I love this sunscreen. I was a bit hesitant to buy it because I usually just use drugstore, but I'm happy I did. The texture is a little weird at first, but this keeps my skin matte and I feel like my skin looks so smooth with it on.

I’m a huge fan of the glow screen and buy it faithfully. I got this as a sample and was excited to try it. I ended up LOVING IT! It’s beyond lightweight and doesn’t clog your pores. I have sensitive skin and it worked super well for me. I put a little makeup over it and it also worked as a great primer. Will be ordering a full size! Highly recommend.

I ordered this from a friend's recommendation saying it wasn't greasy because I was looking for something for my face. I can't say I'm a fan of the Matte Texture but I wore this all week and vacation and didn't break out.
Very lightweight and sheer. There is no “white cast” or “ghost look” left on my  face/skin.  Had not issues using this as a primer alone or with my other primer.

I have oily combination, acne prone and sensitive skin that reacts to some SPFs. This SPF has the soft texture of a makeup primer, is blurring and smoothing, and has a natural, non greasy finish. There is no color to it and it does not sting my eyes/irritate my acne. It creates the perfect base for makeup and looks beautiful on its own. I add some Drunk Elephant D-Bronzi drops to it and it gives my face a beautiful bronzy glow, not greasy/shiny. I will repurchase when I run out of it!
reviews.review_title: the best sunscreen I have ever used!

reviews.review_text: I know it’s “scentless”, but I love the scentless smell. Completely weightless ans grips to my makeup amazing. Sometimes I wear this alone!
A great everyday sunscreen! Light, absorbs well, and layers under make up really nicely.

I got a sample of this in the most recent Sun Safety kit and I pulled it out the other day to try it.

I really liked it. Since it's a gel, when I perspire it doesn't run into my eyes nearly as much. This is a huge bonus.

The fragrance is nor noticable and it applies easily.
Love this production! Doesn’t leave a white cast and has no smell!
reviews.review_title: Works well on darker skin tones!

reviews.review_text: Lightweight, clear, and not oily at all, has caused no negative effects (e.g., acne) on my skin. I put this on top of my face and neck after using Vitamin C serum and moisturizer. Knocking it down a couple of stars because of the smell (strong like sunscreen) and the peeling that it causes when used on top of moisturizer. I've found that waiting at least 2 hours before putting on my moisturizer is when the peeling doesn't take place - but that's not a reasonable timeline for daily routines! Will likely look into another SPF once this is done.
reviews.review_title: Good but peels on top of moisturizer

reviews.review_text: Best face sunscreen! I purchased it in store the other day and it is amazing! I highly recommend.
Smooth, serum consistency but doesn't protect from the sun!! My face burned so badly with this on.

I have the most sensitive combination skin and this sunscreen is a godsend! It has no scent, it goes on smooth and sits lightly on the skin. I've been using it like a primer in the summer months and it works great! I love this sunscreen so much.

Wow, I have never tried an SPF like this one. It goes on clear and so smooth because of its gel-like form. It’s not sticky AT ALL, it has no scent and it’s matte. I received a sample and I’m ordering the full size right away.
This is my favorite sunscreen.  As a WOC, I was thrilled that it did not leave an ashy film on my skin after applying.   The gel formula is fantastic.

Probably, the best sunscreen I’ve ever tried. I love the texture, it’s truly unseen ( I hate that white mask that other sunscreens leave on my face), not greasy and doesn’t smell like anything to me. Love it! Finishing my 3rd package and I’m happy they made a bigger one now.

let me start off by saying i LOVE this sunscreen. it’s completely clear, applies really smoothly, and makes your skin look amazing! i even love mixing a tiny bit of my too faced concealer with it to even out my skin tone. i have extremely oily skin and i’ve only recently been able to get my skin clear of acne. this stuff has such a nice, velvety feeling that i’m obsessed with. the only thing is, it’s horrible for your pores. the ingredients will clog your pores and if you are even the slightest bit acne prone, i will bet money on it that you’ll get pimples from this stuff. after a few days of using this sunscreen, i have white heads on my nose, forehead, chin & under my eyes. i’m so disappointed because i loved the way this applied and how it looked but unfortunately acne is a deal breaker. i’ll be returning this & searching for a new sunscreen that is non-comedogenic.
Easy application no greasy feel skin feels so soft after applying

I don’t usually write reviews, but this product deserves it! I use this on my face daily and have yet to get even the slightest burn, whereas I use other sunscreen on my body at the same time and have gotten burned! The scent of this sunscreen is very light, and although it does feel a bit greasy coming out of the bottle, the feeling doesn’t transfer to your face. Not to mention a little goes a long way. I can usually use a pea sized amount for all of my face. I have sensitive, acne-prone, oily skin, and this has not bothered it one bit. I highly recommend this product!

I turned 31 not too long ago and never used sunscreen on my face up until about 1.5 yrs ago. I was afraid of any sunscreen making my face look oily and breaking me out. Then I realized how important it is to protect your face from the sun (esp once you hit your 30s). Soooo this is the FIRST sunscreen I’ve ever tried on my face and I love it. I would not use anything else. It goes on clear so no white cast. Very silky on your face. Doesn’t leave any sticky tacky feeling at all and doesn’t leave me oily. I use this product in this order: moisturizer, supergoop, face primer, and powder foundation. I’ve already gone through multiple tubes of this thing and I’m glad they have a bigger size available now.
I wear this sunscreen every single day. It’s not greasy, doesn’t leave a white cast. It acts as a great primer before foundation too.

I feel it’s the responsible thing to let people know that this brand is pretty wrong for making such a misleading claim knowing fair well that the tag line of “reef safe” might sway environmentally conscious people to trust in this brand before reading ingredients when really it’s sort of just a fancy loophole phrase to make a claim that will convince more people to buy it. Because of the loose undefined idea of what “reef safe” is considered in a government regulation sense, it kind of just let’s companies who want to slap the label on of reef safe have free reign with whatever irresponsible marketing they want, even if it does potentially harm marine life in some form or another. When I saw the ingredients, I didn’t end up buying it. I’m sure it applies and feels as beautifully as many people like to claim it to be but I do not personally support this type of advertising and the ingredients in it. I don’t think I personally would even trust a brand as a whole who chooses to partake in the usage of misleading claims that are either harmful to people or the environment— I don’t know, a bit too sketch for my taste.
reviews.review_title: consider the misleading claim, look at ingredients

reviews.review_text: This is exactly what I was looking for: an invisible sunscreen, no white cast! Great texture, not greasy, perfect.

Just amazing! I have an olive complexion and super oily skin and have struggled. I’ve tried other luxury brands and still dealt with white cast and the sunscreen feeling heavy if wearing with makeup. 
I’m so amazed by this product alone for going on like a clear silicone primer, on top of that it’s sweat and water resistant is huge! 

Please never stop making this!

At first I was really happy with this product. There was no white cast. I have very sensitive skin but it did not break me out. However, I found out this sunscreen was not that effective. I put this on before for my morning jog and I still tan for only being outdoors for 30 mins.
I love this sunscreen , my skin is dry and sensitive. Just love the way this product feels on my skin. I totally recommend this sunscreen

I love this sunscreen! I wear it everyday sunny or rainy and this makes me feel real smart and proactive. It also sits great under my makeup. The consistency was new to me so I was worried about breaking out at first but I've been using it for almost a year and can safely say it has only changed my skin for the better.

This is the absolute best sunscreen I’ve used on my skin. It goes on smoothly and absorbs well into my skin and most importantly, doesn’t leave a cast on my face. Within a week of purchase, I placed an order for a back up tube. Get it. You won’t regret it.

This product is so amazing! It feels just like a primer. There is a slight smell to it, but you get used to it after literally a few seconds. If you're considering buying this... DO IT!!! I have really oily skin and so I have always been afraid of putting sunscreen on my face, but this does not break me out at all and I think it actually helps control my oil. Best sunscreen ever!

Really love this product, it is weightless and doesn’t suffocate my skin. I haven’t been wearing any face makeup since it is summer, and this allows my skin to breathe while providing protection. It’s almost like a gel-mousse consistency, doesn’t leave a sheen, but doesn’t make you oily either. Only 4 stars because it’s a bit pricey.

Love ! Just be mindful of the skin care products you put on your face before applying , it won’t leave the shadow look but it will peel && look crazy once you apply makeup. For me I avoid this by putting my sunscreen before my Fenty primer.
reviews.review_title: prime 2nd to avoid slip of makeup

reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE it!!! My new go to sunscreen!!!!
Hands down the absolute best sunscreen I have ever used. Leaves my face matte and looking flawless.

This sunscreen is my absolute favorite to wear on my face and under makeup. It feels so nice to apply and doesn't leave any sticky residue after applying. After purchasing this, I haven't been burned on my face at all and I have very pale skin. 
I even used this sunscreen while I was on Accutane, which makes you super sensitive to sunlight, while in Disneyland during the summer and didn't get burned AT ALL!
I thought SPF 40 wouldn't be protective enough but this really surprised me. 
I've been using this sunscreen for the past year but once I saw there was a larger bottle I couldn't pass it up!

Prior to this review, I haven't been one to write reviews. This product is so AMAZING it deserves the unconventional response. As a woman drippin in melanin this product works. No white cast, no greasy feeling, and all the protection I need. Ok Supergoop! take my money!
reviews.review_title: The Last Sunscreen You'll Ever Try

reviews.review_text: As a woman of color, I love how this sunscreen is effective, goes on smoothly and is completely clear on my face. I don't  even have to worry about vigoruosly rubbing it in. It works as a daily sunscreen but also holds up on extremely sunny/beach days. It's not heavy or greasy. Definitely a winner!
reviews.review_title: Effective and Leaves No White Cast

reviews.review_text: I will never buy another sunscreen for my face!! This stuff is amazing. Glides on like butter and completely disappears. Love this!

I got this product as a sample, used it when we went to the beach. i love how it blends to the skin and the feeling when it is applied. However, the following day, it broke me out on areas that I normally wouldnt. Btw, i have oily skin.

I love this! It feels light weight and matte. I wear it alone and with makeup. When I wear it with make up it doesn’t feel heavy or like I have too much on. 

Cons: Scentless? More so than others on the market but I can still smell a sunscreen scent. It’s not strong and I don’t notice it after the initial application. It’s also kinda pricey.

Overall I like it a lot and use it almost daily. I would most likely buy it again.

This is my favorite face sunscreen! Goes on super clear and smooth. Some sunscreen will irritate my skin when combined with other products, but this works incredibly well in my skincare routine. Great under makeup, and the perfect size to keep in a purse.

Dried my skin out and turned it red!  I wasn’t a huge fan when I first started using mostly because of the smell. This smells very strong of sunscreen. So much so that a few hours later my boyfriend went to give me a kiss and asked if I had put on sunscreen because he could smell it. The consistency is ok. It feels like a primer which is nice but I prefer cream/liquid consistency. I will say that it dries quick and goes under make up well. I was prepared to buy something else from that alone but the worst part was after daily use this made the skin around my mouth dry out and turn red. So much so that my skin would get really flakey. It didn’t hurt it was just very noticeably red and dry/flakey. As soon as I stopped using it the problems went away. When I tried to use again it started back up so I finally gave up on it.
reviews.review_title: Dried skin out, caused redness, strong smell

reviews.review_text: Light, translucent sunscreen that won’t make you feel greasy! It took maybe a couple of days for my skin to adjust to it, but I would not say it caused break outs (like I see in other reviews). Also the spf is for real!! It has visibly reduced the sun tan to my face when compared to the rest of my body! Highly recommend.

I absolutely love how this looks and feels. It makes my combination/ oily skin smooth after application, but it broke me out like crazy! I’m 32 and haven’t had a full acne breakout in over a decade :-(

Bought this to use as an everyday sunscreen and my cherry tomato face can tell you that it’s not strong enough for the beach or pool. It will not do the trick. It’s very lightweight which I love, but if you burn easily, an hour in the pool will leave you with a red face. I think the reapplication time is 40 minutes, so with such a small tube at such a price, who is this sunscreen for? My guess is:  people who don’t need sunscreen. Would not recommend.

I really really wanted to love this so I ignored all the reviews that mentioned how this broke them out... And of course if broke me out like crazy. I thought it was stress so I stopped using it to see if my breakout would stop and sure enough it stopped and came back once I started using it again. 
I have used other super goop product but mainly for the body.  I might give the matte version a chance as I have combo skin. If this breaks you out tho try some coola sunscreen instead!

I got this in a Sephora sun sampler and loved it so much I bought the full size.  It goes on like a silky smooth clear primer and protects my very fair skin.  I’m so happy there’s finally a sunscreen that goes on smoothly and doesn’t smell bad!
Smells great and feels so silky smooth when applied. This SPF actually feels like it might not even be working because it applies so well and you can't even tell you have it on!

There’s a lot of misconceptions about dimethicone/silicone being a pore clogging ingredient but actually it is FDA approved and safe for skin. Even I was always skeptical about this ingredient but if you notice any skincare lines for sensitive skin or acne prone skin, some/most do contain dimethicone. It creates a barrier where it prevents water loss and keeps your skin looking smooth while also allowing the product to apply evenly.
I honestly purchased this to put under my other sunscreen as this one is water resistant/sweat resistant and my other one is not. With the weather being really humid and hot, I want to make sure my sunscreen is not getting rinsed off from heat and sweat.

If you’re skeptical, just do some research on it and try a patch test.
Love it! Its texture is super smooth and silky. It's pricey but you don't have to use much for full coverage.

I really love the feel of this sunscreen.  It's also my husband's favorite sunscreen because it leaves no cast; anything that is remotely white usually gets stuck in his stubble a little and you can see the white.  It does, however, burn my eyes a little.  I also used it on my son one day and the skin around his eyes got pretty red and puffy. I still use it and repurchase it, but I do wish it didn't bother my eyes so much.

works great under makeup. I go back and forth between Charlotte and Atlanta and both places are HOT and HUMID in the summer. I used under my Charlotte Tillbury foundation and it stayed put all day. I also wore it by itself. I wouldn't recommend doing that unless you like the matte look. I have combination/oily skin so I like matte for my makeup but not for my actual skin. I like to look fresh, hydrated and glowy, which this product does the opposite. It doesn't feel dry and matte but it looks like it. I added liquid highlighter to counteract that and it was fine.

I love this product!!!! I first heard about it from a Youtuber I watch and I was skeptical at first because of the price. But let me tell you it is so worth it! The product is a gel and so lightweight!! Doesn’t even feel like I have anything on my face, with a matte appearance. Love that it doesn’t have a sheen or a sunscreen scent. I will be buying again! I’m so pleasantly surprised and such a fan of this sunscreen!!!

I live in Hawaii where the sun is intense and swimming is done in the ocean. The preservation of our islands is very important to us, and chemical sunscreens are polluting our beautiful beaches and snorkeling spots. For this reason, the state has banned the sale of oxybenzone and octinoxate, ingredients found in conventional chemical sunscreens that lead to coral bleaching. So naturally, I was in search of a reef safe sunscreen with a light weight formula for daily use. I soon learned that this is NOT the product I was looking for. While Supergoop’s formulas do not contain oxybenzone or octinoxate, they still contain chemicals such as avobenzone and octocrylene that have been found to be harmful to marine eco health as well. Plus, chemical sunscreens work by absorbing into the skin and have been linked to endocrine disruption and skin sensitivity. The gel went on light and matte upon first application, but there was a distinct acrid chemical smell that followed. The next day my skin, though not burnt, was rough dry and scaly. Mineral sunscreens that contain non-nano zinc oxide or non-nano titanium dioxide are generally recognized as the only safe and effective UVA / UVB protection that do no harm marine ecosystems. I’ve since discovered there are many non-nano mineral sunscreens on the market with excellent light weight formulas that leave no white cast, are safe for your skin, and kind to our oceans. I wanted to share my findings, since this seems to be a popular sunscreen choice amongst Sephora shoppers. Great reviews, labeled clean and reef safe, reasons why you may consider purchasing this product and reasons that convinced me to give it a try as well. But upon further research, I realized Supergoop’s marketing is an example of greenwashing. Please be aware of buzzwords like “reef safe” and “clean” as there are no regulations for these labels, and they are often used to mislead consumers. A good reminder to research ingredients and shop mindfully.

I don't know how this sunscreen is even possibly but I will purchase it forever! Goes on beautifully, so light weight. Did not clog my pores (and I have acne prone oily skin). The texture feels like a luxurious primer. Love it!! Buy it you wont regret!

I am in love with this product! It's very smooth and does not feel very thick like most sunscreens. It also doesn't leave your face greasy like most sunscreens I've tried before. I Another plus is that it is pretty much clear and not white.
reviews.review_title: One of the best Suncreens ever

reviews.review_text: I was on the hunt for a sunscreen to protect my fair skin daily, and this one has impressed me every day! It goes on incredibly smooth and duos as a makeup primer if you so choose to wear makeup as well. the SPF 40 is a great number and this formula is just lightweight and not oily whatsoever. I do not normally write reviews but I felt obligated in order to tell others how much I like this sunscreen!

I have never really been interested in purchasing sunscreen on its own before but got this as a sample and I have sensitive skin and it doesn’t trigger breakouts like a lot of other sunscreens have for me. I will probably purchase the full size when I finish the sample.
I love this sunscreen. It has no smell which i love and creates a smooth canvas for my make up. It doesn’t clump up or feel oily at all.

I got a trial size of this and made the mistake of putting it on my face without checking the ingredients.  Besides the fact the ingredient list isn't on the product,  and the tab on Sephora is blank, and I had to hunt down confirmation from Supergoops website...

it has silicone.  I knew it the second I put it on. nope so hard.

I recommend the setting spray or the glowscreen.

I really liked this product. It’s unlike anything other sunscreen I have tried. It is a clear gel and feels like a silicone primer....almost like powder on touch. But it broke me out after two days of application so sadly I cannot continue but I would recommend this product for sure.

I love this product! I've tried at least 5 other facial sunscreens that broke me out. This one hasn't and I've been using it for over a week. The smell isn't strong at all and the feel is very much like a good primer.

I love this on my face! However, make sure you only use this on your face if you’re sensitive. One time I dragged a little onto my neck before spending a lot of time outside, and I got a heat rash on my neck. Happened multiple times. Love the formula on my face since I sweat easily, but just be mindful if you’re sensitive like me!

I am so glad I found this sunscreen. I have been trying and failing to find a face sunscreen that doesn't irritate my skin for the past decade. This doesn't make my skin burn at all, unlike many of the far more expensive products I have tried over the years. Highly recommend! It also goes well under makeup.
I have oily skin and having a hard time to find the best sunscreen  every summer. I saw this product with good reviews. tried it, and I love it! not sticky and super light on skin even under make up.
reviews.review_title: First time user. I love it!

reviews.review_text: I get the hype now. This sunscreen feels exactly like a silicone primer and has zero scent. It is truly unseen and unscented. Like another person wrote, it feels like velvet on the skin. I wouldn't say it leaves my skin matte, it's more of a satin finish. Don't get me wrong, I love a dewy moment (my other go-to sunscreen is The Beet Shield), but if I'm wearing a radiant foundation it can be a little too much with a glowy sunscreen too. However, foundation goes on beautifully over this product and I don't look like an oil slick.

This is revolutionary! I have tan skin and some times it's really hard to find a sunscreen that doesn't leave a white overcast on my face. First sunscreen that doesn't break me out and goes on silky. I love it! I will never use anything else.

I have oily, acne and redness prone skin. I originally got this as a sample and had to purchase the full size because WOW. It will feel a little odd when initially applying but the kind of “greasy” or “silicon-y” feel goes away quickly. In its place will be a powdery feel on the skin and can I tell you what? I NEVER thought a sunscreen would mean the difference between turning into an oil vat and actually looking like I have a glow by the end of the day. Doesn’t clog pores, truly invisible, and gets the job done.

Love this sunscreen. It’s not sticky or too thick. It applies evenly and nicely. Will definitely rebuy! I also have noticed that it makes my skin super smooth and you can’t even see my pores, it’s almost as if it’s a blurring primer.
Love this products. Light weight, it does help for my dry skin. I use it before put my foundation on. Excellent product
This Supergoop Unseen Sunscreen is the best! It makes my skin feel like velvet. Unbelievable how great it is. I received it first as a free sample and loved it so much I immediately purchased it.

So far I absolutely love this product. It has an initially ointment-like consistency that disappears once applied. It doesn’t make me overly oily or greasy, and it doesnt make me look ashy! It goes on pretty well under or over makeup. The only isssue is that you will need to reapply if you’re outside for a long time. Overall it’s still my favorite facial sunscreen.
Smells like jungle juice, poppers. I gagged when I put this on my skin. I am a religious sunscreen user (2x a day) and the ease of application was not worth the sensory discomfort
reviews.review_title: did they put poppers in this?

reviews.review_text: Really wanted to love this, but definitely doesn't protect like a typical 40 SPF would. I've gotten a sunburn almost every time I wear it, and it leaves my skin a weirdo combination of suuuuper dry in some areas and completely oily in others. I won't re-purchase.
The best ever.  No greasiness, no white film, no stickiness.  Spreads very evenly.  You don’t need to use much.

I've been religious about sunscreen use since my early twenties and so I'm not used to getting sunburned on my face. I switched to this sunblock from my cheaper Korean brand to "treat myself" and the joke's on me I guess because I was outside for 4 hours yesterday and the top half of my face (where I wasn't covered by my mask during a protest, haha) is lobster-red. This might be a decent primer, and it might not have a white cast, but it does NOT block out the sun.

Really wanted to like this product, but it felt like I was putting Vaseline all over my face. The really nice thing about it is that there is no white cast and it is SPF 40, but it felt too oily/greasy/thick. Sadly, I ended up returning it.
Loveeeee this sunscreen! It is pricey but lasts a long time, it doesn't irritate my skin or make it oily.  There is no white cast either which I love.

I was a bit cautious at purchasing this item as I wasn't sure what to expect. I love that it goes on almost like a serum and is super light. I need very little of the product so it should last a decent amount of time. Really happy I stumbled on this!
The best sunscreen ever. No greasiness, no whitecast!! It has the consistency of a silicone primer. Very, very faint sunscreen scent but that doesnt bother me. So good

Love! It’s the perfect primer, especially since I’m lazy with my makeup and prefer to focus on skin care. My skin is dry so I use a lot of oils and serums, I use this under my Pat McGrath foundation and it works great  smoothing my skin without making it oily.

I’ve tried this maybe 3-5 times and I really don’t like it. I wish it was more of a lotion type suncream than a silicon based texture. This did not play well with  any of the skincare I own and put on before it. It peals off so easily and doesn’t rub in. I also wore this alone hours after putting on my skincare and it still peals off with littlest balls of product. It made my skin so red. 

I prefer coola mineral sunscreen. It smells amazing, it’s lotion based and, lasts a really long time. That’s my HG face sunscreen.
reviews.review_title: does not mix well with our skincare products

reviews.review_text: I like the texture and feel.  I don’t think it worked as a primer as well, though, as my makeup moved more with it in then without it.   My big gripe is that I have a pretty red burn on my forehead after using this today.  Definately will not by full size.
Made my skin feel super oily as the day went on. Too much of a shine. I did like the smoothness of the product when applying.
makes my skin feel super smooth but super matte without feeling drying... puuurrfect sunscreen for oily skin :’D i would consider buying the jumbo size (-1 star for the price lol)

Very surprised I didn't like this product. I purchased because of the amazing reviews. I did not like the texture of this at all. Very thick and silicone like texture. I feel like it doesn't sink into my skin but rather sits on top. I even got burnt when I used this product. Ended up returning.
Perfect for women of color, plus you can use it as a primer. It does have silicon in it, but it’s not as much as the smash box primer.

Sunscreen & I have a long history of not liking each other. Either the formula makes me break out, or it feels so rich my skin sweats and feels like it's being suffocated. I like lightweight creams and gels; you see where this is going: absolutely no rich products. And then this year I got most than several pre-cancerous facial spots. Tried Unscreen Screen. Hi, wow, jeez, hellooooo AMAZING – clear, lightweight, matte, and quick to absorb. It doesn't feel like you're wearing anything and doesn't make my skin sweat. Layers seamlessly with moisturizers, is easy replies, and honestly, I could just wear this AS a moisturizer.  When it's sunny and humid there's really no face-sweat feeling. 

TL;DR if you don't like heavy sunscreens, aren't a fan of heavy creams, don't like oily white screen, have oily skin, and want a fast-absorbing, no 'sweaty skin' formula. Stop. Buy it. Enjoy having no regrets.

This the best sunscreen I have tried so far. It has a pleasant smell and goes on smooth. It layers with my other skincare products, does not break me out and most importantly layers under makeup without turning it gray or pilling.
Heard about this product from a beauty blogger and it lives up to her review. It is lightweight and makes my makeup look flawless and protects my face.
I m never going to any other sunscreen.... this is the best

Love this sunscreen!! I use it mainly for my face, and its application is very light and matte.  SPF products usually make me very shiny and glossy-looking, and tends to make me breakout.  I use this especially when I run outside, and even when I sweat, it doesn't feel pasty and I haven't had any breakouts.
I love this sunscreen. It goes great under makeup both powder and liquid foundation.
I love this! No grease, no residue, no shine--it's perfect to wear under makeup. It also doesn't make me break out!
reviews.review_title: Does not feel like your traditional sunscreen

reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this right before I went away on vacation and loved it so much so I bought the full size. It not only goes on so smoothly but works as an amazing primer too. I don’t think I’ll use another sunscreen for my face again

This was the exact type of face sunscreen I was looking for. I had tried other brands but they all left a greasy, white cast on my face. The Unseen Sunscreen was light and moisturizing my skin and didn’t leave a white cast at all! It made it so easy to add sunscreen into my morning beauty routine

This is my favorite sunscreen EVER. It feels velvety smooth, like make up primer, does not leave your face shiny at all, it’s everything you want in a sunscreen. It’s a little pricey for the size but you’ll never want to use another sunscreen after you try this.
reviews.review_title: I never want to buy another sunscreen.

reviews.review_text: This truly is unseen! Slides on beautifully, remains clear, not too greasy at all! How effective it is as a UV-blocker, that is for time to tell...but so far, this sunscreen looks like everything I had wanted in a suncreen for YEARS.

I will never use another face sunscreen again! This is so lightweight, and doesn’t leave your face or hands feeling greasy! This sunscreen has become a staple in my routine and everyone needs to try it.
I really like this sunscreen! It dries fast and is an amazing primer! Even after wearing a mask all day, my makeup still looked fresh. I am 61 with pretty dry skin!

Love it! Super picky and facial sunscreen because I need to protect but everything makes me greasy or breakout. This goes on really well, stays put, and I don’t burn after a hot day at the pool. My face and neck are the only parts of me that don’t look lobster-esqe right now. Great stuff! And a little bit goes a long way so the bottle may actually last the whole summer. Who knows. But $40 seems expensive, promise it’s worth it for this
Love it! It truly has a matte finish and not greasy at all! I am a habitual sunscreen user now

As a person who is not white or fair and is visibly brown, this is one of the only sunscreens that does not leave a ridiculous white residue or gray cast. It also goes on the skin very easily and is so smooth that I almost forget that it is there after a while. But back to my first point. It's about time we have sun protection without feeling like it's Halloween.
reviews.review_title: Sunscreen that looks good on brown skin

reviews.review_text: I have used this sunscreen for several years and it truly is unseen.  I wear this under foundation and it does not pill up.  This is my everyday sunscreen.  This is a chemical sunscreen so you will need to reapply.  It has no fragrance that i can detect.  It is moisturizing. great for dry skin.  If you are combo or oily i would recommend getting a sample before purchasing.

I wanted to love this sunscreen so bad:( It has such an odd texture that somehow feels dry and slimey at the same time? It broke me out horribly. I do not have acne prone skin so I was shocked that I broke out so bad from this. If you have acne prone or sensitive skin at all I would stick to their mineral sunscreen!
This is the best face sunscreen!  It is clear when it comes out of the tube, and clear on your face!  No “white stuff,” and NO difficulty blending it into my skin.
Seems to work. It feels like a velvety face primer. It’s clear and has a mild coconut classic sunscreen scent. It does not make my face breakout like other white thick sunscreens do. So far so good.

Nothing spectacular in my opinion and overpriced.  I don't really care for the consistency of it and although I haven't burned I think I am getting tan on my face which I hate! But I'm going to use it since it was so expensive.  I like the fragrance in it but if your sensitive to that do not buy this.

Unfortunately the silicone base of this product clogged every living pore it touched on my face. I'm so sad about it because  otherwise it seems nice. Immediately had a million raised bumps and redness. The attached picture is 24 hours after application. I don't have this problem with other products/primers with silicone.
A gel versus a cream; probably works just fine but not any better than many others, for the price difference.
Absolutely love this sunscreen, it’s so lightweight and complete effective. I’m incredibly pale and this is a go to. Definitely recommend.

So many people hype this product so I was extremely excited to try it, especially being a woman of color. Unfortunately this caused me to breakout with tiny red bumps all over one side of my cheek. The first day I tried it I applied a thin layer, I soon noticed a few tiny bumps. So i didn’t apply it for about 2 days. Today i applied it again, in hopes that it was maybe something else causing the small break outs. But now that I’m home I’ve noticed even more tiny bumps, so I know that it’s product. I wouldn’t knock trying it but everything doesn’t work for everyone.
It broke me out, am really shock. I wanted to love it.

I’ve tried many many facial sunscreens, I have acne prone combination skin and have wasted lots of money on different products. This is the only one I have ever tried which doesn’t feel sticky, heavy and oily. It feels just like any other make up primer I’ve used and so far seems to not cause be acne and protect my skin.
I feels so smooth on my face, it's a wonderful texture.  And I love the 40 SPF rating.  I wear it under my makeup for added protection even though my make up has an SPF rating as well.

I hate that I love this so much because the price is so crazy for how much you get. It has the kind of slip that’s a great primer for underneath your makeup. It blends in really nicely and quickly and makes my skin feel really soft. If I do repurchase I will get the bigger size forsure.
This feels great on my skin. It dries immediately and has as a silicone like finish.

Love this sunscreen. It goes on like a primer, but somehow protects you from the sun even in the harshest conditions. Even better, it doesn't cause me to breakout like regular sunscreen does. Would 100% recommend.
reviews.review_title: Goes on like a primer, but protects

reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this!  The application is amazing.  It goes on smooth and matte and doesn't smell like sunscreen.  I could have been my HG.  But, within an hour I developed bumps on my face.  A few days later I decided to try it again to be sure.  I put nothing else on my face (the bumps had cleared up by then).  The bumps quickly came back.  So, I know that this was the culprit.  I am so sad too because the formula felt really nice.  I gave it a 2 because of the nice formula.
I had received a sample of this before purchasing the full size. It's a very light weight gel and is great to use under make-up or just on its own.
Best makeup primer! This smoothed out the look of pores and kept my makeup lasting all day long. I love to use on no makeup days as well!

I usually stick to mineral sunscreens since I have sensitive skin and chemical sunscreens tend to irritate/burn my skin. But I got this as a sample and ended up buying the full size because of how nicely it wears. 

I was previously using Shiseido Urban Environment sunscreen but the problem I was running into was that even though Shiseido is super smooth, it still takes some rubbing in to make sure I don’t leave a white cast behind. I’ve tried the tinted version and that also just leaves behind a beige cast. 

What’s nice about this sunscreen is that it is also super smooth, albeit in a different way. It feels like it glides over my skin. The other benefit with chemical sunscreens is that you can continue to moisturize over them throughout the day and it won’t be blocked by the mineral sunscreen layer underneath - which makes sense for me because I have dry skin and I use a hydrating primer over my sunscreen. 

Anyway, I love this sunscreen. It’s cheaper than Shiseido, absorbs really well, glides beautifully, doesn’t irritate my skin at all, and still lets me get max benefits from my hydrating primer.

This is the most amazing sunscreen I've ever used! It feels like velvet going on my skin and is completely weightless. I am very fair, and I've had skin cancer, so I'm a sunscreen enthusiast and have tried them all. This is #1. I have now started buying it for friends' birthdays, and they love it, too!
I love supergoop! It smells so good but more importantly it protects me from the sun. 10/10 will continue to buy
This product feels soft and looks really nice on the skin, but unfortunately it gave me blackheads and caused me to breakout!

Goes on very smooth and doesn’t leave any residue or anything like other face sunscreens I’ve used. Works well under products and hasn’t broken me out (I have extremely sensitive skin). I definitely recommend!

BEST. SUNSCREEN. This is the most amazing sunscreen ever. The texture is so nice and well as being weightless. It’s not white, it’s clear and goes on so smoothly. Wears nicely under makeup too. Highly recommend.

Didn’t make me break out but didn’t stop me from burning when I went in water after 20 minutes my face felt super burned and I had to sit out of sun I have never had this happen and I had just started using this product. was easy to apply and didn’t leave me greasy
For me, when putting it on, it was hard to spread around my face fully? Idk but my skin was extremely clear and smooth and it made my face break out like crazy. Just didn’t work for me.

I started using sunscreen very late in my life (I know - it’s terrible!). I always felt like putting sunscreen would make my face so oily. My sister convinced me to try this and I have loved it ever since. It does not make my skin feel oily and is really “unseen”. Using sunscreen is no longer a hassle thanks to SuperGoop! Unseen sunscreen!

This is my favorite face sunscreen by faaaar! It feels so nice on your skin, not sticky or thick. It’s soft and doubles as a primer. I wear it pretty much every day and don’t even notice (it doesn’t smell like most sunscreens). Highly recommend.

All of the reviews are true!! This product is AMAZING. I have never described a sunscreen as velvety but this is so luxurious and absorbs amazingly. I don’t wear a lot of makeup but am huge in skincare and this is the perfect addition to my routine.

Perfect sunscreen.  It absorbs quickly, goes on clean without the heaviness or white residue you find with other sunscreens with this level of protection.  Will definitely incorporate this one year round!

this goes on after all my serums and moisturizers as the last step before makeup. its phenomenal. this is the best primer I've ever used. did not purchase for that quality but with my oily combo skin I'm amazed. wish you got more product especially for the price point but its truly a great product.
Love everything about this sunscreen other than the fact that it broke me out terribly. Very smooth and flawless application but not worth the amount of acne it causes.
I really like this product. A little goes a long way. When applied it looks like and feels like you put nothing on ur face.

Love this sunscreen!! It makes the pores on my face disappear plus it protects my face from the sun. This is a must for me especially on the days where I don’t wear any makeup. It makes my skin look nice and velvety. One tube will last at least 4-5 months since you don’t really need to use a lot. This isn’t like normal sunscreen which usually makes me feel greasy and gross and leaves a white caste. None of that here! 100% would recommend!!

FINALLY! I have spent the past 5 years trying a number of products that can protect my face with a high SPF, without making me more oily or leave white product. THIS IS IT! 

If you have oily or combination skin, this is fabulous. Feels like the Photo Finish primer from Smashbox. Light and fabulous!

For the past couple of months, I have been doing my research on skincare. The one thing I saw everywhere was how important sunscreen is! I found this lovely product and saw it was clean and SPF 40 and WOW! It blew away my expectations. Super smooth application, doesn't leave skin greasy. Amazing product, definitely reccomend!

This is without a doubt my favorite sunscreen. The texture of it is really nice -- it's smooth, it absorbs quickly and evenly, and is -- as advertised -- unseen when you put it on. I add it over my moisturizer and my skin feels great. The sunscreen feels weightless, doesn't leave any oily residue, and doesn't make me sweat or breakout. The best part is that it's perfect to wear when running/sweating outside, especially because the scent is very subtle.

Feels nicer than any other sunscreen or primer I’ve used in my life. Application is weightless and melts into instantly smooth skin. Tried it as a sample and I’m absolutely going to purchase the whole thing!
This made my skin freak out. Feels great on but caused little bumps ALL OVER my face and neck :( it’s getting returned
I love this sunscreen! It is almost like a primer! It is not greasy at all! I wear everyday alone or with my full face of makeup! The texture is so nice!
This sunscreen is so wonderful!!!! I’m a ginger, and burn easily. This goes on smooth, lasts all day in the desert, and has improved my skin so much! Don’t hesitate to get this great product!!!!

Best sunscreen I have ever used as a poc. Also unnoticeable under my make up! Glad I purchased the larger tube limited edition may buy again to have back up because I don’t see myself ever leaving the house without it.
This sunscreen felt really good on the skin and didn't leave any white cast, but made me breakout all over. Similar to other reviews, I got white breakouts all around. I have oily, acne-prone skin.
It first appeared a bit shiny, but it went away very quickly. It really is invisible once you let it dry.
This is a fantastic primer before using foundation or uses it alone. It does not break out my ance prone skin, and it has no smell.

this is the only spf that is completely undetectable, and thats exactly what they were going for so supergoop, you nailed it! it doesn't have any artificial fragrance. it has a silicone primer consistency, so when I use this I skip primer alltogether. protects my face from the sun very well, I work outside and my arms and chest will often times be sunburnt by the end of the day even though I applied spf, but my face stays protected. definitely my go to sunscreen.
Hated this. Broke me out so bad, if you don’t like silicone feeling primera DO NOT BUY THIS! I love the glow screen one - which is a lotion formulation - much better!

This sunscreen feels a lot like a pore-less primer. I have really fair skin and I haven’t gotten sunburnt since I started using it. The only thing I would change is the scent, it reminds me of a chlorinated hotel pool, but overall I really like this product.

I’m definitely not a makeup or skin care expert but I really like this product. I know everyone preaches sunscreen for everyday but I work from home and don’t go outside everyday so I never saw the needed it on a regular basis. I’ve always used sunscreen for my face when I’m outside with no makeup and when I did wear makeup I’d grab a foundation with spf in it. Now I’m inching closer to my 30s (be 29 soon) and skin care is becoming more of a concern. I don’t have any issues with acne, spots or wrinkles but I want to be proactive and keep my skin this way. 

I started researching different options and tried a few. The few that I tried, had the consistency of sunscreen and didn’t work well under makeup even with a primer. This product caught my eye.

This products has the clean at sephora seal. That makes it more intriguing. I cared about chemicals in my products until I got pregnaNt a few years ago. Once you start reading labels you will be shocked as to what is in products you use on your body.

Back to the sunscreen, I was skeptically the  claims that it can be used as a primer so the first few times I used it, I used primer before my makeup. Since I’m a new mom and always looking to cut out an extra step, I tried just using this as a primer and it worked perfect. Honestly it looks and feels just like the smash box primer but this is better because of sunscreen. The consistency is nothing like sunscreen. 

When reading more about the product it stated that it had blue light protection for your skin. I was like, what?! That’s something else I have to worry about?!? Apparently staring at your phone and laptop all day isn’t only bad for your mood, eyes, brain, body...it’s bad for your freaking skin too!! Now, maybe blue light effect on skin is all a marketing ploy to get everyone to buy it. BUT idk about you but with my skin, id rather be safe than sorry. 

Def recommend
reviews.review_title: Woah. An spf that can be used as a primer! yay!

reviews.review_text: The texture ofbthe sunscreen its like no other! 100% worth the price and will buy again

I have very sensitive skin, so I have to really protect what I put on my face. I used this and it was so nice! It is a little pricey, definitely worth every dollar. It’s a clear almost gel like sunscreen that just glides on your skin. It absorbed into my skin in less than 20 seconds.

Cannot express how much I love this. Use it almost every single day on my face and neck and have not run out and it’s been almost 5 months. You only need a little. Lightweight, no film, creates silky canvas for makeup

I really enjoyed this product for my skin. It is light and glory which is great, but the product is tinted to a lighter skin tone. Luckily that is the color of my skin, but I would say that it’s a bit misleading so if anyone with a darker skin tone wants to purchase this product just be aware that it’s a light beige color.
