I love this sunscreen. I have sensitive and acne prone skin and this did not break me out. It doesn't have a super slippery/oily feeling and finish like most sunscreens do so it goes perfectly underneath makeup
Goes on sheer and very soft! Love the way this sits on my face. Can easily be used under makeup or by itself after moisturizing.

I was sent a trial size of this sunscreen with one of my purchases. I was super excited to try it out since I had been hearing so much about it.
It does go on very smooth, blurs pores, and doesn't leave a white cast.
But, like many people who have left reviews, it broke me out. Pretty bad actually. 
The day after, I woke up with a bunch of white pimples all over my face. A lot of itchiness as well.
Unfortunately, I will not be purchasing the full size version of this
reviews.review_title: Really wanted to love this but...

reviews.review_text: My ignorant self only applied this on my shoulders chest, knees and face for a day at the pool. I burnt like a lobster except where I applied this (there are a few nicely defined lines). It’s actually 100% clear and it doesn’t have the typical greasy feel or chemical smell of sunscreen. I knock a star off because it’s pricy for the size of tube you get...
Best Sunscreen out there..as someone that is painfully pale and take great steps to protect my melasma, this sunscreen does the job
Absolutely works perfect! I don’t feel it at all. I am black and it melts right into my skin with no greasy feeling!

i love this sunscreen! i'm auburn coloring and have always burned easily. facial sunscreen always made my skin break out. i asked sephora for recommendations & they gave me a sample of several.
this was by far the winner. i have bought several of my own, now. gorgeous, silky texture that disappears almost instantly, protects & no breakout. great!

Supergoop! Is my go-to brand for everything sun-protection! I love that you can use your #FSA funds to pay for most of their products. They are pricier than drugstore sunscreens but you really get what you pay for and you can often buy these products with discounts offered on the supergoop site and with coupons or seasonal sales at Sephora and Ulta. This is the sunscreen I use as a primer for my everyday makeup. It is clear so you don’t have to worry about any white cast - even for darker skin tones - which is so important. It goes on silky - like a silicone primer - and has a light, smooth feel to the skin after application. It is not tacky or greasy AT ALL! I feel like this is doing great things to protect my fair skin from the Texas sun while providing a good base for makeup and helps my skin rather than causing irritation, breakouts, or oil-slick on my face like other sun protection products. It does have a light sun-screen smell which I assume comes from the active sunscreen properties but it is not overwhelming and dissipates quickly. Would highly recommend!
Love the texture! I got this as a free sample and immediately placed an order for the full size. A little goes a long way.
Love it.  Use daily; it applies so smoothly.  10/10 would recommend.

I love this sunscreen!! I've never had good luck when it comes to putting make up on top of a sunscreen, because it always makes my make up look weird..... But this sunscreen just wow! You can't even tell that you have sunscreen on, and it applies on your face so smoothly! It was definitely worth the price for me! It has a smooth texture and doesn't make your make up look cakey or weird at all.

I love this product because of its texture. It’s completely clear and when rubbed in almost feels powdery. I use this as an everyday sunscreen whether I put on make up or not. Does not leave my skin looking oily or smelling like sunscreen.
This is the perfect sunscreen for anyone who hates white cast...it has a nice texture and soaks into the skin very nicely.
reviews.review_title: Perfect Invisible Lightweight Sunscreen get this!

reviews.review_text: Great sunscreen! I also use it as a primer. It does not leave the skin feel greasy and uncomfortable like some sunscreen I’ve tried in the past. Definitely recommend!

I got a deluxe size in a Sephora summer bag and I really really enjoyed using this sunscreen. It’s so different than anything else I have ever tried and I see why people really love this. The texture is like nothing else, it almost feels and looks like a soft balm but as soon as you spread it on your skin, it disappears and leaves no cast on my skin, it leaves my skin looking even and a bit matte. The texture is nice and you can reapply it without worrying about pilling or anything crazy. I’ve had weird reactions from other sunscreens but this one has performed so well I almost wish I could buy the full size. But some dermatologists have noted that the filters in the sunscreen don’t really provide the best coverage unless you use tons and tons of it throughout the day and I’m looking for something that I can reapply and know that I’m being protected for sure.

Wow!!!! Oily skin be damned! Matte all day. A little coverage like a primer to make you feel natural and gorgeous! Goes on super evenly without fuss, muss, or streaks. No breakouts after either, like most sunscreens. Love their sunscreen line, but this the holy grail for me

This has such good reviews so I wanted to love this. I have acne prone skin but with the help of my acne prescriptions my skin is pretty clear so I don’t get breakouts like that anymore. I thought this sunscreen smelt good for being sunscreen, the texture felt amazing to rub onto your skin it was so silky. But I would become SO greasy and sticky from it when I’d go out into the sun. It felt like it wasn’t truly absorbing into my skin just laying like a film on top. Unfortunately, every time I used this I woke up the next day with tiny white heads in my face. It honestly made me face feel sooooo dirty. Wanted to love it but can’t :/ If anyone is looking for a sunscreen specifically for their faces and has sensitive and or acne prone skin I recommend Shisedo’s. I used them for years prior to trying Supergoop and never had any breakout issues nor sensitivity. The only con was it left a white cast for a bit on your face whereas the Supergoop one does not.

Not for sensitive skin. Caused break out in tiny bumps all over my face. Had to seek medical attention, and the doctor said it was prob this sunscreen. Then I went online and saw that this caused other reviewers to break out in tiny bumps too.
reviews.review_title: Caused tiny bumps all over my face

reviews.review_text: This became my ride or die SPF40/primer last year and this was a repurchase in the larger size.  It smooths skin and shrinks pore appearance, sets well and stays without powder setting. Helps my foundation look natural.

this sunscreen did not work for me. i have oily skin and it just sat on top of my face and i felt kind of gross while i was wearing it. it’s very chalky, and it even burned my eyes and made them watery all day.

I really wanted to like this product because it didn't leave a chalky residue but it felt exactly like it's name: supergoop. I didn't like how slimy it felt putting it on, and I felt like it dried to a pasty mask afterward. I have oily skin and it just made it feel gross.
reviews.review_title: This made my face feel super yuck.

reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive dry skin and I find that this product is very light weight and I use it in my everyday skin care however after a couple of hours my skin does get a but shiny.

This product is amazing! It’s my favorite sunscreen and overall skin care product! I’ve always known how important it is to wear sunscreen everyday but almost everyone I tried left my sensitive skin feeling greasy, uncomfortable, or weirdly pale. But then I got unseen sunscreen in a play box and I’ve been hooked ever since! It goes on so smooth and silky and gives my skin such a nice finish that I usually don’t even put foundation on over it. Plus it WORKS! I literally hiked the Grand Canyon wearing this product and it stayed on the whole time! It is an absolute must have and I highly recommend it!
reviews.review_title: Skin care must have! I love it!

reviews.review_text: I usually don't write reviews but I love this stuff! A little goes a long way and it doesn't leave my face feeling greasy. It's moisturizing but has a matte texture that makes skin feel smooth and shrinks pores.

I really wanted to love this sunscreen but hated it because every single time I used it, it caused me to break out or get a new pimple.  For context, I am blessed with pretty good skin and normally do not break out.  And even tried to use it sporadically to get my skin more used to it.  However, without fail, any time I used this sunscreen, it would cause a new blemish.  Definiely returning.  The Shiseido Urban environment and the Glossier Invisible Shield both work a lot better.

I got a sample of this and can’t say much about how well it works as a sunscreen, but this made my face WAY more prone to redness than usual. I blush quite easily, but this made my cheeks turn bright red at random points throughout the day for seemingly no reason — the photo I attached is even after most of the redness went away. The only other product that has ever done that for me is the elf primer, and this has a similar texture to that, so I’m guessing they have an ingredient in common that doesn’t agree with me. I’m sure this works great for a lot of people and it’s fantastic if you’re looking for a sunscreen that doubles as a primer, but if you’re prone to redness or have had similar reactions to silicon-based primers before, maybe avoid this one. (I’ve marked that I wouldn’t recommend it because I had to choose one, but I honestly think it just depends on your skin!)

I received this in the Sephora Favorites Summer Essentials Set for 2020 and I am already considering getting the larger size. Beyond the clear formulation, this sunscreen gets high marks from me based on its consistency. It's basically a primer and goes great under makeup. It's not billed as a multitasker, but that's how I will be using it!
reviews.review_title: Hidden Multitasker! Sunscreen and Primer in One

reviews.review_text: I tried this as a free sample and I love that it's SPF 40 and feels light and contains clean ingredients. It doesn't leave a white cast and goes on smoothly, not like some sunscreens which can feel thick and hard to rub in. I have oily skin and live in a humid climate during summer, so my only complaint is this makes my face looks so greasy. My skin is shiny as soon as I put in on! Ugh. The good thing is that it didn't seem to clog my pores. I probably wouldn't buy a full size.

I LOVE this sunscreen! It's lightweight and goes on clear, which is such a bonus for my brown skin. I live in a super hot, humid climate and it doesn't make my skin feel greasy at all. I'll definitely be buying this again!

New favorite sunscreen of all time! I got a few deluxes is sephora favorites and I love the texture, how my skin feels, the fact it doesn’t break me out. If I do my whole skincare  routine after I use a water base moisturizer and make sure it soaked in this spf lays on my skin like butter and doesn’t peel off. Also used makeup over it and worked just fine, didn’t see any difference or sliding

These little samples can be so unassuming. If you have this def. try it under you make up or as is today. This is what I am always looking for, a high SPF without the WHITE look, without the GREASY look. This is just a beautiful unique texture of a matte almost clear gel that goes onto the skin smooth like a primer. I am def. investing in a couple big bottles for summer.
reviews.review_title: Finally an SPF in a Beautiful Texture and 40 SPF!

reviews.review_text: I’ve ordered 3 of these in the last 2 months because I’m so obsessed. I use it under my tinted moisturizer, and have been getting so many compliments about looking “youthful” and “glowing” despite being 35 years old and severely depressed due to an existential crisis (spurred by the virus). In the event of an untimely death, I’ve insisted that I be wearing this at my funeral. It’ll probably be super traumatic for everyone because my skin will look so good, no one will believe I’m actually dead!
reviews.review_title: closest thing to a real life Snapchat filter

reviews.review_text: I am South Asian and have had a hard time finding a sunscreen that doesn't leave a white color on my skin. This is perfect! I've used it several times and it's great under makeup or alone. It doesn't leave my skin feeling heavy or oily. It's a must-have.

Love this stuff! It’s super light weight and glides into the skin like butter! It’s great under makeup and I love the fact that it has an SPF of 40! I have sensitive dry skin and have not noticed any sort of reaction from it! definitely recommend!
I love this light texture cream! Highly recommend it!
reviews.review_title: Light Texture, Goes well under mkeup

reviews.review_text: This is by far the best sunblock I’ve had for the face. It goes on very smooth, and the best part is it works better than my primer!!! My BB cream and foundation both works great with this sunblock. It keeps my make up in place. Two thumbs up! Highly recommended!
Really like all of their products. I love how it doesn’t feel greasy. And is lightweight and smooth to apply.
So good! Best facial sunscreen I’ve used. It’s not the greasy , white, , break you out traditional sunscreen. It feels like a silicone makeup primer. I enjoy wearing it everyday under makeup!

So far so good! I had 2 sample sizes of this and absolutely loved it! The best facial sunscreen I’ve ever used. Didn’t break me out, not thick and white, goes on smooth, and no bad scent. (WAY BETTER THAN DRUNK ELEPHANT’S FACIAL SUNSCREEN). I just ordered the 2.5oz size and I can’t wait to use it all summer!! However, I should add that I have not tried this with a full face of makeup yet. I have done natural looks with minimal foundation covering up certain spots and milk blush and hourglass highlight and I’ve had no issues so far and my makeup seemed to last a decent amount of time!

This products makes no sense. It tries to act as a sunscreen 
and a primer but does a bad job at both. Even though it's considered "clean" beauty, there are many questionable ingredients in this product that could easily cause breakouts and irritation on people with oily skin. I personally find that this product breaks me out and makes my skin super oily, causing foundation to slip off even faster than normal.

Best Ever. I've tried countless brands, countless formulations. No breakouts, no grease. Incorporates into my makeup routine and incorporates into my workout routine. No stinging eyes. Totally in love.

I’ve been using this for about a week now and I’m really enjoying it! The texture is smooth and light. Doesn’t feel thick on your face. Has a little bit of an oily residue but that’s to be expected with any SPF, and it’s much less oily compared to other sunscreens. If you care about your skin, this is a product you should be putting at the top of your list this summer (and always, bc you should always have spf on regardless of the weather/season/etc.)
reviews.review_title: quality SPF that’s thin, light and smooth

reviews.review_text: This product had great promise but it was very oily and heavy on my skin

Oh my god. To say I am satisfied would be an understatement. I got this sunscreen bc I recently got a dog and have been spending a lot more time outside. I also recently started testing out retinol and it’s made my skin really sensitive. This sunscreen solves it all. Goes on light, no skin irritation, and I’ve come home protected every time. 

Buy this now!! You won’t regret it.

I received a trial size of this and used it on my face to compare with my usual sunscreen on my body. This product felt oily upon application and I ended up with sunburn. I have olive skin and typically only tan in the sun, but experienced sunburn only on my face after use. I would not recommend.
Absolutely love this product! I use it every morning and I don’t feel like I’m wearing anything. It’s a gel but almost feels like a powder finish. Perfect consistency and texture. I love it!!
I am shocked! I am blown away by the consistency of this product - it truly is unseen. I have never worn a more comfortable, light-weight, non-greasy sunscreen!
reviews.review_title: The most comfortable sunscreen! Truly unseen!

reviews.review_text: Wanted to like this product a lot as a lot of people say it’s amazing.... immediately after incorporating it into my makeup routine I broke out all over!! It may work for some but I would suggest trying it in a small area of your face to see if your skin likes it!
I love this product, it is undetectable on the skin and leaves the skin very smooth . It is a great innovation. . I use it under make up .
It peels off if you wear moisturizer underneath. I hate it

I am so bummed this didn’t work for me! I put this on once and the consistency is just not for me. So I can’t say anything about the sun protection part. But the consistency is like the smashbox primers, and it just doesn’t work with my oily skin as it makes me feel super oily. But if you have no problem with that thin consistency, then you will probably really like this and won’t need a primer after.
reviews.review_title: bummed this didn’t work for me

reviews.review_text: I love this product! I was an avid user of Image Matte Sunscreen for years, but I have oily skin and it always left a bit of a sheen even though it was supposed to be matte. So, I took to the internet to see what other products were out there and found this. I agree, it is pricey for the size, I've been buying mine on Verishop, but since Sephora now sells a jumbo size, I'll definitely be getting it here from now on! This sunscreen is AMAZING, no white sheen, no shine, just great, matte sun protection. I do find that it's not as moisturizing as the Image brand one I was using previously, so I actually layer my Vanicream face lotion underneath this. I do not wear foundation so I don't know how well it does under makeup. I do have oily, acne prone skin, but I did a treatment of Accutane a year ago. I still get small breakouts from time to time due to hormones, but I do not notice that this product makes them worse or causes breakouts for me. I also do not notice any difference in sun protection between this and my old sunscreen, but I do have more olive toned skin that is a bit more resilient to the Sun than fair skin. However, when I do burn, it's my face and shoulders typically so I like to protect those areas when I'm out and about.

I use this as my daily SPF and it’s awesome! I tend to be worried about using new products since my skin is super sensitive, but, I have not broken out with this and it has done a great job protecting my skin. I like that it doesn’t have that sunscreen smell ( it has no smell) and that it feels super smooth on my skin!

I like the idea of using a sunscreen as a silicon primer before my make up, and it has clean ingredients. However, I have sensitive skin and this sunscreen gives me acne and pimples after using it. Got it for couple months now, but still got acne after every time I use it.   So disappointed.

This has been my go to for the last 2 years! I literally have no complaints! It absorbs into the skin quickly and seamlessly leaving a smooth matte canvas. It leaves no residue or white cast and doesn't cause me irritation. Works amazingly during summer when my skin is more oily! It has a typical nice sunscreen scent. Also I don't know if it was my imagination but I feel like it reduced redness in my skin. 100% recommend!!
I have sensitive skin, and tho it has many good ingredients, there are also many bad ones as well. I break out with this :(

I've tried a few face sunscreens to find my holy grail daily sunscreen - this is it! so nice and hydrating. it does feel kind of oily at first on the skin and on your hands but that goes away as it sinks in. It feels just like soft skin when it all absorbs!
Worst sunscreen I have ever used. This does not work a bit. I used more than enough and spread it evenly and I ended up with splotchy burns.

I was shocked by this product. It has a clear, silicone formula rather than a traditional sunscreen cream or lotion. It is ultra smooth and it leaves zero residue. The only problem that I have with this product is how small it is for the price you pay... if you're willing to splurge on your sun protection, this is the product for you!
I would give this five stars, but it’s way too expensive. I immediately looked for a dupe because spending $44 on a sunscreen is bananas. It’s a no for me.

Wow!  This completely exceeded my expectations!  I have been on the search for a sunscreen that I love, and I think I just found it!  I hate the sheen that many sunscreens leave, or the uneven patchiness of matte tinted moisturizers.  This is so smooth, silky, and luxurious when you apply it (but feels different to me than a silicone primer).  There is absolutely no trace of it on your face as it is completely clear.  I also love that it has a little higher SPF than most facial sunscreens.  I have yet to use it under makeup, but I don't anticipate it being a problem.  I did not have any piling.  You really can't even tell it's on!  Will definitely repurchase.  I hope they keep the 2.5 oz. value size.

This product is ok. I use it after using the Supergoop moisturizer to help matify the shine. I just can't get over the chemical sunscreen smell. Switching back to Coola matte sunscreen after I'm done with this.
This sunscreen is like from a different world. I love how smooth it applies and how invisible it is! AND its clean! Great product.

I received this sunscreen in a sample value kit (I think it was the Sun Safety kit by Sephora). I wanted to like it. I used to use Supergoop a lot until it started breaking me out (I have oily skin). I put this on my face, like you're supposed to. Let it set in for 15mins, and then walked my dog. My skin is very sensitive to sun. I also use AHA products which make it more sensitive. I walked the dog, came out, and BAM. Sunburn on my cheek. Just one cheek! And it hurts a ton. I had to wash my face and put in my go to (Neutrogena Clear Skin SPF 55). What a nightmare. Never again. I'll be giving my samples of Supergoop away (they're all super greasey and I hate the smell).

I love this product. The texture feels like a blurring primer, and  is translucent, so it applies smooth and clear, rather than white and chunky like many other sunscreens. Also, it can go up to your eyes without stinging horribly. Totally recommend.

I remember I received this as a sample and I knew I had to purchase it once I ran out of it. It doesn’t smell like your regular SPF . It makes your skin soft, protects you from the sun, and makes your makeup glide easily when applying it. It also hides your pores & makes you look flawless.

LOVE this product. Soaks right into your skin with zero oily residue. I am a red head prone to sunburns and I haven’t gotten one while using this product. I love it and will be repurchasing when my bottle is empty!

If you like a dimethicone primer, you could use this as one with a little boost of spf. However, as a sunscreen this product makes no sense. There is no way to put as much of this on as you need to guarantee sun protection without having a heavy layer of silicone all over your face. If you’re putting a tiny layer of this on, you’re not getting anywhere near the reported protection.

I love this sunscreen! It’s perfect for my oily skin. I apply it last after moisturizer. It leaves a matte, smooth, clean finish that really does prime for makeup. It does a good job with shine & oil control. I really like how it feels on my skin!

I wanted SO badly to like this product. It protected my face from sunburn for sure, but it made my skin freak out. I already have acne-prone skin, and use a prescription-grade retinoid gel almost every night to treat it — this product did not react well with that. Not only did my skin burn and peel, but if I put makeup on top of it, it made my skin MAJORLY peel with my foundation, or even without foundation. :(

I really can't believe this is so highly rated... I really, REALLY dislike the consistency of this sunscreen. It pills immediately if you 1.put any on of any significant amount (i.e. only apply teeny-tiny amounts) or 2. rub it in "too hard" (i.e. use feather-light strokes only, please) or 3. use with ANY other face products (serum, lotion, foundation, powder, setting spray....). Maybe they have altered their formulation since I purchased it several months ago (looks like they have a new "colorful" logo), but I doubt it. It was a nightmare and a hot mess to apply; each time I made the attempt, I had to wash my face and start my day's routine all over again. May I recommend COOLA (which is a mineral [safer, more effective] sunscreen of which many varieties Sephora also sells)?
I love this sunscreen, it does not leave any residue whatsoever, it also feels so light on the skin and it can be used as a primer. Definitely recommend it.
reviews.review_title: OMG! I cannot recommend this product enough.

reviews.review_text: This was a repurchase for me!  I tried it originally as a fluke, and am so glad I stumbled upon it!  This sunscreen is just perfection.  I use it at the end of my routine - serum, moisturizer, oil, sunscreen - and it just glides on perfectly.  It's also not shiny or greasy which is what I was looking for in a daily sunscreen.  I recommend this to everyone I know.

I really dislike the smell and feel of most sunscreens. They feel sticky/tacky and overall uncomfortable. This sunscreen goes on like a smooth, velvety moisturizer and feels very light weight. Not sticky at all. While it goes on matte, throughout the day my face will get oilier and oilier because of this sunscreen, that's why I'm giving it 4 stars. I'm going to try the mattescreen next.
reviews.review_title: Best sunscreen I've tried so far

reviews.review_text: i wanted to like this product so bad, but it pills up like crazy if i use it over any serum. it also pills up when i wear it under makeup from time to time. super annoying :/
Goes on nice and sheer but doest work. I burn every time I use this

This is the best texture of sunscreen I've ever used. If you're not sensitive to chemical SPF, I 100% recommend it. If you generally react to chemical SPF though, this will likely cause the same reaction. Whatever irritates my skin in drugstore SPFs like Neutrogena and Olay, also irritates my skin in this. It doesn't physically burn like those do, but my cheeks are inflamed all day long. Sad, because otherwise this product is amazing.
Not only a great sunscreen, but this is a great primer too. I have big pores, and this smoothes them over, helping my makeup go on smooth.

I've tried at least 20-30 different types of SPF in my day... and this is the best. It sinks right into your skin. Doesn't pile up after going over your skincare. It doesn't leave a sheen or a scent. It doesn't leave a white cast on your skin. It is literally Unseen. If I didn't just put it on, I wouldn't even know I was wearing it. So good to know that I'm protected without the usual annoyance factors of sunscreen! Great stuff-- the price is worth it!

If you hate the feel and look of traditional white sticky sunscreens this product is for you! I love that the formula is clear instead of while like most sunscreens. It makes my skin feel soft & hydrated without being heavy. This is great as a stand-alone or as a makeup primer.
For us oily girls, if you like a semi matte look, this is perfect as long as you don’t mind silicone. But if you want a dewy look, add this to the Glow Screen for a beautiful glow.

This is probably the best sunscreen I've ever used. I gave it 4 starts because it makes me very oily throughout the day, but it's great for darker skin tones. It doesn't leave a white cast on my face like other sunscreens do. I also love that there's no odor. I think I've found my holy grail sunscreen!
reviews.review_title: Great for people of color/ darker skin tones

reviews.review_text: Would definitely recommend! Goes on very smooth, unlike most sunscreens. Leaves no white casting, also feels and smells like more of a primer than a sunscreen.
Love the feel of this sunscreen— Feels velvety soft tubing into your skin and it works great under makeup even without primer in between

Though spendy, this product is totally worth it. There is no white residue, goes on smooth like a primer, and absorbs well. Wore it on a hike in the snow and didn't get burned at all. Also, I have blemish-prone skin and I didn't break out al all which is major!!!
reviews.review_title: Love it, dig it, will buy again

reviews.review_text: Please don’t call this clean! It has mineral oil - a known clog pore demon- causes big time break outs
been using this product for 2 years now and I love it. I have oily skin and this product leaves my skin with a nice matte finish so I don't look extremely shiny when I leave the house.
eh. Felt like a primer that just sits on top of your skin. Didn't love it but wasn't the worst in the Sephora Favorites Sun Safety Kit.
This product I give 4.5 stars. It goes on smoothly and nicely. The product does smell slightly like sunscreen which is disappointing. Overall would recommend.
Very soft and invisible. Best sunscreen I’ve used. Slight smell but nothing compared to other sunscreens. Definitely will be repurchasing!

I should have done more research before purchasing this, but  I'm unfortunately unhappy with this. I wanted to invest in a good SPF—this one makes me feel like a silicone grease ball. I did not like the way my skin felt after wearing it and I believe it clogged my pores + caused breakouts. I could see how this works for other people, but it is not for me.
Received a sample in my Sun Safety kit. This stuff is really good! No white cast that you can get from so many products with sunscreen. I'm back to purchase a full size product!

I've been using this for the last 3 months and I love it. Its the last step in my AM skin care routine. It's light and makes my skin glow despite it's matte finish. I do not wear any foundation so I cannot speak to it's claim as a base to makeup, but the last two years my entire goal was to no wear makeup and this helps me achieve my no-makeup look.
This stuff is amazing. It doesn't smell like sunscreen, nor does it leave behind a white cast or a greasy appearance. It's very smooth and it's a phenomenal primer for makeup.
This product is so smooth and velvety. I would compare the texture to the Smashbox photo finish primer or the hourglass veil mineral primer. So smooth, not greasy at all! New favorite!

This goes on clear, like Smashbox primer, and doesn’t have a smell. It has that silicon slip texture to it so it fills your pores in nicely. Absolutely no sunscreen smell and really works. Definitely will repurchase

I absolutely love this sunscreen. It's lightweight so it doesn't feel heavy when you first apply it. The texture is a little weird but it's not bothersome. I love that this sunscreen is clear and won't leave any streaks on your face when you apply it.

Hands down the best sunscreen out there. Not only is it clear which is a bonus for me, but it’s the only sunscreen that doesn’t burn my eyes. It doesn’t have a sunscreen scent whatsoever.. but rather faint primer smell/texture. Will be purchasing again!
I’ve been dying to find a sunscreen that is light enough to wear under makeup and this is it! I actually use this as my primer and really like it. It doesn’t smell like sunscreen and goes on clear.

PROS:
- I live in the humid South and don't have an issue with this sunscreen sweating off. 
- Seems to protect my skin fairly effectively. 

CONS:
- My skin breaks out nearly everytime I wear it.
- Silicone feel very much like a primer, but it never sinks in. I can literally feel it sitting there all day and it feels like my skin can't breath. 
- My foundation always separates when I wear this sunscreen underneath.
This is by far the best face sunscreen I have ever used. I have worn this everyday for the past two months. I love that it does not leave my face feeling greasy and it has little to no scent.
The gel sunscreen is WOC friendly! I love it, non greasy! I haven't had the opportunity to pair it with my make up because I have no where to go but alone its beautiful!
reviews.review_title: Oily skin friendly and WOC friendly!

reviews.review_text: My ultimate favorite sunscreen. I've bought this three times already. It's a light weight gel that feels exactly like a face primer.
reviews.review_title: Feels like silk on the face

reviews.review_text: Very lightweight. Goes on lightly and smoothly. A little goes a long way. My go to suncreeen protector.

I keep coming back to this product; it’s the best primer I’ve ever used and such a fantastic sunscreen. It goes on completely clear and keeps your foundation from settling into creases and fine lines. Cannot recommend this product enough!
I love this sunscreen. It’s lightweight and doesn’t leave any residue but is still moisturizing.
This is my second time purchasing this sunscreen. I like that it is lightweight, no white cast and goes on smoothly almost like a primer. I highly recommend this product!

This stuff is amazing! It feels like a primer going on and within 30 seconds its soaked in. I never feel like I have sunscreen on--its not oily or smelly. I put it on at the end of my skincare routine every day. SERIOUSLY worth the money!

This sunscreen is my go to! So many others claim not to leave white cast...but do. I have been using for over a year and don’t plan on stopping any time soon! Formula is super light weight and non-greasy...I apply over my AM skincare routine and head out the door. Even my husband is a fan!
This is a really great CLEAR sunscreen! It has a gel consistency and a little goes a LONG way!
I loved this sunscreen. It went on clear with no white or purple cast. I can see this working for all skin tones.

This literally feels just like a silicone primer and makes your face SO smooth. It lasted on my oily skin all day long and actually helped to keep me matte. No sunscreen smell and I didn’t burn after being outside.

I love that this has NO white residue on my dark skin. The texture is really smooth, almost like a satin/silk soft feeling when I apply it on my face. I usually where under my makeup, but with the quarantine, I haven't been wearing makeup so I use it on it's own when I go for my walks. It doesn't feel heavy at all, in fact, I sometimes wonder if I put enough on because it's so light. This has an SPF of 40 which is great for your face (you don't want to go any lower than 30 for your face for proper sun protection). I highly recommend that all women with pigmented skin have this on hand.
reviews.review_title: NO white residue on dark skin!

reviews.review_text: This goes on so smoothly. It is invisible going on and you just don’t feel it on your face! I love it an will definitely purchase again.

I have been using this daily for a couple weeks now. The texture is lovely and it doesn't break out my very sensitive skin. It really does disappear into my skin. It is also a huge improvement over the glow screen which is incredibly shiny and wasn't for me at all.

I read some reviews about using this and still getting sunburned. I work outside at the farmers market and go on a walk outside daily for around an hour and it seems to be doing a great job. I will definitely spend a whole day outside this summer using this sunscreen and report back change my review if I do somehow end up burned.

Oily skin girls . This is for you . I wear sunscreen everyday even in the winter . I always look greasy after and I absolutely can’t tolerate a white cast. This product ? Amazing , never seen anything like it . Don’t hesitate to buy , might be the best decision ever . Rubs in smoothly , no white cast . I would compare the consistency on the face to the smash box primer. Absolutely love it

I have been using this product everyday, with or without makeup, for over a year and I love it! I like that it's clear and works as both SPF and a makeup primer. I used to use Neutrogena clear face sunscreen, which left a sticky shiny residue, then layer Smashbox photo finish primer on top before makeup. The layering felt heavy sometimes. With this, I only need one product to do both and feel lighter on my skin. For traveling and daily morning routines, it is more convenient to only need one product instead of two. It applies with a matte-to-natural finish in the morning, but after 5+ hours at work in front of a computer it starts to shine a bit. I just blot and my makeup stays in place and doesn't transfer or fade. My face has never gotten sunburnt while wearing this. 9.8/10 highly recommend

This is the absolute best product that supergoop makes. While I love a lot of what they make, if I had to choose only one to keep using, this would be it. It's extremely light weight, not greasy, no scent, completely transparent. Doesn't leave you matte or dewy, literally invisible.
reviews.review_title: absolute best product in the line up

reviews.review_text:
Silicone, silicone, silicone???
Is it in this product? Not sure. But it feels like that!
I don’t prefer that texture... not sure if it’s comedogenic either. But this has been a bit far from my type! I prefer sunscreens that feel like a lotion or moisturizer or something!
It also completely rolls off if I put this on after moisturizing. Even light moisturizers!

Just not a good fit for me. 

Trying the GLOW next. Looks lovely!
reviews.review_title: rolls off if you moisturize before

reviews.review_text:
First off! I finally got to try this! Been trying to get a sample with my orders, kept getting sent other samples I don't ask for. Really wanted to try this. Used it for about 4 days in a row on my face! :) 

I wear sunscreen everyday before I go on my hour bike ride. It's important for me to have sunscreen in my life and to wear it as often as possible! I'm from AZ, so understand the heat and how badly the sun can burn the skin! 

This is too much money! .. for sunscreen! I have sensitive skin that is very acne prone. 
I will not pay $35 for this at such a small amount. 

I buy sensitive skin Aveeno sunscreen for $10! I get more, and can use it all over. Plus it's SPF 50! 

This isn't for me.
reviews.review_title: Too much money! Not worth it!!

reviews.review_text: Beware of using this product as just a sunscreen when going outside if you have fair skin. You will burn! I've tried this product multiple times and always burn. This product is great as a primer if you're wearing under makeup and staying indoors, as the consistency is great and doesn't pill. But definitely won't be repurchasing after continuously getting sunburn while wearing it
Wanting to try a clean sunscreen and rave reviews I tried this product.  Love the clear color and the way it goes on so smooth.  Makeup goes on over nicely!  Want to try more of their products.

I purchased this awhile ago like 2 weeks ago and since then i wanted to give an honest review and update. This is far the best sunscreen on your face! It’s legit so smooth, glides on your skin and it feels like a baby butt. Honestly of course it smells like sunscreen but i used it all over my face and neck whenever I go out or do my exercise outside. INVEST IN THIS! I swear you will love it!!

This is a nice sunscreen for use with makeup. It layers well under makeup and with other products. It works like a primer. It wears really nicely throughout the day. I love the idea of a clear sunscreen but I really disliked the silicone feel of this product. It felt way too synthetic on my skin. I felt like my skin was wrapped in something and could not breath throughout the day. I couldn't even finish a whole tube of this. I gave it to my sister who ended up loving it and its now her favorite sunscreen. I prefer Glossier's version of a clear sunscreen.
reviews.review_title: Like the idea, dislike the texture

reviews.review_text: Really like this so far. Embarrassingly, this is my first actual dedicated SPF product. After recently turning 30, I decided I couldn’t rely on the SPF in my moisturizer and foundation alone, and needed to kick it up a notch. So far I really like how this feels both alone and under makeup, although I worry how it’ll last on my combination skin once the hot summer weather arrives. It also has a tendency to pill a bit when I apply it over my moisturizer but it isn’t the worst pilling I’ve seen.

Absolutely love this product! It’s super light weight and feels amazing on my skin. I’m a runner and the UV Index where I live has been pretty high, yet I’ve not burned. I’ve also layered this as a primer under my make up and it looks amazing - even hours later! A little bit goes a long way so it’s worth the $$.

I love this stuff!  It also acts as a makeup primer.  I have really oily skin and I’m in my late 30’s.  This stuff feels amazing on my skin.  I burn on my face pretty easily and I usually hate any sunscreens as they make my face extra oily and I will then get some breakouts.  I put this on after my moisturizer and voila, ready to add my makeup!

Best facial sunscreen I've ever had the pleasure of using. I've gone through many different brands of sunscreens and I've tried every Korean product under the sun when it comes to UV protection. It does have a rather strong scent but this is the only negative. I use this as a primer under my makeup and does a phenomenal job smoothing the skin and reducing the appearance of pores.
The BEST SPF I’ve ever used! Doesn’t leave a greasy residue or leave you super matte. It feels like there is literally NOTHING on your skin.

I’ve been looking for a sunscreen like this my whole life. It’s amazing. It glides across my skin effortlessly. No white cast, weird oily sheen, or “sun block smell.” I’ve never found a sunscreen that actually improved the look of my skin. I’m really happy this stuff exists!!!

SO happy I took the plunge and purchased this! Lightweight and matte - the perfect sunscreen and primer solution for my oily combo skin. Does not pill when it comes into contact with my moisturizer, does not melt off my skin in the heat, and keeps everything together when I wear make up. Definitely protects my skin because my scars have not darkened! I only wish it was a little cheaper since I will probably be re-stocking this always. I use it every day and the standard size has lasted me 2 months. Can't say enough about this product.

Wow is all I have to say. This is the best thing I've ever bought. This is so lightweight I don't even remember having it on. This was so worth my money. Its fragrance free, gos on AND is a primer for makeup, non comedogenic so I don't have to worry about blocking up my pores with oil. I love this!!!

Let me start off by saying that I have extremely sensitive skin and a very pale complexion and I can’t really use spray sunscreen. I saw this product online last year and knew that I had to try it. I definitely don’t regret that! This product is now one of my favorites and makes putting on sunscreen much more enjoyable as this one doesn’t leave a white residue or ANY residue for that matter. It also doesn’t burn my skin and it feels super natural and not oily at all! I do understand that it is a bit pricey but it is 100% worth it in my book!

So I’ve been using this product for almost 3 months. This is the best SPF ever! It’s goes on light and smooth. A little goes a LONG WAY. It doesn’t leave that weird ashy film like other spf. Bonus that it doubles as a primer. I’ll definitely repurchase again and again.
This is the best sunscreen I have ever used. It goes on so silky and it leaves your skin matte and refreshed looking. It is perfect. It is not greasy on the face at all.

It’s meh. I only use it when I’m not wearing any foundation or concealer bc for some reason it always makes everything on top pill so you’re left with little tinted balls all over your face, not cute. It’s also fairly greasy so I really wouldn’t recommend for people with oily skin either. The protection is good, I used it in Joshua tree (a desert) and accidentally only applied once in the day but didn’t end up with a sunburn which is pretty good since I’m pasty and very prone to burn. Supergoop has other sunscreens that are better, research my loves! Also this is a chemical sunscreen, which, eeek, read some stuff it’s kinda scary and also NOT reef safe! Save our reefs boys n girls!
goes on sheer but DOESNT WORK!!! If you have fair skin and easily burn this is not for you.
I have acne-prone, dry skin and developed small, red bumps everywhere on my cheeks after using it.

Hands down the best sunscreen I’ve ever used! I’ve been trying to find a sunscreen that also has blue light protection and have tried several brands but this is the absolute best. No white casts, doesn’t break me out, and layers perfect under makeup. Worth every dollar!
Amazing product, bought last year and have been using since. Goes on smooth, clear, and non sticky. I apply it after my skincare routine then reapply after an hour. Would definitely purchase again!
So far so good! I really love this product I do have to knock off one star and that is because the size 1.7 oz but overall you need this in your life.
My favorite sunscreen. I’m so impressed with the texture, and how it seems to just melt into your skin as soon as it’s applied. Love!
Lightweight, doesn’t smell like sunscreen, feels protective without feeling heavy. Goes really well under makeup!
I absolutely love the texture of this sunscreen. It comes out and you think it's going to be oily, but it dries so nice and doesn't leave any residue at all, it's crazy.

Favorite sunscreen ever. Wear this daily under tinted moisturizer during the week and sometimes only on the weekends. It’s perfect smooth texture and never makes me break out. Love it and will continue to buy!
I have been using this sunscreen for a couple of years now, and I love it. It works really well for those of us with darker complexions, and doubles as a great makeup primer.
Best sunscreen in my book! I have acne prone skin and this is a nice consistency that doesn’t break me out. My new daily sunscreen!
Light, non-greasy, acts like a primer underneath your foundation. Highly recommend!
I just love this. I have sensitive skin and am outside all of the time. It’s perfect.
I am a sunscreen fanatic and this is my favorite one! I love the way the gel formula disappears into my skin and I love that it is cruelty free!

I always hated sunscreen. Cakey, gave me breakouts, made my face white, clogged my pores... Not this baby. This is everything i ever dreamed of and more. I LOVE to put this on, it makes me so happy, from the consistency, to the color, to the way it feels on my fingers and then on my face. it is perfect. Haven't had a sunburn since i discovered it a year ago.
reviews.review_title: Never wore sunscreen until i found this

reviews.review_text: Prior to trying this, I had been using a mineral sunscreen for years. This is so much more moisturizing and gives me a healthy glow. What I like most about this is that it absolutely does not leave that ugly cast on my skin. This lives up to all of the hype and is worth the money.

I love this product. I use this sunscreen daily and love that it goes on smoothly and can be worn alone or underneath makeup. I dont notice any breakouts or negative reactions at all, just sun protection! I've even turned my husband on to this sunscreen!

I've got this sunscreen because I was looking for a new good sunscreen for daily use, I've read the review and how amazing this product is, but NO I broke me out and it make my face greasy ew, I hate it.

I always wore sunscreen but I never enjoyed it because it was often too thick, too greasy, too ashy and irritated my sensitive areas. I received this as a gift from my friend and I'd heard some great things about this brand so I gave it a try. I'm so glad they came out with a jumbo version because I love this stuff! The texture is super lightweight and almost gelatin-like without being goopy. When you apply it, the only way you know you have it on is because your skin will be so much smoother but the product really disappears! No white cast, greasy residue or irritating feeling. It feels a little like magic but nothing like a traditional sunscreen. Great way to help you enjoy the benefits of sunscreen again!
My fav sunscreen. I wear all the time and recommend to all my friends

This sunscreen is so amazing!! I purchased for a trip to the Bahamas last month and it did not disappoint. It goes on so smooth and makes your skin look so clear by blurring your pores and hiding minor blemishes. It also didn’t cause any breakouts which happens with other sunscreens I use. I’ll definitely be buying another one when I run out.
Wildly disappointing. Made me itch like crazy. It felt good going on, and love that it’s sheer. But ick.

I have used another lightweight sunscreen with an SPF 40 for the past 15 years.  I decided to ask the skincare advisor which sunscreen they preferred and why?  I was directed to this product.  

This is the lightest weight and most undetectable sunscreen I have ever used. it works as a primer for your foundation. I use very sheer foundations and have never been happier.  It is also a clean product which I am using more of every time I shop to replace one of my products.  

You will not be disappointed.
reviews.review_title: Lightweight and Most Effective Sun Protection

reviews.review_text: I really really like this. It spreads easily and is clear when on. Works great as a makeup primer. Love it!!

I love this sun screen!!! I have dark chocolate skin that gets very oily in some places and dry in others so I was looking for a product that works for both. I heard about this sun screen on Instagram from a beauty influencer and made a mental note to try to find it. Imagine how excited I was when I randomly stumbled across it at Sephora... I had to get it and I love it!! No joke it goes on clear and matt. I have not had any extra break outs and it hasn’t made my skin any more oiler than usual. The smell isn’t strong and a little goes a long way. If you have darker skin or sensitive skin give this a try!
Super light, can use it every day as a primer. I have sensitive skin and this works with it. No scent which I also appreciate. Amazing product!
A little of this goes a long way, and soaks in with literally 0 greasy/oily feeling. It is truly unseen and grips makeup really well. Highly recommend for everyday use.
This is the best sunscreen I had ever used. I wish there was makeup this lightweight lol

I needed a daily sunscreen and I got a sample of this before and loved it so I ordered a full size. I love the formula of this sunscreen because it's not oily but it doesn't make skin look dry either. It sits great under other makeup and works together with my other skin care too!

I purchased this product based mostly on the description and the fact that it was a 2-1 in a sense since it was like a primer and a sunscreen in one. After the first day of using I broke out with small pimples all over my forehead, chin and cheeks. Since this happened, I have been struggling to clear my skin back up. It also felt heavy on my skin; and if you rub your makeup in slightly too much, everything rubs off - almost as if you have a peel off mask on. Unfortunately, I wouldn’t re-purchase or recommend this product.

10/10 product. I have been hearing about Supergoop and their sunscreen for a long time now and finally caved! Its a little on the expensive side for sunscreen, but I decided to try it anyways because quarantine. Anyways, previously I have used Cerave and Neutragena and it didnt work for my skin type. I'm on the dry side, but my face gets oily during the day. Supergoops sunscreen was awesome. It felt very matte and didnt seem like suncreen at all which i loved. I was super shocked when I first squeezed a little onto my hand because it was clear and not white! Overall, I like it a lot and may repurchase when its finished.
reviews.review_title: Wanted To See What The Fuss Was About

reviews.review_text: I usually don't like silicone-based primers, but heard such good things about this that I wanted to give it a try. This product makes all of my skincare underneath peel off like erasure shavings or lint pilling on an old sweater. It's so gross that I can't use it! I have normal-dry skin, and have never had a product react to my skin or skincare like this before! Yuck!
no white cast!! hydrating velvety soft texture. received sample. bought full size. gfs bought this too now, my mom. reminds me of smashbox primer.

I'm an Esthetician and from my research, pilling happens when our skin is not ready to absorb a product. Probably from a previous product that hasn't absorbed yet. I allowed all of my normal skincare to absorb 30 minutes each product and still had awful pilling. I received just a sample so I can't try again but I really want to.
THIS IS AWFUL! It dulled my skin so much and it kind of burned!

Best matte sunscreen around, and arguably best all around sunscreen around! You won’t be disappointed. The hype was real. Goes on smooth, doesn’t roll or ball up even when you reapply. Most importantly though, no white residue and no grease - like you’re not even wearing sunscreen.
Love it I was so skeptical but this is amazing it smells great not harshly perfumes feels great not heavy makes my skin feel so soft I love it definitely will buy again
reviews.review_title: love it I can’t believe it

reviews.review_text:
It has a weird feel/texture upon application, it’s almost like you are putting oil in your face but it does absorb quickly. The smell is also off putting , I’m acne prone but I haven’t had any terrible acne in a long time but I noticed since using this , I’ve been having tiny bumbs all over my face and a few deep breakouts. I purchased it because a Sephora employee had recommended it to me. But it’s a no no and just horrible for my skin. I will be returning ! I wish I had read the ingredient list prior to purchasing. Quite frankly, it doesn’t do much as a sunscreen either. Like someone mentioned, may be it’s just better off as a primer. I’ve never worn it under makeup,
 so I wouldn’t know. This is a no for me
my favorite sunscreen ever, cant see it, cant smell it, cant feel it. its great on its own and under makeup, i cant say enough good things honestly

Not sure what I'm doing wrong but when I apply after my moisturizer, my whole face piles up all the product and rubs right off. Not sure if it's my hylauronic acid serum or what but I was expecting this to be the perfect product and primer but I'm disappointed

Love this sunscreen, it feels like the smash box clear face primer and absorbs really quickly. I use it as primer since it’s so smoothing. It also doesn’t break me out (I’ve used it for three months now)and I have acne prone skin.
This is the BEST for ACNE PRONE skin . It does not have that heavy smell of sunblock. I’m in love with this sunscreen it’s AMAZING a must have.
reviews.review_title: A MUST have for ACNE PRONE SKINS!!!

reviews.review_text:
I hate how it feels in my face and it also broke me out. 
Would not purchase again. I was not able to return either.
Kind of expensive for what it is, but it has clean ingredients, goes on really smooth, and is SPF 40 (which is hard to find). Didn't break out my acne-prone skin.

Great primer- lousy sunscreen 
I used this on my olive skin ( face ) and ended up red & mildly burnt. 
It does make a good primer though under makeup- will use it up & not repurchase
reviews.review_title: not a sunscreen- more of a primer

reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing. The only non-mineral sunscreen I’ll use and soooo much better than Tatcha (which I reacted terribly to). Seems like it’d be greasy, but once you apply it, it soaks in. No pilling either. I make my own tinted sunscreen with cover fx drops since I’m a neutral green/olive, which is hard to match. My boyfriend loves it too. He resisted using it at first and then exclusively used it on our last vacation. Def a winner and I’m sorry I held out so long. As a reference, I’ll also use Roche-Posay mineral sunscreen, which is also amazing.
Makes my skin very oily towards mid day and breaks me out. Also i don't like how it feels so sticky. I

I have loved this so far! As an avid SPF wearer I need something that I can apply without making my face feel gross. This product sinks into the skin without leaving any residue feel. Sure it’s different than other products that are more lotion like, this is a gel texture, but for me that is preferred to keep from feeling like I have a ton of layers on. Great sun protection as well!

This product is not what I expected, I expected something more like the Morad daily lotion with spf 30; this stuff doesn’t feel like lotion.. it feels more like a primer and very jelly like. I did find it interesting too that today I put it all over my face and within an hour my face was burnt? I didn’t wear make up; hello quarantine. Maybe it’s a bad batch? Pretty disappointed with this product, it could have just been not what I expected at all, especially for the price.
I really did not like the feel of this product. I don't like products that I can feel on my face throughout the day, and this is one of those products.
Really great product. Love the thin, smooth consistency it has. Very easy to apply.

I've gotten to the age where I'm getting serious about wearing sunscreen daily, and this wasn't pretty for my wallet, but it's so worth it.  I hate the way sunscreen feels on my face, even Neutrogena's feels like a film I want to wash off by the end of the day.  This one has such a unique texture and feels velvety soft once it finishes absorbing in a few seconds.  I love how it's clear and doesn't make my skin look light and patchy.  I don't wear foundation or makeup on a daily basis, so I can't speak on how well it performs as a primer, but I can imagine it's good.  I appreciate how it's cruelty free and reef safe, so overall, it's definitely worth it, for me!
reviews.review_title: Makes me want to wear sunscreen!

reviews.review_text: IF I AIN'T WEARING THIS, WHAT ARE YOU DOING?? If it works out with your skin, then it is so worth your money. Sun protection is so important!!! This helps your makeup stick on, and it doesn't irritate my skin one bit. However, I've read reviews saying it breaks them out, so I would get a sample first! :)

I was really hopeful for this product because I have been looking for a sunscreen to wear everyday and looks good under makeup BUT it broke me out so bad!!! When I only used it for two days, by the end of the week I had three huge, painful pimples that were super deep under my skin. It was definitely discernable from my normal acne I have never had pimples this deep before. Also it is just an awful texture (silicone) and pills. It is very difficult to rub into the skin and I feel as if it didn't even apply at all. OVERALL AWFUL AND I WANT TO SOB.
reviews.review_title: I hate it so much!! IT BROKE ME OUT SO BAD :(

reviews.review_text: This product is gross! I don’t understand why Sephora marked it as “clean”. It’s filled with silicones. Don’t want that stuff on my skin. Pass.

This sunscreen is really all that and a bag of chips. I’ve been using this product for almost a year now and it never breaks me out (I have super sensitive skin.) Goes on clear and doesn’t clog pores.
reviews.review_title: The only sunscreen I will ever put on my face

reviews.review_text: This product goes on silky smooth and makes the skin feel nice. As a primer it feels like a nice base for smooth makeup application.  It does have decent ingredients for spf however I regret not reading the ingredients before purchasing.  I feel zinc is one of the top ingredients for best protection of both UVA and UVB   This product doesn’t have zinc. While working indoors in front of a computer this product is probably fine I’m not sure I would use this alone for my usual day to say activities. At a minimum I wear spf 30 in the winter months and spf 50 or more during spring and summer into early fall. Not sure this is the best choice for stand alone sun protection but a decent primer

I like that it has an SPF 40 and it does not have a tint to it. However, I really hate the texture. It feels like a runny version of the smash box primer. It has a very silicony feeling to it which is fine if you wear it alone. But it will pill and give a thick feeling when you later it on top of other products. I have a 10 step routine so I do not expect any primer to be 100% matte on my skin. This one still give a little shininess but it’s not something a powder can’t get rid of.

I just wanted to write this review to warn others that I've been wearing this religiously for a year thinking it was just normal suncreen as that's how it's marketed. It works great as a primer BUT after doing some research, it is NOT enough as a standalone sunscreen. I learned it has to be layered with other SPF products to get the full effect of a normal sunscreen as the "SPF 40" is diluted by the primer qualities. In other words, you have to wear another real sunscreen before putting on this primer that just happens to have a small fraction of the SPF you actually need. I think it's irresponsible marketing for Supergoop to say this is simply Sunscreen all over the packaging when the primary function is just a primer. If I knew this earlier, I would have layered more SPF products for more protection on my face the entire past year as I was exposed to more UV rays than I ever expected.
reviews.review_title: This is a primer NOT Sunscreen

reviews.review_text: I have oily acne prone skin and this has become the only sunscreen I use. It doesn’t leave a white residue or make my skin oily. It has a natural finish to it so you won’t look matte. Plus I haven’t had it pill when I put foundation on top of it. Love this stuff!

I finished a bottle of this several months ago. I loved it, had no problems. However, my newest bottle is making me break out. I think they changed the formula and it is now reef safe, which is great, but my skin does not agree! I’m bummed that I’ll have to find a new SPF, but appreciate a company giving a crap.
Wow! This is hands down the most comfortable sunscreen ever. You can’t even notice it’s there. Definitely worth every penny.

Works great under my makeup!  So much so that I’m saving this to wear only when I wear foundation. It has just a hint of sunscreen smell...which I love!  Used my normal primer on top. Gave 4 stars because I haven’t been able to see how it works in high heat yet.
This sunscreen is absolutely amazing! It goes on clear and is so silky, once it is on you can no longer feel it. It also leaves your skin feeling so smooth and looking a little radiant which I love!

This stuff is great. Not only is it an effective sunscreen, but the primer benefits are huge. I’ve been in the least forgiving light and still get compliments on how smooth my skin looks (even if I have a breakout that I’ve covered up!).

This formula is NOT for oily skin. I bought it because of the hype and holy crap I am a oily slick mess after one hour. Haven't tried it under makeup but I cant imagine it locking my makeup in place. I am too scared to wear this to the beach too...if I get oily just sitting on my couch then I cant wear this out lol. It is however silky and feels nice to put on the face but I shouldn't be putting silicone products on my face anyway. Waste of my money!
No! Thankfully I got this as a sample because it is very silicone heavy! Also this is a chemical based sunscreen. I don’t see how that can be seen as “clean”.

This actually makes wearing SPF everyday enjoyable. It is completely clear and you really don't need alot because it spreads so well. There is no scent and it doesn't feel like you're wearing normal sunscreen. Plus it protects against blue light (HUV) which is more damaging than the sun!
The bomb. No Makeup. Over Makeup. Only sunscreen I like for myself and clients.

I absolutely love this sunscreen. I love how it feels and makes my face look. There is absolutely no white cast but give my fade a hydrated smooth look. I really wish it came in a larger tube! With all the Sephora stores closing Due to the state of emergency I was worried I would run out. Thank God The online store is still available.

No white cast. Feels like a primer, sits really well under makeup! I got this as a recommendation and now it is a staple to my skincare routine I cannot live without! I do wish it was a larger size, because for 34$ this just barely lasts 2.5 months when used every day.
I tried this as a recommendation from a youtuber. I used to use the olay face sunscreen. This is so much better. Goes on clear no white cast, and it is smooth.

I meant to review this ages ago but I just started my 4th (I think) tube. I use this everyday underneath whatever makeup I use or if I'm not wearing makeup. I've noticed my skin looks healthier overall since starting using it! Definitely recommend as it basically acts as a primer, saves a step :)

I love this stuff. I put it on after my serum but before moisturizer. It goes on clear - can’t see it. And it has a matte finish so when I put on my moisturizer I’m not all greasy and shiny. Feels like there is nothing on your skin. Will be my face sunscreen for good

Amazing product! This goes on so smoothly and isn’t greasy. It creates a wonderful base primer for your makeup while keeping you safe from the sun. I have very acne prone skin and this doesn’t bother my skin at all.

this is my favorite waterproof sunscreen by far. It goes on clear with no white cast, never pills, and layers wonderfully under makeup. The only con is that you can’t use this around your eyes or it’ll sting badly. I have their eye cream that I use instead for that area.

perfect but you run out fast so buy at least two at a time. invisible, feels good on the skin, doesn’t leave you oily (it’s not mattifying either tho so expect a shine), bomb as a primer or on its own
reviews.review_title: perfect product but needs bigger packaging

reviews.review_text: I loved this product! The product blends easily into the skin and has a blurring effect to create an even base for makeup. It was also a great primer for my makeup!

Why would this brand use chemical sunscreens?  Look up any one of the three listed and see what they do to you in the long run!  Supergoop has other sunscreens that are wonderful.  This one is not clean

This is the BEST sunscreen I have ever used and I have tried soooo many! It goes on clear like a gel and I love that. It truly is unseen. Your primer will glide smoothly over it and it is perfect under makeup without giving those flakes like so many do. I will use this for life.

This is sunscreen is not only “unseen”, but it also has this velvety finish to it that makes my skin look & feel flawless. It soaks in almost instantly and (most importantly) there isn’t any film or white residue after I apply.  As an African American that’s a huge plus for me!
Truly lightweight and “unseen” but initially smells like gasoline. Then becomes less strong
My favorite sunscreen !! It’s very light and goes smoothly as a primer under makeup. Highly recommend this sunscreen!

It’s a good sunscreen, but I haaate the texture. Feels like I’m rubbing Vaseline on my skin! But then again I’m a dry skin gal and also don’t like the smash box primer that’s similar to this texture. Judge whether you want this on if you like the smash box primer! I do love the normal sunscreen (it’s a face and body SPF 50), and that’s GREAT
reviews.review_title: I HATE THE TEXTURE BUT LOVE THE BRAND

reviews.review_text:
I am a sucker for a good, clean sunscreen.
Pro - protection, and no pilling when applied after serums/moisturizer
Con - if you have oily skin this will not keep oil at bay
This is a great product , Because it is soft and light .

I like how it goes on, much like a primer, with a smooth finish.   However, when I put on the Kosas foundation on top, it doesn’t mesh well.  Further, I tried it this weekend for the first time while exercising outdoors.  My skin did not like this while sweating.  Upon washing my face, I now had bumps on my skin.   I’ll finish the tube (for a daily SPF, but won’t wear it when I exercise)  but won’t repurchase.
reviews.review_title: Nice application but not an overall favorite

reviews.review_text: This is my favorite sunscreen.  I always kind of hated sunscreen as the various types I used were hard to put on evenly.  This stuff glides right on.  I love it.
Literally invisible. I’m shook. Perfect for dark skin. Sheer af

Won’t wear another sunscreen under my makeup again.  Contrary to it’s name, Supergoop! is weightless and makes my skin feel silky smooth.  It provides great protection from the sun, w/o the thick, white film other sunscreens leave on the skin.
Love this product! It’s not heavy and it blends in well, doesn’t leave a white mark. It feels nice and not at all greasy.
Very happy with this primer/sunscreen. Just what I was looking for. No white cast. Sinks in to the skin fast.
I love this sunscreen.  It is absolutely invisible as you put it on your skin.  It feels smooth and luxuriant and offers great protection!
Love the soft and smooth texture that just glides on my face.

I have oily sensitive skin that breaks out in the sun (and I work outside a lot). Makeup slides off my skin. This product does everything it claims. Holds on to my foundation (with sunscreen), I don't break out from it, the sweat or foundation. It's silky smooth. Comes off at night easily. LOVE IT.
I apply this as the last step of my skin care routine. Goes on smooth and light.

The Unseen Sunscreen is the only sunscreen that actually goes on unseen. I've tried multiple other face sunscreens that claimed to be matte when applied, but they always left blue streaks on my face. This is the first sunscreen that I truly feel comfortable wearing knowing that it's doing its job while remaining unseen. I wish they'd have it available as a full body sunscreen as well!
Feels like silk on my skin and blends well with makeup.

It stings when it “melts” into your eyes. I use sunblock regularly. This looks better than my more natural ingredient spf, much better at pore camouflage; however the need to constantly wipe my stinging watery eyes because of this sunblock is a deal breaker.

I highly recommended this!! My skin has so much sun damage and acne it’s was becoming an issue.
I came across this product and started trying it. The issue for me with regular sunscreen is that it’s white, smells horrible, and is hard to fit into my daily routine. But with sunscreen it is not like the other’s! It gets its name from actually being unseen like the color is like vaseline but it feels like regular lotion when applied!! This is totally worth it
I was super excited to try this product. I’ve been using it for a week now and I am very disappointed. It leaves a layer over my skin and my make up looks terrible after a while.

This is the most lightweight sunscreen I've ever used on my face. Not nearly as "goop-y" as their other products. I love that it double acts as a primer as well - super convenient! My makeup goes on so smooth over it and it doesn't break me out or clog pores like most sunscreens. No shine or greasy residue either. Will definitely repurchase. A must have!
Goes on smooth like velvet. No grease which for my oily summer skin is amazing. Love how it’s translucent. Also doesn’t clog my pores and makes a great primer! Yay!!
Probably my fault for not checking, but super siliconey texture, and been breaking out like crazy. Makeup does go on pretty afterwards, but that’s to be expected w silicone based primers.

This product is a game changer! I was on the hunt for a sunscreen to put under my makeup that wouldn’t leave me looking greasy or leave a white cast on my face. I was also looking for a primer and I didn’t like any of the ones I’ve sampled. After some research on YouTube (we all do it lol), everyone was raving about this sunscreen that ALSO works as a primer. After the first use, I was in love. Not greasy, no white cast, and it is the perfect primer for makeup!!! Im in love!
goes under makeup perfectly. no white cast, and dries so matte I don't even have to wear any setting powder on top of it if I'm not wearing makeup. not greasy or oily at all.

I LOVE this sunscreen!! Up until very recently I've been a person who loves to be tan and is careless with sun protection. Now that I'm in my mid-30's and freckling up a bit and concerned about skin health, I went on the hunt for face sunscreen. This is the only one I've found that doesn't suck!! I  moisturize first and then apply primer and makeup. If I'm going somewhere really sunny I'll spray with Supergoop refresh setting mist with sunscreen.
reviews.review_title: The ONLY sunscreen for your face!!

reviews.review_text: This is hands down my absolute favorite daily sunscreen. I have oily/combo acne prone skin and it doesn't make my skin overly dewy nor has it caused breakouts. It subtly blurs my skin and is super comfortable and lightweight. It doesn't smell great in my opinion but it isn't at all a strong scent and it doesn't linger. The texture is very smooth, very spreadable and it's clear. I've only worn it under makeup once and it looked just fine. I don't think I'll ever use any other face sunscreen.
Perfect! I’ve been on the search for a perfect primer for 6 months with tons of different samples. This has great SPF plus it’s the best primer I’ve found- even for my under eye area!

Fantastic product! I took my sample tube to Cabo for a week. The only part of me that did not burn in the Mexico sun was my face. I like the primer texture and did not break out at all. My makeup looked flawless. There was no funky sunscreen smell either. Worth the money if you don't have super sensitive skin.
reviews.review_title: Try It, You Might Love It

reviews.review_text: This sunscreen works really well for sun protection, but it’s AWFUL to put on. It feels like liquid plastic (silicone) being pushed into your skin. I’ve had a few breakouts, which is extremely rare for me. I’m not sure I can directly tie the breakouts to this product, but I’m not ruling it out. Buyer beware!

I have normal skin to slightly oily skin. It’s a great product but I don’t think it’s the best for my skin type. I don’t really like the texture of the product and the dimethicone makes my skin oilier. Not a bad product but not what I’m looking for.

I love how this is see through and acts as a primer which means I don’t have to add a primer on top if I’m wearing makeup. Also being dark skinned it’s amazing because regular sunscreen makes me look dull/grey/blue. I wish it came in a bigger size

Love love love. Was recommended because I wanted to replace the SPF Kiel’s Ultra Facial Cream with a non-spf moisturizer and put the sunscreen in my primer instead? To hopefully keep my makeup from slipping around so much? 

This. Is. IT. I found my new face routine (with the Ilia True Skin Serum Foundation)!!! Please never change/discontinue. I’ll be heartbroken!

My makeup stays put, I’m protected, and my skin is soft soft soft. ❤️
reviews.review_title: New step to my routine ... well worth it!!!!!

reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! I've always struggled to wear spf but hated having that white cast every day. When I went to Sephora and asked for a new sunscreen that didn't have a white after look I was taken to this product. And I've been so impressed since using it every day! It makes my t zone smooth and my pores small, and who doesn't love daily spf coverage?! You won't regret this purchase!!
Holy grail of all sunscreens! Goes on smooth and matte. No sticky residue. Doubles as a primer. I love this sunscreen!
reviews.review_title: The only sunscreen you'll ever need!

reviews.review_text:
Very conflicted about this product. When only using a small amount (the amount I'd use for a regular makeup primer), I was impressed. It was great under makeup and fairly matte. But I couldn't imagine that was enough product necessary in order to get full/even SPF coverage. I reached out to Supergoop customer service since it doesn't say anywhere how much to apply. The rep told me about a dime size. She said she uses the Mattescreen and uses about a marble size herself. So when I tried using a bigger amount, but still less than a dime size, the great primer quality of it was reduced as it became a little too slippery. I'm using this for the SPF benefits, not just as a makeup primer so it needs to look nice and work well when I have the correct amount applied.
But the bigger issue with this is that is broke me out HORRIBLY. I never break out. I have sensitive skin that will react to products sometimes by getting red/irritated, but almost nothing breaks me out. I am presently trying to treat and heal some major blemishes caused by this and I also have about 10 of those tiny barely raised whiteheads that i don't even know what to do with. 
I just returned this and will try the Farmacy's sunscreen now.

The texture of this is very slippery, almost like a makeup primer. It’s completely clear and you can easily apply the recommended amount with it being shiny or greasy. It layers on top of makeup we’ll be reapplication too. I don’t find it drying or moisturizing, so it plays well with most other skincare and makeup. For a daily sunscreen this works great and I highly recommend if you haven’t found a favorite daily sunscreen yet!
I really loved how this product felt on my face. Unfortunately my skin reacted to it and I got contact dermatitis. Going to have to return in
reviews.review_title: Wish I could keep using it

reviews.review_text: One of Sephora’s clean products. Love it. In terms of sunscreen, one expects that thick ugly oily sunscreen feel on the face, but after a week my skin has taken it very well and my makeup doesn’t pill or look caked on. Definitely recommend.
Best face sunscreen I've tried yet! I use it every morning. It's lightweight and doesn't leave my face looking or feeling oily like many others I've tried over the years. Major bonus for being Clean!

This is the sunscreen for people who hate sunscreen! It goes on smooth, absorbs quickly and fully, leave absolutely no color or cast on your skin. Feels like a primer rather then liquid sunscreens I'm used to. It's perfect for everyday wear under make up up yet strong enough for a tropical vacation. I've converted many friends into sunscreen believes with this product!

I usually try to give products a chance before I fully write them off, but this gave me painful breakouts. The amount of silicone in this might be pore clogging even if you double cleanse like I do. You might be alright if you typically don’t suffer from acne. Also this makes my makeup slide off faster. The texture is also off putting.
reviews.review_title: Too much slide and glide in the formula

reviews.review_text: I love this! It really is unseen - it doesn't leave any of the white cast or streaks like mineral sunscreens, doesn't alter the texture or finish of my skin, and works well under makeup.
