People just need to be aware that you have to put chemical sunscreens on at least 15 minutes before going out into the sun! Would definitely recommend, it's my go-to sunscreen.

Really is "unseen" and is also "unfelt!" This sunscreen is light and leaves your skin feeling silky. It doesn't have that sticky, shiny look and feel like most sunscreens. It worked well for me in Hawaii for serious sun protection, and also works well under makeup for daily wear. I am in my 20s and have oily, acne-prone skin for reference.
Absolutely amazing. Incorporating SPF into my skin care routine is a must. The texture/consistency is awesome and I really do use it as a primer for my combo complexion.
This stuff is awesome. The texture is amazing and it is super protective. Definitely would recommend.

It is very gentle to skin and works pretty well if you use it as a primer before makeup. One thing it can improve on is the smell, it smells like glue to me. And also, if your skin is dry you should probably put on more lotion as the texture of this sunscreen is pretty dry.
This product is awesome!! I highly recommend it for daily use
Enjoy the way that the sunscreen is clear and leaves the skin very soft.

I switched from a moisturizer with SPF to a regular moisturizer...but still wanted sun protection. I saw the positive reviews on this and figured I give it a try; so far I like it, no breakouts or anything.

I'm still experimenting with how much to put on. The bottle says to put a dime sized amount, which I feel like is a lot considering how small the tube is.
I have been using Supergoop for years and it’s the best sunscreen out there especially when I work out. It doesn’t iritate my eyes as I wear contacts.
Great product! Love using it under my makeup. My husband even asks to use it because it’s not greasy. Will continue to buy!

I've been using this stuff for over a year, and it's amazing! I couldn't find a moisturizer that included sunscreen that wasn't tacky or interacted poorly with makeup. Supergoop's Unseen Sunscreen, on the other hand, goes on completely smooth and doesn't interact with my moisturizer underneath OR makeup on top, at all. It has a nice "blurring" effect on pores, but is otherwise undetectable on the face. Easiest way to get your daily sun protection into your routine!

I'm shocked by how much I like this. Generally, I really hate wearing sunscreen on my face. My eyes are always sensitive to it and burn like crazy, even when I try to avoid the eye area. But this one is pretty great and have had no issues with that... it might be the consistency. It almost feels like a thick gel- it is mostly clear, with a very slick texture, like a silicone based primer. It makes my skin feel really smooth, but it doesn't feel like a heavy primer or anything. it really is bare feeling. I love it and will continue to buy in place of any other primer I have tried (Ren, IT Cosmetics, Laura Mercier, Cover FX, BareMinerals).

Overall good sunscreen. The first couple of times I used it I felt like there was little product balls that formed while I was rubbing it in..maybe I didn't wait long enough for my moisturizer to absorb? I have been using it every day for about 2 weeks now and I will buy again.

My absolute favorite sunscreen, it doesnt smell, leaves no traces like other white sunscreen products, and you cant even tell you are wearing it because its not sticky at all! I wear it every day under my makeup
Very light and works well for my sensitive skin. It also doesn’t leave a film and goes on clear.

So lightweight, it doesn’t even feel like you’re putting anything on your face. Chemical spf usually has as sting to it but this does not do that. So far one of the best sunscreens I’ve used. Only issue with this, way overly priced for the amount of product you get which is why I gave it 4 stars.

This advertises as a primer as well as a sunblack, so I thought this would be good for someone with oily skin.  However, everytime I have put on, I feel extremely oily by the end of the day versus when I put other sunscreens or no sunscreen on. I bought in the summer and thought it was due to my skin being more oily in the heat but I have recntl tried using it again and found it still makes my skin very oily.   I do not recommend this, it you have oily skin.

I switched to this sunscreen from another brand and it has been a Godsend. I’ve been looking for sunscreens that don’t leave a white cast and this came highly recommended in my network. My last sunscreen was great, but a little too moisturizing than I liked. 

This sunscreen is soooo lightweight and just sinks into my skin. Yes it is a bit pricier than others but it is will worth it. Plus it has SPF 40 instead of the common SPF 30 like other popular brands.
A great lightweight formula that does not leave a white cast on dark skin tones. It also doesn’t look too shiny or greasy - the finish is more velvety.
reviews.review_title: Does not leave a white cast on dark skin tones!

reviews.review_text: Amazing product! It doesn’t have that strong sunscreen smell most sunscreens have. It’s super light isn’t chalky looking. Would purchase again! Love it!

I was looking for a product that I could use under makeup for extra sun protection or alone, didn’t give my tan skin a white cast, and wasn’t too thick. It goes on smooth, doesn’t make my combo skin break out (which I experienced with many other sunscreens), and works well under my makeup. It really is unseen from the first moment it hits my skin, and feel velvety smooth. I also enjoy it for bare-faced days. It’s an all-around winner.
I love the way this feels on my skin. It goes on with a primer like coverage and I feel like it protects my skin. I use other Supergoop products, so I decided to try this one out and I’m happy I did!

I'm super picky about sunscreen, usually they cause irritation, breakouts, burning feeling; but not this one. I'm using it daily! No white cast, no angry skin. I typically wear it under my make up but it is fine on it's own too. I've tried several other sephora sunscreen and this is the only one to pass the sample test. I'm super happy with thos purchase.

I am upset because there is so much about this sunscreen I love. 

Pros:
-The packaging is great. Squeeze tube works well, does not come out too quickly. Easy to travel with, the cap stays on well, and it stands up well on its cap.
-The texture is very slick, it slides on the face well and sinks in quickly.
-The finish is beautiful. It dries down to a soft velvet finish that layers well underneath makeup, or looks beautifully diffused without makeup. 
-Works very well as a primer for makeup, specifically wetter foundations (does not work suuuper well with dryer or stick formulations). It feels like it seals in the skincare. 
-Mineral sunscreen and reef-safe!


Cons:
-I have very acne-prone skin, and this has a bunch of dimethicone in it. I started breaking out about a week after using, and I was cycling through my skincare wondering what the problem is. I took a break for three days, and no new spots and all of my spots have gone down. I am so bummed because I love everything about this sunscreen, but I just cannot wear it with the amount of dimethicone in the formulations.
i only used ONE time and its a go for me! this is a Blessing to those who need

Great sunscreen. Got a few samples of sunscreen a while back and this was my favorite. No white cast, sits well under makeup, and doesn’t feel greasy at all. The texture is really interesting. Due to price, I wouldn’t use this on my body, but for my face/ears/neck, this is great!
Amazing! I have used it every day for 7 months. No white caste, never greasy, goes under foundation (powder and liquid).
reviews.review_title: No white caste! I love this stuff!!

reviews.review_text: I love this product.  Its gel like consistency allows this product to melt into your skin without any white cast. It has a beautiful soft non oily finish. This product is definitely a new favorite.
I really love this product!!! It blends into my skin perfectly and is a nice gel/silicone type texture so it glides on easily. Works great under makeup and no fragrance, a go to every morning for me

This is thee perfect sunscreen. First. it's a clear balmy gel. There is no white cast. Second, it dries down, no tacky feel. It did not dry me out. Felt soft on my skin. Third, sits perfectly under makeup. I purchased for a Florida trip. It was hot and humid and my face makeup didn't budge. Under powder or liquid foundation. Buy this!

There's a dupe for this product that has never caused breakouts for me: Murad Invisiblur Perfecting Shield. It seems exactly the same, but no unwanted pimples!

I used this for about one week and during this week, I had very weird breakouts all over my face. I thought maybe it was hormonal, so I waited a week and let everything try and calm down. I wore this again a few days ago and it was the ONLY thing I put on my skin all day. I cleansed my face well that night and when I woke up, I had three new pimples in random spots.

I don't normally get acne so I'm pretty confident that this must have been comedogenic or something. I didn't have an allergic reaction, just surprise pimples in odd spots all over my face.  

I'm young 20s with combination skin and I don't wear makeup except for mascara, so I'm pretty confident that this product was the problem for me. My skin is not super sensitive either.
reviews.review_title: Caused Major Breakouts! I found a dupe...

reviews.review_text: Super light weight and wears well alone or under makeup! I was skeptical about the price point, but worth it for a "clea " chemical sunscreen.  Great for everyday wear.
This sunscreen is amazing! When you fist put it on it feels siliconey but the feeling goes away. I’ve put makeup on top of it and it doesn’t peel or move my makeup.
Love this product. It provides a smooth look and grips your makeup. The SPF is a huge added bonus.
Totally transparent and feels very very light. Don’t even realize you have anything on. I’m a dark caramel color and I get no white film, weird ash look, nothing. Totally worth the price
Goes on smooth and protects well. Doesn’t leave a white cast on the skin.
I wear this everyday under makeup. It's very smooth and easy to apply, not greasy or sunscreen like at all!

By far the best sunscreen I've ever used.  Feels silky and light on the skin. Does not break me out or cause oiliness.  I won't use anything else ever again!  Love this stuff. I also didn't notice any flash back in photos which is another bonus.
reviews.review_title: The BEST of the best - great for acne prone skin

reviews.review_text: For a super oily girl like me, this sunscreen does wonders in mattifying my freshly moisturized skin and preparing it for makeup on top. It also doesn't have the overly strong scent of a lot of sunscreens, and you only need a small amount for your entire face. However, I will say that it lacks in longevity -- the mattifying effect only lasts for a few hours, and I'd venture to guess that the SPF effect only lasts a few hours as well. But it's become a staple in my makeup kit and it's one of the best facial sunscreens on the market!
Break our city for my sensitive acne prone skin. Cannot use this product, gives me some pretty deep and painful breakouts!
reviews.review_title: bad break out for sensitive & acne prone skin

reviews.review_text: This seems like it would be the perfect sunscreen - velvety, fragrance free, mattifying. However, every time I wear this, without fail, it breaks me out. I wear this alone with nothing on top, too! Do not buy unless you want to break out.

My favorite sunscreen and primer! I have oily skin so I prefer to keep my layers to a minimum so not having to use a separate sunscreen and primer helps me skip a step without missing anything in my routine. It works especially well under my favorite foundation which is more mattifying, so if you have oily skin it might pair better that way for you. I do find that for other foundations it doesn’t do as good of a job of filling in the large pores on my nose so I often still have to use a pore filler, an easy fix though.

This is a really unique sunscreen in terms of texture and how it feels when you apply it. I found that it was acceptably moisturizing, even in winter when my skin is the driest. There is no white cast, but I do find the matte feeling it leaves behind undesirable.

I received this product in this year's Sephora Favorites Skincare's Next Big Thing kit. This is an excellent primer. It is a chemical sunscreen, so there is no white residue or dulling of the skin. It is mattifying and a little drying, so it may be uncomfortable if your skin is already dry.

This is a great sunscreen but do not put it near your eyes because it will cause stinging.This works better than mineral sunscreens because there is no whitecast and it feels invisible under makeup but it cannot be used near the eyes. Supergoop has an eye sunscreen but it is very drying and flaky. I would love a sunscreen that felt like this on the face that could be used around the eyes but that's probably a unicorn product.
LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!!! This sunscreen didn't make me break out and didn't make me look shiny. not to mention, it is cruelty free, vegan, and reef-safe!!! totally worth the price!
Best sunscreen I've ever used. Glides on smoothly and works great as a primer for foundation.

This is my favorite daily sunscreen! I've never felt the need to use makeup primers and I think this product is why. It smooths and fills pores and makes complexion products apply so easily. I also love that this new formulation is reef safe - yay!
This stuff was sent from heaven. I live in Florida and it works as an amazing primer as well so I don’t have to spend money on a primer as well. I’m obsessed. 100/10 stars.

I started using this because I received a trial size in a clean skin care set during Christmas and finally decided to break it out. I noticed my makeup last from about 8-10 hours which is exactly what I need! I also use some kora noni oil along with this, so it might be the combo but I absolutely love!!! I hate primers with silicone and I use this instead, definitely recommend

I've been using this sunscreen for over four months now. It makes my skin feel soft and velvety. If you're looking for a sunscreen that doesn't make you look pale and it doesn't feel gross under makeup, this is the sunscreen for you. Perfect for people who have darker skin tones so you won't get flashback in photos.
reviews.review_title: Makes skin soft and it's perfect under makeup

reviews.review_text: This is my favorite sunblock in the world! It's extremely gentle compared to other chemical formulas. I love it as a primer under my makeup.

This irritated my eyes and made it watery! I was extra careful not to put it near the eye area. Even so by midday, I am squinting and can barely open my eyes. I had to look up the ingredients list and realized I shouldn’t have used this sunscreen due to sensitive eyes.

Always looking for a pore filling sunscreen to wear under foundation. This one looks great upon application, but I am a shiny, oily mess well before lunch time, even with very matte foundations. It is on the pricey side, so I want to use it up...but not something I will be repurchasing or a product I would recommend if you have oily or combo skin.
I saw a review of this on Youtube and tried it out, and I loved it!

Im 25, have light/medium skin tone and combination/oily skin. I’m not really prone to break outs. With that being said, 
Pros: it’s feels super soft and did not make me break out 
Cons: it takes up more foundation to cover my face than usual, it makes my T-zone waaaayyy oilier than it used to, and once my face gets oily, it begins to oxidize my foundation. Then my foundation will cake around some spots, for example around my nose, and come off around the rest of my nose, tzone, and any other super oily spot. I feel like I don’t wanna touch my face to even scratch it cus it’ll remove my foundation and/or slide it around. 

I really wanted to like it, but the same thing keeps happening every day with my skin getting oilier, foundation sliding around/off. I’m gonna have to return it :(

Favorite sunscreen, amazing make up primer. This is completely clear and feels a bit silicone-y but is amazing. Only need a little bit. And I love love how they made it reef safe!! I live in FL and this works perfectly and feels like nothing on the skin.

It is a very nice sunscreen because it leaves a smooth look and it’s clear which I’m an esthetician and have always worn sunscreen and this is the first time I see one that’s not white and doesn’t leave a white cast but unfortunately it does have dimethicone and silica which clogs my pores and breaks me out in tiny pimples all over my face

Love this sunscreen for my face! Easy, smooth application that sits well under makeup or perfect without. It has a velvety texture and goes on completely unseen. No shine or sticky residue. Amazing for reapplication during the day!

Up until trying this product, I had not found a sunscreen that didn’t cause me to have cystic acne or make me look like a shiny, greasy mess. This sunscreen has a ton of slip to it, feels more like a primer, and causes zero breakouts! I only wish it came with a pump, as it is a little hard to control the amount of product being dispensed. Overall, a holy grail type of product!

The only negative about this product is the anxiety I get at the thought of it being discontinued or running out! I know people say mineral sunscreens are apparently “better” for you but as a WOC, I really can’t handle the ghost face look of most of them or the heavy consistency. This sunscreen is UNDETECTABLE in look and feel! I will never not be without it.

While I initially LOVED this product for its amazing texture and absolutely transparent and matte result on skin, I have given up on it after a few weeks. My skin breaks out in the most ugly of ways. Sorry Supergoop, going back to more traditional formulas!
Beautifully lightweight! This product feels so great on the skin. It's easy to get carried away and apply more.

I *love* this product. Hourglass Mineral Veil can’t touch Supergoop Unseen Sunscreen for a vase primer. Meaning I have a severely oily nose and chin, normal on the rest of my face. I use the Supergoop everywhere and layer Urban Decay Deslick primer on my nose and chin and Milk Hydrogrip everywhere else. Ever since I added Supergoop to my routine, I’ve not had much oil breakdown in my nose and chin area.
Love love love love love love love.  This works exactly as described.   #HG
This is the best sunscreen. A colleague recommended and it’s so light and effective. It doesn’t wear you down and is clear.

A repurchase and will continue to buy this. A truly clear SPF that glides on smoothly and disappears into the skin. It is siliconey which I did not love it at first but tolerated it and soon fell in love with the texture and application. This primer-type SPF goes well under powder and powder foundation. It does not dry matte on my oily skin, but I have no trouble wearing it alone for a satin finish. I use about 1/4 teaspoon for both my face and neck.

I run every day and sweat profusely. I've extensively researched sunscreens that won't burn your eyes and this has always come up highly rated. I've used it numerous times and thus far have not had a problem with it burning my eyes. It's lightweight, completely clear, and goes on easily. I give it 3 stars for a couple of reasons. First, the cost for such a small amount is outrageous. I use sunscreen every day (face, ears, front and back of neck) and while I like the coverage this provides, it's not cost effective to buy. Second, because it's more of a gel-like substance, and clear, I never feel like I've used enough nor covered all my exposed skin, so I use even more. I do like that it has not caused any breakouts and leaves my skin smooth to the touch (it would make a decent primer), though. I'll stick to sunscreens that are more cost effective, but unfortunately eye burn-y.

I’ve given up in finding a primer that don’t cause a breakout. The primera I’ve used before would either make me breakout (sensitive oily skin) or would not see a difference and make my face shiny. This is the first that does not make me break out and has SPF 40?! Love this primer
Love the consistency and formula! Wish this could be my everyday face spf but it’s to expensive.
Hands down the best sunscreen I have ever used. Goes on clear, matte, and full coverage. I can skip primer if I want to and it has never broken me out. My holy grail of sunscreen.

I received this in one of Sephora’s Holiday Minis Sets and I loved it so much I HAD to get the full sized tube! It’s well worth the price and I absolutely love it. I have a darker skin tone and believe me when I say there is NO WHITE CAST! The formula glides on beautifully as the last step in my skincare right before makeup and it’s a great primer. Even on its own it’s great too! Will totally repurchase!
reviews.review_title: Does what it says!!!! Goes on Clear!

reviews.review_text: great sunscreen! applies well and looks good under makeup. I love that it's sheer so you don't get any sort of white cast. definitely recommend!
I spent a lot of time in the sun over the summer, and used this everyday. It definitely worked for me.. didn't get sunburned. It has a smooth, nonsticky texture and works like a primer.
reviews.review_title: Summer essential but great all year round

reviews.review_text: This goes on so smoothly and creates a nice base. I usually give it a minute or two before applying anything on top of it, but I have had luck and it doesn't pill. I ended up switching to this from the Shiseido Urban Environment sunscreen I have been using for over a year.

I can't rave on this enough. It makes your skin velvety, plus the SPF factor is a game changer. I have tried a lot of different primers (Mac, Becca, bareMinerals, Benefit, Smashbox, etc.) and this is my favorite, by far.

Try this product! Yes it's as good as all the reviews say, I know I too was skeptical. Its so thin and light. Absorbs quickly. Non greasy, even with it being SPF 40. Works great under makeup. So great that my bestie is using it now.

I have oily/combo skin, oily t-zone and dry cheeks, so I figured Id try this sunscreen since I have a tiny bit of acne and read that this is a good one for acne prone skin. I have to say this is the best sunscreen I have ever bought! It is as mattifying as it says. I do look a little oily after application but just after one blot i am set for the rest of the day. I will say though, I add this after my moisturizer and when applying it my moisturizer rubs off a bit if that makes sense, but I dont mind. Doesnt leave a white cast, have a weird strong smell, or leave you sticky. I was going to try the eltamd sunscreen after this one but I think I will stick to this one until it does me wrong lol.
This was truly a "unseen" sunscreen because it goes on smoothly and I cannot tell if I put anything at all when I am done. The best product that works like a primer.

I love that this is clear!  I apply serums, wait for a bit then apply eye cream and moisturizer after it's absorbed, I put on SuperGoop Unseen Sunscreen before makeup.  It doesn't matter how much time I wait in between layers, as soon as I put on the sunscreen it rubs off in clumps so I don't really feel like I'm putting on any sunscreen.  Wondering if anyone else has this issue?!
reviews.review_title: Nice but comes off in clumps

reviews.review_text: Totally weightless, dried immediately. Broad spectrum, so it is perfect to use along with retinol anti-wrinkle products.
This is one my favorite beauty products. It’s two products in one. I love that I can protect my skin with its SPF 40. The texture is amazing!!! It leaves my face softer than ever! :)
Love the product but hate the price - too expensive for the size of the bottle. I use mine as a primer and SPF!

I've been slowly trying to make the switch to clean products and this is a great everyday sunscreen. Not greasy, doesn't make me breakout. The only thing that has taken some getting used to is the color. I've always had white sunscreens in the past. For some reason, this clear one makes me think - did I get good coverage? Is it all rubbed in? Can't tell.

It goes on really silky. Love that it doesn't feel oily at all, didn't have any skin breakouts or irritation from it. Really put it to the test with a  week in the sun in Hawaii. No burn at all. Would definitely recommend!

Emphasis on primer! This is the perfect spf / primer for anyone with problem skin it glides on like a silky luxury primer I haven’t burned while using it so I’m putting my stamp of approval on the spf purpose. It definitely helps hide the texture on my skin it helps my make up hang on to flaky post break out areas and has become my new go to. It’s clear so no white cast and it does not pill up with my other skin care products (creams oils and serums).
reviews.review_title: No white cast performs perfectly as a primer!

reviews.review_text: This is a great matte nongreasy sunscreen. Its one of the only ones my boyfriend will use because its so matte and doesnt give off shine or stickiness
I absolutely love this. It doesn’t have that white residue that most sunscreen have. Almost feels like primer and sits on skin nicely.

Amazing product! I love that it is sheer and almost powdery when applied. The texture reminds me of a primer. I do not use foundation, so after applying this, I jump straight to a bronzer or blush. Makes my makeup really stay. I’ll continue to purchase this product and look forward to trying others from SuperGoop! I love that it has the clean stamp. That’s my prefer type of products, especially when it comes to my face!

I saw the great reviews this sunscreen has and I went ahead and bought it, now, after using it a few times, I feel the need to write a review to save others from making the same mistake. This feels like a silicone-based sunscreen, not easy to apply, even less easy for the skin to absorbe, I end up getting product pilling all the time, very annoying and it doesn't help with makeup application.

this is by far my favorite sunscreen I've ever used. if your skin is on the drier side i would definitely use a light moisturizer before applying this product dude to it not being super moisturizing! for my skin type (combo/oily), i feel that the moisture level is enough. I've been cutting way back on the amount of makeup i wear so i cannot say how this works with liquid foundation. i will sometimes wear powder foundation and ive noticed a few times that the product doesn't smooth out my pores on my nose very well which then causes my foundation to settle in the pores. it's not a super big deal to me, and it may just be user error (I'm still playing with it). i will say that my make up doesn't move or separate anywhere else. over all i love this product and will continue using!

I love this stuff. It works well as a primer, provides nice even sun coverage, and doesn't clog my pores. It truly feels like you have enough coverage to actually protect against the sun - so many other products are so thin and watery that I worry they really aren't doing much protecting. With that said, it doesn't feel heavy and it doesn't smell like sunscreen, so I love it.
Doesn't make you break out and is impossible to tell that you have anything on your skin. Doesn't alter how make up goes on whatsoever.

I’m always on the hunt for a good sunscreen, and over the last year I’ve been focusing on sunscreens that offer protection against blue light - I was surprised to see that there are only a handful out there. I was also looking for something the could double as a primer. I’ve only had good experiences with Supergoop products and this one checked all boxes.
I LOVE it. The texture is primer-like and it layers beautifully on top of my skincare. My foundation grips to it and stays in place all day long! It also makes my skin looks airbrushed (for reference, I wear Ester Lauder’s Double Wear) and helped me streamline my morning routine!

I told an employee that I had sensitive skin and was recommended this sunscreen and couldn't be happier. I usually get rashes from longterm sunscreen use and so far this is one of the rare products where that hasn't happened! I also love that it's clear with no white cast and very easy to blend. It does have a strong initial sunscreen smell but that fades pretty quickly. The consistency is VERY similar to silicone-based primers and it smooths out your skin

Love Love Love!!!
This sunscreen not only goes on flawless but you can not feel it on your skin. It is made for ALL skin types and tones, which is one trait I look for in my products. They have one that is tinted and advertised as “for all skin tones” but it is mainly for the lighter skin spectrum. This sunscreen has a similar texture to the tint one and it makes your foundation look FLAWLESS. Definitely worth $$$.
Favorite sunblock! Love the light texture. Feels like gel but goes on matte

So disappointed!! I love the feel of this sunscreen but after over a month of use I think it’s been the cause of my horrible acne flare. Every time I have taken a day off my skin will clear up slightly, every time I apply it flares again! It’s filled with silicones which are known to cause acne and I didn’t even think about that beforehand!
reviews.review_title: Good if you’re not acne prone!

reviews.review_text: I love this sunscreen. A little goes a long way as the final step in my morning routine. I love the consistency and that it isn't super heavy and it's not white. It really helps me feel good about using sunscreen under my make up.

LOVE this sunscreen! I would recommend this sunscreen to anyone, but especially if you have dry to normal skin. First I apply my day time moisturizer, let it sink in for a couple of minutes, then I apply this product on top. This sunscreen leaves your skin feeling brand new, all the while protecting it. I’m going to be gifting this to all of my close friends and family during the holidays.
This product is amazing! It feels like the smashbox photo finish primer, but it has SPF. It makes my foundation look flawless while protecting my skin from the sun!

I think I’m the only person who doesn’t like this! I put it on before I went to work under my normal make up. It dried matte and was a nice vase to put my foundation on. However, 3 hours later I looked in the mirror and it was peeling off everywhere as if I was peeling from a bad sunburn! I had to remove all of my foundation so I didn’t look sickly. I don’t understand how everyone else raves about this sunscreen.

I love this stuff! I received it in my Sephora play box, and I will be buying a full size. It has a similar feel to the Benefit Porefessional primer. It seems to be the only sunscreen that doesn’t break me out. I wear it under my makeup, and my foundation/concealer doesn’t slip or slide over this.
This is by far the best sunscreen I have ever used. I can apply make up on top with no problems at all.
Works fine. Consistency is a bit off. Has not made me break out. Definitely need to use a moisturizer underneath as this appears to have none.
Fantastic facial sunscreen. When they say unseen, they mean it. Even my husband is a big fan.

I tried to like this because of the high SPF and invisibility claims but ultimately I can't get over the texture and the way it sits on the skin. I used it over the summer and think it’s a good SPF because my skin got less pigmentation than usual. But it feels like a weird, rubbery layer that just sits on my skin and never actually gets absorbed. If you like silicone-y primers you might like it but it made me feel like my skin couldn't breathe. I did break out while I was trying this but I was also experimenting with a few other new products so jury's still out on the true culprit. I’ll give it a shot again in the winter. That being said, because it is like a primer, it does layer well under makeup.

I hate sunscreen, but I absolutely love this. A chemical sunscreen that doesn’t clog my pores like regular mineral sunscreen, and doesn’t add to my pale oiliness throughout the day, like mineral sunscreen. Love this stuff. Feels like you have nothing on, smells like you have nothing on, and yet you’re protected. I’ve purchased it twice. I’ll never go back!
dosen't apply well on my skin. it clumps up on my skin and fakes.
Love it but definitely won't need a moisturizer before you apply your makeup! Also will definitely need a mattifying setting powder

Holy‐moly, buy this sunscreen! Light, smooth, non-greasy, almost primer-like texture. No scent to speak of. Makeup applies over it well. I can finally tolerate what my dermatologist has told me to do for years. Initially got it as a sample, have since bought full-sized several times.

It was hard to ignore the hype about this product, and I'm so glad I didn't! I don't wear makeup very frequently, but this SPF wears so well under the BB cream I have. It also works wonderfully on it's own - which is how I wear it most often. The texture is so velvety soft and it keeps my skin pretty matte throughout the day. Great and versatile product!
I lent mine to my cousin to try and she also loves it - says I'm not getting mine back lol guess it's time for a new one!
Not for acne prone skin. Makes me break out every single time. It’s nice if your skin is normal though.

I finally caved and purchase this product while on vacation in Las Vegas without my usual sunscreen. I’ve always heard how this product is so amazing but was skeptical because I loved my good ol reliable (EltaMD). Supergoop! is amazing. It’s so light weight and has a barely there feel which is just what you want in a facial sunscreen. It has a silky slip to it that has doubled as my makeup primer. This is the first sunscreen I’ve been compelled to reapply mid day with because it’s so light.

This product works great as a primer/every day sunscreen where you have minimal exposure to the sun or are only exposed to weak rays. I wear it every day under my makeup and it doesn’t get oily and holds up well for my 10 minute walk to work outdoors. However, I recently went on vacation to FL and used this sunscreen while on the beach one day and I am so disappointed with how it held up. I ended up switching to neutrogena a few hours in because my face was sunburnt and now I am left with a tomato red face and a clearly defined tan line from my sunglasses. I thought that this product would hold up well in extreme sun exposure, but instead I fried. Given this, I’m hesitant to think that the SPF protection I think I’m receiving on an every day basis is even effective. 2 stars only because it lays well as a primer for makeup.
reviews.review_title: Does NOT hold up well in the sun

reviews.review_text:
I was on the hunt for an everyday sunscreen; I am black and most sunscreens leave a white cast, so I wanted something that would go on light and not coat my face in that pasty glow.

I loved this sunscreen at first. It felt lightweight, i could wear it without looking like a ghost, and I was feeling myself knowing my skin was protected. After a couple weeks/months of wear, I started to notice that I was breaking out like crazy, with deep pimples popping up on my cheeks and forehead. I was certain it had to be something else, so I started to play with my skincare routine, but that wasn't it. It wasn't until recently that I realized that the only constant during this period of breakout has been the Supergoop sunscreen, and after doing a little research, I have seen that some others have faced similar struggles. I guess my skin does not love the formula, and I am sad bc its back to the drawing board for me!

I'm fair skinned and struggle finding excellent daily moisturizers with an SPF above 15 that actually works as a moisturizer. All of the good moisturizers really don't have any SPF. When I received this sample, after a few days of using it, I was sold. I can't explain it. Maybe it's the primer part. You won't even know it's there, and it made my skin smooth like a great primer would. I honestly didn't realize it was a primer until I came back on Sephora's website. I was using it as sunscreen only, and it made my face look better, so I often would only use eye concealer.  It's wonderful!

I am newer to using facial sunscreens, but this one is definitely awesome. It goes on completely transparent and absorbs quickly. It has the slightest faint sent of sunscreen, but you only smell it for a second. I can't really speak to the effectiveness of it, as I purchased it in November, and I don't spend a lot of time outside this time of year. But I definitely intend to repurchase.
reviews.review_title: Try this if you need a transparent sunscreen

reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this product because of the texture and coverage. It feels so smooth like you’re putting on a serum, not anything like other sunscreens that are sticky and smelly. I feel totally comfortable with putting makeup on afterwards. I marked as 4 stars instead of 5 because, although Sephora has it as clean, external reviews seem to disagree. Not really sure what is true.

I couldn’t believe how obsessed I became with this stuff. Usually I try to buy either moisturizer or CC cream with sunscreen already in it, but I received a sample and after one try I was hooked. I’ve gone through almost 2 full size tubes since. It’s an official staple in my skincare routine. It wears beautifully under makeup or without and even acts as a primer. It’s definitely pricey, but to me the results are worth it.
My current FAVORITE sunscreen! It’s just what I’ve been waiting for since so long! I don’t even need to use a primer under my makeup as this just does the job. It’s my go-to sunscreen for work!
reviews.review_title: Amazing Sunscreen!!! love love love this!

reviews.review_text: I purchased this product after returning "Play".  I love the gel-like texture.  It acts like a combo of a blur plus sunscreen.  A little goes far as promised. I just wish the SPF was 50.
reviews.review_title: Good but Wish it had a higher SPF

reviews.review_text: A colleague recommended this brand to me and I wanted to use this for my face based on it being branded as "unseen".  It works beautifully and my skin feels wonderful!
Love this product! It's almost like a silky petroleum jelly but in a really good way! make up goes well over it, not sure it really has any make up priming benefits though.

Primer plus sunscreen! What a brilliant idea! I used to wear sunscreen then primer then foundation. With this product, I’ve eliminated one step in my regimen. The texture of this primer, in my opinion, is practically identical to smash box which remains my go to when I apply makeup for an evening out and don’t need sunscreen.

LOVE LOVE LOVE this sunscreen. I tied couple of sunscreens and all of them gave me slight rashes as I have sensitive skin. This one has a very light primer like texture. Doesn't make my combination skin and T zone oily at all. The lotion is also very good.
I love this sunscreen. It goes on clear and my make up smoothly applies on top. Also it doesn't sweat off during a work out!
The best sunscreen I’ve purchased. It goes on clear so there is no white film or residue remaining. Also the products absorbs into the skin very well.
I was definitely excited to try this out. unfortunately I think there might be an ingredient that made me breakout. could be great for others just not for me. :(

I love this sunscreen! It’s got SPf40 with NONE of the oiliness I dread. It’s also a fantastic primer that leaves my skin feeling soft and helps my makeup last all day. I love how lightweight and invisible it truly is. If you’re looking for a new sunscreen (or primer honestly) this is a great option!

I received a mini size in a skincare set and instantly bought the full size, I had no idea sunscreen could be this amazing. It glides on like a smooth clear primer, no grease or white tone. It works great under foundation, tinted moisturizer, powder foundation or no makeup at all. I highly recommend trying this.
reviews.review_title: Feels Like A Smooth Clear Primer!

reviews.review_text:
I love it!!! 
It is perfect for oil or combination skin

Currently on a tropical vacation and was looking for something very lightweight without any trace of residue— this is it! So glad I bought this right before my trip. Love that it’s spf 40 and you don’t need to wait to have it dry before putting on makeup. Literally has the feel of a primer. It’s also a travel friendly size!
Great lightweight spf. Perfect for daily wear under makeup. A little goes a long way so this will last you.

I absolutely love this sun screen as it is transparent and does not give me any white cast. The sunscreen gets absorbed within less than a minute and leaves a velvety matte texture. It is very comfortable to wear as well.
This is my new go to sunscreen, there is no white caste, no sunscreen smell, and it glides onto your face smoothly. I love that it’s a clear sunscreen.
This is a great non greasy SPF for a daily primer.

I loved this product until 5 or so days after using it, when I started noticing little bumps appearing. I assumed it was due to it being summer and "glowing" and humidity, but no, it turns out that something about this formulation and my skin resulting in clogged pores. My aesthetician took one look at my skin and immediately asked what new product I was using and this was unfortunately was the culprit. Switched to Coola Sun Silk Drops and problem was solved. Very disappointed that this didn't work for me because it is super light and the texture is amazing.

This is great in every regard, its clear, it smells nice, it goes on smooth, EXCEPT that it clogs my pores and gives me the most awful whiteheads and blackheads for at least a week after each use. I don't usually have issues with acne, or with sunscreen for that matter, so this was a bit of a disappointment. I really wanted to like this product, but it seems this product does not like me! For that, 2 stars.

This product checked off all the boxes for me: clean, non-irritating, and no white cast!

However I WISH they’d use less plastic in the packaging.
reviews.review_title: the holy grail if you like to go bare-face

reviews.review_text: LOVE this product! It goes on really nicely, doesn’t smell like sunscreen, and functions as a sunscreen and a primer. It is an effective sunscreen - I forgot to apply body sunscreen once and got burned everywhere except my face. It works very well as a primer for me also. I also love the concept of a sunscreen that works on more skin tones. Definitely give this a try.

After trying Murad's expensive but amazing spf primer I wondered where I would find a product of the same level of quality but within my budget. This is it! It is an amazing primer and I know I am proctected. This is a Must have!
reviews.review_title: Works for all skin tones! great primer.

reviews.review_text: LOVE this! It is UNSEEN and smoothly blends on my skin. I saw all the Insta ads about how easily it would apply on my skin and it does. I didn't want to buy a product that would make my skin look cakey after a while - some creams tend to do that. Also, it definitely does not cause me to breakout. Does not help much with redness or anything but is a great sunscreen.

I have been obsessed with this ever since I received it in my Sephora play box months ago! I purchased the larger size as soon as I ran out of that, I use it pretty much every day but especially before applying makeup! I haven’t found 1 foundation that it doesn’t work with, right now I’m switching between Estée Lauder double wear & Sea foundation by Tarte for reference since they are both very different foundations but this is going to be a staple in my makeup bag forever! Who ever struggles to wear sunscreen every day will want to use this one for sure!
reviews.review_title: doubles as the best primer ever!!!

reviews.review_text: I have terrible skin and have been looking for an SPF that doesn't break me out for years and years and years.  I can feel the cysts coming - hard and red and bubble up, scar, leave darks spots and worst cases scars. This is the first thing I've found that works. I've tried Clinique, Estee Lauder, Skin Ceuticals, Neutrogena, other Supergoop products, Body Shop and more I can't even think of. I got this in my Play! box This doesn't break me out ever and I can wear it daily. It leaves my skin very soft and does not leave a residue or greasy feeling. It doesn't react with my salicylic acid treatments. Totally worth it for me to buy the full size.

Finally, a sunscreen that doesn't leave a white cast, tacky feeling, or any of those other weird things that makes us all not want to wear any at all.  This goes on cleanly, smoothly, and really is weightless.  I'll never buy another SPF.
reviews.review_title: A Sunscreen you WANT TO WEAR!

reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this sunscreen as everyone I know who has tried it loves it. When I first put it on, I was impressed by the consistency and how well it sat on my face (not oily or greasy etc). However, I had a horrible skin reaction to it. I don’t have sensitive skin and in fact have never reacted to anything I’ve put on it before but this made my skin red and dry and itchy and it took over a week to get back to normal. Beware! Make sure to test this on a small part of your skin for a few days before putting it on your whole face.

I’ve tried countless SPF products and this is the first that doesn’t pill on my face. It feels greasy on your hands but not once it’s on your face and it blends in so easily. While I hate paying this much for sunscreen it’s a high quality product.

It’s Unlike any other sunscreen which will make your face look pale. But it’s a little bit greasy in the beginning. 
However, I like it! And would totally recommend anyone to at least give it a try!
This is my every sunscreen. It’s light and well protected. It acts as a great primer too. Will definitely repurchase

horrible smell, feels oily when you put it on and sticks to your hands, just the feeling is icky.  I'm trying to find an alternative to the Supergoop Serum (which is magic) since it seems like it's been discontinued, but this is not the choice.  It does ultimately provide a nice base layer once you get over the strange texture and gross smell, but it's just not worth it.
Love love love this sunscreen. I didn’t even know it was possible for sunscreen to be clear, not white! It goes on like a primer and has no scent. Perfect for under my mineral powder foundation.

This really is the best sunscreen ever. Never again will I forget to apply sunscreen, as using this product is a pleasure I look forward to in my routine. It's soft, clean texture and a subtle but nice smell. It doesn't affect makeup application and feels so good to put on. 10/10 recommend!
Except for the lasting hours, this is perfect! Less oily than the other lines​ from the brand.

I was skeptical about this product at first too ladies, I heard so much about it I thought there was no way it could possibly live up to it but from the first try i was HOOKED. If you have oily skin this is a must for you, I've gotten my sister, my mom and all of my friends hooked on this product as well. It has a velvety texture that smooths the look of pores and won't make you greasy at all, the texture is similar to that of a primer but if you give it a minute it will absorb completely. If I don't put this on in the morning, no matter how many mattifiers, I will be shiny and greasy a few hours later but not with this. Have you ever actually WANTED to put on sunscreen? Because Supergoop did it y'all, I look forward to it every day. This is a game changer, my skin has never looked better, I'll even put it on at night under my foundation as a primer if I'm going out.
reviews.review_title: Have you ever WANTED to put on sunscreen?

reviews.review_text: I've tried several sunscreens this year, including other Supergoop! Products and brands not sold in Sephora. I must say, this works best with my combination skin, even as I reapply on top of makeup throughout the day. As the name suggests, there really is no white cast or residue, even after reapplications. There is a scent that might bother some people, but it fades very quickly.
The absolute best texture! A delight to put on every morning and it works.

Not sure about the point of this product. First it doesn’t make one’s makeup last longer, second it is full of silicon and causes insanely great amount of breakouts. Be aware if you have acne prone skin. Not sure why this product is called a primer. I like this brand but definitely not this product.

Depends on if you think you like the feeling of chemical sunscreen. This formulation is very light thin and easy to spread but it also feels a bit greasy on the face, though it’s actually very matte. Personally I feel kind of grimy and prefer cream type sunscreen to this light kind of dry Vaseline or balm seque compound.

I really like this sunscreen. It doesn't irritate my skin, it goes on and stays matte, it's smooth....I don't know if I would wear it to the beach, but for every day use it is great. I just wish it cost less!

Great product. I use it on hands daily - and arms if they’re sticking out. I use a different sunscreen on face/neck/chest. All year. Unlike some sunscreens, this is moisturizing and has nice minimal fragrance. No white residue. I like the silicone feel too.

As someone who suffers from Melasma, I have to use sunscreen to prevent further damage.  I’ve tried everything under the sun (no pun intended... lol) and nothing really worked under makeup.  Make just wouldn’t go on right after sunscreen and I felt primers
I’d give this a million stars - application is a breeze, great texture. Doesn’t mess with my makeup, no white residue like most SPF. This is a must have!
Used daily for a week and experienced in of the worst breakouts in my life. Took 2 weeks to heal.
This stuff is awesome for a sunscreen that you can wear everyday on your face. It feels good and works! I wish there could be a huge bottle for the whole body.
reviews.review_title: Love This Sunscreen Hope It NEVER Changes

reviews.review_text: The only sunscreen I want to use. The texture leaves your skin feeling amazing and is great under makeup. It also does not irritate my skin or cause breakouts. Awesome product!
I adore this as a simple mattifying primer that as a bonus had sunscreen. It never breaks me out, and works well on its own or underneath foundation.

Best best best sunscreen ever! It’s so light and the texture is just right! you can’t even feel it!! It is super matte goes well with moisturizer and makeup. Doesn’t leave any white creases on the face like most sunscreens do. I’m just glad that I found this sunscreen!

Super lightweight, not sticky either... at first it feels like it may later greasy on your face but it feels like nothing is there! And I don’t know if these two things coincide, but I haven’t used primer in months! Just this then foundation and setting spray and everything stays all day!!
Works great, I use it on a daily basis. I have combination skin.
reviews.review_title: Works great, not sticky, no residue!

reviews.review_text: I’m allergic to many different sunscreens. They make me break out or makes my face sting right when I walk outside. This product doesn’t do either! I love it! I use it every day and have no issue!
Love this stuff! Completely invisible and perfect for outdoor summer activities .
I love this sunscreen. I wear this as a primer, if i'm putting on makeup, but If I don't wear makeup, I still put this on by itself. It keeps my face protected, smooth, and matte!

This made my makeup slide all over and looked like I had cake face. I tried using more and less...with a gripping g primer and without...and with a number of different foundations. Nothing helped...I’m bummed. I like that it’s blurring and I think it’s great if I’m not gonna wear any foundation, but that isn’t gonna happen.
Smooths my pores and evens out my combination skin. And spf!! That’s the best part.

Everything about this is amazing and does what it says. Barely a smell. You need maybe a pea sized amount. Blues your skin like a light primer. It absorbs fast and doesn’t have a bad texture it’s like liquid silk.
Does the job, applies nicely and not at all tacky. This truly does what it says it will and is completely “unseen”.

This is the perfect every day sunscreen. There is no white cast, it smooths pores (not as much as a primer) and leaves the skin in a velvet matte state. I have acne prone skin and haven't found that this makes my breakouts any worse or causes new ones. Makes my skin feel soft and protected.
This is the only SPF that doesn’t break me out! I use the every day and it sits well under my makeup!
Lightweight,  smooth and applies like a primer love it. No greasy heavy feel like most sunscreens

Whoa! This is the first sunscreen I’ve used in my life that goes on transparent! It like disappeared after it set on my face after a few seconds! By disappear it felt like I didn’t even put anything on texture and feel-wise. I’m currently using Shiseido sunscreen 40 spf and that one leaves a thin fair veil over my face and I can tell I’m wearing sunscreen. I wore it under tinted moisturizer. I have super oily and shiny skin and for the most part it’s kept my face and tint intact with minimal shine. I’m impressed by how this material works and goes on skin! It’s new technology!!!

4.5 stars really. This is a game changer for me. I'm not in the sun often; seriously I don't even leave the house every day, so I don't ever wear sunscreen, and haven't for years. Typical sunscreen is usually just gross. I hate the smell, the feel, the look, all of it. 

But THIS product, this Supergoop Unseen Sunscreen? It's sunscreen for people like me who hate sunscreen. It's going on my face whenever I leave the house now. It's an amazing primer in addition to being an awesome sunscreen that doesn't even feel or act like a sunscreen, which is incredible. 

My only minor quibble is that even after having it on for 12  hours, I can still "taste" it. I obviously didn't put it on my lips, but I could taste it in my mouth all day. I have a very sensitive sense of smell, so I'm probably just smelling it because it's on my face and somehow that's translating to tasting it, so I hope I can get used to that.
Love it!! Works great under makeup, goes on easy, and doesn’t make me break out.
Feels like a silicon primer- wow! I used this for my vacation to Florida and it worked like a dream. I will forever repurchase!

I love this as a sunscreen—NOT a primer!!  For me it doesn’t cut it as my sole primer so I have to use something on top.  But for a no makeup day it’s perfect.  It’s very lightweight with lots of slip so it applies easily.  No nasty SPF smell!!
I loved the no white cast look, hated the slippery feeling, separated my makeup. Didn't work for my oily skin.
I love this sunscreen.  It goes on colorless and clear, no white residue and my concealer and makeup goes on smooth and flawlessly.

This sunscreen is truly amazing and it works with my acne prone skin. I ALWAYSSSSS break out with any normal sunscreen but this has been a gem. No break outs. It’s a little pricey but a little goes a long way! Invest in your akin early ladies.
This sunscreen is amazing. The consistency is like primer and sits very well under makeup. I love putting it on my face every morning, it makes it easier to remember to put on sunscreen!

Loved the feeling, broke me out! I was so excited to use it on a trip and a day or two after using it, I noticed I was breaking out from it. everything else that I've used stayed the same except that. I had to give it away and I was so excited to try it out!

So sad about this product because I really wanted to like it. I have super oily skin, so I thought this would be perfect for me as most other sunscreens make me look greasy and gross. I love wearing makeup, so having skincare that doesn't pill is a must for me. Unfortunately, this sunscreen pills like crazy on me. I thought that maybe it was the combination of this and some other product so I eliminated all the unnecessary skincare and just used moisturizer. I tried it over tatcha, FAB, la mer, and fresh, but this sunscreen still pilled up!! Don't recommend for makeup lovers, but instead recommend the Everyday Sunscreen also by Supergoop. That one doesn't pill and blocks both UVA / UVB really well. It does look greasy when you apply but after powdering, it lasts and is fine for the entire day.
I’ve been using a retinol product so I needed to start adding a sunscreen. This sunscreen is a primer and sunscreen combined. I love it and use it every single day.

I tried VERY hard to use a mineral/physical-only sunscreen for months. I used four different kinds, including Supergoop’s mineral formula, but none worked. So I switched to Unseen Sunscreen and it has impressed my socks off. If you are prone to oily skin or breakouts, the silicone in this might clog your pores. But it is indeed invisible and I compare it to the old Smashbox primers. The downside is that it is on the pricey side, but worth all your pennies if you’re a woman of color!
reviews.review_title: Sunscreen that is like a primer

reviews.review_text: I used this as a primer for double insurance. But when I tried to use it as a sunscreen (about 4~5 times of usage compared to use it as a primer), it made me felt like someone put a plastic bag on my head, and only leave two holes for my nose.

I’d been searching high and low for a non-comedogenic face sunscreen for the better part of 2 years before I found this. I’ve had both BCC and melanoma on my face and neck, so quality sunscreen is exceptionally important to me. It sits well on my face, has only the faintest smell that dissipates after a few minutes, and hasn’t caused any redness or breakouts at all. A must in my skincare routine that I’ll be continuing to order for a long time to come.
So nice. I live in south Florida and my t-zone gets super sunburnt but is really oily. This stuff is light and is absorbed right into the skin. Definitely would recommend
My all time favorite sunscreen. It doesn't leave my face feeling greasy or shiny. It goes on clear and matte. It's perfect as a makeup primer too .

I really wanted to love this product. I have oily, acne-prone skin and loved that this was a primer and sunscreen in one. Unfortunately, it seems to have clogged my pores and caused some breakouts. I’ve been breaking out a lot recently and assumed that it was dairy or hormones, but I seemed to get new spots regardless of my cutting out dairy or not being on my period. I suspect it’s the dimethicone. Anyway, as much as I liked this product, it didn’t work for me.
I normally hate putting on sunscreen and this actually makes me want to use sunscreen!
Smooths skin out, makes skin matte and ready for makeup. No white residue.
I liked this product it does what it’s supposed to doesn’t smell too strong....my only issue is it still made my face oily throughout the day.

This is a great sunscreen. No white cast, no greasy and oily feeling, and lasts well under makeup!
I recommend wearing with a layer of moisturizer underneath
I love this product! The smoothness, application, and the way it works! Living in Phoenix - definitely need the SPF! And it’s nice that it’s not a heavy feeling!

Feels amazing! Moisturizes and does not smell like sunscreen, which I think is awesome; specially when using it everyday. 
It goes on super smooth and doesn’t feel oily, indeed at first I felt like I wasn’t putting anything on, until I got used to it. 
Definitely works too, as my face didn’t get burnt at all while exposed to the sun!

I’ve only been using this for a week but FINALLY a sunscreen that doesn’t add weight or texture to my skin and doesn’t make my brown skin look ashy. It’s a truly transparent formula that goes on very lightly and I cannot tell I have it on. It has very little scent. Very happy with this and makes it easy to include in my regimen every day.

This product contains silicone, which can cause milia (little white heads on the skin) with constant use. Silicone is comedogenic (clogs pores). If you have acne prone skin, I would not recommend this product.
reviews.review_title: This product does not have good ingredients.

reviews.review_text: I wear this EVERYDAY!  Love it, will never leave home without it.  If this is available as a sample or I can buy the small size version, I pass them out to friends because it is sooooooooooo good!  I have tried everything on the market for the last 25 years, nothing compares.
reviews.review_title: The best sunscreen, awesome primer as well

reviews.review_text: The aging my face has undergone from sun damage is better than the toxic crap that could have entered my system to prevent sun damage.  But NOW behold !!! I can wear sun screen thanks to this wonderful non-toxic cream.  I love it.  Wore it on my latest trek fishing in Canada.  Safe and happy am I.  Thank you SUPERGOOP
Works great. My new favorite sunscreen. No white film and it’s weightless, It’s bleandable with your foundation
Love this stuff. No shiny oily looking face. It dries matte. It works.

I wanted to love this product. It goes on with a nice mat finish. It's light and clean. I took it OB vacation and used it on my sun and nephew on their face. I reapplied every 30 minutes. We all burned on our faces. I had to return it.

I'm sure I'm not the only person to say this after trying Unseen, but it is seriously the BEST sunscreen I've ever used on my face. It goes on like a light lotion and it's completely invisible. Completely. I had a skin cancer scare this year, and need to wear SPF 40 when out in the sun. My skin is sensitive and I have trouble with most sunscreen products. They itch and irritate, and make my face look ghostly pale. Not this one. I apply it over my moisturizer, it's literally "unseen," and it keeps my face from burning. So grateful to have found this sunscreen.
reviews.review_title: The BEST sunscreen for the face!

reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this sunscreen. The texture is like a primer and it does not feel heavy when layered over a cream. I haven't noticed more breakouts than usual, so that's good.
Best SPF I’ve ever used. Super lightweight, doesn’t add shine or make my oily skin any more oily, feels like nothing and layers well under and over other products perfectly.
Apart from the price, great product— the only non greasy sunscreen I have found

I really like this product! It's so easy to use and blends well with other makeup that it makes applying daily SPF so easy. I will say that I notice a bit more of a greasy residue on my face by midday when I swear this product (nothing blotting papers won't fix), and I don't recall that same issue with the regular Supergood sunscreen (as opposed to the unseen).
Next time I buy, I'll probably go back to their regular sunscreen, but I'm overall happy with this product.

This is my absolute favorite sunscreen!! I wanted something that I could add to my established skin care routine, something that was light but worked well. My cheeks and tops of my ears always burn in the sun and this does its job well. The formula is light enough to go over a moisturizer without feeling like you’ve done 3 extra steps. I can’t recommend it highly enough!!
reviews.review_title: Perfect to add to your skincare routine

reviews.review_text:
I received this at first as a free sample, but when I tried it, I instantly saw my face looked so good, without open pores, without a greasy look. 
Its a great product for oily skin! Its a must have

I own at least two other sunscreen products by Supergoop so  it's suffice to say I like them.  I bought this also for the priming benefit and that it has no color.  So far, it works very well.  My skin does not react negatively to it.  It goes on clear and smooth.  It does slightly keep my makeup on longer and tiny bit less oily.  I also like to use it over makeup occasionally when I need to reapply my sunscreen.  What I don't like about it is that it feels like silicon and I hate silicon feel, but that, I could live with if Supergoop makes the same version in mineral format, that'd be so great!
reviews.review_title: Good until I find clear mineral alternative!

reviews.review_text: Love this sunscreen! Lightweight and smooth application.
Great sunscreen, does exactly what it's supposed to without feeling or smelling gross. Good price point and you don't need a lot for full face coverage.
I love this product. Very light on skin. I bought 6 to givft my friends n relative
reviews.review_title: Love this sunscreen. Non greasy not sticky

reviews.review_text: Made me break out. I use the foundations from this brand and my skin is fine. I have sensitive combination skin.

I’m really impressed by this product! I love that it’s completely clear and doesn’t leave a white cast. It’s also weightless! Doesn’t feel like I have sunscreen on my face at all. It also doesn’t clog my pores.

I have bought this product 3 times and love how truly sheer it is. I don’t burn easily but spent 45 minutes riding my bike after applying this product generously and I got sunburnt. It was my first time putting it to the test and I wasn’t even sweating.
I love this sun screen. It leaves my face smooth and silky and gets the job done.

It feels like a primer than the usual sunscreen. I hate wearing sunscreen because it makes me feel sticky and hot. But this is hands down- the best sunscreen out there. It makes my makeup stays well and I don’t mind wearing it at all. Beautiful product.
reviews.review_title: I can’t believe this is a sunscreen

reviews.review_text: Super bummed I decided to try this sunscreen. I’ve been using all the wrong products and being too harsh w my skin so I got rid of almost all of my skin care products and started fresh and in just a few weeks my skin has been the best it’s been in years and years!! The only thing I was missing was an spf moisturizer and I liked that this one was clean, high spf and helped w blue light defense etc. In ONE day of using this I have AT LEAST 10 pimples!!! I used it before work and this all happened before 5 pm. As bad as my skin is sometimes I’ve never had a product cause acne in the span of 8 hrs?! Everyone’s skin is different but if you tend to break out I would stay away!!
Love it! Makes no difference whether I’m going light or heavy on my makeup, feels like I never put it on. And of course it works well.

I have combo/oily sensitive acne-prone skin and have tried every sunscreen under the sun and have been giving this sunscreen a fair shot all summer long. PROS: truly lightweight! It feels like vaseline when it comes out of the tube but once it's on you don't even notice it and dries down pretty matte. I can get pretty teary-eyed when it comes to sunscreens and this did not make my eyes water. No white cast and minimal greasiness. No pilling. A little bit goes a long way. CONS: Made me break out badly especially on the cheeks but I kept using it because of the price and because I was excited that it was so lightweight. This was my first supergoop product I've tried so maybe the other ones will be better.

I bought this after much consideration and looking into so many and I definitely made the right choice. I wear makeup daily and wear it under my makeup and have no issues. I also have sensitive skin and it doesn't irritate my skin at all. I def recommend!!

I'm torn. I really enjoy all of the benefits of this SPF, especially the fact that it helps protect against blue light (working on a computer all day and using a cell phone - it just got me excited). I don't know if it's because of what skincare I use underneath this, but it pills! It's not A LOT of pilling, but it definitely is there after I apply this. I just cleanse my face, apply my toner, serum and moisturizer, and add this on top. I don't think I'll be repurchasing...
reviews.review_title: I don't know how to feel...

reviews.review_text: Love the texture and you can tell it’s there. It would be great if they come up with higher SPF
This gave me an allergic reaction... got tiny pimples on my face neck and arms from this (also applied on my arms to make sure that this was what caused an allergic reaction)

I love that fact that this product doubles as both a sunscreen and makeup primer. 

It feels light and airy. Definitely a staple. I use this everyday.

This is probably Supergoop!'s best product. It's weightless, colorless, works well without leaving that usual greasy feel like other SPF products, and can be used alone or as a primer for makeup. What's not to love?
reviews.review_title: The Best SPF Product in my opinion.

reviews.review_text: Love this as sunscreen and would purchase again. With me being African American I look for a colorless clear sunscreen, I hate having the white/purplish cast on my face. This does not give me a cast. Feels light weight like nothing is this. Haven’t used it as a primer. I also add a primer if I’m wearing makeup.
This is great. I am deep dark and this does not give me a cast. I like the feel

I've been using this since May 2019 and I love the feel of this sunscreen! I actually enjoy putting it on, which is important because I've liked other sunscreens in the past, but the amount of effort needed to get them on would be so off-putting that sometimes I wouldn't even bother. However, this sunscreen is so smooth and comfortable, and even gives a nice glow! Definitely worth the price.
Lightweight sunscreen that does its job. Doesn’t leave a film on skin or even notice that you added sunscreen onto your daily routine. Favorite of all the supergoop products.

I have combination oily sensitive skin. At first I loveeee the texture of it, very similar to smashbox primer. However, it broke me out occasionally because the silicone clogged my pores. I apply it on cleaned face every morning alone, no moisterizer needed. This tube lasted me almost a year, I will not repurchase it unfortunately
The first time I tried this clear gel I hated it. Now I’m on my 4th bottle. I love how quickly it absorbs and how gentle it is. I use it all the time under my makeup.

I use this product everyday, both on its own and under makeup. I was skeptical about using it as a primer but it really does grip my makeup, even when I'm wearing a dewy or natural finish foundation. I find that it layers well and doesn't pill or alter any foundation I use over it. Best facial sunscreen I've come across so far!

This sunscreen goes on clear and sinks into the skin nicely without feeling heavy or greasy. I have olive skin and live in Florida - lasted all day. No white cast, which is very important to me (and I’m sure everyone). I’d recommend.

Not for oily skin. I have SUPER oily skin. Like... visible oil on my face in two hours skin. This product makes my matte foundation break apart. I could literally just wipe off ALL my foundation with a tissue after about 4 hours. I’ve tried this product multiple times, but I’m done. It makes my skin just oily beyond control.
Love this! It has a light smell that reminds me of cocoa butter and it goes on so smoothly! Has been my favorite primer that I have used so far!
Great sunscreen. No white cast and leave a dry touch matte finish.

I LOVE this product. We all know how important SPF is and always hear how we *have* to use it to protect our skin from damage, but it's so hard to find something that isn't greasy or thick or something that makes us break out. This sunscreen....does not. I've used it daily for months now and it goes down like primer, so lightweight and soft to the touch. I work in concert production, pushing around tour cases in the sun and it STILL doesn't melt off. Worth every penny (and the bottle lasts 2-3 months!)
reviews.review_title: Best face sunscreen ever made ever

reviews.review_text: It feels nice on the skin and my face has never gotten burnt when I’m wearing it. I don’t even reapply it a few hours in either.
None

I was so excited to try this product as I’ve been looking for a primer and SPF to wear under my makeup. 
While it applies nicely... 2 days into wearing it I realized it was giving me cystic acne on my chin, cheek, and forehead. Nothing else changed in my routine other than this product. Very disappointed... especially since I JUST got rid of almost all my acne scarring from YEARS of getting facials. Thanks for the new scars!
Very expensive but a bit goes a long way on this. The only sunscreen that has no white cast and that doesn’t make me look greasy!

I had high hopes for this. I've been using it for a few weeks. It pills under my powder and leaves my face feeling greasy for a little bit but I figured you can't have it all esp with invisible sunblock. Lately though, my face is breaking out and since starting to use this, im noticing emerging dark spots on my cheeks. Be careful if you try this. The hype might not be worth it.
The texture of this is great, feels like nothing on at all. Also acts like nothing on at all. I used this after a Drs. laser treatment for Rosacea. I did a few errands on the way home( In
reviews.review_title: Worse than nothing, as you think you are protected

reviews.review_text: wow is just it! I have been looking everywhere for a sunscreen that doesn’t make me even more oily than I already am and this is it. Living in AZ means you really have to wear your sunscreen everyday to protect your skin so finding the best spf was my mission, I tried drugstore ones but they were too oily and shiny until I tried this for my 100 points, I just bought the regular size today! It doesn’t smell strong, it’s literally a matte pore filling primer! I’ll never use anything else again.
reviews.review_title: BEST SPF I HAVE EVER TRIED

reviews.review_text: Goes on light, isn't greasy and layers nicely under makeup but causes me to break out if I use it as a daily sunscreen (leaving it on all day). Works fine for workouts knowing I'll end up washing it off after a short wear.

I am completely obsessed with this sunscreen! I am a brown girl with super oily and acne prone skin. This sunscreen does not leave a white cast, doesn't make my skin oily and hasn't broken me out yet. I've been using this over my Clinique moisturizer and the two pair perfectly well. I have not tried this under make up yet but the texture of this sunscreen feels like a primer so I have no reason to believe that it will not sit flawlessly under makeup. I have finally found a sunscreen that I want to reapply every two hours! I absolutely love it and could not recommend it enough.

Buy it. Feels silky on skin like a high end primer and absorbs quickly. Easily worn under makeup or alone at the beach. I wish it came in a larger size for beach use because go through it quickly with reapplication.

I really love the idea of clear sunscreen but I just cannot like the texture of silicone on my face for some reason. Also if you don’t let it sit for a minute before foundation, it may crumble depends on the type of foundation that you may want to make sure it works well with your foundation.

Really confused over all the positive reviews... Thankfully I only spent 100 points on this product as a sample size. Initially I was very hopeful because most sunscreens leave me looking gray since I have medium skin. This product lives up to its "unseen" marketing which is great but not at the expense of oily makeup and a painful breakout! I have extremely dry skin so I have no idea how this made me oilier than usual. My experience also does not align with the claim that it leaves a "velvety matte" finish. My skin is also very clear and I don't usually get painful under the skin zits. I knew right away this product was the culprit because it was the only thing that changed from my usual routine and I felt the breakout coming on as the day progressed with me having this product under my makeup. Haven't had a breakout since. Also nowhere on the packaging does the product say non-comedogenic or dermatologist tested but yet their website FAQs claim it is... very strange. DO NOT RECOMMEND if you have sensitive skin.

A great sunscreen. There is no white cast and it does absorb into your skin quite easily. I do notice that some days it does make my skin oily so that’s why I gave it 4 stars. Doesn’t always stay matte on your face under makeup. Can make you a bit oily in the summer month. Will have to see how it holds up during the winter months.

I love this sunscreen bc unlike most sunscreens, it doesn’t look or feel greasy on my face. There’s a lot of product, it’ll last you 6 months of frequent use. 

I had an excersize class (more like a boot camp) where I had to be outside for 5 hours, 4 days a week. This sunscreen was perfect.

The only downside is that it doesn’t last long and doesn’t stop my face from getting oily

This is holy grail material. The product itself is invisible when applied and is so smooth and matte that I can’t even feel it on my face. It’s kind of hard to explain but it just glides on and I have to double check all the areas of my face to make sure I’ve got everything covered. It has the *slightest* sunscreen smell (which I personally enjoy). Love, love, love!

Absolutely love the texture of this sunscreen. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I just found out it's not pregnancy safe. Will definitely be switching back to it once this baby pops out!
This stuff is amazing! It doesn’t feel oily on your skin. It’s like a matte “unseen” finish. Works well under makeup. No complaints. Great stuff!
reviews.review_title: Great Stuff! Not oily at all!

reviews.review_text: I’d love to give this 5 stars- it goes on well and is not greasy. However it doesn’t provide protection! We got this for our trip to England. Several times we were only out an hour, had applied this sunscreen generously and we all still got burned faces. Such a disappointment! I cannot advise this for any real sun protection.
None

I wondered why the texture was so nice and slippy and it’s because it has dimethicone in it ?? I didn’t think Clean at Sephora stuff had that, I’m not super weird about chemicals but I don’t like putting that in my face tbh. This is a nice sunscreen otherwise tho, feels good going on and plays well w makeup

This sunscreen is incredible. It has no scent, is completely clear, has such a smooth texture, and plays great under makeup. It’s very much worth the price, and if you’re looking for a great sunscreen, this is it.
It clogged my pores and caused me to have horrible breakouts on my forehead the day after.

I have been looking for a sunscreen because my esthetician said its something that should be included in your morning regimen. I tried a few sunscreens, drug store and high-end within a 6 month period. I would break out or my skin would get irritated. I finally tried supergoop and i was pleased with everything about this product. I do have sensitive skin and it didn't irritate my skin at all, there is no scent so that's also a plus for me. This is very lightweight, it doesn't have a whitecast so it doesn't affect the look of your makeup. Also, makeup does apply very smoothly over this. I have been using this as my primer as well. Nothing bad to say about this product, its a great purchase and worth every dollar.
