This is the best sunscreen I’ve used but let’s remember that the bar is pretty low. It doesn’t leave the white streak or as much of the oiliness that usual sunscreen leaves but it’s still pretty oily. Other than that, it’s pretty invisible & very lightweight.
This sunscreen is amazing! Has the same consistency of a face primer and doesn't leave an oily residue.

I really really love this product. My favorite is that it is invisible and so smooth and soft. I have been looking for a sunscreen that does not irritate my face and i have finally found it! My new favorite and essential product.
I am a very picky when it comes to sunscreen but this product has exceeded all of my expectations! It doesn't have a scent, isn't oily and feels weightless. No more cringing when applying sunscreen.
reviews.review_title: Where has this been all my life?!

reviews.review_text: Disappointed. This product feels almost like a primer and it is completely invisible. However, it is still not comfortable for me. It gave me a very bad cystic acne breakout and my makeup does not go on over this. $32 for such a small amount of product is insane. Not impressed.
Absolutely the best.  I love this product. It makes my makeup last longer and helps with pores, just like a primer, despite the fact that it protects you against the sun.
Finally a sunscreen that feels amazing to put on, very silky and disappears instantly. Happy I found a sunscreen I love that I look forward to putting on every day.

I have oily, acne prone skin, work outside and wear a full face of makeup every day. So the pros: 
goes on very smooth and velvety to the touch. 
blended in quickly
clear
matte finish

cons: 
noticed makeup separation
made my lips SUPER dry and flakey- I only applied to my face but because of sweating and such it would transfer. I'm not talking a little dry I mean every day non stop my lips would peel. The only thing that stopped it was by stop using this sunscreen.

I heard others rave about this product and I get it.  It comes on clear, feels like a silicone primer and it’s supposed to protect your skin.  It’s not cakey and does not leave a white ghost trace on your skin.  You can apply makeup and look great.  My daughter also loves this product since it goes on clear.   Would have given the product a 5 if it had titanium dioxide.  Will repurchase.
Great sunscreen.  Very lightweight and smooth.  Great scent.

This is the best thing in face sun protection in my opinion!! It is so light when you squeeze it out of the tube and put on your face. Feels like you’re spreading a light silicone cloud on your face. From someone who tends to break out from oily sunscreens, I spent most of my 20s refusing to put product on my face in fear of spending the rest of the week battling pimples. Now that I’m in my early 30s and my job requires me to be in the sun daily, I’ve noticed some dark spots appearing on my face from sun damage. This SPF has tremendously changed my mind on wearing sun protection on my face and makes me truly feel like I’m wearing nothing but ready to take better care of my skin for this next decade of sun exposure! Anyone that I’ve had try this stuff has been happy with the texture and the protection! Definitely a staple in my outdoor bag!
reviews.review_title: A must have for anyone in the sun!!

reviews.review_text: This is incredible! Even though it's pricey, it doesn't clog pores and it doubles as a make up primer. SuperGoop! should market it as a primer with SPF because that's how amazing it is. It's great for sensitive skin and I LOVE that it protects against harmful UVA rays.

I got this sunscreen because I thought it would work with my sensitive skin. I was mostly right! It goes on easy and doesn't leave any greasy or shiny skin in its wake. As actual sun protection, it works. For my very sensitive skin, pretty good. I had mild breakouts after using it.
Very light. It feels like a smooth primer. It's clear and non greasy. There's no scent to it.

No white residue
No fragrance 
Not a oily finish but a slight sheen present even after applying  foundation so not good if your going for a Matt finish look.
Does not feel like a soffocating layer of product sitting on my skin 
Silky smooth feel that does feel like a regular primer foundation applies nicely and looks great. 
Highly recommend this to all but especially darker skin tones.
reviews.review_title: No residue or fragrance, perfect for darker skin

reviews.review_text: I was in Mexico where its dry and you're outside most of the time. I used this as a primer and let me tell you I DID NOT GET SUNBURNED and keeps makeup in place
Love love love this sunscreen! It never makes me feel oily like a lot of others do and it works very well! A daily must for me!
Excellent sunscreen for tan skin, works great underneath makeup and feels nice on skin.

wow I love how this applies! it absorbs so quickly and leaves no streaks. one star off because it's not a lot for the price, since I use it daily, it has been a month and I'm almost out. Wish they had this product in a larger value size.

This is a great sunscreen and does exactly what is promised: it is light,  invisible and acts as a perfect primer. I love it, this is my second one and my friends have already listen to me and bought it.

This is a nice sunscreen that leaves a silicone smooth finish. However, it can pill up really badly if you're not careful. My mom tried it out and looked like her skin was peeling off when she put on her foundation. I've only had a few small problems, usually when I don't give it enough time to dry and set. It lasts well throughout the day and hasn't given my sensitive skin any problems
reviews.review_title: You have to work with it

reviews.review_text: None
Wore this product while camping. My skin never felt sticky or greasy. Works great as a primer under my make up.

I have to say I was skeptical because I have tried so many SPFs spent big bucks and by end of day I would feel greasy. When u are at work you cannot stop and go wash ur face to feel clean. Who has time for that but I bought the trial size and I have to say I’m in love with this brand. I’m really oily and by end of day using this SPF I’m okay and I love this particular one from Supergoop!!!
My new go to!  Goes on easy with no streaking, also non gteasy feeling.   I have used in swimming and it works great!
I love this product! I live in Florida and we need sunscreen year round.  This works as a great primer and sunscreen all in one.

I love this entire company, but I really specifically love this product. It feels silky going on and finishes as a matte base. It’s also the only product I have found that gets me through the day without a burn and doesn’t clog my pores.

This applies really well and absorbs quickly. Sunscreen is SO VITAL for longterm skin health, but traditional sunscreen is not friendly as a base layer underneath powder or cream foundation. This Unseen Sunscreen is a night and day difference from traditional SPF. It glides on silky, absorbs quickly, and layers well under makeup without pilling or smearing. I will say that I find myself looking shinier much more quickly when I wear this than I otherwise would, but an extra layer of finishing powder is well worth it for sun protection! Easy re-application, as well.
reviews.review_title: Feels more like a primer than a sunscreen!

reviews.review_text: LOVE this product! Why did I ever use anything else??? This sunscreen is effective, light, non-oily, and acts as a great canvas for me to apply makeup. My face is so smooth after applying this sunscreen.

Super lightweight sunscreen! This is the perfect product to add to your skincare routine without the gunk. The formula is gel-like and glides smoothly over your skin. A little goes a very long way. I highly recommend it to anyone who needs extra protection from the sun. You can barely feel it when its on!

This is a great product . I am 44 years old, recovering from adult acne and 9 months is to aggressive course of correction and treatment with my dermatologist. I love in sunny California and have done extensive traveling and this summer, spending many days outdoors. I also have combination, leaning towards oily, skin. 
This has been a saving grace. No film, no cast, non greasy and works great under makeup or alone.
Love this sunscreen for my face! So light and dry feeling. Doesn’t make me break out.
reviews.review_title: First face sunscreen I have ever liked!

reviews.review_text: Being super fair, I usually just keep covered rather than deal with sunscreen. This summer has been a hot one so I pulled this out of my loot from last year's Sephoria and loved it. It goes on so easily and absorbs. It does not get on  my clothes or my Tesla seats like everything else I used to have. Already repurchased this gem. Bottle seems small but this lasts.

I get the hype!  After just one use, I am officially a convert to this sunscreen.  It goes on clear and smooth with zero residue, works great under makeup, and has no smell.  It's absolutely worth the money, and I will repurchase again and again.
None

This sunscreen is amazing - no grease, no stinging, works like a primer and is absolutely invisible.  My make-up stays all day.  Got this as a free sample, and 3 days later ordered the full size because I couldn't imagine living without it.
Absolutely love it! I wear it everyday and I always forget I'm wearing it. I put on a bit of powder and blush on top and my skin is glowing all day (not in a greasy way!).
I absolutely loved this sunscreen. It really lives up to the name unseen sunscreen. Not greasy at all and blended into my skin seamlessly.

OK, so...i have been anti-sunscreen a long long time. i have come to a point in my life where i need to be wearing it to avoid further sun damage. i was visiting my friend in texas-100 degrees, humidity in the high 90s, while shopping for sunscreen. i was prepared to hate, no matter how good. this stuff though...is truly humidity proof. goes on nicely, then feels like our favorite high dollar primer is on. makeup goes on smooth, stays on. no stinging! stays on, no bad smell. i am a fan!

I had no idea what this would be like when I first applied it, and if I'm honest I thought "huh this can't be real sunscreen". But it went on my arms and hands so easily, and feels like air. You don't feel like you need to wash your hands immediately. And I didn't get sunburn so I really can't complain! I'll have to get a bigger container next time!
Used it yesterday and woke up with tons of whiteheads and clogged pores. Same thing I get from other products with dimethicone. Nothing else changed in my routine.  Luckily it was a sample.
I don’t know what’s in this but I’ve gotten sunburned the 3x‘s I’ve worn it. I’ve also been experiencing Whiteheads all over my face. A BIG NO

This sunscreen goes on like a primer and leaves my skin looking airbrushed with a matte finish. I have super sensitive skin so it took a long time to find something that didn’t cause itching and redness but I’ve had no issues with this. It doesn’t smell like anything which for me is a positive. 

The bottle lasted 2 months with daily use. Other reviews said theirs lasted longer but I apply this everywhere from my shirt’s neckline upward. I didn’t used to do this but I’m in my 30’s and was starting to notice my neck aging faster than my face! 

My only concern with this is that it’s a chemical sunscreen rather than a physical one. I just bought the Supergoop mineral version and I’ll review that when I near the end of the bottle.
reviews.review_title: I actually look forward to wearing this

reviews.review_text:
I was amazed the very first time I tried this sunscreen. No white cast, smooth silky texture! I thought I finally found the perfect sunscreen of my life...Now that was with no make up over this sunscreen. Second day, I put on Nars foundation over this and it was pilling. My makeup would not set the way it normally would. So I washed off everything and started all over. This time I applied hourglass foundation over the sunscreen and it did not pill but after about an hour my skin started to get oily. 
To make the long story short, I tried this sunscreen many different ways, with different lotion, different setting powders. In all honesty, it just didn’t do well with any of my makeup combinations. It was best with no makeup.
I give 1 star because after using it for about a month, I can see my left side of my face has became darker from driving. Which means this sunscreen really didn’t help with the sun protection as it claims. It might just be a great primer for some but not as a sunscreen. I’m starting to think any sunscreen that has a primer bonus might not be effective as just pure sunscreen.
reviews.review_title: This is a primer, not a sunscreen!

reviews.review_text:
hard to find anything badabout this sunscreen   
except maybe the price per ounce.

pros: clear primer-like sunscreen , seems to fill in pores
makes a perfect base for daytime makeup, ihad no negative skin reaction to it, because its clear it has almost a silicone primer effect (not sure if it has silicone in it)
there is absolutely no whitecast when applied, does not look greasy when applied 

cons: expensive price for small tube , if you were to use this everyday you'd spend a fortune on it.

I am in love with this SPF. I have very fair skin, and I burn almost immediately when I go outside; so spf is a daily necessity. Most spfs break me out, and/or are super greasy. NOT THIS ONE! This one disappears into my skin, isn’t greasy or shiny at all, keeps my oily skin looking matte, doesn’t break me out, and protects me from the sun beautifully. I’ve found my holy grail facial sunscreen.

I like the silicone-y texture of this product as well as the amount of protection it provides, but after using it once (after moisturizer and before makeup), I had tiny bumps under the skin all over my face, particularly on the apples of my cheeks. Took forever to heal! Would not recommend!
reviews.review_title: Avoid if you have sensitive skin!!!

reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and did mot think this would work. I tried it anyway and im obsessed!! So light weight and looks amazing under make up or alone

The real mvp for keeping oil at bay all day. This is the only thing that I’ve tried that has worked with and without makeup. Also excellent for women of color because the substance is clear and does not leave a white cast. Easily sinks into skin upon application.
My favorite sunscreen! It blends in so well and doesn't have an obnoxious smell.
Love this formula. It feels so light underneath your makeup and doesn't leave a white undertone. It has the same feel and texture of the Smashbox Photo Finish Primer! Love this sunscreen!

Finding an untinted face sunscreen that doesn't sting your eyes is... difficult. I mean, sweat happens! My sister serendipitously recommended this sunscreen to me shortly before I traveled to Europe, and I used it almost every day. (I used an SPF'd foundation the first couple of days, but I was sweating so much that it wasn't worth the effort to pretend to look fancy.)

Does this sunscreen work? YES.

I applied it in the mornings before venturing out for all-day adventures. I reapplied once on days that involved the beach and water to the face. Unlike my shoulders (and an unfortunate strip on my back), my face never burned. Not even a little.

Now, I am a pale, indoorsy, Irish-heritage'd type who burns before tanning, so if there had been a burn, it would have been quite obvious (dare I say... painfully obvious?).

BUT MY FACE DID NOT BURN. Equally as important, MY EYES DID NOT BURN. It was humid, the heat index was 100  (F, not C), and I was outside for-ev-er for a week-plus. Sweat happened. Burning eyes and skin did not. This is basically a miracle, because there were days that my jean shorts were completely soaked through. (With sweat. It's exactly as gross as it sounds.)

This sunscreen's dimethicone-y aspects make it easy-peasy to apply. A dollop the size of a rather large pea usually takes care of my entire face. There's no extra shine and no stickiness (#bless).

Is this product perfect? Alas, no. I am sensitive of skin, so consistently applying anything (besides my daily moisturizer) will eventually lead to some surface unhappiness. So, as excellent as this sunscreen is, let your skin take a break every so often.

If you're about to sweat it out, give this a try. You might be pleasantly surprised (and gloriously unburned!).
reviews.review_title: Protection From the Adriatic Sun? Check!

reviews.review_text: This sunscreen is amazing. I knew I needed to wear sunscreen, but it was so difficult to find one that didn’t leave a residue, was easy to use with or without makeup, and didn’t give me breakouts. This one checks all your boxes. It’s incredibly soft, it’s clear, and it doesn’t feel heavy!

I have dry sensitive skin and whenever I have applied sunscreen, regardless of brand it always irritated my skin and I end up with dry patches and patches of skin that burns when I put on moisturizer. The only thing that has worked for me so far was moisturizers that included sunscreen but with SPF of 30 or less. I was always looking for something with higher SPF. I purchased this recently and I wore it everyday, no irritation at all and it did not dry my skin out after use. It smoothes out my skin and grips my foundation beautifully. I cannot say enough good things about thid product and I look forward to putting this product on. It was very frustrating not finding a high SPF suncreen that worked for me and I am SO happy Supergoop came along with this product. This is going to be on my re-purchase list for a long time.

I've never burned while out in the sun for extended periods, and it doesn't sweat off easily. I have oily, acne prone skin and pores that clog very easily and this doesn't mess with my skin at all. Yes to everything about this. I never thought that sunscreen would end up being one of my favorite products to apply but this is such a wonderful part of my routine. It's more than a sunscreen to me since it also leaves my skin looking bright and dewy. To anyone on the fence, I'd definitely go for it, it's not like any other sunscreen I've tried.
I love this sunscreen! Easy and effective way to ensure sunscreen is applied daily. Layers perfectly under makeup.

was excited at first. . .then i looked up the ingredients....here's what i found.  

￼

0

￼

What Is Avobenzone and Is It Safe In Sunscreen?

Avobenzone was introduced in the 1990s and is a common chemical sunscreen. Unlike other chemical sunscreens that just protect from the sunburn-causing UVB rays, avobenzone also protects from UVA rays, the rays that cause premature aging and skin cancer. This chemical is given a two rating by the EWG. So what’s wrong with avobenzone? It seems like a safe sunscreen, right?￼

What’s wrong with avobenzone?

Avobenzone, by itself, is relatively safe in terms of toxicity, but it breaks down quickly in the sun. Once exposed to the sun, avobenzone alone only offers about 30 minutes of protection.[i] Since UVA rays are the sneaky rays that do their damage deep within the layers of your skin, you wouldn’t even know it until many years later.

Why is avobenzone used in sunscreen?

So maybe you’re asking why they don’t they just use an ingredient that is better friends with the sunshine. We wish we knew! Because many chemical sunscreen companies still use avobenzone for UVA protection, they then have to add not-so-safe chemicals like octocrylene to make it work longer than 30 minutes.[ii] Octocrylene helps stabilize avobenzone, which is good, but it is a known endocrine disruptor that also releases free radicals.[iii] Not good. Skin sample tests showed there were more free radicals when using octocrylene than skin exposed to the sun with no sunscreen at all.[iv] And remember, free radicals, also known as reactive oxygen species (ROS), can damage skin cells and increase the risk for cancer and other health issues.[v]

get this!!! its so lightweight you cant even tell its on. if anything it makes your pores less noticeable without clogging them. its great for my sensitive skin and doesn’t irritate it at all. so worth it

I love this for my face! I received it as a sample and used it on vacation. I hesitate to try new sunscreens as I can't stand the heavy feeling. This product blends flawlessly into the skin and is NOT heavy at all! I definitely recommend this to those who have tried a variety of sunscreens and were disappointed in the texture and amount of residue. This disappeared into my skin!
Love it. Goes on super easily and doesn’t leave any kind of residue on my skin.

I love everything about this sunscreen from the weightless feel to the nonexistent typical white residue associated with most sunscreens. I’ve struggled with finding a facial sunscreen and I like this one because of the silky texture, mild scent, and how it doesn’t leave your face feeling greasy and dried out from regular or matte sunscreens. I highly recommend giving this a try. The only downside is that this is not considered “reef safe” unlike the Supergoop! Matte version which I do not like as much as this.

I received the Unseen Sunscreen as a sample and then purchased the full size. I am very happy with this product as it does not leave white cast and it can be worn with or without make up. I would recommend this product because it can be used not only as a sunscreen, but as a primer as well.
reviews.review_title: The best sunscreen and primer for dry skin

reviews.review_text: This sunscreen is different in a good way. It has a primer Silicone feel to it that sinks into my skin right away and blends out to nothingness. I can’t feel it on my skin at all but it’s there. I used it when I went to the Texas beach on Sunday. I am a light skin red head with freckles so my skin burns easily. I only applied this once and didn’t burn. The only part of me that burned was the top of my head and a little of my forehead where I hadn’t put it on. I am buying the full size for sure.

I first moisturize my face, then I put on my primer then lastly the foundation. I was at the beach for 4+ hours and body got burned except my face. This sunscreen protected my face and this was what I really wanted.

being dark skin it's hard to find a sunscreen that doesn't leave that white cast across my face. plus I have super oily skin so many sunscreens are greasy and make me break out. this sunscreen melts into my face and drys down matte which I love. My face doesn't produce as much oil as it use to. I reapply in the afternoon and I'm good to go. love love love loooooove.
reviews.review_title: this is the best sun sun I've ever use!!!

reviews.review_text: This is amazing! Works perfectly under foundation and stays the whole day!

I was excited to try this product. Sunblock is a daily must for me. I thought this would be great because I was looking for something clear, without the white residue and I already have a tinted sunscreen I like (Coola). I wore this twice, not as a primer but bare faced just out and about running errands. Sadly, I am returning it. I felt like silicone was just sitting on my face. It was uncomfortable for me and left my mostly dry skin feeling like an oily silicone slick. Many people seem to like it so it’s just a matter of preference and what you want your skin to feel like.

Loved this sunscreen from the moment i sampled it. the gel-like consistency really does feel like there’s nothing there; i would compare it to the feeling of applying jojoba oil, which i have used on my face for years as a moisturizer and to tone down inflammation. it absorbs so easily into the skin! a little goes a long way, & it’s nice because it doesn’t leave a thick, greasy film on your face when you put it on NOR at the end of a day of wearing it. i was so used to that greasy feeling of sunscreen, and burning sensations on my dryer patches of skin, and horrible stinging affect in my eyes. i stopped using sunscreen for years. this sunscreen changed that though; it has never irritated my skin. it’s worth every penny!
reviews.review_title: sunscreen that actually feels like skincare

reviews.review_text: Best face sunscreen that I've used! It goes on very smooth and invisible, feels like a good primer. Well worth the cost IMO

Love this sunblock!! I used it for the first time while visiting my sister in Myrtle Beach, SC and I didn't burn all day. The formula is lightweight and hydrating. It absorbs quickly into the skin and works beautifully under makeup as a primer. Awesome!!!
Really nice consistency and texture under my makeup. Goes on very smoothly and my makeup stays on throughout the day.
Caused such a terrible reaction. Broke out in tiny bumps all over my face where I applied it. Pretty disappointed.

I love the texture of the product and you wouldn’t feel it on your skin once you have applied it  because it’s absorb pretty quick. Love this product and I might say that this among the best product for sunscreen that I’ve tried. If you are hesitance, don’t be. Your skin will thank you and you won’t regret it.

When I first received a trial size of this, I thought it was just a sunscreen. I'm a huge SPF girl, super pale, burn like bacon in a hot pan. So I wasn't at all opposed to getting a free sunblock, even if it was a tiny amount. Then, I went to apply some before my makeup and realized it was a primer. That honestly excited me sooooo much. Even more exciting was the fact that it preforms almost exactly like the Smashbox primer we all know and love. So not only is it a sunscreen, it's also an awesome primer. I've used this everyday this summer and the only other SPF product I've used on my face is the Tarteguard SPF powder and not only have I remained completely burn free while still spending quite a bit of time outdoors, I haven't darkened at all. I get most people probably want to be tan but I try my hardest to maintain a fair complexion year round for anti aging purposes. 10/10 combo. I'll continue to buy and use this every summer

This product is amazing from the feel of it to how it goes on it truly lives up to the “unseen” aspect. My only request is for Supergoop to make it bigger. For $32 I need a bigger bottle/tube with more product pronto.

I used to not like putting on sunscreen because it makes my face look extremely oily. Since I gotten older and wanna prevent my skin looking more youthful, I decided to give sunscreen a try again. This sunscreen is a game changer and I’m using it everyday! It doesn’t make my face feel oily and keeps my pores less visible.
I tried a dab on my arm and it gave me an allergic reaction, thats never happened to me with any product, so NOPE!
TOP product to protect the skin from the sun!  It is easy to apply, and absorbs immediately and does not leave the skin greasy!  I use it every day!
Got it in a Play! box, and stored it for months since I had a sunscreen at the time. I used and I wished I used it before.. its amazing! Ordering full size right now!

The formula feels great on the face, matte, not tacky or heavy. However... after spending less than two hours in the sun my face was burnt.
Not the most effective, and not sweat proof.
I have the full size and during this summer heat wave this has made me an oil slick

I wanted to love this but it made my skin break into a rash/tiny bumps that I suspect is a reaction to their formulation. It is similar to smash box primer—has a slick texture and it is clear which is a plus. I think if you’re blessed with naturally beautiful skin and not so sensitive this might work. I wanted the higher spf this product offers but not at the expense of having bumpy skin :( I think glossier is a good alternative if you are looking for that clear/transparent look. But for now I’ll stick to hourglass veil primer even with the low spf and whitish look...hope this helps

Pure GOLD!!! I literally just used this for the first time (it was just sitting there from my Playbox) and I am absolutely AMAZED! I have oily and acne prone skin, and I’m super leery of sunscreens because they’re so heavy and oily. This here is like a matte primer and sunscreen in one sha-bang. I will def be purchasing the big bottle!

This sunscreen is fantastic! I use it for the entire family on faces. It’s quick and easy to apply on my kids faces (ages 3 and 6 and always running full speed away from me when I pull out sunscreen). It leaves no white cast and feels completely silky and smooth once applied. My husband loves it also. So thankful to find a face sunscreen that can be applied with no breakouts and feels so nice on my skin. Easy to apply under make up also.
I love that it is so light, it doesn’t feel like you’re even wearing sunscreen. When I washed it off, my skin did get a little flaky but the next day it was fine. Overall I’d recommend.

I used this product 3 times and each time I had the worst breakout I have ever had, - in areas of my skin that I have never had an breakout before as well as the usual areas.

Although I used a small amount (less than the dime sized amount recommended) I found this product to be overly greasy and just sit on my skin.  By the end of the day I looked awful and this was despite blotting my skin on frequent occasions throughout the day.  I doubt there was any sun protection as a result of me having to blot and wipe away continuously.  Despite the expense I have now thrown this product in the trash.  Do not  recommend for acne-prone skin
I do like the texture of it, it’s very light amd not so greasy but Still Broke me out.. :(

This is the holy grail of sunscreens!  I've been using it for over a year, and have yet to develop a pimple (I have sensitive skin, and I sweat a lot on my face when I'm having hot flashes!).  Enter Unseen Sunscreen.  Super lightweight, and feels like silk going on, and it's super blendable.  You can do it without looking in the mirror, how many sunscreens can you say that about?  Foundation (I use liquid) glides right on over it, as if I just applied a primer.  I have many ways of wearing this sunscreen.  Sometimes, I use the Supergoop city sunscreen serum underneath, especially when I feel I need that extra layer of moisture.  That dries on quickly.  Then, I add a half and half  plop of Unseen Sunscreen and my liquid foundation (Sephora 10-hour), and mix them up on my fingers and apply to my face.  The whole process takes less than a minute, and my skin feels light, and non-greasy, with just the right amount of coverage.  If I'm heading out for outdoor activities I apply this without the foundation to get the maximum SPF from it.  My skin feels so dewy, yet not greasy! For full makeup coverage, I apply the foundation AFTER the Unseen Sunscreen.  I do that for events where I want full coverage makeup.  Love this goop!!
reviews.review_title: I will never use another sunscreen!

reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this sunscreen since I had read such great reviews online but it just didn’t work for me. The texture is non greasy  and works well under makeup. But just after a few uses and I can see that it has darkened my dark spots. Going back to physical sunscreens. I would not recommend it to people suffering from hyperpigmentation.
None
The only positive is that this sunscreen is clear and lives up to the "unseen" branding. But unlike the Supergoop Mineral Smooth
reviews.review_title: It's like smearing oil all over your face

reviews.review_text: Having white spots on my skin since a very young age, I have always had to apply large amounts of sunscreen. This is the best one I have ever used. Absorbs quick and I don't have to worry about it getting on my clothes and all over my car. Please Supergoop! make this in a gallon pump bottle. I would absolutely buy it.
I am addicted to this and all super goop products. It is so smooth, non greasy and protects my face even under my makeup. It is light and smells great too. Definitely a must for this Florida girl.
Tried multiple times with a break in between of days or weeks and breaks me out almost immediately. Sad because it’s clear and easy.

This. Stuff. Is. Awesome. 

I've never met a sunscreen that I could put on my face and it not break out in zits the next day and last for weeks. So I just didn't use it on my face. Ever.

This is the one that broke the mold. The texture is silky and reminiscent of the Too Faced Photo Finish Primer... I LOVE it! You can use it as a primer even, or over the top of makeup. It has a very faint sunscreen smell... just enough to make me think of summer (my favorite time), and not too much so you smell like a walking beach. 

Good coverage and protection, although it needs to be reapplied more than some mineral sunscreens. 

This will absolutely be my go-to sunscreen from now on.
I finally found an effective sunscreen for my oily skin with no white cast. It work wonderful under makeup too!

I'm an Esthetician and I hate sunscreen. I hate the oily feeling, I hate the white cast and it feeling like it is melting off my face. This sunscreen is the greatest I have ever used. It has a silicone feel, which I love. It isn't white, AT ALL, and it goes on so smooth. No oily feeling or look, no white cast. It applies so well under makeup. I will never stop using this product.

This product is so amazing! When it says "UNSEEN" they mean. It glides so softly on the safe. I walk to work every morning and I just feel so much better knowing my face is protected. You only need a dime sized amount and it works wonders! The price is worth it!
reviews.review_title: BEST every day sunscreen for face

reviews.review_text: I got this as part of a "try it kit" and while I normally prefer physical SPFs, my physical SPF of choice is not very water-resistant so I layered this underneath to guarantee protection on my vacation in Mexico (I knew I'd be very sweaty and wasn't sure if my physical SPF would hold up). It did the trick (didn't break me out, didn't burn my skin, etc.), but I still do prefer physical SPFs because they're gentler on the skin and are more photostable and protect better against UVA and UVB.

This sunscreen is clear and feels like a dimethicone primer, smoothing pores alone or under foundation. I wore this every day for 3 weeks in the Greek isles under a full face of makeup. It held up so much better than my body sunscreens (even a waterproof sport spf100!) so I started using this on my chest and shoulders instead. it's so great feeling on the skin, doesn't sweat off, keeps makeup in place, and protects the skin without breakouts even w daily use. best sunscreen for face I've ever found.
Makes my skin feels so soft and smooth! Perfect for under your makeup or used alone. It didn’t make me break out either. Finally found a sunscreen I feel good about using on my face!

BEST. SUNSCREEN. EVA...I cannot believe it didnt find this sooner! I battle with oiliness and breakouts with other sunscreens during the long summer months. This goes on smooth, never leaves my skin oily, and I've had zero breakouts. I also noticed I didn't have to re-apply it during the day. I have combination skin, and my face loves this stuff. A little goes a long way too, because it goes on like a clear, silicone product.  Love it.
Wow! Very lightweight and easy to use! I will certainly add to it to my skin routine
Sun protection is SO important and I've been trying to incorporate it into my routine more, so I was really excited to try
reviews.review_title: No-go for sensitive or acne-prone skin!

reviews.review_text: This is a really lovely sunscreen!! Normally my skin is sensitive to chemical sunscreens, but this one causes no irritation at all. I also generally have issues with my pores getting easily congested, and I am happy to say that this product has not clogged up my pores even after using daily for several weeks. The product does smooth out my skin like a primer would, which is so nice, however I will say that it doesn’t not really control oil or extend the wear of my makeup. I didn’t really expect it to, so I’m only taking one star off. Just be aware that it is an excellent sunscreen, protects beautifully and nicely smooths the skin, but don’t expect it to work exactly the same as a primer would for makeup wear.

This is the fourth product I have added to my now growing Supergoop family, it it did not disappoint. This one in particular has a very different finish. It goes on very velvety and smooth. I have acne prone skin and oily skin, and it does not leave any oily film on my skin. Truly feels like it sinks right in, and works well under my makeup.

I was really surprised about how this turned out for me especially because of all the good reviews. This was SUPER oily for me. It went on super oily and slippery and even though it dried down after a few minutes, I could feel and see my face getting oily throughout in the day. I have normal to dry skin so this was super surprising to me. Disappointed but it's only been a few days so we'll see if it improves. 3 stars because my makeup did look nice over it once it dried down before it got oily.
Does not make me break out goes perfectly under make up!!

I really like this sunscreen because as a woman of color sunscreens are more catered to lighter skin. When you have darker skin the sunscreen gives you a white cast which makes you look ashy. Another reason I like it is because it isn’t super greasy/shiny. It also has antioxidants Which is good for the skin. It’s invisible and weightless on the skin.

I have recently started using a lot of The Ordinary products so I really wanted to include sunscreen in my daily routine. I was really excited to received this in my PlayBox, but within one use under my makeup, my forehead and chin broke out in tiny red bumps. I immediately suspected and stopped using the sunscreen and my skin went back to being normal.

I have gone through 2 bottles of Glossier's Invisible Shield and decided to try something new for the summer because I found my makeup sliding around in the heat. I tried different setting sprays and different primers, but still the heat was getting the best of my makeup every day. I was looking around for a different sunscreen (with more SPF protection than Glossier's) and based on the reviews, found SuperGoop! It's clear and leaves a velvety finish on the skin once massaged into the skin, unlike my Glossier sunscreen which was actually the culprit of my melting makeup! My skin feels smooth and not sticky after application and the product itself is clear, so no annoying white cast! Another plus is that this product is actually cheaper per ounce than Glossier's, so definitely a win!
LOVE this! Lightweight and doesn't feel greasy. Put it on right after I use toner as a primer and lasts all day. Can't say enough good things about this product!

This sunscreen is absolutely amazing. I love using it as a primer underneath my makeup or alone. I’m on my mid 20s and I’m not incorporating sunscreen into my skincare routine and this really helps! Usually I would be sweating off my makeup within the first couple hours of my shift, but it’s been controlling the sweat! I would highly recommend this product!

LOVE it SO much as both, a primer and sunscreen! i was orginally looking for a sunscreen that wouldnt get greasy under makeup and wouldnt enhance texture under makeup and this does that so beautifully. Not only that, this makes makeup go on so much smoother. I even use this for night looks under makeup because its better than any other primers I have used.
reviews.review_title: great as a primer and sunscreen!!

reviews.review_text: Absolute favorite sunscreen. Goes on and sinks in seamlessly.
Best sunscreen ever!! I Love this product it feels so nice and light . I will definitely buy this again ,This is now one of my favorites products.

When I first tried this on, I was ridiculously in love and told my gf's about it. I am sensitive to spf cause of my eczema. It's my third time putting it on my super clean face.. thought I cleaned it all off at night but I woke up the next day with whiteheads all over my skin :( most likely from clogged pores 
I've never reacted like this before, I'm usually worried about eczema not acne. So, I'm going to have to stop use. It is most likely from the silica. Also keep note this is a chemical spf (although it's really hard to find mineral spf that disappears, Murad's vitamin C one gives me eczema reactions)
reviews.review_title: Loved at first, then I broke out with whiteheads

reviews.review_text: It is well worth the price!  It instantly dissolves into your skin and does not leave a sticky residue.

This product is EVERYTHING. It works awesome as a primer under makeup, but I'm still confident that I won't get sunburned. It's perfectly matte without drying me out, and goes on completely clear. Will be staying stocked up on this forever.

I've been using this sunscreen for a week now, and I really enjoy it. It's completely clear and doesn't feel greasy. I personally believe it helps keep my skin looking more matte than usual, which is a great bonus for me.
My only complaint is that you almost HAVE to pat this product on. I've tried gently wiping it on, and the sunscreen begins to turn into almost a powder that will ball up on your face. Patting it on eliminates that problem, but then you also have to pat on your foundation with a sponge. Not the biggest problem, and I'll adapt if it gets me a matte and invisible sunscreen. It's worthy of noting, though.
reviews.review_title: Love it, but application can be tricky

reviews.review_text:
Although I did like how this product applied, please be aware that if your foundation or any other skincare product contains Titanium Dioxide it will DEACTIVATE the avebenzone filter in this sunscreen (avabenzone is what protects against UVA, the rays that damage collagen. Because I am so in love with my foundation and it does contain titanium dioxide, I chose to return the product as I want the best sun protection possible. I write this review to help others and you can read multiple scientific studies discussing this as I was completely unaware of this until my dermatologist was able to warn me. I wish more companies spoke about this issue as I feel that people can often be mislead about the level of protection they are receiving. Check the ingredient list of your foundations before pursuing this product!!!!
I do love the brand Supergoop! and all that they stand for and I personally use their mineral and combination sunscreens daily
Feels lightweight, like my moisturizer! Invisible protection that really works! Definitely a winning product!

The first sunscreen I actually want to use! It doesn't leave a white cast on my skin and actually works. I've tried many drugstore and Korean brands that don't seem to have actually protected my skin from the sun.
It gets absorbed in the skin without leaving a white layer.

I love the high SPF of this, I like the price, I like that it can serve as a primer (it mattifies slightly), I don't like the silicone-y feel of it. If it went on with a serum texture,  it would be my HG and I would marry it. The sun protection works great and it doesn't cause any issues under my Fenty foundation (might not be as cooperative with non-matte foundations though). I have normal/combo skin that tends toward oily, and it works well for me, but my mom has dry skin and it pills on her (I let it set, but I'm not sure if she does). I've used Dr. Jart's BB with spf 40, which doesn't have the silicone feel to it, and I'm more likely to repurchase the Dr. Jart's for everyday SPF than this, I think. This may end up as my go- to for no-make up summer days at the pool and the beach.
reviews.review_title: Not my holy grail but I do like it

reviews.review_text:
As a pale Irish-American with a family history of skin cancer and a proclivity for sunburns if I so much as think about the sun's existence, I have run the gamut of cult favorite sunscreens. I've tried dozens of formulas from drugstore to the most high-end, the highly touted K and J beauty products, local brands, you name it. They were all okay, some certainly were better than others. 

The issue is that not a single one of these formulas made me want to apply sunscreen every day. It felt like a chore that got in the way of the rest of my routine. 

That's where this sunscreen comes in. I knew when I tried it that it wouldn't leave a white cast, but I wasn't prepared for how nicely it would absorb into my skin. It feels more like a primer than a sunscreen. It isn't greasy, nor is it drying. The ingredients are wonderful - nothing that would cause my sensitive skin to break out. I am actually excited to apply sunscreen every morning now - and while this sunscreen is a little pricey, it's honestly not bad considering the quality you're paying for. I'm on a mission to get my family and friends to care about applying SPF every day, and I'm so glad sunscreens like this exist to make people feel excited and good about protecting their skin.

(Also - the packaging is incredibly cute. What more could you ask for?)

Being pregnant I was looking for a clean and safe sunscreen. A Sephora sales lady recommended this one, which unfortunately I bought, to find out later if is full of toxic ingredients that can cause hormone disruption and allergic reactions: "there is concern that chemical sunscreen ingredients can permeate the skin and cause hormone disruption and allergic reactions. Common chemical sunscreen ingredients to avoid include oxybenzone (one of the worst offenders), avobenzone, octisalate, octocrylene, homosalate, and octinoxate".... almost all of which are in the active ingredient list of this product. This definitely should not be listed as a "clean" product by Sephora and would not recommend it to someone who is looking for a safe
reviews.review_title: Not clean at all.. full of toxic ingredients.

reviews.review_text: I bought this for my husband (I can't use b/c I am allergic to SPF) and he is OBSESSED. Of all the different sunscreens (high end or cheap) this is by far his favorite and it really protects his skin well. He has used it skiing and down at the beach and loves it.

I have never worn this under makeup, I just use it as my daily sunscreen after finishing with my morning routine. It’s oil free so you don’t get greasy! It has a slight sunscreen smell but it is not as strong as the smell in the glossier sunscreen. The glossier one claims that it doesn’t smell like sunscreen but it sort of does. Overall, I don’t see myself getting greasy and the smell fades pretty quickly though the smell isn’t that bad initially

i avoided using sunscreen as part of my skincare routine for so long because of how tacky and sticky they felt on my skin. but sun damage isnt cute and i took a chance on the high ratings and ive been using this every day ever since. its completely clear so it doesnt leave any white residue, super soft and melts into my skin, and it smells like vanilla. ill recommend this until the day i die (which wont be from skin cancer. WIG)

I love this! My skin is so sensitive and breaks out with pretty much anything but this is one of the only SPF’s I’ve found that doesn’t break me out! I do get a bit oily towards the end of an 8 hour period but I’m naturally oily anyway. It does a pretty good job of controlling oil and minimizing pores.
This feels weightless on your face. It is the first facial sunscreen I’ve used that doesn’t make my eyes tear. Performs to perfection.
My fave sunscreen. It does not clog pores or make my skin greasy. It is a silky texture

I really liked how this product wore under makeup and how it didn’t leave a white cast, but sadly it broke me out. If you have acne prone skin you might want to avoid this as red algae is highly comedogenic. Otherwise if you don’t suffer from breakouts this is a good product to consider to get your daily SPF because it’s not greasy and works well as a makeup primer.
Love it. Acts like a primer.  Lives the skin smooth, poreless and matte

Best product ever! It feels like a primer, does not leave your face greasy! I just can’t get enough of it. 
You feel the protection without the white residue and greasy feel.

I absolutely love this sunscreen. It is so lightweight, that you'll wonder if it's even on. It leaves a smooth finish, that feels almost like a primer. I've used it alone, and under makeup and have had no issues. I run outdoors for hours, and love the staying power of this. It's completely invisible, lightweight, unscented and doesn't clog pores.  It is a chemical sunscreen, so I know it's not for everyone.

My new favorite sunscreen!!! I had been using Clinique's city block 40 SPF sunscreen for a while now and wanted something without tint and that wasn't drying my skin. Since I live in Denver, hydration is everything. Discovered this product while doing some research on sunscreens and so glad I found it at Sephora. It goes on so smoothly and because it is clear I don't have that ashen finish I get from tinted sunscreens. It also feels amazingly silky on my face and is perfect under make up. Works as a primer too. My husband uses it as well so we will be buying more when we are done with our current tube. Thank you SUPERGOOP! :)

I can't say enough good things about this product! I'm a lifelong sunscreen hater, even though I know how important it is to prevent skin cancer and signs of aging. The texture of this sunscreen is amazing - it's velvety soft and not sticky at all. It has no overpowering sunscreen fragrance, it goes on clear (no Kabuki mask!), and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. I just wish I had discovered it years ago!
reviews.review_title: Awesome sunscreen for people who hate sunscreen

reviews.review_text: I'm really happy with this! Once I put it on, I couldn't even tell I had anything on my skin- it left behind no residue or oiliness. After about 10 minutes of wear it fully soaks in and I can't tell I have it on for the rest of the day. Love it!
first received this in a play box and immediately fell in love! the best SPF 40 out there! easily absorbed, doesn't create sebum.
Love this 2 in 1 SPF primer! It’s absolutely clear and when  used under makeup makes a smooth base that has the benefit of a SPF.

I am extremely pale with oily and acne prone skin so I am always on the hunt for a high SPF sunscreen that works well without being greasy or causing more breakouts. I finally found it! This product has a silky finish that feels like a primer and wears well under foundation and concealer. I have been using it for about a month now and it hasn’t caused any breakouts. It does seem to add slightly to my oil problem but I’ve found that it helps to wait until it dries down completely before applying foundation. I have worn it on several sunny days that I have been outside for hours at a time and have experienced no redness or sunburn. I do make sure to reapply after swimming or sweating a lot. I have tried dozens of brands both drug store and high end and this beats them all! Definitely recommend!

It's a sunscreen...nothing too special about it to me. I like that it goes on clear, but there are other brands like Elta MD that go on clear, are moisturizing and cost less. This one is not moisturizing at all. I wanted to try it and i like it, but i probably won't repurchase it.

I wanted to like this so much but it did not work for me at all. It felt very slippery on the skin and never absorbed or dried down. It created a greasy layer on my skin that lasted all day. I thought maybe some of my other skincare wasn’t interacting well with it but no matter what I tried/cut out it never did anything but be a greasy mess.

I don't particularly like to wear sunscreen.  It's stickey and gooey and your makeup doesn't lay right on top of it.  I got a sample of this stuff and it was love at first use.  It goes on last, after you moisturize but before your makeup.  It leaves your skin feeling velvety and it's a delight to put foundation on top of.  I went ahead and bought the full size and passed on the rest of the sample tube to my bestie who also fell in love with it.

I received a sample size of this product in a previous purchase of a travel size variety pack, and brought it with me on my week-long trip to Aruba. I was hesitant to try this for the first time as I usually have sensitive skin and break out easily with products that don't agree with my normally oily skin.
However, I was very impressed with this product. Unlike other sunscreens this isn't a white oily substance and it didn't 'bleed' or run off in the water. It's more like a semi-transparent, yellowish, lightweight, creamy matte gel--I'm not sure how else to explain it. When I spread it over my face it was like spreading velvet, it dried clear and was not oily.
Most importantly, it didn't make me break out or cause a rash, and it protected my face from becoming sunburned. I let my husband, mother-in-law and nephew try this product and they were impressed with the texture as well. Another point to mention: my nephew has sensitive skin too, and this didn't make him breakout either.
Now I'm here to purchase the full-size product to use as my daily summer moisturizer. I definitely recommend this product.
reviews.review_title: Here to purchase the full-size product now!

reviews.review_text: Recently tried this in place of Dermalogica Prism (because the store didn't carry it) and I was more than pleasantly surprised. I love the smell. It isn't a strong sunscreen smell but the hint of it present is perfect. It is very light and not oily on your face. I primarily have been using it on my hands and face, daily. I did use it for a pool day and well, not the best about reapplying however I was still pleased, NO SUNBURN and NO DRYNESS after.

This is the best. I have recommended it to so many people and they love it too. It actually goes on with a semi-matte finish. Almost like a primer. You wont look oily. I like it for my chest too. As for sunblocking ability, I suppose it does the job because I've never gotten burned when I wear it. I'm on my second tube- but the first one lasted about 3 months (wore it on my face about 6 days a week).
Light weight and quickly absorbs. Steep price point but worth it. Does not irritate skin or cause acne.
Best face sunscreen on the planet. I’ve tried them all and this is the ONLY one that glides on clear, stays matte all day, and doesn’t inflame my sensitive skin. Seriously the best!!
the BEST sunscreen I've ever tried! Cannot reccomend enough-- great coverage, amazing texture, neutral scent-- have been rebuying for almost a year now!

I have extremely sensitive skin and this is the only truly invisible, lightweight sunscreen I've found that doesn't cause dryness or breakouts. As some others have said, it's more like a primer - which is perfect for me and as I ease into my 30s, lends a nice finish to my skin. I use is as my daily sunscreen for the summer, which can get pricey but a little of this goes a long way and the protection is worth it. I'll be buying another to keep in my purse!

I live on the coast and have tried just about every face sunscreen out there and this is easily the best one I've ever tried! I has a smooth silicone-like finish so it doubles as a great makeup primer, but it is silicone free. It does not contained oil or fragrance which is great for oily and acne prone skin. This is one of the only face sunscreens that hasn't broken me out. Because of the unique silicone-like texture, a little goes a loooong way, so even though it is on the pricier side for a sunscreen, I feel like it will last me a long time and I am really getting my money's worth. I would recommend this to anyone looking to try a new sunscreen this summer. This has quickly become my holy grail facial sunscreen!
Order this for a trip to Mexico. I am incredibly fair skinned and this saved my face.
Love this sunscreen, my favorite under make up, it feels almost like a primer and is very smoothing for my skin.

Amazing, this doesn't break out my skin, works as a primer and is perfect for applying makeup on top. It doesn't leave any white cast, also is light on the skin and doesn't dry out my skin. This is my second bottle and highly recommend it.

I am currently undergoing retinol treatment so SPF is mandatory for my skin (NC 45 for reference).  I've tried a few brands even the ones from the esthetician but all have left me looking like a zinc cast greaseball but NO LONGER!  I actually look forward to applying this over my moisturizer as opposed to it being a chore and it is now part of my daily routine.   At first I was skeptical bit even my dermatologist gives it her seal of approval and said my skin is improving without the dreaded sun damage.

This sunscreen is amazing!!! It does work really well as a primer but it works really well as a sunscreen too. I even put it on and went to the beach to test it!! No burned face. very light, soft. Yes, there is silicon in it, I'm sure but just like any other primer, I don't care. It's the last step on my routine so all other products were absorbed already. It's a game changer for sunscreen and people, like me, who hate that white cast and will just not wear heavy stuff. I got this as a sample first, loved it so much, I already bought a full size and kept the sample for trips.
I can not say enough good things about this sunscreen! I love it and it’s been a great primer! I love how thin it is, a little goes a long way even on my dry skin!
reviews.review_title: Such a good sunscreen and primer!

reviews.review_text: I used to never use sunscreen, as i thought they were all greasy like the beach kind. I learned that as a WOC, especially with my awful hyperpigmentation, it is essential to use sunscreen. Since I have used it along with a bunch of other new items, my dark spota have been fading. I started using this in February along with the Caudalie serum, toner, and moisturizer and my acne and spots are clearing, slowly but surely. Its not till May that i started using glycolic Acid toner which also works.
Highly recommend this product! It goes great under my foundation and does not cause me to breakout.

I bought this product because it had the clean seal. Apparently that means nothing because the first four ingredients in this product are chemicals that are part of the “Awful Eight” which are toxic to coral reefs and humans. I’ll be looking to return this in the store. Sephora, please re-evaluate how sunscreen earns a “clean seal.”
reviews.review_title: NOT reef safe or a clean product

reviews.review_text: This product goes on smoothly, it reminds me of a good quality primer. I use it when I'm about to tan and it protects my face well. It doesn't leave a sticky tacky residue and I imagine would work perfectly with your regular makeup routine since it blends well. I when massage the rest on my hands and I don't feel like I need to wash my hands after to get it off. Absorbs well.

This stuff is AWESOME. I like to really protect the skin on my face and neck as it is so easily and quickly discolored by the sun. I wanted something that does not feel or smell like sunscreen and could go under my makeup as a primer- this does exactly that. It also feels kind of hydrating which is an unexpected bonus. The texture is that of Smashbox Photo Finish primer. I loveeeee it!

This is the most unsunscreen-like sunscreen I've ever used. It feels like a high quality primer. It's not greasy at all. It stays throughout the day and controls the oil in my T zone. It definitely works well as a sunscreen - I was out in the sun for several hours yesterday working and no sign of sunburn. Typically with other sunscreens I would have at least a little sensitivity or redness, but nothing with Unseen Sunscreen. I highly recommend this as a part of a daily routine. I'll be getting this as a staple over and over.
I absolutely love this product.  It goes on so smooth and its very lite weight.  Just like the title, Unseen sunscreen.  It's the best!

This stuff is amazing! I have tried sooooo many facial sunscreens but none of them even came close to this one. This goes on completely sheer and feel absolutely weightless and best of all it works! My skin is very sensitive and every other sunscreen I have tried clogged my pores/ caused break outs. But never with this. I don’t give a lot of reviews. But if I could I would be shouting it out from the roof tops that this stuff really works!

First, I love that it’s transparent even on deep skin. Most sunscreens leave a gray/purple cast on deep skin. However this one was truly “unseen.” My biggest issue is that after applying it starts to peel off of my face. Throughout the day I see these little white flakes all over and if I touch my face it peels even more into little balls. It has a silicone gel-like texture which never works for my skin. This would be a disaster under foundation. I’m going to try one of their other dispense methods, maybe the mist, to see how it works out because I do like the formula.

I tried a sample on my cheeks and it burned :( I had to wash it off immediately, I really wanted my skin to like this but chemical sunscreens are too irritating for me, I have sensitive so anyone with sensitive skin be careful put on a little bit because it really stings if you get a reaction.
reviews.review_title: May not be suitable for sensitive skin

reviews.review_text: Best facial sunscreen I’ve ever tried. Does not have a fragrance, it goes on clear, and does not leave my face sticky or oily, and I have oily skin.
This sunscreen is great! The best part is that it does not make my face greasy or oily.
really love this product, barely any smell and doesn't leave you oily or shiny. which it was a bigger amount for the price, but will continue to buy.
This sunscreen feels so light weight and smooth and I love how it’s clear and protects my skin so well against the uv rays.

I'm so glad I didn't buy the full size! I wore it for one day with little time in full the sun and my face is covered in spots and freckles (not the cute kind). Its going to take months to get it back to normal. I saw another review mention this may be a problem with chemical products but I havent had this happen this drastically with another brand that I use
I live in India so I live in a humid and hot climate, I have oily skin and this makes me so greasy hence I will not repurchase.
Love! Love! L-O-V-E!! This is lightweight, and a little goes a long way. No white caste , no fragrance, it just gets the job done!

I got a sample of this when I purchased the Drunk Elephant Get Even kit, which included the Umbra Tinte sunscreen, and this one is sooo much better. I have sensitive skin, and some sunscreens give my face a burning sensation throughout the day, especially if my face gets hot. This one does not do that at all. The texture is very similar to the Murad Invisiblur that I used years ago when they were cruelty free. Since Supergoop is CF, I think this might be my new go to sunscreen.

This just might be my favorite product of all time. I am amazed just by how well it keeps my makeup in place. I went to the beach for 3 days and wore this everyday and my face didn't burn at all. No matter what I have tried in the past, my face has always burnt. It is a definite must for me now!

This product is so silicone-y! For a chemical sunscreen, I question whether this actually sinks into the skin and performs correctly. 

It just kind of...sits on my skin, transfers easily, doesn't dry down. I pat in my sunscreens, and assume that's the best way to apply this as a high silicone product too. I got this in a small size, so I guess I'll just use this in a pinch when I have nothing else.
reviews.review_title: not sure what this is for

reviews.review_text: Love this!  It's clear and there's no white cast.  I like the silky texture and how smooth it goes on.  When you're done applying it, it looks and feels as though you didn't just put something on your face.  No greasy/oily feeling like a lot of sunscreens.  And it doesn't irritate my skin or cause me to break out.  Works great as a primer, although sometimes I still use my Becca Ever-Matte primer over it on my T-zone.  I have noticed that on a couple of my no makeup days, my skin did seem to get a little oilier later in the day.  So that's my only complaint.
I absolutely love this! The only thing I would love even more is if it had some radiance! Feels amazing as a primer, makeup applies wonderfully on top. Amazing.

I was excited to try a clear sunscreen. Previously I was using an SPF 50 that did leave a white cast. The smell and texture of the Supergoop are nice. It stays well under makeup. However, even though I reapply as recommended every two hours, I’m not seeing that much sun protection. I generally tan easily and quickly but I think I was doing better with the SPF 50. This unseen sunscreen would work better for people who undergo moderate to minimum sun exposure.

Best sunscreen ever! It glides on so smoothly and basically dissolves on your face and it feels powdery or something like that. No streaks or icky feeling! I used this during my recent vacation in the Philippines--which is during their summertime! No sunburn whatsoever and I spent hours and hours at the beach under the sun. I did tan but my skin didnt burn. I even went to get my facial at the end of my trip and my skin technician asked what sunscreen I used because there were no signs of sunburn or sunspots or sun damage or anything! I love this product so much, I make everyone try it and buy it for themselves!

I have been looking for a safe and eco-friendly sunscreen for awhile now and I thought this would be it. It has the “clean” approval stamp but contains Oxtinoxate which is harmful to our environment, ocean life and studies show even ourselves. Oxtinoxate along with Oxybenzone, Benzophenone-1, Benzophenone-8, OD-PABA, 4-Methylbenzylidene camphor, 3-Benzylidene camphor, nano-Titanium dioxide, nano-Zinc oxide is in many sunscreen products but is causing major problems like coral bleaching and health problems for marine life. Please come out with a fully eco-friendly sunscreen!
I'm so glad I decided to try this! This is a perfect sunscreen for everyday wear. Super light and non-greasy. Best part is that it goes on completely clear on your skin.

First of all, the silicones in this product give it a really silky texture (just like the original formula of the smashbox primer) and I feel like this product reallt just sits on my face. It also causes my tinted moisturizer to feel slippery??? if I try to put it on right after I’ve applied this.

My biggest concern, however, is the red algae in this product. Red algae is one of THE BIGGEST comedogenic ingredients out there. Basically, it will clog your pores no matter what. It’s also mildly irritating. I have acne prone skin so this product was a huge disappointment because I was so excited when I got this in. Honestly didn’t even use it long enough to see how my skin reacted because I was terrified to find out. I have combination sensitive skin.
This stuff is amazing. You can barely feel that it’s on. No smell. Matte finish. Great under makeup. You can layer it over makeup too. It’s the best.
This is the perfect summer primer! Creates a matte, poreless canvas for your foundation.

I love how smoothly this applies and how my skin feels like velvet, but honestly, it does NOT protect my skin the way that a physical sunscreen like titanium dioxide does. A big negative for me was that it got in my eyes, even though I was careful not to apply too closely to them.
reviews.review_title: Didn’t live up to the rave reviews.

reviews.review_text: Love this! So lightweight and doesn’t make my skin feel greasy, I have very oily sensitive skin and this doesn’t break me out! I love that it is clean and also protects from blue light
I liked this.  It goes on so smoothly.  didnt irritate my skin and looked good under makeup.
There really should be an option for zero stars.  This is the most disgusting glue like product I ever put on my body or face it was thick and greasy and disgusting the other reviews are wrong

I was on the hunt for a primer that included SPF because I was so bad at putting on sunscreen, mostly because I hated the greasy feeling and that it ruined any makeup I put on. After some research I came across this brand, but I was skeptical because it didn't say it was a primer, only sunscreen. After reading the reviews I decided to give it a chance and boy am I thrilled I did! This stuff is absolutely amazing. It functions great as a primer, doesn't leave a gross, heavy feeling on my face, and it doesn't have an icky smell! I'm honestly so impressed and I'm so happy I don't have to think about putting on sunscreen every day. I am fair-skinned and have never noticed a white film at all and my makeup doesn't matte up at all during the day. Do yourself a favor and give it a try!
reviews.review_title: So glad I gave it a shot!

reviews.review_text: This is such a good product! It feels just like a silicone primer, and has absolutely no white cast or scent. It wears beautifully under make up, and does not irritate or dry out my sensitive skin at all. It’s the best facial sunscreen ever!
My favorite SPF! Love that it’s clear and the texture is incredible underneath makeup. I do wish it came in a bigger bottle for the price.
Makes face look matte and does not feel heavy. Love it!!
Works really well on my oily combination! Feels clean and shine-free!

Only rating it 4 stars because of the price and amount you get- as a college student I want to make sure I maximize my dollar!
That aside, I love this product. It glides onto my skin very nicely and doesn’t leave an obvious sheen or shininess to it. I have dry skin with some shiny spots, and this doesn’t accentuate that. The texture is different than any other product I’ve used, and feels kind of oily, but it went on my face just fine. There isn’t much of a smell to it. Easy application. I wish they would make this in a larger size, and I hope it does well enough they can decrease the price slightly so I can continue to purchase it!

I got a sample size with my points and was blown away. I hate most sunscreens but this one was different. It so far has played well with my foundations. No irritation to my eyes which is not the norm for me.

I was excited to have a lightweight sunscreen to wear under makeup. This gave me the worst breakout I've had in years. I unfortunately cannot recommend this product. There are sooo many other options out there.
This wears fantastic under makeup.
I am fair skinned and this worked amazing on my recent vacation. I was looking for a face sunscreen that wouldn’t be greasy and cause breakouts (I am prone to hormonal acne). This did the trick!!

As someone with PMLE/photosensitivity who is also at high risk for skin cancer, I’ve tried SO many sunscreens throughout the years and wear it every single day (as one should). But this stuff is the best and hands down my favorite for everyday wear! It feels so nice on the skin, doesn’t feel oily/greasy (does feel slippery and different than other creams for sure), doesn’t leave a white cast at all, dries/absorbs quickly and feels almost like a primer on the face once it’s absorbed (which is nice if you plan to apply makeup afterwards), doesn’t have a “sunscreen” smell/fragrance or really any fragrance which I love, and has cleaner ingredients than most chemical sunscreens on the market. And while I do usually try to use mineral products (or just a UPF shirt/covering honestly) if I will in the sun for longer exposure times, for everyday on my face/neck/décolletage/hands/arms/etc. this is for sure my go-to and has been for over a year. So bottom line: LOVE IT :)

I love this sunscreen! I bought it when a cruelty free blogger reviewed it and I ran to sephora go buy it! it feels so good on the skin and doesn’t even have a strong scent which I LOVE! and I even use it as just a primer under make up sometimes! I recommend it to everyone and probably will continue to

I wouldn't rely on this as your only form of sun protection...sunscreens only last for 2 hrs after all. (Which is why I love the Supergoop Defense Spray that I can reapply over my makeup)  But it does work well as a sunscreen and it actually is the best makeup primer I've ever tried!  My pores are minimized, my foundation stays in place without sliding or getting patchy.
wow this primer is amazing, th texture and feel of it is awesome! it's one of my favorites for sure!!!

This would be better off as a primer for your face more than a sunscreen for your whole body. It has a slip to it and helps makeup go on so smooth. And I LOVE it. It’s better than any primer I have ever used and plus it’s sunscreen so it’s a win win
Worth every penny. Goes on clear, non sticky, and basically odorless! Will recommend to all of my patients from now on.
best sunscreen I've tried, sticking to this one from now on.  applies on smooth and not greasy. Like a primer. makeup also goes on well after.

I have mild rosacea, so sunscreen is highly important.  It also means my skin is hyper sensitive.  This stuff is a spectacular 2 in 1 that resists sun, calms my skin, and provides a perfectly smooth surface to take make up.

so I want to start off by saying i would NOT use this as an everyday sunscreen. The ingredients mimic a silicon primer and feels and wears just the same. It's also super pricey if you are using it as an every day thing, but a little does go a long way. I highly recommend as a primer for glammed up days in the sun. didnt make me greasy, no white cast what so ever, no burning, nice feel, blurring effect, and my makeup wears great over it. 4 stars for the price point.

Love this sunscreen and love that it can be used on all skin tones because it’s completely transparent. It’s a great primer for my skin type and offers great protection. Total plus it’s certified clean! Totally recommend.

I got a sample of this sunscreen from my Sephora Play box. It feels just like Smashbox Photo Finish primer and goes on easily and my concealer went on smoothly on top. It does have a faint smell of sunscreen, but otherwise is odorless and clear. I am very fair skinned and burn easily, and after wearing this for 4 hours in direct sunlight I did get burned. I probably need to reapply anyways so I’ll try it again!
Very light, feels smooth, non greasy, good coverage. I put this on my face and hands everyday. No break outs, no mess, absorbs well!!!

I have enjoyed this primer quite a bit starting to use it about 3-4 weeks ago. What I really like about it is the high SPF without feeling like an SPF, and it really does work very nicely with a variety of foundation formulas. In fact, it seems to be the most versatile foundation friendly primer I have used. My only little issue I have is I do tend to get a bit shiny with this but it’s not meant to be mattifying and since my skin is normal/combo and not dry that makes sense. It’s not greasy like other SPFs though, so blotting papers work just fine. I may try their matte version when I use up this bottle, but other then the shine it’s a great primer. I use other SPF products too (moisturizer and foundation), so the combination has so far worked really well for sun protection.

I’ve been a faithful Sephora shopper for years and never before have I left a review until now— and for a sunscreen?! This stuff it truly amazing. After investing in a series of microderm sessions, my esthetician kindly insisted that I finally start getting serious about consistent sunscreen use. I have finicky skin that is extremely sensitive to new products and tends to break out immediately after deviating from my usual routine. After reading reviews I landed on this product, crossed my fingers, and began applying religiously as part of my morning routine. Fast forward to 9 months later and I don’t know what I’d do if this product was ever discontinued! Not only did my skin remain clear, but the texture of this product left my skin so velvety soft that I now actually prefer the feel of having this sunscreen on! It somehow seems to offer a smoother surface for make-up application, and doesn’t leave any white cast or stickiness that other products notoriously leave behind. 5 stars, only because they won’t let me give 10!

I try to give this product a shot, but the texture of it turns me down. It makes you think that it fits for oily skin, looks matte at the first applying, but after 1 hour of wearing, it starts to make my skin more oily, also make my skin have that heavy, greasy feeling. I don't know how people use it or combine it with any products that they say it works, but I only use this sunscreen with concealer on some spots and blush.
Doesn’t smell like sunscreen. Goes on smooth and dries matte. A bottle lasts me a while.
It is a good product. I put it 4 stars because it does not absorb quickly.

I got the trial size so I would have something portable to carry on vacation.  I do like the texture etc of the product but it just didn't work.  I got sunburned anyway.  I really wanted this to work.  Should have tested it before vacation.
Perfect sunscreen! I love everything about it!
The absolute best and ONLY sunscreen I use daily. Doesn’t break me out and holds well for 8+ hours without caking up my makeup, I recommend this to everyone !!!

This sunscreen helps me stay matte throughout the day AND is a kickass sunscreen and primer. I had no idea such a miracle product existed. You can use this with makeup, on its own, etc. didn’t break me out!
LOVE LOVE LOVE the texture !! So smooth like a serum application. Great coverage and easy to apply before makeup or even a natural faces.
Hands down my favorite sunscreen ever! Goes on clear and acts as a primer.
This is my new favorite sunscreen. You don’t get the heaviness and shine that you typically get from sunscreen.
I love it! It feels like it hydrates my skin without making it oily at all. It blends so easily and a little goes a long way. I’ll be repurchasing this item when I run out of it.
I as looking for a sunscreen that would wear well under makeup but this ain’t it. Maybe I haven’t found the right combo

I absolutely love this sunscreen! The consistency is very lightweight and not greasy which is exactly what I was looking for in a sunscreen since I have oily/combination skin. A plus is that it says it is water and sweat resistant! I wear it alone or under my makeup and the consistency acts somewhat like a primer in my opinion. Such a great buy, I will definitely be repurchasing this again once I run out.
reviews.review_title: Just what I was looking for!

reviews.review_text: This product is great as a primer or for a non-makeup wearer who wants a non-greasy everyday chemical sunscreen. It's perfect for olive to deep skin tones because it's identical to the look of smashbox photo finish primer. It's clear and a velvety gel consistency so there's no cast and no shine. I recently developed an allergy to chemical sunscreens so I had to return it but if it wasn't for that I would've kept the product.
I like this product a lot. It basically feels like silicone primer but with SPF.

I love this sunscreen. It is light and my makeup goes on great on top of it.  I was using Josie Maran's sunscreen but it didn't seem to be working well.  I was getting a lot of sun damage. This seems to have stopped since I switched.
