Great product. Smells wonderful. No white film. You can put it on even if you are wearing your prettiest dress and still feel amazing. I highly recommend this product.
I love the feel of this sunscreen! It is extremely lightweight I love that it is SPF 40. It has become my new favorite!
love! best sunscreen ever.
In love with this sunscreen, super light and moisturizing
reviews.review_title: The best sunscreen on the market

reviews.review_text: I have tried a lot of face sunscreens, but this has become my absolute favorite for everyday use under makeup! It doesn't irritate my sensitive skin, and the colorless, gel-like consistency makes it the perfect primer to wear under foundation without making my face shiny/extra white. It's a bit pricey but totally worth it in my opinion.
reviews.review_title: Perfect everyday sunscreen for under makeup

reviews.review_text: Love this product. The texture is very nice and smooth.
This product is awesome. Totally lightweight and unseen on your face. Does not mess with application of makeup. No drying time, it simply glides on and disappears. Love it!

I super love this product! I’ve tried so many different face sunscreens in the past and this is honestly the only one that I fell in love with. It goes on so smoothly on skin and the texture is kinda like the benefit porefessional primer but with SPF. I have very sensitive, oily skin and I break out when I try out new products but I could say that this works perfect for me.
so good / doesn't smell / completely clear and easy to put on / didn't know this prior to purchasing but also doubles as a primer

This is by far the best sunscreen I've used. I have super sensitive acne prone skin - EVERYTHING makes me break out.. but never this. It goes on smooth w/no residue or oily feeling. I dont wear makeup but it leaves my skin soft and non-greasy when applied OVER my moisturizer. My face is a bit shiny by mid-day BUT I have super oily skin to start with and that's nothing a blotting tissue can't handle. This and the SUPERGOOP moisturizer w/SPF are the only sunscreens that have never caused a breakout for me. I prefer this one for the summer as it is lighter than the moisturizer. A little goes a LONG way!!!
Very effective.. doesn’t feel greasy. It doesn’t leave white cast or have a chalky feel at all. Blends very well with makeup.

This stuff is amazing. It has no smell, it goes on and stays clear, and makeup sticks to it. I have very sensitive skin and frequently break out in hives after using sunscreen, but I've never had a problem with this stuff. It also WORKS! My boyfriend is the palest person I've ever met. When we left the Pacific Northwest to visit sunny Florida, I was so worried he would burn while we were out on the beach all day. He burns so easily any time it's not actively raining outside. I put this on his face once, reapplied it 3 hours later, and it lasted the entire day. His nose didn't even get pink.
reviews.review_title: Works for even the palest, most sensitive skin

reviews.review_text: This stuff is AMAZING. I'm so happy I got a deluxe sample of this to try out. I knew I loved it after the first use and ordered the full size right away. It's like a silicone primer, but soooooo much better. I tried the Smashbox photo finish primer and didn't like it, but Supergoop nailed it. AND it's sunscreen. It is perfect under makeup and gentle enough to use on my eyelids as well. This is one I will purchase again and again.
reviews.review_title: I wish I could give this ten stars!

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. Supergoop really made an excellent item on this one. I apply it after I use it after my serum and moisturizer. I then let it sit for 5 minutes then apply makeup. It works as great as a sunscreen/primer. Definitely worth the purchase. It seems like it will last a fair amount of time as well. A side note I did try their moisturizer and spf combo cream and it made my skin have red bumps all over! My skin could not handle the spf and moisturizer together. Just a note if you were debating between the two and needed confirmation.

Amazing! Was looking for a great sunscreen and this tops it all. Goes on clear and feels amazing. Texture is silicone-y. Does not have a greasy feel or anything! Love it. Will be using as an spf makeup primer.

My favorite sunscreen! This isn’t like the normal white sunscreens that you really have to rub in. Goes on smoothly and can be a little oily, but personally I don’t mind. It is a little pricey considering the size of the tube

This is amazing! Super light and dries up immediately with no trace or smell of sunscreen. My last step before applying makeup. I didn’t give it 5 stars because I’m waiting to see how it does in the summer heat.

During one of my recent splurges on Sephora, I added this sunscreen as a reward and didn't think much about it. I haven't used Supergoop products before, therefore i had no expectations. Once received, I fell instantly in love with it! It hasn't been easy finding a sunscreen that does not clog up pores, or leave a white cast, or even leave my face feeling sticky. Supergoop was the answer to my prayers. On top of that, it appears to prime my face prior to makeup application. I loved it so much, I purchased the full-sized product prior to the sample version running out. For the price point, it is quite worth it because a little goes a long way and it'll last for awhile. One thing it doesn't do is keep my face matte and devoid of oiliness, but I am not going to hold it against them. I just use other skincare or makeup products to make up for it. All in all, highly recommend!

Nice, clear sunscreen. It’s thick and very almost silicone-y in feel, so it really does work great under makeup. The trick is that it takes forever to dry on my skin. My skin just doesn’t soak it up the way I thought it would, so I have to wait close to 5-8 minutes for it to completely dry! You don’t have to wait for it to completely dry before applying makeup, obviously, but you do get better results if you do that.
reviews.review_title: gets the job done, but takes awhile to dry

reviews.review_text: I actually had to use this as sunscreen (arms, shoulders, neck etc) this week since it was all I had in the house and I needed to mow. FYI, The texture would be great for those with sensory issues as an entire body sunscreen since it doesn’t feel sticky/lotiony.

I love it. Finally a sunscreen I WANT to put on. It’s not sticky at all. It glides on smoothly and doubles as a primer. I use this under my foundation and use the powder stick to reapply sunscreen throughout the day. Highly recommend!

This is by far the best sunscreen practically for all skin types, but you will appreciate it especially if you have been looking for a protector that does not leave your face ghost or greasy white, this is a transparent gel that leaves your skin totally smooth, to me  eme it seems to the consistency of the first of smashbox the photo finish!  I really love him

Incredibly soft feel and finish (SO AMAZING), not the least bit greasy, and very minimal sunscreen scent. I’d applied Unseen for the first time just before a hike - no sunburn, even after sweating! As much as I love spray-on application, this is my new favorite sunscreen. I’m very impressed with this product!

This works great under makeup. It feels velvety and goes on clear. Would definitely recommend. I was using the matte Supergoop previously but that broke down my foundation after several hours.   This one right here though, yeah this is where it’s at.
This is a perfect sunscreen to go under foundation I didn’t think I would like it but I may purchase the full-size as I am very pleased with this product. A new summer staple.

Best Sunscreen Ever.  This works as a primer under makeup and I could not love it more.  I get eczema from mineral sunscreen and this is the best of the chemical sunscreens available.  It does not smell, is not greasy and is super light.
reviews.review_title: I have found a new love.

reviews.review_text: Love love love! So lightweight, can't feel it at all. Doesn't have a smell and is not shiny. Perfect for combination skin.

I love that it's really smooth and almost has a matte feel to it.  There's no whitecast or greasy at all which is great as a Black woman with oily skin who always has to wipe the shine off my face after using sunscreen.  You wouldn't even be able to tell I've put on sunscreen with this, I love it.  I highly recommend it!

I’m so happy that finally there is a sunscreen that does not make my skin dry or white after I applied. The texture of the sunscreen is so smooth and not oily. It makes my makeup smoother and no extra color (creamy white) under the makeup! Love it!!!

I use it as hand SPF...i mean I don’t like Synthetic which is chemical SPF on my face, i only use Mineral SPF on my face, Niod survival30 is a great mineral SPF
 for face for sure!!!! But if I put mineral SPF on my side, I get white mark all over my clothes especially when I’m wearing the black color of clothes. So I usually Put chemical SPF on my hand, oh yeah’ also Supergoop Has another Glow stick SPF which is also great SPF for the back of my hand. Due to the sun exposure, I can see some hyperpigmentation on my hands, that’s why I consider wearing SPF on my hands very serious.  This one is super Translucent, and matte finished. I put the hand cream then this one on the back of my hand. Feels smooth and soft, even forget I have SPF on my hand. Also, very very reasonable price!! I’m going to buy this one for my father, and he never put SPF on his face because of the white lotion like sunscreens. Now I think  I found a right one for him.
Great coverage but not heavy.  Easily absorbed by my skin without any residue.  I wish they would make this in a larger size!
Love LOVE love this silky velvet clear spf coverage!! The best I’ve used to date!

HG sunscreen. I finally landed on that perfect product and have no plans to try anything else. Feels like a Smashbox primer when applying but dries down. No white cast, no breakouts. It has a slight blurring effect and on the days I wear makeup, it funtions well as a canvas to powder or liquid foundations. This is a winner!

Hands down best stuff ever. Use to use coola and i thought that was good. But this is even better! Doesn’t leave my face sticky, greasy or oily. Feels like a smash box primer. Will never use anything again!

Goes on great under makeup. I use this daily. It feels greasy when you first put it on. But it drys down and doesn’t break up foundation put over it.  I recently tried another so called clear sunscreen and it made my makeup look separated and awful.

This is the perfect way to have SPF on and not compromise your makeup! I have gone through 4 of these tubes, it is the BOMB. Works amazingly at smoothing and priming your face for foundation! I always recommend this to my friends, it’s the best!

This sunscreen is non-greasy and it doesn’t leave a cast. My skincare routine was missing spf bc as a woman with darker skin, I hated the cast typical sunscreens left. I’m using AHAs at night to fade dark spots so I seriously needed adequate sunscreen during the day. If you’re a makeup junkie, the texture is velvety like too faced’s primer. It even smells great! I don’t even feel like I’m using sunscreen so I’ll be back when I run out of my current stash. Thank you Supergoop for creating a product that EVERYONE can benefit from! Life (skin) changing! Much love!
reviews.review_title: FINALLY! A Sunscreen w/o A Cast!!!

reviews.review_text: This works so well, as stated, that my husband fell in love w/ it too and uses it daily! He hated how all sunscreens would stick to his light stubble--which isn't the best look for a working professional. This blends invisibly and its encouraged him to not leave the house without sunscreen on his face!
It took a few uses to get used to this texture but it lays so nice under my makeup. It also has a pretty clear color so it can easily be mixed with a drop of color- I use Drunk Elephant D-Bronzi.

No white cast, absorbs nearly instantly, no scent and acts as a primer for makeup. Fantastic. I have rosacea and have not tested the efficacy in full sun...keeping my fingers crossed as all other characteristics/features of this product leave me extremely satisfied.

I got this in my Play box and I was excited to try it. However, 10 minutes after putting this on my face started getting red and bumpy all over. I have never reacted to a skincare product before, but this one was awful. I had to wash it off and ice my face to reduce the swelling. Besides that, the texture was too slippery to apply makeup on top of. I would not use this as a primer even if I didn't react to it.
reviews.review_title: Awful skin reaction, not good under makeup either

reviews.review_text: Not a fan of this product. I received a sample of this product and it made my skin break out immediately. Also left a sticky feel on my face.

I already have a sunscreen that I use religiously on my face, so anytime I get a sample for a sunscreen I use it on the back of my hands (bc the hands show age too!) This one feels very “silicone-y” at first, which, I usually hate anything silicone-feeling, but this actually dries down unlike other silicone products that just sit on my face. After it dries down you can’t even feel it on, it’s so light.  It would be a great sunscreen under makeup (and probably a good primer too.) I only took a star off because I’m still waiting for the US to have a system that rates how UVU rays like Europe and Asia does. Even if something says “broad spectrum” I still don’t know HOW effective it is against UVA rays. So until then, I stick to my Japanese sunblock.

If you're reading this you're probably all about that SPF too, and I'm here to tell you this is it. It is so frustrating trying to find a multipurpose product that has an SPF higher than 30 - I prefer to use something like a SPF/BB cream or SPF/moisturizer than having to add another thing to my routine. This is perfect as a finishing step for no makeup days, under powder alone, or as a primer for full face makeup, all with SPF 40. The silky texture and no white cast are also fabulous bonuses.
Great texture, can put on make-up very soon after applying. Goes on clear, so no white film clogging pores. Wish it was a little bit larger size for the price, so knocked off a star.
Love this sunscreen smooth texture not sticky my go to now got it as a sample in my Play! Box now I’m hooked!
This is a great sunscreen. It goes on clear and doesn't make me look casket ready. It wears well under makeup
I love love love this sunscreen. It doesn't smell, is very easy to apply, and acts as a primer! I would recommend this to anyone.

I have photo-contact dermatitis and most sunscreens cause my face to break out in an itchy, burning rash. I am only able to use physical sunscreens but many of these leave a hazy white film on my brown skin. I have used Supergoop for sensitive skin in the past and even that one caused some mild itching but this one it PERFECT. It is clear, not sticky and goes on like a make up primer. And most importantly, I have worn it for the past few weeks without absolutely no reaction whatsoever. A little goes along way and it is worth every penny. Please Supergoop, don't ever discontinue or change this product!

This stuff is the best!  I have utilized so many other brands and this does not feel greasy nor stinky like sunscreen.  This applies well right after face moisturizer, and provides some matte coverage.  It also has a bit of a "tacky" feeling, and I can apply foundation and other face makeup without needing a primer.  This is truly a life-changing sunscreen and well worth the price!  I can even use it on my active elementary school-aged kids, and they don't complain about "sunscreen in their eyes" when they sweat.  My youngest son even thinks it smells like "cupcakes."  You will not be disappointed in this purchase, but if you're hesitant, Sephora normally has a trial/sample size in their sunscreen collection every year.
I love this sunscreen! I got it as a sample and had to buy the full size. It blends smoothly with my makeup and makes it easier to blend in my foundation. Definitely must-buy for summertime!
reviews.review_title: Best Sunscreen to Blend with foundation! Love it!

reviews.review_text: I received a trial size in one of my boxes and I fell in love. I’ll definitely be purchasing the full size. The name is very fitting as it’s truly clear. No white cast whatsoever and none of that nasty sunscreen smell. I’m normal to dry and this didn’t leave me dry or greasy, just super smooth. No breakouts and didn’t pill over moisturizer (even when applied directly after). Primer didn’t pill over it either. Makeup went well over it so it works well as a primer too. It’s not difficult to remove, and I just can’t say enough good things about it.

I've been using this sunscreen for the last 6 months and boy do I love it! I love that it offers great sun protection but doesn't leave you feeling greasy/oily like a lot of other products. Also, a little goes a long way so I feel like I'm getting my money's worth!

Wow! I have never used a sunscreen like this one! It feels almost... soft going on? Like you're spreading a powder over your face. It immediately shrank my pores, helped even out redness, and kept my skin protected while I was outdoors with friends. I got this as a sample and am so excited to get the full size and start using this everyday. I couldn't recommend this product more!
This is the best sunscreen you can use on a daily basis. It goes on like a make-up primer and you won’t notice it later.

Amazing product. I have dark skin and there is no awful white/purple cast on the skin. Plus it is great as a primer before makeup application. Jslust be sure to moisturize before using as the product is NOT a moisturizer.
I love this sunscreen! It goes on like your fave weightless serum, obviously it’s clear (and that’s amazing!) and it won’t move your makeup around if you need to reapply mid day. Love, love, love!

I had always been scared of sunscreens, mainly because of its texture, smell, look and how my skin felt after applying it (clogged pores and i could actually feel my skin suffocating). I would only apply a sunscreen on vacations, even after knowing i should be applying it everyday! And then I got the Supergoop! Sunscreen in my March play box, and boy I’m in love! Never knew i would include a screen in my daily am routine! Woohoo and now i have! I love how it makes my skin feel, a bit silicone-y, but i like that, it smooth, almost fragrance free and my skin looks great! Im super excited and just ordered a full size!
If you already have a silicone primer in your makeup drawer, no need to add this. I was hoping for a cream or lotion, and really don't like the consistency of this stuff.
Works great, I have sensitive skin and had no breakouts. My new favorite!

I really like this sunscreen. It has nice SPF, it seems to absorb into the skin well, and it has not caused me to have any breakouts, which is rare for me and sunscreen. The only thing I don't love about it is the matte aspect of it. During the summer, I like to look dewy and fresh, and this mattes out the face a little more than I would like it to. But other than that, it is a great product, and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a good facial sunscreen.

Well, well, well. Just when the last two products from Supergoop failed me, and I thought I would never purchase their product— I gave this one the last chance and it took it! This is much better than the supergoop city serum. Not greasy. It feels like the kind of primer which smooth out your skin.

Amazing product!!! I love the texture, appearance, feel, and smell ( or lack of ) this sunscreen. It doesn’t smell like sunscreen at all which is why I love it. Its not thick. It’s a great primer under make up and keeps my skin feeling very hydrated throughout the day. It has the same texture as the bare minerals original primer, clear and weightless. GREAT PRODUCT!!!
reviews.review_title: Where have you been all my life

reviews.review_text: Best spf product to apply under makeup! Not greasy or white goes on clear and dries matte. Perfect for summer!

This feels like a silicone primer on the skin so I get why this is ideal to use under make-up. No white cast or anything on me and I am brown to light brown. Feels nice and smoothing on my face. The fact that it is translucent and feels really light makes me wonder if it is actually effective as sunscreen so I am giving it 4 stars. But I am happy to get rid of having greasy and melting sun screen on my face.
reviews.review_title: Feels great, don't know if effective as Sunscreen.

reviews.review_text:
I first received this product as a sample and loved it so much that I purchased it. This has a matte look and is not oily like most. My skin is sensitive and I did not break out at all after using it. 

The SPF coverage is good as well. I never burned, and I sun burn easily too.
reviews.review_title: Great protection with a matte finish

reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I am very fair skinned and prone to sunburns. I’ve struggled forever to find a sunscreen that is lightweight, doesn’t break me out, isn’t sticky, and that looks good under makeup. This fills all of those needs! It has silicone in it so it feels very smooth and goes on my skin easily. Should have bought more than one but I will definitely be purchasing this again... and again!
So smooth! Works like a primer under my makeup.
I love this product! Most face sunscreens make me shiny and I feel greasy. This one leaves my skin matte and is a great primer under my makeup. Goes on smooth and feels good on my skin.

texture is different from normal sunscreens. 
Don't think it has broken me out and I haven't burned in the sunny california weather (including beach days and sunny ski days)

LOVE.  I am fair and wear SPF 365.  This sunscreen is perfection!  It's the texture of a light silicone primer.  Protects.  ZERO BREAKOUTS.  I've been wearing it daily since I got it; have already ordered back up!

This is the best sunscreen I've ever used. It doesn't make you casket ready or leave a strange color cast. It leaves a nice velvety finish. If you have oily skin or acne prone skin try not to use too much so you don't clog your pores. A little goes a long way.
Works very well as a primer under makeup and I love how I can dab some overy makeup later in the day to refresh my spf and it won't mess up my makeup
reviews.review_title: The best spf for makeup lovers

reviews.review_text: This unfortunately made me break out, although I loved the texture and the fact that it is absolutely clear. Three stars though because it is a brilliant product that just didn't work with my skin.

I have normal skin, that can get drier in the winter. I wear this sunscreen over my skincare and under primer/makeup during the winter. It stays on, works, and does not make me break out. I purchased another one when my first ran out, because I tried a cheaper option (Eucerin with spf) but that made my face greasy, made me break out, and my makeup didn’t last through the day. I don’t have those problems with the Unseen Sunscreen, and the spf is higher too!

This is the best sunscreen I have ever tried. Honestly. It goes on clear and isn’t heavy or greasy. I wore it all day on a scuba boat and did not get burned at all. (Obviously reapply after you get in the water). It has never made me break out or with bogged down skin. It’s perfect for everyday use.

Most of the reviews I read focused on how this product works with makeup, and the consistency of the product. It is clear gel, goes on smooth, wears well with makeup, feels like a primer. But my 5 star review is for the fact that I haven’t ever been able to find a face sunscreen that did not irritate my skin and eyes beyond belief. Like, they were actually painful, even natural ones like DE. Though I haven’t given it a full romp in the sun for an effectiveness test, this is the gentlest facial sunscreen I have found for everyday wear. It’s not at all irritating. It hardly seems like sunscreen. It is my new holy grail for face sunscreen, and I have tried many. Thank you Supergoop for a highly functional yet GENTLE product.
Silky, lightweight, effective. Simply put, I LOVE this product!

I love this sunscreen. It is very light and gives a nice matte softness feel to your face. I did not feel oily at all like other sunscreens. It provides the right amount of sun protection with spf 40. You might need to reapply and the product is a bit small for the price.

This is the best sunscreen ever! I love the texture, glides on your skin. Easy to build for maximum protection. I never get an outbreak and does not have a funny smell. I suffer with a lot of skin cancer and my doctor has insisted I become more proactive with my sunscreen. This is next to my bed and is the first thing I put on in the morning. I hope my doctor is happier with me because of this great product!

When I applied this sunscreen for the first time, I was worried it would feel oily because upon initial application it seemed a bit on the oily side. It goes into my skin so well and after letting it set it didn’t have any oiliness. It’s easy to apply, feels light, and is perfect for wearing under makeup or bare faced. It has the perfect balance between light and easy so as not to feel like you’re covered in sunscreen while also letting you feel protected. I burn pretty easily and was not even red after a week in Aruba using this!

I got it as a sample and will be purchasing a full size for sure!. Its one of the first sunscreens that not only don't make your face shine like a Christmas tree, but have a matte finish and blur imperfections. You cannot see it on your face. I still use my regular moisturizer under it because my skin is super dry. Highly recommend!

I got this because if felt so smooth on my hand when I tried it in the store. Once I put it on my face, it made it so dry and caused my foundation to look cakey. On the plus side, there was no white cast but this isn’t something I would ever use again.

Amazing product. I am brown with oily/combination skin. this doesn't leave any white cast and has the mattifying effect so just the perfect suman for me. Blends great with great texture and feel and layers well with other products. It's now a must have in my skincare and no excuse to not use sunscreen ever again!! I just love love love this product!!

This stuff is INCREDIBLE. I can finally put sunscreen on my face every day and not feel greasy or break out. Didn’t think it was possible, but my face literally feels better after putting this stuff on.. soft, smooth, absolutely zero grease or shine and it held up for a whole day at Disneyland and an entire day at the beach (no sunburn). After trying endless face sunscreens, this is it. I will buy this till the end of time.
This feels so light and so soft that you might even forget you need to apply anything else to your skin.

I wanted to love this product so much, since I hate sunscreens that leave a white cast. Unfortunately, this burned my skin and left me with some dark spots. I'm a person of color, with medium toned sensitive skin, so thought this would be perfect, but unfortunately it was far from it.
I love it, but it gives me breakouts. It feels lightweight and it’s not greasy, but it just doesn’t work for my skin. Hopefully it works for others.
I like the lightweight texture and how easily this applies. I used it under my makeup but everytime I use this, I get breakouts. I had to stop using it. Not for sensitive skin.

Got this as a sample in one of my previous Sephora orders - didn't even ask for it.  Put this on at 9 am.  It's clear - feels like my Smashbox Photo Finish Primer.  I wore it all day Spring Skiing in totally blue sky, brilliantly sunny day at 10,000 feet - didn't reapply (forgot to bring sunscreen w/ me) - and no sunburn.  I'm fair skinned - normally if I don't reapply when I'm skiing I'm in trouble.  Now I'm buying a full bottle.  Enthusiastic fan.  And it's so lightweight - this is going to be awesome for summertime.  You can for sure wear it under makeup.

I've hesitated to use sunscreen since they've caused me to break out in the past. After a little research, I came across this recommendation on YouTube so I decided to give it a try. I was not disappointed. I absolutely love how smoothly it glides onto my skin and just sinks in. My face is a little sensitive, acne-prone, and oily. This product hasn't caused any irritation at all. I put my makeup directly on after sunscreen and everything applies smoothly. I bought it as a sunscreen but it also doubles as a primer. This is a product I plan on repurchasing after I'm done with the tube I have.

Good For Your Skin!!!  The Frankensence in this product is wonderful for relaxing the skin.   It absorbs beautifully with a cool feeling.  Doesn't feel heavy, which is important in Summer hrat, especially in humid climates.  Also does not affect or alter makeup.   As a proud Rouge Member,  I Thank Sephora for the sample, and when getting a facial at Sephora location - which is fabulous  - Supergoop was applied as the sunscreen, to my delight.  The Sun ages the skin, and sunscreen is necessary.   This sunscreen is a favorite of mine now, and I am VERY picky about my skincare and makeup.
Best sunscreen for oily skin. Sits perfect under makeup!
Wanted to love this product but it made my skin I wanted to love this product.   I don’t think of myself as having sensitive skin but something in this kept causing bumps on my face.

I had to return this unfortunately. It went on the skin pretty great but every time I wore it, by the end of the day I had breakouts on my face. I finally figured out that it was this product and went back to my normal sun screen.

I received this product in my Play! Beauty box last month, and I loved it! It’s a very lightweight sunscreen that doesn’t feel like you’re putting paste on your skin, which is great for me. I have slightly sensitive skin, so this was wonderful in terms of not making me break out. It’s almost like a jelly that rubs in similar to how some serums feel, which is great.

I received a sample of this and wanted to love it as it is truly lightweight and makeup goes over it nicely. Sadly, it made me break out so I can’t give it a good rating. My skin doesn’t break out easily so I knew right away it was the sunscreen. My skin does not play well with silicone-based products or products with oil so this is a no-go for me.

I would definitely recommend this sunscreen Especially to my brown and dark skinned girls looking for some sun protection. I have a sunscreen sensitivity, I break out into small rashes in the areas the sunscreen is in. This hasn’t done that and it’s been a 2 weeks of everyday use. It hasn’t broke me out, give me a rash, nothing. This was the best recommendation I’ve ever gotten from a Sephora employee and I trust NO ONE in a Sephora uniform lol. The consistency of this feels like a primer (mainly the smash box photo finish or the maybeline baby skin primer) and it feels like butter in the face. It’s translucent with a slight yellow tint. I apply this after my moisturizer everyday, even if there’s no sun out. There’s no type of cast on the skin (and I’m a dark skinned girl) I love that my face still feels hydrated and it has a slight velvet matte finish for a few hours but of course it will start to break down like any other sunscreen out there. A little goes a long way. I love how my skin looks with it on and even after it breaks down.

This is seriously the best sunscreen!  It’s clear, so no cast. It’s practically odorless which is a plus for me. & it feels like a primer!!  I’ve tried a few sunscreens (PTR, DE, Shiseido) & this is the best!

I have always wanted to try this, and got the chance when I chose a deluxe sample a few weeks ago. This product is amazing!!

It’s a sunscreen, pore minimizer, and primer all in one. I have combination, acne skin, large pores and Supergoop applied very smoothly, and left a matte finish. It blurred my large pores, making them appear smaller! My foundation layered on top, applied like a dream.

My regular T-Zone oiliness came thru 4 hours later, but that isn’t a fault of the product. If you have oily skin, oil will shine through at some point. Nothing blotting tissues can’t handle!

This is my new go-to primer and sunscreen!

I need sunscreen to actually be sunscreen. Wore this today and gardened for about 2 hours on a partly sunny/partly cloudy day and have a severe sunburn on my face. I was not sweating so did not wipe it off. I could understand if it was spf 15 or 20, but not for spf 40. Also the caused pilling under makeup for work.
Simple review for a simple product. I’m fair skinned and must use ample amounts of spf. This is lightweight and goes on like a dream. It’s not greasy like other spf and it doesn’t breakout my skin.

The main reason why I never really wore sunscreen (shocker, I know) was because I hated the feeling of it on my face. It would always make my face feel oily, heavy, and sticky, and would pill up or leave a white cast behind. I hated it. When I read the reviews of this sunscreen I was initially super skeptical. How could a sunscreen be THAT perfect? I am amazed. There's no lingering residue, and sometimes I have to REMIND myself that I even have sunscreen on. I've read that lots of people say it works as a primer, but it works just fine UNDER the primer I use. I wish it came in an economy-sized tube, because I will definitely continue to buy!

Wanted to love this and I did until using it outdoors in the hot Florida sun. I have been using this under makeup on workdays and it feels and looks great, but come to find out does not protect from the sun! I got burnt after being outside for only about an hour. Lovely product but does not protect from sun damage.
This product is amazing! It’s pricey but worth it!

Pros: It kept my pasty white skin from sunburning and a sports game. It sits really nicely and not too heavy under my makeup. I don't find the scent strong at all.

Cons: The texture takes some getting used to, as well as the amount to use. The instructions say to use a small amount, which I failed to do and it felt greasy and weird. After I scaled back, I found that I still had plenty of product to protect my face, neck, decolete, and ears without the mess. 

This isn't a moisturizer. I use this as my last step in my morning routine before makeup. Cleanse-Serum-Moisturize-Sunscreen-Makeup.

Not sure I'll use this instead of stronger sunscreens all the time, but for everyday under makeup it's great.

Pretty much the only sunscreen that doesn't break me out. If you are sensitive to silicone-y products than this isn't for you since this is basically a silicone primer. Alot of people feel that silicone products are pore clogging but I find that I break out less when this product "fills in" my pores because it keeps other, worse things, out. I would highly recommend to anyone that is acne-prone.

Let me first start by saying I am a dermatologists daughter and skincare especially suncare is very important to me. This is a very clean and simple sunscreen and it looks very nice under makeup. I live in hot and humid Florida and I have found that this really grips my makeup on even while sweating. this also doesn't dry my skin out but I do use a moisturizer under it. This also leaves no white cast and is perfectly clear
reviews.review_title: Very Clean and effective; no white cast

reviews.review_text:
Pros:
Great base for makeup
No white cast
Applies smoothly
Does not: 
break me out, clog pores, dry my skin out


Cons:
Does not smell great

Have got a few samples of this and I think it's okay for a sunscreen, haven't got a sunburn yet, but I don't like the feel of it. it feels like silicon and just slides off my face. smells like sunflower seeds
reviews.review_title: not good on my oily skin

reviews.review_text: This product is amazing and it’s really light! I received a sample and used with my daily makeup. I went to an event and the sun was really hard that day. This a lifesaver, because I face and ears were protected.

Absolutely love. Melts into your skin; feels like nothing. I have historically worn Elta MD tinted moisturizer which is also a terrific product but am changing up my routine and Elta was too heavy.  I am 50 years old, have clogged pores n my nose and chin, normal forehead area, and very dry skin elsewhere (cheeks).  I felt that this sunscreen handled all areas of my face equally well. I selected a sample with one order and it only took one application to lead to me ordering.

I totally recommend this product! Sunscreen is a must and the fact that this sunscreen can act as a primer that doesn’t clump up or peel off when the makeup or some other cream is applied is amazing. Not very hydrating by itself but by adding a moisturizer underneath; the sunscreen still glides on smoothly and doesn’t react negatively with my makeup or skin.
reviews.review_title: Amazing! Must have in my makeup!

reviews.review_text: This glides in like a dream and stays out. I do not get oily and I absolutely love it.

This stuff works amazingly well - used it at the beach in south Florida and didn't even get a freckle.  Not to mention it goes on super smooth, not greasy at all and didn't make my skin feel gross.  Will use for every outing in the sun.
Recently got a sample of this in my play box. Used it on vacation in Cancun and didn’t break out. With my eczema I’m allergic to all kinds of sunscreen except this!!
My face still got sunburned.

I’m so glad I found this!! It is so smooth and transparent so no weird white cast and it also fills my pores. It almost acts as a primer and creates a really nice silky base for my foundation. It absorbs really nicely too. I’m using it for my dark spots and hyperpigmentation.
reviews.review_title: Sun damage? I don’t know her.

reviews.review_text: Finally no white cast! Not easy to find a sunscreen that works for deep skin tones.
My go-to sunscreen, i have dry skin and so far this is one of the best ones i've tried.
My favorite sunscreen/primer out there. Well worth the price. A little is all you need to cover your face. Lightly scented and made my skin feel soft.

LOVE this. I wear SPF every day and just recently started switching my skincare/makeup to cleaner ingredients. I was worried about finding a good sunscreen under these conditions but this stuff is great. It kind of feels like a primer so it's good under makeup but actually looks even better on its own. It doesn't give a white cast on me which some sunscreens do, however I have a very fair complexion so I can't speak for others. This may be my new can't-live-without item.
This is the best sunscreen I've ever used! It's not greasy at all and goes on completely clear. Obsessed.

I was looking for a sunscreen that didn't leave a white cast on my skin, and this one is perfect!  It has a gel-like consistency that goes on super smooth, and it's clear so nothing shows through when I layer on foundation.  I'll definitely be buying this again!
This is the best.  It’s SO weightless. I just love it.
Seems good.  I use it under my makeup goes on smooth.

Previously I didn’t worry too much about which sunscreen brand I used and Nars radiant tinted moisturizer with spf was my daily face base. But I’m in the midst of a series of laser treatments on the face to get rid of some hyperpigmentation due to sun damage and nothing works on my skin but this! Even things I’ve been using for years are breaking me out right now or completely drying out my face even if the product made me oily before. I really didn’t know what to do, but this sunscreen actually improved my skin tone and texture and my make up went on so nicely. I put on my skin care including moisturizer and let it absorb, then put on this sunscreen and let it dry down, and then makeup. I couldn’t wear any sunscreen, tinted moisturizer or foundation for several hrs. until I found this. I can’t wait until my laser treatments are completed because I have sensitive skin and this no downtime laser is aggressive for me. I’m confident though when my skin goes back to its usual oily combo state, I’ll continue to use this because I know it won’t irritate my skin. Love this stuff!

I recently revamped my skincare routine and added this in to go on underneath the NARS tinted moisturizer. I wanted a little added protection and a primer. It's super lightweight and absorbs fast. I have very dry/sensitive skin and so far no major breakouts. One bump popped up, but I can't attribute that to this product. Everyone's skin is different, but so far I'm really liking it! If I notice breakouts after longer use I'll update!

Overall, I really like this sunscreen. It has a very silicone-y feel, which might not be for everyone, but I don’t mind. I actually think this is a great sub for a primer and my foundation sits better, especially around the nose area. It doesn’t make me break out, as long as I use a lighter moisturizer underneath. I’ve used heavier products before applying this and noticed a couple spots pop up. Because of this, probably wouldn’t use when my skin is on the drier side and I need a thicker moisturizer.

I bought this because it was an award winner from Allure, and I do not regret a thing. This sunscreen comes out clear, SO NO WHITE RESIDUE! Another bonus is that it doesn't leave my face feeling oily or greasy, or even shiny. It's small and easy to pack away. I will be back for more!

I think this just might be my favorite sunscreen for the face. It feels very much like a primer, with that cream-to-powder texture. It's so lightweight that you forget you have it on, and it's not noticeable at all on the face, whether or not you use it alone or under a foundation or powder.  I don't often use a separate sunscreen, because I use a BB cream most days. But I'm thinking of getting this to use on the days I don't feel like wearing makeup.
While I like the way it feels, love that it's clear and it did protect as advertised, I have a HORRIBLE breakout from it.  Despite claiming to be unscented, it smells funny as well.
reviews.review_title: If you're prone to breakouts, steer clear....

reviews.review_text: WOW! I received this in my March Play Box,  just in time too, as I am almost out of sunscreen (where I live, it is a must year round) No breakouts, no greasy film, dried quickly. Directions state to reapply every 2 hours, I haven't done so yet, as I really only need the sunscreen for protection while driving to school, but as summer gets closer I will probably be reapplying,  if I remember hopefully I will update on the results of if I had to reapply a lot of my makeup.

It has a truly invisible texture. No white cast at all. Even straight from the tube, it is a crystal clear. Feels just like Smashbox's primer, and is grippy, so this is great for people who want a sunscreen and mild primer in one. I experienced no irritation or breakouts at all.
Love this product!! It absorbs quickly and does not feel on the skin. The most what I like is that it is clear !!
I love how this doesn’t leave a greasy feeling on my face. I am oily in spots and some sunscreens can exacerbate that issue. So glad I found this gem!
This is a great facial sun screen! Not greasy at all and works well under makeup!

This stuff is AMAZING! I have two full sleeves and hand tattoos so sunscreen is a must and this amazing lotion just melts into the skin! I got a sample with the Sephora Play and I intend to purchase a bigger size!
reviews.review_title: Sunscreen is a way of life!

reviews.review_text: Best sunscreen ever! Feels like a primer when applied, not greasy. Great under foundation. You won’t regret.
The perfect facial sunscreen does exist! Happy :)
Clear, extremely light weight formula without the strong sunscreen smell. My face is protected, and it doubles as a solid makeup primer. Got in in my play box and love it!

This stuff smells so good, I love it. It does smell like sunscreen, but I happen to like that smell so if you don’t — maybe look for another spf product; however the scent does fade after a few minutes. It goes on like a dream and smoothes my pores. It’s perfect under makeup or by itself. I can’t wait to buy it again!!

Pros:
Great spf protection, smooths pores and is excellent as a primer or on its own, lovely fragrance

Cons:
It is a little pricey, if you don’t like the scent of sun screen then you might not appreciate the fragrance
Doesn’t pill over my skincare and it doesn’t make a weird base for foundation! I’m in love!

I tried this during a face foundation class and was given a sample to try again on my own. At first I thought the foundation had caused the irritation, but after trying just the sunscreen... low and behold super skin irritation!! Now I have a face/neck of little red bumps that itch.

I hate the kind of metallic shine that all sunscreens leave on my face after using it! But this unseen sunscreen is complete life!!! I have combo skin and it's mature so I have to use sun protection everyday.  this sunscreen is almost like a... I guess dry gel is this best way I can describe it. not greasy,  VERY thin, smooth, and makes my skin look almost matte after I use it. this doesn't make me look greasy and it doesn't really have a scent. !  I'll probably use this for years to come! great product! only bad thing is I have to reapply more times that I like but that's it.

The best sunscreen for people with oily skin and enlarged pores! SPF 40 is great especially since it doesn't feel oily and I live in Vegas. Has a silicone-like feel and acts like a primer and helps with oil control. No white cast whatsoever since its formula is clear. Only downside was when I used a new moisturizer, this sunscreen would clump up under my makeup. So I stopped using it for a while and tried 4-5 other sunscreens. I got a new moisturizer recently and tried it with this sunscreen and they are like a match made in heaven!

First sunscreen I came across that does not leave a white cast on my  dark skin. It is light weight, mattifying and pore minimizing. All of that is a plus for me because I have oily skin and large pores. A little goes a long way; I've had this product since July 2018 and still on my first bottle. Keep in mind that I use this product EVERYDAY.
I like unseen sunscreen broad spectrum SPF 40 is a good product
It is so f—ing nice to have sunscreen on without making you look even more white!!
to formulate this product without parabens, synthetic fragrances, or oxybenzone is great... but its kinda pointless considering octinoxate literally induces coral bleaching.

Best face sunscreen I’ve ever used. It sinks right in with no white cast, and I can’t even tell I’m wearing sunscreen. The smell is natural and really pleasant. It feels like the Smashbox photofinish primer and like the primer makes my skin look smooth! LOVE this.

Going out of my way to write this review because that's how pleased I am! I went to Florida last week, (my face hasn't seen the sun in practically six months) so I decided to buy this in hopes that I wouldn't break out like I normally do from drug store face sun screen. This literally cleared my face of any blemishes??!! Yes, i'm sure the sun also helped significantly but I know this played a huge part too. You will not be disappointed. I think with its consistency it will likely work well on all skin types. So pleased! My parents even used my bottle and said the same thing. Definitely give it a try if you're on the fence.
Stays on all day and offers full sun protection. Sad I didn’t discover this sooner.
I bought this on a whim while I was browsing through the Sephora App. I was drawn to the fact that it is an invisible and weightless sunscreen, and it really is! Would definitely recommend.
It works as it states.
This didn't work for me. My skin is normal leaning towards dry during winter and it gave my skin an overall oily appearance.
I love this product!!! It smells amazing and works really well as a primer... gotta love products that serve dual purposes! I am definitely buying again.
I love every product I have tried from supergoop.  Thus is great for an outdoor sweaty workout or under makeup.
I was worried that this sunscreen would bother my dry skin, but it goes on smoothly and my makeup sits perfectly on top.
I’m turning 30 so it’s about time I stopped slacking on sunscreen. This has the consistency of a really good primer. Hasn’t caused any breakouts. I love it! Worth the hype!
I’m a sunscreen fanatic and, while I prefer a matte sunscreen in the summer, this has year round usefulness.   Great as a sunscreen in cooler months and perfect to reapply OVER makeup any time.
LOVE!!! Finally a sunscreen I can use - does not dry your skin out or make it look greyish. This is literally transparent and dissolves in your skin like magic.
It’s perfectly invisible and matte. And it’s like a primer. I like it. I wanna get this again.
I love it!! Will buy it again for sure ❤️
I love how this can also be used as a primer. It does a pretty good job at making my makeup last throughout the day, as well as protecting my skin from sun damage
I have never been able to wear sunscreen daily because I do not like the way it feels on my skin. This is weightless, truly greaseless, and feels exactly like I'm putting on primer. Love it.
reviews.review_title: The only sunscreen I can wear daily

reviews.review_text: Non greasy and a little goes a long way
I have been looking for a great daily sunscreen and this one is amazing. I use on top of my daily moisturizer as well as oil and it seems to make my make-up go on so much smoother then before! Love!

This is my favorite everyday sunscreen.  Often I use a primer as well, so it may be a waste, but it really is invisible and works with my foundation.  For extended hikes and beach, I use something else.
this is an amazing product. I have sensitive skin and usually break out from sunscreen, but this is great! I can easily apply makeup over it and it is really light and smooth.
I have oily skin and this isn’t bad at all. It is invisible once applied but does leave a slip on your skin. As long as you’re using a mattifying primer if your skin is oily, you should be good.

I can't speak to the SPF because I haven't tested this out in a full day of sun and I don't burn easily, but I will say this is the best facial sunscreen I have ever tried. It feels similar to a silicone primer and goes on matte. It doesn't have that sunscreen smell, either. I have oily skin and by the end of the day I am no more oily than normal when I wear this sunscreen, so I can say with confidence that it does not increase my oiliness. I can see myself repurchasing this long into the future.
reviews.review_title: You will want to repurchase this is if you try it

reviews.review_text: Just arrived at my doorstep and I already love how it glides on.  The texture of this product is amazing for a sunscreen.  I bought this to go under my mineral sunscreen, to ensure I have blue light protection.  I try to avoid fragrance, so I love that this has no scent.

I have tried so many sunscreens but this is absolutely the BEST! Nothing compares to this sunscreen. Absolutely no greasy texture it feels just like a primer. No white cast which is amazing. A must buy ladies and gents. Don’t hesitate buy it you will not regret it.

As a brown skin girl, finding a sunscreen that doesn’t leave a cast is extremely hard. However, this product is literally invisible and feels amazing going on. It has changed the way I view sunscreen and I actually look forward to wearing it each and every day. Super goop has changed the game with this one! Thank you!

First Sephora review!! A little sample size came in my Play! by Sephora box and I fell in love!! Bought the full size as soon as I ran out!! It has a silicone like feel to it on your fingers and face when applying but then it just melts into your skin during the application. Not greasy or sticky. From my experience, it's slightly mattifying (bonus!). Finally!! SPF for my incredibly oily face!!!

This stuff is the real deal. I have a couple of other sunscreens in my rotation, but this is the best one if you're looking for something that sits well under makeup. The texture reminds me of a primer, and it provides the most amazing smoothing and blurring effect. It even looks great on no-makeup days just for that reason. This is the first thing that even came close to my love of La Roche-Posay Anthelios Ultra-light fluid SPF 60, which I will continue to reach for on days that I need a little extra coverage. If Supergoop raised the SPF factor on this I would drop everything!
This is worth every penny! It soaks in quickly and doesnt affect my makeup at all! I haven't had an issue with the SPF breaking me out at all.

Absolutely love this! It’s lightweight & it feels silky (not sure if that would be the correct word to describe it). I hate when a sunscreen makes my face feel dirty or if I touch it & it crumbles up but this doesn’t do that even though the I Sweat. I think the price is great bc I it lasted me a little over 7 months & I used it everyday since I live in Arizona
This stuff melts into your skin and leaves no residue! Goes on super smooth. It’s literally the BEST sunscreen I have ever used.

I love this light weight super smooth, easy to blend sunscreen for my face! I don’t wear make up but I imaging that it would be perfect under makeup! I like that there’s no strong smell and a little goes a long way!

I hate it, hate it, hate it, HAAAATTTTE IT. It felt so gross and it made my moisturizer crumble so i wasnt able to do my makeup. Even if I didnt wanna wear makeup, I cant use it with any moisturizer or else it looks bad. IT ALSO FEELS GROSS. I HATE ANYTHING THAT FEELS LIKE SILICONE.
First time using sunscreen before makeup and I definitely got the best option. It leaves my skin super soft. The smell is amazing. I loved it.
Honestly a pretty awesome sun screen. It doesn't have the feel of a normal sunscreen and actually doubles as a great primer so it'll work well under makeup. Totally recommend!

Love the texture, goes on clear, not greasy or tacky and provides great base for makeup. Hot tip, my boyfriend loved it too because other, White sunscreens get in his beard and get crusty and gross. He’s always grabbing this out of my bag when we are on vacation. Just wish it was cheaper... I’d use it on the rest of my body.

First I must say this is an amazing sunscreen to wear on its own or under makeup. I love the fragrance free, non greasy, colorless formula AND spf 40. But the real kicker here that has my jaw literally dropped is the fact that I’ve spent so much money on primers claiming to keep my oily skin matte and none of them help it last beyond an hour or two. I use this stuff as my primer or pair it with a pore blurring primer on top and let me tell you, I haven’t had to use oil blotting sheets in weeks! I don’t know what it is but I’m sold on this! To me, it’s like a matte primer with spf 40 that actually works and keeps me matte all day. I will repurchase this for as long as it is made! Highly highly recommended
Best sunscreen ever! I have oily acne prone skin, this is so clean and gives me a smooth texture.

This is the absolute best facial sunscreen I have ever come across for make up wearers.  Non greasy, works amazingly as a primer, its everything you could ever want. With good skincare routines and this, you can't go wrong.

I have combination skin live in South Texas so lots of sun and heat. So far its great under my makeup, not heavy and doesn't leave me greasy! Still trying to figure out how to control the T zone oil but its worth the issue for clean spf coverage.
This is the ONLY sunscreen that my overly sensitive skin tolerates. It goes on super easy and doesn't make my skin feel like an oil slick. Nice!!

Amazing. The most lightweight sunscreen I've tried and I've tried a bunch. I have super sensitive rosacea prone skin and I know the importance of sunscreen with sensitive skin. With any skin for that matter. I have fair skin and live in Texas. This stuff wears so nice its not greasy, not shiny, and truly layers invisibly under sunscreen. It is kind of pricer for sunscreen but worth every penny because it actually makes me want to use it every day.
I love this product. It has great protection and makes my skin feel so smooth. No white cast and it leaves a really nice natural finish on the skin. Highly recommend!
Love this-best sunscreen and works great as a primer too.

this made me break out like crazy! plenty of new skincare products can make my skin breakout in the first week, but this sunscreen continued to make me breakout week over week. it has a nice feel and is lightweight if it works for your skin, but I had to throw away the bottle before I finished it.
No stickiness, smooth finish. Love ❤️ it

This feels almost like a really great soft primer. It does not make your skin dry but does mattify! I have oily skin so this stuff feels great and looks beautiful on the skin. I love that it also helps protect against blue light as I work on a computer everyday.

Love this product. It is clear and no residue after application. Very light and smooth on the face and good for combination oily skin like me. This is my second bottle and my son is using it too. He likes it because there is no white cast after applying it. He complains about the scent though, but scent is no problem with me. It smells a little bit like silicon. Also I am giving it 4 star because it has Octinoxate which is not good for sea environment. Hopefully they will remove that ingredient soon. I like oxybenzone free because it gives me allergic reaction to it aside from it is bad for the environment. This product does not have that. Hopefully it will be octinoxate free soon as well.
reviews.review_title: Very light and clear; no white cast

reviews.review_text: This sunscreen is so good. It's definitely worth a try - you won't go back! It feels like a Laura Mercier primer and makes daily SPF way easier.
LOVE! Goes on so smooth you don’t even notice you’re wearing sunscreen. Highly recommend!
I used Cover FX cream foundation and the super goop plays very well with it. Supergoop doesn’t make the foundation move or separate after a few hours. The texture it amazing too.
this does make my skin look smoother, however I do not like the smell of this product.

I love the way this feels on my skin. It seems to protect
My face from the winter weather as well as from the sun. I haven’t tried it in warm humid weather but I look forward to it!

I have very oily and sensitive skin, and i was afraid that this sunscreen would leave me with breakouts or make my skin oily after 1 hour, but its doesn't, for me now its more enjoyable to use this everyday since it doesn't feel heavy and doesn't leave any white cast.

I really loved the texture and how soft it goes on, but sad to say it did not agree with my skin. Fortunately I did not break out but it did make my face itch throughout the day. Bummer! I really wanted to love this :(
reviews.review_title: Nice texture but not for sensitive skin

reviews.review_text: Possibly one of my favorite skincare items of all time. I am on my second bottle now, took me a year to get through the first one!! Bought both of my parents a tube for Christmas and they love it on their mature skin as well. Great non great, formula with no white cast due to the transparent color, with a great silky finish that makes apply makeup flawless. Would recommend for all skin types! A must have item.
I'd recommend this to anyone! It goes on clear and doubles as a great primer. Somedays I just wear this with no make-up. Definitely recommend!
I've tried so many different ones but I always end up back to this. Truly is my favorite!

The best skin care discovery in a long time for me. I am very bad at wearing sunscreen on my face, typically annoyed at over oily, breakout causing, sticky mess in a lotion bottle.... that is, until I found this product. This has become the favorite part of my makeup routine every day now. It feels like soft clouds caressing my face when applied, drying down to the perfect texture to be worn with or without makeup. I have tried pairing this with three foundations, and have noted that it actually made the foundation stay longer and no added oil by the end of the day. After starting to use this, I get compliments on my skin at work. A little goes a long way. I would say I use about 1/2mL each use (give or take), so with daily use, this bottle would provide 100 applications.

I will never be without this. Never. It’s the one and only spf I’ve ever used that didn’t dry my skin out, make it shiny, or generally not sit well under foundation. It never pills, it’s just silky smooth.

Finally a sunscreen that doesn’t leave a white cast or make me break out. I have sensitive acne prone skin and have struggled with finding a sunscreen my face agrees with. I have hyperpigmentation that I’m trying to clear up with skincare products and need a good sunscreen. This has been the best. I highly recommend if you have sensitive brown skin.

This an awesome idea, a sunscreen that doubles as a primer! This product goes on very easily and has a similar consistency of a silicone primer.  It is clear,  or very light yellowish in color,  so obviously there is no white cast. There is a faint sunscreen scent,  but that doesn't bother me.  This does help my makeup last,  but I will say that those like myself with oily skin and large pores will need to blot powder a couple times during the day.  No big deal though,  I don't know of a primer with 30+ spf, clear,  mattifying, smoothing, and long lasting.  So, I still consider this a win!

living for this. I've been through an array of SPF products trying to protect my stupid face from the harsh outside world, and this one is killin it. first of all, it doesn't have that sunscreen smell, it's (like the other reviewers have all said) like a primer so it blends easily and is perfect for applying makeup on top of.
I really liked it.  Wonderful and affordable.  Give it a try.
It felt beautiful but it broke me out... I really wish it didnt because it work great as a primer and a sunscreen.

I never wear sunscreen because they ALL made me face breakout. Even after trying the Murad version my face still broke out. This was my last attempt at sunscreen and I’m so glad it worked! It goes on smooth without pilling up into little balls. My makeup goes on nicely over it, and it also acts like a primer.

Feels not only like best daily sunscreen but also the best primer. Feels like the lightest, smoothest skin shield that also then takes on makeup beautifully. The feel of it is addicting. I’ve always dreaded a daily spf and this now is something I look forward to applying.

As a woman of color, this product is a big win. I’ve been searching for a daily sunscreen that doesn’t leave a white cast on my skin FOREVER. Have tried moisturizer with SPF before but it broke me out. This goes on smoothly and sinks into the skin very nicely. It feels like a lightweight primer, but even if you used this with no makeup after, your skin would feel clean and fresh and bare. After cleansing   toner and serums, I apply my moisturizer and let that sink in, then apply this sunscreen as the final skincare step. Next I add my cc serum or any other makeup and it layers perfectly. A little goes a long way. I have oily, acne-prone skin and am sensitive to artificial scents. This product fits the bill, I highly recommend.

It's more like a PRIMER with sunscreen. I generally dislike any kind of silicone-y feeling primer, and this feels exactly like that. I can see how this can work for other people, but if you're not a fan of primers, stay away.
reviews.review_title: More of a primer than spf

reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this sunscreen!! it is weightless, dries matte and leaves my skin feeling so flawless. i have a normal-oily skin and my skin does not look oily at the end of the day if I don't have make up on.

Love this product. It's a nice texture that is clear and has no smell. It blends nicely onto the skin and doesn't feel like I'm wearing anything. I'm really sensitive to facial sunscreens and this one is definitely a keeper

4 stars only because it’s so darn expensive for freaking sunscreen. But dangit, is it worth it. It’s mattefying but not drying which is perfect for my combination skin. No smell, no residue, it’s so great and even though it’s pricey I’m going to be buying it again and again
I was shocked at first by the gel-like texture, but it goes on like a dream! Stand alone, or mixing it with your moisturizer. Makes your skin smooth and maybe even a little brighter!

I use this instead of my Benefit Porefessional. It helps my makeup last longer just like a primer. I used to use the Coola matte sunscreen, but it was only SPF 30. I absolutely love this stuff and how well makeup goes on over it!

I have combination skin with a tendency towards dry, flaky patches. Sunscreen typically brings that out in my skin until now! Supergoop is soft and silky and doesn't dry my skin out. I use it over a normal moisturizer (this is not a replacement for moisturizer). I love it!

This product is truly unseen and goes on sheer. It feels and looks like it is mattifying and it feels really good on the skin. It goes on really smooth too. My only problem is that every time I use it I get a cystic pimple somewhere on my face. I used it once and got a large cystic pimple, I stopped using it and decided to use it again after the pimple cleared to see if this caused the problem and it caused another pimple at a different location. So sadly this isn't for me... For background, I have sensitive combination acne prone skin with large pores so be weary if you are the same.

I want to love this so badly. It is mattifying, it goes on clear and disappears. But for the life of me no matter what I do it pills under my makeup. I have tried moisturizing, not moisturizing, using different moisturizers. I even waited an hour after putting this on before applying foundations/powders and it still pills. I have amazing skin. I am not a bragger, but that's my one lucky genetic trait. I hate that this pills every time I use it. I so badly want to utilize this for all the other amazing reasons, but after months it's just not happening. I bought the SPF setting spray. At least that won't pill. :-(

This sat on my shelf for a while but recently, I’ve finally seen the light. Not only great sunscreen but hands down the best PRIMER I have ever used and that includes stints with hourglass and too faced. I have combo, sensitive, acne-prone skin with serious dry patches and as a primer, this doesn’t dry me out or cause breakouts. Will definitely be repurchasing!!
I love this sunscreen. It actually gets me to wear sunscreen everyday. It’s clear and goes on like primer.
I love this sunscreen. It’s not greasy and I can wear it under my foundation.

Best "unseen" sunscreen I have ever tried. Works like a primer for makeup. It is velvety soft but not greasy. I only have one issue - it really stings my eyes. I will continue to purchase even if I have to use a different sunscreen for my eyes.
I received a sample of this

One of my favorite sunscreens of all time. I'm on my 3rd tube right now. It is a little pricey compared to what's on the market but I really like the texture, finish, and effectiveness of this. Texture is similar to a primer with that silky feeling, and the finish is like a... semi-matte finish. If you're the type to put on face makeup every day, this also works as a primer while keeping you protected from the rays. If you're extremely oily and/or combination, this is a perfect daily sunscreen for you. Makeup products with sunscreen built into it don't work as well (e.g. foundation with SPF) because you actually have to put more on for it to be effective; with this, it's made as a sunscreen and since it's similar to a traditional primer, you can use a generous amount for the sun protection without it feeling too heavy or packing it on like you would if you used a foundation with SPF. Highly recommend!

Pretty good but not amazing. It does have a pretty 'matte' feel but I would say it's more 'matte' like a silicone layer than 'matte' like a powder. I say this because my glasses slip around my face like crazy with this stuff on, even if my skin doesn't feel greasy at all. It still adds a bit of 'slip' because it doesn't really sink in, just sits on your face. Feels like a primer -- makes your skin super smooth and soft. So, I think you will probably like this if you live in a humid climate / tend to have oiler skin and also don't wear glasses or have concern about them slipping around on your face :)

I really loved goop sunscreen, it went on smoothly, evened oit the texture of my skin, was excellent as a makeup primer, non greasy not shiny a great everyday sunscreen. EXCEPT,.. alas it clogged my pores. Maybe it’s just me but as soon as I stopped using it, my pores were no longer clogged.
reviews.review_title: Supergoop great except clogged my pores

reviews.review_text: I love this sunscreen! The texture is amazing- soft and silky, almost like a primer. It's great alone or mixed with foundation.
LOVE LOVE LOVE can’t say anything bad about this. And I normally hate sunscreen.

i LOVE this product. I had been using neutrogena sheer dry touch for my face, but it doesnt even come close to how great this is. This is a smooth, clear "goop" with a silicone texture. It glides on smooth, sets quickly, and doesn't disrupt my base application. SO SO good and worth the price.

The texture of this sunscreen is remeniscent of a primer. It's almost clear and reminds me of the Makeupforever Step 1 Primer. It blends, provides a nice base for foundation, and my makeup actually holds up throughout the day. No pilling, or breaking up of foundation/concealer over time (both problems I faced with multiple sunscreens). Definitely recommend this for everyday use!

Doesn’t break me out, glides beautifully over my moisturizer and sits perfectly under my makeup (I wait 10-15mins before applying makeup). Feels like velvet on the skin after just a couple minutes. I will use this forever (please keep it forever).

Have been using this on and off for about 6 months. I wanted to love it, being able to consolidate to one product instead of a sunscreen and then a primer. Sunscreens never set and this product is no different. As a primer I can put my make up on at 6am and by 9am my make up is sliding all over my face and settling into what few movement lines I have on my face. It certainly does NOT grip my foundation at all.
reviews.review_title: It's light and colorless but does not grip makeup!

reviews.review_text: THE PERFECT DAILY SUNSCREEN! Great under makeup. Doesn’t have a scent, doesn’t leave a white cast, and I practically forget it’s there. Best sunscreen ever.

I love this stuff. I'm a dark-skinned African-American woman and have had considerable difficulty finding a sunscreen that both didn't leave white cast and provided a pleasant finish. It smoothes the skin, leaving it matte and oil-free throughout the day. I do not wear facial makeup in general, but when I occasionally dab on concealer over pimples, I do find it helps it sit better on the skin, making the concealer less discernible.
My favorite every day face sunscreen. I love it so much, doesn’t leave a cast, works great under makeup and doesn’t ball up with any of my other skin care products. I love it!!!

Love this sunscreen. I use sunscreen religiously and hate sunscreens that leave a white cast or struggle to find “tinted” sunscreens that truly are universal (I’m in the medium/olive/tan category). I’ve had a couple other favorites but this one is great because it really feels like there’s nothing on your skin. Super light and nice velvety texture. It also has a very very light scent that goes away quickly. Overall I’m very happy with my purchase.

I have combination skin and I love this product. I was skeptical because I had yet to find a facial sunscreen that wasn't too greasy or white. This goes on and feels like an anti shine primer. I wear it over my moisturizer.
reviews.review_title: Love it, can't believe it's sunscreen.

reviews.review_text: This product is the best sunscreen I have ever found. The ingredients are some of the best out there, but it does have dimethicone. I just make sure at the end of the day my face is thoroughly clean to prevent breakouts. I use cosdna to check everything I even think about putting on my face, and this one check out! My only complaint is the smell, but it isn’t noticeable 10 seconds after application.

I really like and regularly use a lot of their products, but this one was a no-go almost from the start. The texture, even after drying down, felt like I had a layer of slick plastic sitting on top of my skin (which, I believe, is technically true of a lot of primers, but it shouldn't *feel* like it). I eventually had to just take everything off and start over because I couldn't stand the sensation. As such, I have no idea if it's any good for sunscreen or makeup longevity.
Best daily spf for oily skin. Acts as a primer and blurs pores. My foundation blends seamlessly on top of this stuff. Will definitely repurchase!
Gah, I love this stuff! My kids have even stopped complaining about wearing sunscreen on their face when I use this.  It feels wonderful!
This is the best sunscreen for black skin ever.  No "ghost face" and no " grandma just slathered my face down with Vaseline" look. I can't praise this stuff enough.
This is the perfect sun protection with the texture of a primer to go under makeup! I use it daily!

I have been looking at this for a long time and debating on whether or not to try it because the idea of sunscreen and primer in one just seemed like it couldn’t possibly do the job for my makeup routine after... this stuff is PHENOMENAL. Better than any primer I’ve used in the past. I will not be purchasing anything but this from now on. What a beautiful thing to have clean, high spf facial sunscreen and a primer in one. Wow. They really did it with this one!
Love. Finally a sunscreen that doesn't make me break out. It's more of a clear gel and sits nicely under makeup.

This would be great for those living in warmer climates. That matte finish stays matte throughout the day. I apply this sunscreen after toning and applying either an essence or cream. This glides over anything shiny and transforms into a matte finish. No scent which I love. Now this can irritate sensitive eyes so be careful not to get too close. I learned the hard way by applying this before jogging outside and the sweat combined with the sunscreen trickled down to my eyes. Irritating. So it’s not a workout sunscreen. But it’s good as a daily matte sunscreen.
This is my new favorite. I have very oily skin and most sunscreens make it even worse, but this does not. It also does not irritate my acne prone skin.
Love this product! It is not like your traditional sunscreen and that's what I love about it.

I initially really liked this because it has no scent and goes on easily (not sticky). However, I question whether it's actually effective--I seem to have gotten a lot of sun spots since using it. I also started breaking out (large, angry pimples), something that my skin never does. The only change in my skincare regimen has been this sunblock. I definitely won't be using it anymore.
I am so glad that this has come into my life.  I love this product and unlike those I have used/tried in the past, a little goes a long way.  Definitely has become a staple for me.
First sunscreen ive used and I love it. Very light weight. No lingering smell. Does not show up or dry white on the skin. Literally blurs your pores and imperfections!!
I like it. Seems greasy at first but then it absorbs into your skin. Doubles as a pretty good primer as well. Doesn't have that annoying sunblock smell. Doesn't break me out.
Big fan of this stuff. It doesn't smell like most sunscreens (though the smell is a little odd it goes away almost immediately) and it isn't greasy or lotion-y which makes it great for every-day use.
I love this product! Leaves my skin soft not greasy

Finally a matte finish, white proof, streak free sunscreen that doesn't irritate my face!! I have been shopping and in search of a year round sunblock that doesn't leave my face looking like i'm wearing a thick white cream or a super greasy oil slick. I'm quite happy that companies are now thinking of the darker skin toned people in the world when formulating product.
best sunscreen i have ever used, unseen as in unfelt...goes on perfect and does not over-oil skin

This is THE BEST sunscreen I have ever used! And this is why:
1.- Very light non greasy feeling.
2.- It is actually transparent (no white cast!).
3.- You feel you are using a primer instead of a sunscreen, and i don't even use primers in my daily routine.
4.- After you put it on it dries quickly and seem to "mattify" your skin.
5.- I am very prone to acne and this product did not cause any breakouts in me, I have been using it for 4 months.
6.- The first bottle last me 3 month (I use it everyday, even if I am staying home)
7.- It goes perfectly under makeup (for me that is very important) It actually makes my makeup looks better, sometimes I use it at night just as a primer (I know it's crazy, but I feel is that good).

If you are looking for a great sunscreen give this a try!
Love love love using this product under my makeup. It almost blurs out my pores, my makeup goes on top really well, and it provides sun protection! The feel of the product is very silky.
There are no cons.  It is lightweight, non-greasy, and invisible way to wear SPF

I bought this sunscreen after reading so many good reviews. It has similar texture to the smashbox photo finish primer and is not sticky at all which made me really excited because I hate that sticky feeling after sunscreen application. I used it for 5-6 times over a period of two months and every time I applied it I got breakouts on my forehead and cheeks the next day, even after double cleanse. I returned it!
reviews.review_title: Broke me out every single time!

reviews.review_text: love this; no white smudges...

HG sunscreen! I wear it every day. Gel-like consistency (think Smashbox Photo Finish primer) lets it blend into skin easily. If I'm feeling like my skin is a little dry, I'll mix this with a pump of daily moisturizer before application. Either way, I do not have to use a [facial] primer anymore as this does the trick. Has held up on its own, as it's not too shiny like creamy sunscreens, and under powder (I do not use with liquid foundation as mine already has sunscreen in it).

I always hated wearing sunblock before because of the smell and just never really understood the value of wearing sunblock. After trying supergoop Unseen it definitely lives up to the hype. It has NO smell and is SO smooth on your skin. I use it as a primer before makeup during the day and or just leave it by itself if I dont use any foundation for the day. You can not see any hint of white sunblock on you at all and it just glides so smoothly. Probably my most favorite and best product I own! Highly recommend this to everyone
