I have no idea how they formulated this SO well. I have very dry skin that needs a lot of moisturizing, and this is a great bonus step to my skincare routine (it acts like another amazing lotion!). It is completely invisible on my skin, doesn't leave me oily by the end of the day, doesn't make my BB cream pill up... and I feel so great about having the extra sun protection. Magical.

Unfortunately, I wasn't really pleased with this sunscreen at all.  I'm not a fan of that velvety texture because It's hard to even out on the face and it was hard to distinguish if I had a lot or too little on my face because it blends in clear.  I felt like it wasn't lightweight and it made my skin feel greasy.  Also hard to tell if it was working or not.

This is the only sunscreen that works on my super oily skin!! Although SPF is so important I didn’t like wearing it because it would make me greasy. This sunblock is silicone so it almost feels like a primer, and it doesn’t leave a white cast like other sunblocks because it’s clear. I loooove it
I absolutely love this stuff! Great sunblock coverage and a nice smooth base for makeup. I no longer need to use powder because this and my makeup create a nice glowing affect.

I bought this for an everyday sunscreen for my face. I bought it basically because I love supergoop and I consistently buy their oil sunscreen. However, this product was a bit of a disappointment. It says that there’s no fragrance to this and does not smell like sunscreen, but it does. Very slightly, but it’s still there. Luckily, the smell goes away throughout the day. So I am still able to stand it, so I still use it. It also has a very silicone like feel to it that I thought wouldn’t be a problem, but I am not liking (just by preference). I’m going to continue to finish what I have, but I probably won’t buy again.

I have very mixed thoughts on this product. For a sunscreen, it's great. Clear, smooth, and not smelly. As a primer, it's not great. My makeup is not as flawless compared to using my regular holy grail primer from Lancome, even if I layer this under it. My makeup just does not look the same. If you're using this more for a sunscreen than a primer, I would recommend it! As a primer, not so much. I will use it up when I really need sunscreen, but I won't be repurchasing. Will be using their setting spray as well, which doesn't disrupt my makeup.

Bought this to bring to Hawaii for my fiancé and I! I hate that mineral smell and oily sunblocks from the store, plus they always make me break out! I got a sample of this before and have loved it! It isn’t oily, no scent, and works great! My fiancé loved using it as well, he was surprised when he first put it on! Highly recommend
Best sunscreen I’ve ever used.
I love that this is not sticky or oily, and has a pleasant gel texture with no fragrance. It also helps keep my make-up in place. Most importantly, it didn't cause any break outs.
I love the how light this sunscreen is and the matte finish that it ends with! It's become one of my favorite additions to my skin-care regime.

This primer applies smoothly and clear and feels light as air.  I sometimes wear foundations, but mostly concealers with powder and this Supergoop allows for seamless application and flawless finish!  I accidentally applied way too much while pregaming with the girls for a night out which is the only instance where it felt the slightest tad bit “sunscreen greasy”.  I apply on my face alone if I’m applying makeup when the sun is down, and on my ears and neck and even down to my chest for daytime.  My makeup lasts 10hr days with minimal transfer (I sometimes touch my face—I know, bad!) with this as a base, from the high-end Natasha Denona Foundation X (90/92) to the Sephora Bright Future Color Corrector (Orange), the latter which tends to crease and wear off with a crappier primer, but far less so with this Supergoop one.

I score this product 5 stars because it is a high quality primer as well as UV protection, it is splendid for dark skin tones, friendly to my oily skin, plus it withstands the heat and a little sweat.  I blot once or twice in the day (and I do this daily because I am genetically ultra oily everywhere no matter what product I use).  Wearing this product alone does not give the skin a particularly blurred look, but the skin feels smoother.

Work wonderfully and doesn’t feel heavy or greasy. When I first put it on I thought the texture was a little weird and I wasn’t into it but after I gave it a minute to set on my face it felt nice and smooth.

I love this sunscreen so much! I have super oily skin and I also live it the hot place. I been trying to find a good sunscreen for my face and I found it! My routine with this is I wash my face with my acne wash, tone, moisturizer my face, and then put this on. This has not effected my makeup at all. I highly recommend this product.

I’m a mineral sunscreen kind of girl but I tested this on my skin and really liked the texture and feel but, I started break out. I’m not returning since I tried it with a “next to nothing” foundation product so I’m trying to clear my skin up and try this sunscreen again because I really, really want an effective non- mineral sunscreen.  I’m saying yes with special caution to acne-prone or sensitive skin types. Patch test first don’t use any other new products to isolate the reaction.

I hate mineral sunscreens and I was never able to wear them everyday like I know you should do. Then I found this chemical one, and its so smooth (silicone sensitivity beware). I finally got an SPF I wear religiously. It works as a great make up primer too due to the silicones. I understand the ingredients will not be for everybody but if you're ok with chemical sunscreen and silicones, this may be the SPF for you!
reviews.review_title: Good If you like Chemical SPF

reviews.review_text: I love this product. I just took on my trip to Italy- where the sun was so strong and I was out all day- and it gave me full coverage. I felt like I didn't need to reapply more. And it doesn't feel oily like traditional sunscreens. I would recommenced it!

This stuff is absolutely amazing! It's works for daily application and does not leave a white cast - I was very concerned about that on my medium skin tone. It is clear, light and moisturizing. It can easily be worn alone or under makeup. A little bit goes a long way, so I don't mind the price, especially for something I will use everyday. I love it!

I was looking for an everyday sunscreen and with this I have found the perfect one! I use to hate putting on sunscreen everyday because they were always so oily and I felt like they just sat on my skin or made my makeup look weird. This is totally different from anything I've tried before. It is kind of hard to see online, but it is a clear gel-like sunscreen, and goes on clear with no white residue that you get from other sunscreens. I also really like that it protects from blue light. All the other blue light protection creams I have found are expensive and I haven't found this in many other sunscreens but think it is also very important in addition to UV protection. I have dealt with acne for a very long time and have not experience any break outs from this. My first bottle from 3 months ago is still going (after almost daily use) and I have already re-ordered my second bottle. I will definitely be using this for a long time, it will be very hard to make me switch from this!
the best sunscreen I’ve tried, by far (and I’ve tried plenty). doesn’t ever break me out, it is non comedogenic. goes great under make up also!
A Lovely texture. It’s is a translucent cream so there are no streaks. Sunscreen is so important and this one is easy to apply.
I want to love it because of all the positive reviews but it breaks me out so badly!

OK, if I could give this 20 stars I would. I have NEVER met a sunscreen (for my face) that I absolutely loved. Like, maybe, but never love. They are always good but... Well, this one is also good but..., BUT (hahaha) for very different reasons. First the love part. OMG, you put this stuff on and you neither see it nor feel it 60 seconds later. I have no clue what it is made of but I think of a silicone based product when I use it. There is no wet feeling at all when you put it on. No irritating smell. NO detrimental effects on your make up. No breakouts (for me anyway). I couldn't convey any stronger how much I love this product if they paid me millions to do so. 

Now, on to the but... Really? Does it really have to be this expensive? If you use facial sunscreen, you pretty much have to use it daily. That's a high price tag for a product you have to use daily. From what I understand, you have to put a good amount of any sunscreen on in order to obtain the benefits of the SPF level in the product. So if you're just barely putting this on to make it last longer, you're getting a beautiful, weightless, makeup friendly, SPF 15 :(  But for those of you who are willing to pay that ridiculous price tag (like me unfortunately), this is the ONLY sunscreen to put on your face. You will never regret it!
I love how this applies to the skin. It is very smooth and blends easily. I love that it is clear and doesn’t smell like other sunscreen products or give a white cast.
This is a great sunscreen that is lightweight and goes on smoothly.

Okay what the heck, how did I not know about this product sooner??? Amazing! Not only is it clear and not greasy at all, but it also has the feel of a primer. It goes on so nicely and doesn't make my skin look oily at all! I use to hate wearing sunscreen on my face because I hated how oily it would get and also the white color of sunscreen sometimes doesn't rub in well, but this stuff is a game changer! I wear it every day under whatever else I have on my face and it's great! Never going back to anything else.

This is more than a sunscreen, it’s a wonderful makeup primer with the added benefits of spf. I’ve noticed a difference with my makeup application and wear throughout the day. I also have had some dry spots on my face and this actually helped soothe them and make them more manageable to apply makeup. It’s a game changer for me.
I've been using this tube everyday for five months! It lasts a very long time. It goes on very clear. Smooths skin appearance. Will be repurchasing!

So far it's the only gel sunscreen that I've tried, it was so easy to apply. It made putting on sunscreen actually fun. The only problem with it to me was that there's like only enough of it for your face.

I've really enjoyed this product. I can wear it alone over moisturizer or under makeup pretty easily.  I have dry skin and wear pretty thick moisturizers, do I'd I key those sink in for a few, this sunscreen glides over really nicely, which makes me think it might be good for someone with miss oily skin as well.   I'm pretty fair, so sunscreen is an absolute must for me, and I'm so glad companies are now making products that are so much more available and versatile. The only downside I noticed was that my eyes watere pretty easily if  I get the sunscreen anywhere near my eye area (which I know you shouldn't get it near your eye area at all most of the time), but I do have sort of sensitive eyes.  Still gets an A  from me!

I'm a sunscreen junkie and have tried dozens of brands (LRP, Elta, etc.). However, this is my current favorite because it doesn't leave a white cast, moisturizes and soothes damaged/irritated skin, doesn't sting my eyes, and my normal foundation (NARS sheer or tinted moisturizer) applies beautifully. The texture is similar to your traditional AB sunscreen, but thicker and more luxurious. The result is hydrated and healthy looking skin.
Love this sunscreen. Makes daily application of sunscreen easy and doesn't look oily or feel heavy. Well worth the money!
Clear on brown skin!!! Goes on super smooth like a primer. I used this sunscreen all summer and had zero problems.

We are on a boat, a LOT. Finally, a really good sunscreen, that doesn’t have a weird color or glow. My husband stole mine, so I’ve bought more, and will continue to buy. It has a really nice feel, when applying.
reviews.review_title: Looks and Feels Good, and Works!

reviews.review_text: I purchased this product based on another user's review to try to find a less expensive option for Murad's Invisblur Perfecting Shield. I would say that it does the job as far as a transparent SPF protection that doesn't irritate my skin. The texture of the Supergoop is more powdery whereas Murad is more silky. That doesn't really bother me, however. The only thing I think Murad does much better is the smoothing effect. My skin stays much less shiny using the Murad with no other make up. However, for almost half the price, I have absolutely no complaints about the Unseen Sunscreen!
reviews.review_title: Good less expensive option for Murad Invisiblur

reviews.review_text: Love the gel-like texture and it's fantastic under makeup! No white tint left on the skin. I love everything about this brand!
amazing. no smell and not greasy. really protected my face all day long on vacation!
Applies so smoothly and wears fantastic under makeup. It has a really light scent compared to other spf products I've tried.
As someone with oily skin, his is the best sunscreen I’ve used. It’s very mattifying, makes my skin feel smooth, and doesn’t smell like sunscreen.
Love it!!!!!!! not greasy, just let it absorb.

I was ambivalent about paying this much for sunscreen, but this stuff is great. As others have noted, it goes on like a primer, and it doesn’t have a sunscreen smell or make my face shinier or make me break out. I actually think my skin looks better after a week or so of using it instead of regular facial sunscreen. It is a little irritating to the super sensitive skin on my upper lip, but I just stopped putting it there, and the rest of my face is fine.
Definitely great sunscreen and primer. I like the texture and the sunscreen is unseen. I recommend this product.
BUY THIS SUNSCREEN. It is clean, it is high protection, and it is so lightweight with barely any scent and is BETTER THAN MY MAKEUP PRIMERS!!! Beyond amazing.
love the texture! Perfect to use before the make up as a primer
Love this sunblock! Feels like nothing at all, this is the only sunblock I intend to use on my face ever again.

The only thing is I wish this came in spf 50. 
Love the coverage- a little goes a long way, making this a fair price and a great value. It’s also a decent size package. 
I love love love that this doubles as a clean primer!

This stuff is great! Really fabulous texture and goes on really well under make up. I was also having issues finding a good SPF that wouldn't pill up or look funny on top of moisturizer and this also checked that box. I use it every day!

Searched everywhere for a sunscreen that would work well under my powder foundation, not take ages to dry, and wasn’t tinted (for days I truly don’t want to wear anything!). This is it. It’s the consistency of a face primer and works just as well. Get it. You won’t regret it.
My absolute favorite facial sunscreen! Completely sheer, doesn’t pill, never broke me out and has a smooth matte finish.
I don’t like it. It’s a weird texture on my face
Goes on clear and does not have a white cast. I've been using it as a primer on occasion and it's working well. The product does not have a strong scent and hasn't broken out my skin.

This product warrants my first Sephora review, it's absolute perfection. It's truly a makeup primer; has the feel of the smashbox primers but all of the benefits of a supergoop product. Whether by itself or under your makeup, you're getting the SPF coverage needed  plus an incredibly light, weightless feel product that literally just melts into your skin. And when they say unseen, it truly is just that; it's almost clear when it comes out of the tube and seamlessly goes on. This brand is truly innovative and this product is their newest addition to a wonderful product line!
The best face sunscreen ever! Goes on absolutely clear and matte. No sunscreen smell, or greasiness.

This is the only daily sunscreen I’ve tried for a long time that doesn’t break me out. I love that it doesn’t have a strong smell, and I love it as a primer. I’m on my third bottle and will continue to repurchase.

This product is worth the price tag. It feels amazing on my skin. I bought it for the sole use of protecting my face from sunlight BUT IT'S SUCH A GREAT PRIMER! I have oily skin and it keeps my makeup in line.  Love this brand.
reviews.review_title: if you're on the fence, just buy it

reviews.review_text: I’ve been using supergoop unseen sunscreen for about 3 weeks now, and I really like it! I have normal to oily skin (oily on my t-zone) and this sunscreen just blues my pores while also keeping me satin matte through out the Day and  doesn’t break me out! Btw I’m really oily around my t-zone and breakout over anything.... just Incase you guys are like me and what to try it out!
reviews.review_title: oily/ acne skin. this keeps me satin matte!

reviews.review_text: I love this product! Leaves the skin feeling so soft without the slightest bit of stickiness. It's the perfect everyday sunscreen to put on before your makeup. Highly recommend!

I really like this product because it contains sunscreen. It goes of very smooth and evenly but the only thing I don't like is that it leaves your skin a tad bit oily after. I have to use oil blotting sheets after I apply this so that I can apply powder foundation without it looking uneven from the oil, I wish it went on matte like a lot of the other primers do. Other than that, great product.
I wanted to love this project, but it literally clogged every pore in my face! Had to return it.
reviews.review_title: Ugh. Traded one issue for another!

reviews.review_text:
Bottom line: This sunscreen is dope. My skin can't handle a lot of products so the idea of putting on my fave moisturizer and then putting on a sunscreen with a white cast just wasn't good. I tried this on a lark and it feels velvety going on. It's precisely what it purports to be: invisible sun protection (minus strange smell). And it also made my skin look glowing. Several people remarked on it. It's a team player, working with other products in my arsenal to help me achieve my goal of great-looking skin. 

So why am I not giving it the 5 stars? The price. I don't think it should be at the price point that it is given the amount it offers. I think it should have a little more product at $32.00 Even so, I'm still going to buy it again because it's just that good.
It would really change what you think about sunscreen. I use it as a primer and no need an additional layer for sunscreen. It can also mix with a lightweight foundation, and they work perfectly!

This product is my new must have daily sunscreen! I have an oily t-zone so I typically avoid daily sunscreen and only wear when I'm out in the sun..This is a game changer! I don't feel oily and it's holding my makeup better than any other primer I've used. I just spent 3 days in Disneyland with this as my primer and the refresh spray as touch up throughout the day..No sunburn and no smudged makeup!
Amazing formula! It goes on feeling dry and is truly the only sunscreen that does not clog my pores or break me out. A fast favorite!
Finally! No gray cast! A primer that’s actually clear and doesn’t make my yellow skin look gray!

I am 44 and do not use foundation or any tinted moisturizers. I end my morning skin care routine with a sunscreen. That’s it. With other sunscreens, my face would always be shiny (I don’t use powder either).  The matte finish on this product is very nice. It goes on very smooth and even. Almost with a velvety finish.  My skin feels soft and there is no shine. I spend a bit of time outdoors and it keeps those pesky freckles from coming out so I know it is very protecting. Also doesn’t burn my skin when I sweat. Have purchased three tubes of this and will continue.

LOVE LOVE LOVE! Super silky and totally leaves skin feeling soft and it feels like you are not wearing sunscreen. Wish I would have discovered this earlier after wearing the typical drugstore face SPF which is heavy and greasy and makes me breakout. I have been wearing this under my foundation and so far it seems to help my makeup stay put as well, so added bonus!
reviews.review_title: Perfect for Oily/Problamatic Skin, Feels Great!

reviews.review_text: Hand down the best sunscreen I have used of my face.  This goes on smooth and clear.  There is not weird sunscreen scent which I love.  This works great under my makeup everyday.  This is a holy grail for me.
Love this! Very lightweight, and works great also as a primer!

As a dark-skin black women finding facial sunscreen that doesn’t turn you grey was extremely impossible and frustrating.These are one of the many reasons women of color stray away from sunscreen. Supergoop changed all of that. Not only is it invisible, smooth & silky but it also sticks on even when you’re sweating your butt off during this New York summer heat.
I really like this sunscreen. It's a clear gel that dries down to a nice powder. A little goes a long way. It is not greasy and non drying. I will purchase again.

Love this product!! I’ve tried many sunscreens for the face and they all make me feel heavy and oily. This gel goes on clear and dries to a smooth matte finish. And since I’ve been using I’ve noticed that the redness and sun damage is slowly fading.

My skin is super oily and super acne prone and it's been sooooo difficult for me to find the perfect non-greasy, oily sunscreen. This is a winner. It is super smooth on the skin and wear this every single day with nothing else. Mid- day my face is still not oily. Great buy. Pricey, but worth it.
reviews.review_title: Perfect for super oily and acne prone skin

reviews.review_text: I have very oily skin plus I live in Miami and the humidity is crazy for my face until I tried this. It goes really smooth on my skin and minimizes my pores, very easy to apply and doesn't leave a heavy feeling when I apply the rest of my make up; It's so lightweight even my husband is using it everyday.

I'm impressed immediately by putting it on. It feels silky and smooths the appearence skin. The texture glides and hides and will melt under makeup. It is terrific that this brand also leaves out so many harmful or filler ingredients and I feel it gives good protection although I haven't used it at the beach or hiking, just in the hot city. This is what I'm looking for in an everyday product.

It feels like satin while applying! Pores remain clear and protected from sun after application, and creates a super-smooth finish for other products. I used it as a base before applying Supergoop! CC Cream sunscreen.

In love with this silky primer feeling sunscreen; makes using SPF super easy! Plus it’s completely translucent and doesn’t have that strong sunscreen smell! Added bonus, it gives your skin a smooth radiant glow, which I’m not sure if it’s bc of my other skincare products I use before it since I use it as a last step in my skincare routine but I’m in love with it. Definitely repurchasing!

This product gets two stars for the novelty of a gel sunscreen that doesn’t leave a ghastly cast on your face. With that being said, I cannot use this product on top of any moisturizer because it is so oily! It’s actually sleek in texture and lays down on skin kind of satiny and not matte at all. However, it does not stay that way- my combination skin gets oily in a matter of an hour and the summer heat exacerbates the oiliness. Oil slick at the end of the day and a couple of pimples and clogged pores after two weeks of daily use.
I am enjoying this sunscreen. I really love that it is unseen. It is not white like most face sunscreens.  It goes on very smooth. I will continue to purchase this product.
Seems to be pretty good. It serves a few purposes so why not...sunscreen, primer, conditions skin

I've been searching for this sunscreen all my life. Makeup doesn't "pill up" when applied as happens with so many other sunscreens. I've also tried mixing my foundation with it to use as a tinted moisturizer. Smooth application, great sun protection and greaseless feel make this a perfect product.
this is really nice, lightweight and makes a great primer. love the spf factor.
I love this sunscreen! It leaves a natural finish and makes a great base for my makeup. Finally, a sunscreen that I don't mind, and actually look forward to, wearing daily.
I use this daily.  It isn't greasy and I like the texture and feel of it.  It seems to work well, no sunburns!
reviews.review_title: Non greasy sunscreen works well with makeup

reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for the past month and so far so good.  Love that it goes on clear!  Doesn’t leave any white residue on my face.  The only negative is it’s kind of greasy when applied.  My face is already naturally oily so my face is extra shiny after applying this sunscreen.  But overall, loving this product so far.
This sunscreen feels so silicone- y it almost feels oily on your face. It does blur nicely like a primer, but the texture is a bit much for me.

AMAZING! The best way to describe the texture of this sunscreen is to compare it to Smashbox’s photo ready primer! It is invisible, rubs right in, and is not greasy!! I spent a week in the sun at the beach and it kept my skin from burning and also didn’t cause any breakouts!! I would HIGHLY recommend this!
reviews.review_title: Best face sunscreen I’ve ever had!

reviews.review_text: I just recently bought this product but it is amazing! I have a super oily T-zone and sunscreens always leave me looking extra greasy. This product has an amazing texture, think of a primer, and doesn’t leave me looking shiny. Flawlessly blends into skin and works well with makeup. My pale skin is so happy!
This has been the best spf I’ve used so far. It goes on smoothly and leaves a satiny finish. It layers well on top of other products. There is no white cast at all and lives up to it’s name “unseen”

This thing is freaking unreal. I CANT BELIEVE this is a sunscreen. It’s perfect!!! Everybody should know about this. It’s so light. It’s like using primer. If you have oily skin like me THIS IS FOR YOU. DO NOT HESITATE. Also Sephora, please deliver this to Sephora Spain !!!!

Have never reviewed anything until now. This sunscreen is everything I spent the last year looking for. It's a gel, and there's no awkward waiting time to wait for it to soak in like other sunscreens. I've been wearing for about two weeks and my face is brighter and clearer, even when I walk to work. Love love love!

I hate a love hate relationship with sunblocks and I can assure you this one is a LOVE. 
First of all it is clear, odorless and smooth. It does not leave your skin with a greasy feel, the texture is great. 
I wear it after moisturizing daily before my makeup. 
I use this everyday even when I stay home, being and island girl their is sun everywhere.

I’m really picky about suncreen. Because of my complexion most leave my face looking ashy and grey, even those with a tint. This suncreen delivered as promised: velvety, matte finish that left zero white cast. Highly recommend!
A sunscreen that acts as a primer?! Order me ten more please!!! Love that this sunscreen doesn't feel greasy or heavy on my face. Thanks, Supergoop!
Love this sunscreen. Use it not only on myself but my two daughters. Makes your skin feel so soft.

I really, really wanted to love this. It sits amazingly on your skin-- feels like you aren't wearing anything at all. This didn't make me oily, but it did break me out like no other. (And I really don't usually have to worry about acne). Definitely watch out if you're pimple prone!
Love this product as a primer for my makeup in addition to the SPF benefits. Absolutely in love. It is so soft
reviews.review_title: Would use as primer even if it wasn't SPF

reviews.review_text: I have had issues with every sunscreen I have ever tried using on my face, causing rashes, break outs, and flaky skin. I was so happy to find this sunscreen and now use it every day without any issues! It is such an amazing texture, it feels like you are putting a primer on your face and does not leave your skin sticky or red like other sunscreens. My husband and all my friends are now hooked on it too!

I suck at applying SPF, this makes it a no brainer. I love how easy it is to apply and reapply when out and about. Use it on the daily and to reapply when spending the day in the sun. I have super sensitive skin and it’s been impossible to find an SPF that doesn’t burn my face. This stuff is awesome and leaves my skin super soft with no shine or residue. I don’t know how it pairs with foundation as I don’t wear any, but I would totally suggest giving it a try!!

While it down go on clear and settles down dry I have had more and freckles start to show on my face and neck since using it. I naturally freckle and have had zero freckles on my face for a number of years because of sunscreen use. However shortly have buying and purely using this bottle they have reappeared and nothin else in my routine has a changed. Won’t be repurchasing.

I’m allergic to most products with SPF in it so I was suspicious when people told me this was super gentle. It 100% is. I absolutely love it. I feel like it makes my face look a little dewy which I think is nice. It does occasionally irritate my skin over time, but overall this is great
Lightweight, non greasy, blurs/give matte like finish. I love it!

i’m so shocked at how amazingly well this sunscreen primer works! a little bit goes a long ways so you’ll have this tube for an entire summer. i got a sample size and it’s lasted me a week at the beach, one lake day, and multiple pool days!! it’s done an awesome job at protecting my skin and keeping my makeup on. 10/5 stars for sure.
No color. No smell. No residue. BEST SUNSCREEN EVER!
This stuff is awesome. It kind of feels like a primer, but not as dry. This will definitely be my new daily sunscreen.
I love it! It's light stays great under makeup

I was super excited to try this sunscreen. It went on sheer and really set my makeup well. Unfortunately it also made me break out so I had to return it. I have pretty acne-prone skin though. If you don't have acne issues I would recommend this.
Love this sunscreen! Clear gel that goes on smooth and doesn't leave an oily/greasy/caked feeling on the skin. It has a slight sunscreen smell, but not overpowering.

I reallyyyyyyy wanted to love this. But I could tell after just a few hours it was giving me tiny little bumps. The texture is great, the consistency is great, the finish is great too! Didn't make me look oily at all, just glowy. I just happen to be in the minority of ppl that this didn't work for. Sadly, I wasn't handed a receipt when I purchased it so I can't even return it :( Hoping my sister will enjoy it

I really enjoy this sunscreen. It is oil free and isn’t white like so many other face sunscreens. It is a great option for those with microbladed eyebrows, too (no oil, doesn’t cast a white tint, no exfoliants, no acids). It goes on clear and smooth and feels glorious.
Finally! No chalky residue on darker skin.  Applies well over skincare and under makeup.

I have a dry skin type so I was very skeptical of this product. I completed my daily skincare routine which includes: an exfoliating toner, essence, moisturizer and eye cream. After I let this product sink into my skin, I put makeup on top and my foundation started to flake off. This has happened twice and I'm not sure how to fix it. I wouldn't recommend this is if you have dry skin.
reviews.review_title: Didn't work with my dry skin

reviews.review_text: Untraceable on the skin and feels like nothing. Even my boyfriend has gotten behind it!

Wow! I received the sample a month ago. This is the first sunscreen that is truly weightless. I’ve tried many sunscreen and it would be too oily for my combination skin. This one is weightless and it doesn’t have bad chemical smell that most sunscreen have. I will definitely buy the full size.
I needed daily SPF protection for my face and this fits the bill.  Will purchase again.
I wear this literally everyday. Can’t even compare to other SPFs- it’s SO much better! Lightweight and sheer, doesn’t have a fragrance, doesn’t pill... the list goes on! A must have.

I have always HATED putting sunscreen on my face.  It was  too thick, too greasy and smelled awful. It also always seemed to get into my eyes where it would cause horrible burning and tearing as bad as the time I pepper-sprayed myself in the face.  This stuff is completely different and it's utterly fantastic!  It doesn't do any of the bad stuff and it works wonderfully as a primer for makeup.

5 stars compared to neutrogena and other stuff you find at regular stores. I haven't tried anything else. This was the only thing in my price range, and it's great.
It does have a scent, but it fades after a little while.

I’ve been looking for a sunscreen that does t make me too shiny and this is perfect. A great matte finish without overdryng. I have dry, sensitive skin and most sunscreens burn or make me break out but this has been great so far. Looks good alone and wears well under Bare Minerals powder. I don’t wear liquid foundation so I can’t judge that. I first tried it during a heat wave and the temperatures were on the 90s and so was the humidity and I stayed matte all day. I don’t love the price but a little goes a long way for me.

I Love that this product is light weight, not a cream, and only requires a small amount for application. I have dark marks on my face and needed a good block while I treat these scars. So far so good.
reviews.review_title: Light weight, not greasy, easy application

reviews.review_text: I needed to add an SPF to my routine and did not want to change moisturizers so I decided to give this a try. This works SO well as a primer and keeps my makeup looking fresh all day. I put this on as the last step in my skincare routine, after my moisturizer. I really love that there is only the teeniest hint of a smell - barely there at all. It's not greasy-feeling and is comfortable on the skin.
LOVE this! Very light, invisible in the skin and high SPF!
reviews.review_title: Great for people who don't like to wear sunscreen

reviews.review_text: This year Sephora started labeling products with the green leaf symbol and means that these products are free of Sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, triclocarban. All things bad for your skin. This suncscreen feels light to the touch and goes on smoothly. After cleansing my face in the morning, I follow it up with DE C-firma day serum and wait a couple minutes to apply this sunscreen. I let the products soak in and then I proceed with my makeup routine. Overall, I'm happy with this product as it works for me.

Haviing olive skin, I typically slather on the sunscreen to avoid any more dark spots on my face. With other products, my face looks like a chalky white mask. This UNSEEN SUNSCREEN is amazing!!! Where has this been all my life??? I am in my 40's and it literally leaves my face velvety and does not crease into little wrinkly areas. It goes on clear and doubles as a face primer. I use it daily under make-up

I was hesitant on buying yet another sunscreen that would most likely be terrible for my skin, or make me feel super greasy, or would smell like beach on the worst possible way. Forget all that. If you are reading reviews because you are on the fence, go for it. I have combination skin and usually have to blot my face once a day even with the best possible primer (hourglass veil, in case you wonder). This sunscreen has no smell and really goes on like a primer. I found it layers with makeup beautifully. I still need to blot by face in the middle of the day, but that's OK for me. No breakouts, no makeup melting, no foundation/BB cream pilling. It really makes daily sunscreen use became part of your routine. Worth every penny. I think it's similar to MURAD invisiblur, but it is more smooth and easier to layer with makeup. For no make up days, I still stick with COOLA mineral, since it has a bit of color.

So far, so great! I've only had this about a week or so, but I'm really loving it so far. I have very fickle/sensitive skin and am prone to breakouts, so I pretty much only put jojoba oil on my face on a daily basis. I knew I needed to start integrating SPF, but I was nervous to freak my skin out after finding a routine that calmed it down. So far, this product has been ideal. I love that it's not a lotion, so I don't worry about feeling like my pores are clogged, or like I'm sticky, shiny, or white/blue.

Really like this sunscreen.  It doesn't leave a white cast like other sunscreens do. It  doesn't leave my skin oily... I can't tell I have it on.  The only negative for me is it's a little pricey, but since its the only one so far I like.. I'll probably keep on purchasing it.

This is actually amazing, you can't even see that you're wearing SPF 40 because it's not oily or white. It works really well as a primer (my skin looks so smooth!) and I've been wearing it during the Philidelphia heat wave and haven't gotten burned yet!!!
reviews.review_title: No excuses not to wear this!

reviews.review_text: Amazing!  Unseen Sunscreen works great!  It is so light and does not have the normal heavy sunscreen smell.  I use it as every day protection as well as for days at the pool.  Usually my children complain that sunscreen stings their face they love Unseen Sunscreen!

I wanted to try this so badly for the summer that I actually went into a store inside of a mall to buy this!!(Much more hassle than I usually care for) And I have no regrets!! I love it!! I love the texture, a little goes a long way. I basically just use it as my summer primer and bonus, I get spf too.

Amazing product. I don't wear sunscreen almost ever, and I know I should. But as a woman of color, I already have a difficult enough time finding foundation that matches my complexion, so I certainly don't want to add a white cast. I've seen sunscreen before that has claimed not to leave any white chalky residue, but it always does.

I decided to give this one a try, in part because I'm going on vacation shortly, and also because I know I need to use it. The reviews made me decide to take a chance on this one, and wow am I glad I did. THIS STUFF COMES OUT OF THE TUBE TRANSLUCENT, Y'ALL. There is no white-blue glow because this product is colorless! I've fund the holy grail of facial sunblock. I went to buy another tube of this two days after I received it, and it was already sold out. I will definitely be buying this again, once it comes in stock!
I have sensitive skin and can’t handle any formula that has zinc type of SPF. But this bad boy is perfect use for the summer and probably into the fall!
This is my new favorite primer and sunscreen! It’s silky smooth, doesn’t make me break out.

I love this face sunscreen! It smells so good, goings on so transparently and also leaves my skin not matte or too oily, but a perfect dewy sheen as well as blurring my pores a bit at the same time. I suggest trying it out before hand to see how your skin reacts, just in case! Certain parts of my face are more sensitive and I'm glad that this still works for those parts for me too.

I. LOVE. THIS. STUFF. Best sunscreen I've ever tried, hands down. Makes my skin feel so smooth, doesn't clog my pores, and acts as a great base for makeup. And it truly is completely invisible. It's like a gel, and the best.

I love this product! This works great on my oily skin. To me, it feels more like a powder on my face. It's not greasy and it does not make me oily. This product also doesn't break me out. I would highly recommend if you're looking for a lightweight sunscreen

I have a tan skin tone and this is one of the only sunscreens that doesn’t make me purple, it has no flash back in photos, and keeps my face from getting too oily throughout the day. Reapplying is pretty easy, I don’t wear makeup during the summer so it’s super easy to apply this onto my face without worrying about going over it to hide the purple!

I've never been happier with a sunscreen product! Usually I just get skincare or makeup products that have spf in them because most [ALL] spf-specific products I've tried have either broken me out or didn't sit well under makeup or make my makeup oxidize or look weird. NOT THIS ONE! This stuff is INCREDIBLE. I love the way it feels - almost like a primer! It wears incredibly well under makeup and I've found myself using it practically every, even when I'm just lounging around at home. I love that its CLEAN and broad spectrum and I am just so so so happy that someone finally came up with a product like this that WORKS! Thanks Supergoop<33333
reviews.review_title: FINALLY A SUNSCREEN THAT I WANT TO USE!

reviews.review_text: Best face sunscreen I have used to date - it doesn't take too long to dry, face doesn't look oily, and make up goes on great after application. Great purchase.
This product is amazing! It doesn’t feel like I am wearing sunscreen and it is not greasy.

Texture okay, caused significant congestion after about a month of use, which I expect is from the silicones in the product. It was the only change to my routine during this timeframe and the congestion just continued to build. Was hopeful for a multi-purpose product but looks like we'll be back to two separate products for sunscreen and primer.
It's an ok product, not really worth the price. Makes my oily skin even more oily!

This sunscreen is amazing. It feels slightly like silicone because of its gel-like texture, but I LOVE it for that. It's got a similar consistency to Bare Minerals Prime Time Primer. It wears great under makeup, doesn't sting my eyes, doesn't leave a white cast, and doesn't have a strong smell. I wore this as my base on vacation, and even with hours in the sun didn't get the slightest bit red (which is amazing because I'm as white as paper). My hubby even enjoyed the texture and feel of this! It's not greasy AT ALL and doesn't clog pores or irritate my sometimes finicky skin. This is a true holy Grail for me. If you're on the fence, try it, you'll love it too!

I was really excited to purchase this product after reading excellent reviews all over the place. However, using this underneath my water-based foundation made it TOTALLY streak. I have tried letting it dry, but I find that this silicone based sunscreen leaves me with a slippery base for my makeup slippery instead of becoming tacky like my go to, Too Faced hangover Rx primer. I'm disappointed and will continue my serach for a daily sunscreen to wear under my makeup.

This is my first review for any product despite spending an asinine amount of money at Sephora and maintaining Rouge. I have melasma, courtesy of wacky hormones from my third little crotch fruit, and have to wear sunscreen daily during the summer or I look terrible. Y’all... this stuff is everything I never knew I needed and wanted from a face sunscreen. It has a texture and color similar to Smashbox primer. Smooths on effortlessly and leaves your face feeling baby soft. Works amazing as a primer under makeup but also doesn’t cause any chalky appearance if I choose to go makeup free. I have stupidly sensitive skin and have had no skin breakouts after using this stuff daily for three weeks. I’m not one for shouting “holy grail” from the rooftops but I love this product so much I told my cashier at Target about it last week. BUY THIS AND TELL YA MAMA TO BUY SOME TOO!
reviews.review_title: If I could marry a sunscreen, it’d be this one.

reviews.review_text: While most sunscreens are thick, greasy, and sometimes even leave a white cast, this goes on clear with the feel of a serum or mattifying primer. Doesn’t feel greasy in hot humid weather, and layers well under makeup.

I bought this because the mineral sunscreen was out of stock. This feels more like a primer than a sunscreen. Which is nice if you don’t use your sunscreen as a moisturizer like I do. I do like that this sunscreen has no scent.

I’m starting to realize how important sunscreen is. And I think a lot of people ignore it especially when they’re younger. This sunscreen makes me want to wear it because the packaging is so cute and the concept is great. I’ve been seeing a lot of clear sunscreens popping up in the skincare industry lately but hadn’t tried one. I saw this one in Sephora one day and thought I’d give it a try. I love that it’s clear so that there’s no white cast so this would be great for darker skin tones. When I first put it on, I was surprised by a scent that I thought was silicone. I read the ingredients and sure enough it has some in there. This is good and bad because on one hand it can double as a primer for makeup and leave a smooth oil-free surface. But on the other hand, it can trap in dirt or oil and clog pores. Overall, I’m really excited about this product and I’m glad protecting my skin from the sun this summer will be a lot more pleasant of a process.

Fanciest sunscreen ever! 1.7 oz for $32 is pricier than Drunk Elephant, but it's worth it for some times/places! I wouldn't consider this sunscreen heavy-duty, but it is SPF 40 and wears beautifully under makeup or on a bare face. MOST IMPORTANTLY, it leaves no white cast! So this is complexion-friendly for absolutely every skin tone! I bought this when it first released months ago, and I haven't gone through it quite as quickly as the Drunk Elephant. Perhaps it's because I'm subconsciously saving it? It's just that reliable and unique of a product. There is literally no other sunscreen on the market like it.
Never thought I will be pleased wearing sunscreen everyday! This product is awesome! No stickiness! No fragance! No greasy! Perfect for my oily skin! Awesome for layering...

This is the best facial sunscreen I’ve ever tried. Goes on clear, keeps skin looking matte, and works great as a primer too! I got this as a sample and am definitely going to repurchase. A friend used some of mine and she told me she had to buy it too!
I love the fact you can't even tell I'm wearing sunscreen! it goes on so nice and smooth. definitely will be buying it again...

This product goes on like a primer: smooth, shine free and light on the skin.  I can't beleive it is spf 40 because it doesn't feel like sunscreen at all.  This is my sunny weather must have!  I have oily, acne prone skin that *always* breaks out from sunscreens, but not this one.

I pair this with a full Drunk Elephant skin care regime (see also: The Minis), and the results are marvelous. It's moisturizing AND it works very well as a primer. It helps hide texture irregularities under foundation, and doesn't irritate my highly sensitive skin, most sunscreens seem to do.

Received sample will be buying full size . I went to lake this weekend. Put this on my face under my makeup and used a sports spf sunscreen on my shoulders and back. While I have a burn on my back and upper chest face is  burn free! So glad I put it on! Always felt like my face was the first thing to burn. I was wearing sun glasses but still no face burn after a long day at the lake winnnner!

This eliminates any reason AT ALL for you to not wear sunscreen. This is the perfect product for daily wear, as-is or under makeup. No fragrance, feels light and velvety on your face.

Was gentle enough that my skin--always super sensitive but additionally deeply irritated from a round of doxycycline for pesky acne--wasn't bothered at all.

This stuff is amazing! At first, I didn’t like the texture. But it doesn’t pill on the skin and it does work with my foundations, so I’m happy about that. It also is great because it doesn’t cause me any breakouts nor does it sting my skin. This also works well in the hot/humid weather because it won’t run into your eyes. I highly recommend this to people with acne or anyone seeking a simple sunscreen that will work on all skin tones!

Loved that this is clear, light and easy to run on. It dries so perfectly matte and is a great base for makeup. It kept my makeup on even after hours at the beach. Great bonus that it doesn’t smell bad!

Goes on clear and smooth, no grease! I bought a full size bottle to take on vacation, and it kept my pale redness prone skin protected with no breakouts. I'd highly recommend this to people with darker skin tones in particular, this is the first sunscreen I've seen that does not leave the dreaded ashy white cast.

I love this product! I’ve been using a similar product that I liked but this one has more SPF and seems to set my makeup much better. I worked a 12 hour shift at my hospital and my makeup looked flawless at the end of my day. Love love love.

I never use sunscreens, because usually is too much white, sticky and thick. Recently I use a home made remedy, improved my skin soooooo much, so I start looking for sunscreen to protect my new improve skin. and I find this. This product is amazing, can work like a primer. smooth my skin, reduce pores. as good as just like everyone says here.  I don’t use BB cream and foundation in summer time, this sunscreen is perfect for me.

Ok so you should use a sunscreen everyday and this is basically what you want out of a sunscreen. Natural ingredients without the sunscreen white film. This it it. It’s a holy grail sunscreen that I’ll use forever. 
Leaves absolutely so sign or residue. Truly lives up to its name “unseen”. Get it. Love it. Done. Thanks Supergoop.

I am a thirty-something, and before this, I had never regularly worn sunscreen. Sure, I’d slather on some Coppertone at the beach, but for daily wear I was down to relying on makeup and crossing my fingers. I had tried sunscreen after daily sunscreen and, frankly, I probably have four languishing under my si k right now. I could never get past the greasy texture, the oily finish, the smell, the way it made my makeup look terrible... No more. I recently started using retinols, and heeding all the warning labels, decided to give this a try. Wow. This stuff is incredible. Not only is it nongreasy, I honestly can’t feel it at all after I apply. It goes on like a primer, and just vanishes into your skin, no residue, no weird interactions with makeup, hardly any smell at all—and what there is disappears within seconds of application. I cannot recommend this product highly enough. It’s made a believer out of me.

I have always skipped sunscreen for a number of factors; including the whole white cast issue. However, this product has been life changing. I look forward to using this stuff to protect my skin from the sun and it is also a nice primer on days I decide to put on a little foundation.

This sunscreen is perfect. If you liked the Cover FX Clear Cover sunscreen, you will love this product! It has a gel like consistency and I love that it doubles as a primer. It doesn’t smell like sunscreen at all. It’s super comfortable and not greasy.

This product is gel like and does smooth on very nicely on the skin.  If you want to wear without make up, I imagine that this would be a really nice SPF.  I have oily skin and wear liquid foundations, therefore, this SPF contributes to my foundation not lasting and slides around.  I will go back to the Supergoop Everyday wear of 50 which is a lotion based and worked well with oily skin.  I just thought I'd try this formula out.
I am so grateful for this sunscreen! It’s clear and feels and acts like a primer. Makeup goes on smooth on top of it. It does not dry out my face like most other sunscreens do.
looks and acts like a primer! for under your makeup which is exactly what i need bc my favorite foundation doesn’t have SPF
Lightweight and a perfect primer for under your favorite foundation!

Never thought I would be this excited for sunscreen but I absolutely LOVE this!! It goes on so smooth and silky and feels and acts like a primer. It doesn't mess with my foundation it doesn't have a smell it is just silky perfection can't recommend it enough!!

I have spent years trying to find a sunscreen that wouldn't cause an allergic reaction and have finally found it! The added bonus is that it's so lightweight, I feel like I'm not wearing anything at all. I have only worn it on my bare face so far, but I am in love! It glides on so smooth, doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy, and helps minimize my pores. Will definitely buy this again!

I’m so glad I purchased this sunscreen it lays beautifully in my skin , it works perfect with my makeup routine, I have combo to normal skin , it doesn’t make me greasy or sticky at all , I totally recommended
Like the title this sunscreen is completely invisible and goes on the skin like butter. Using this I don’t need to use any primer and makes my skin appear pore less.
Obsessed with this product! The silicon base makes it light on the face while still doing its job outside. I also love wearing everyday especially in front of the computer screen!

This sunscreen is revolutionary. First sunscreen that doesn't smell or feel like sunscreen. It's light, unscented, goes on clear with no white sheen. It works exactly like a primer under my foundation. Only regret is that I didn't buy it sooner.

I received a sample of this product and was blown away by how it made my face feel.  It glides on like a primer and give my face a nice glow.  I am definitely buying this product.  and the price is right.

This is my first time writing a sephora review- but I thought it could be helpful for those with combination skin! I noticed that as soon as I started using this, I had little breakouts. When I stopped using the product, those breakouts didn't come anymore. I really wanted to like this product, but unfortunately it didn't work for me!

I love the feel of this Unseen Sunscreen. Feels amazing and perfect for under makeup. I wear it by itself when working in the yard because it does a great job and doesn't sweat off. Don't forget to apply sunscreen to your ears that's valuable real-estate too!!

I took this with me on a two week vacation into the desert basically. My face got burned on the only day I forgot to use it. I hiked the Grand Canyon, Joshua Tree and Zion Nat'l Park in it - it didn't get in my eyes, it stayed put, it didn't break me out, it didn't let me get burned, and re-application was easy considering it really is translucent and so you don't need a mirror to reapply. Flawless under makeup. Cannot recommend this enough. My travel companions borrowed it several times because sunscreen kept melting into their eyes.

I cant believe this product exists! It's perfect for my sensitive skin, it goes on clear, doesn't get oily and doesn't cause breakouts. It's so light I can comfortably wear it under foundation all day long. this product is a dream come true!

I thought it felt really nice on my skin and was invisible but on three different occasions I used this and then the next day I had tiny white heads on both sides of my mouth and some redness. Unfortunately doesn’t agree with my skin

I went to the beach the other day and used this under my makeup and the setting powder SPF over it.  They worked great together and with makeup.  I’m getting a full sized.  I’m amazed at how light and clear it is.  Best of all, I didn’t burn (remember folks this has 40 minute protection, by an hour) and I didn’t get any shine all day long even though I forgot to layer on my matte moisturizer (Origins) that I’m loving this summer.

As many other reviews state, this product is light, silky, colorless, and mattifying. It does a great job protecting my skin during long days outside and my makeup practically applies itself after I use it. However, I can only give it four stars because the volume of product for the price is simply not sustainable. I’d rather deal with the drawbacks of other products than constantly pay such a ridiculous price.
reviews.review_title: price point is keeping me from repurchasing

reviews.review_text: Love it. Its a sunscreen that also acts as a primer. It makes my foundation blend effortlessly. Plus it has not caused my skin to breakout which many other sunscreens and primers tend to do.

Had a sample size of this and decided to try it out. Only used this sunscreen, had no make up on and went outside for 2hours and got the worst sunburn of my life. I wasnt in water, didnt sweat it off. This gave me no protection what so ever
It’s a good primer and sunscreen, but it tends to crumble up when applied on top of some moisturizers.
This sunscreen goes on smooth and light, and makes my pores look smaller. I use it before I apply makeup or alone. This is my favorite facial sunscreen ever! And I have tried many brands.

FINALLY! A sunscreen that doesn't clog my pores or make me look oily. I love using this as a primer under my makeup, but it's also great on days when I skip makeup or go for a more natural look. I'm HOOKED.

I absolutely hate the feeling of wearing sunscreen (or pretty much anything on my face) and this is one of the most comfortable/least noticeable products I've tried. I usually wear it with a setting powder (such as Laura Mercier) or the Supergoop Invincible Setting Powder for added SPF, since my skin tends to be a little slick and I feel like it stays on better (or at least the texture feels more normal to me) when I use a powder. But I'm sure it would be fine without one.

This is my most favorite sunscreen for my face I've ever found so far! I love how light it is. It's truly magical! It's been so hard to find a face sunscreen that doesn't make me break out and that doesn't feel greasy, and this is the one for me!

This is a great product. I think it's comparable to most other silicone primers, but this one doesn't seem to clog up my pores and I love the UV protection. I used to use the cotez sunscreen, which works marvelously, but tends to "ball up" with water based products. This sunscreen works well with all except my becca foundation. all i do is spritz some smashbox primer spray and with some finessing, the foundations sits well. my Nars, urban decay, and it cosmetic foundations give me no problem whatsoever.
So far so good! I love the matte finish and goes on super smooth, I have pretty oily skin but this holds up pretty well also works amazingly as a make up primer.

If you’re looking for an SPF you can stop now! This is honestly one of the best products I’ve ever bought. I got the kit with the setting spray and the foam, the other products are ok, but I will deff be buying the full size of this ! It’s slightly mattifying, and it’s perfect alone or under makeup!
This is a must have product if you live in a hot, humid climate. I live in Charleston, SC and this is the perfect lightweight sunscreen and makeup primer in one. No noticeable smell either ❤️
reviews.review_title: A must have in humid climates

reviews.review_text: Best sunscreen for my skin tone! Just dissolves onto my skin, really in unseen! My makeup glides of easily after! I was under the sun on a super hot day and my body got sunburnt, however this sunscreen prevented sunburn to my face!
Great spf! Literally it sinks into your skin right away! No more white cast!

I have really oily skin and this is actually really great for it! It goes on smoothly and makes my skin feel good. It isn't completely matte but it is by far the best sunscreen I've used. It also doesn't have a bad sunscreen smell.

Love this sunscreen. I have been using it all summer and so has my boyfriend! I love it because it comes out clear- no chances that I’m going to forget to rub a spot in. Great product and does not break out my skin. Highly reccoment!
So glad there is finally an invisible effective sunscreen!  This does everything they say it will, and it feels like nothing on.

This is the ideal product I f you are looking for a lightweight facial sunscreen that doesn’t leave a cast. I tried a few others that said they were lightweight and they felt somehow oily and left dry white patches at the same time. You can use this as a primer, but if you don’t wear makeup that’s fine as well. The consistency is a gel that mattifies without drying out your skin or leaving a film on your face, you can hardly tell it’s there!
This stuff works awesome! It goes on clear, literally feels
Loved it but it broke me out after a few days so sad - had to return it...
I wanted this to work out so badly. Its light, goes on smooth
I'm really enjoying this sunscreen, only downside is how often it needs to be reapplied. i had to reapply 4-5 times throughout the day. kind of smells like coffee. texture is nice and lightweight.

Spreads nicely on face. However, it is not sweat proof as it says which results in the product coming off. It might work better if used with foundation (I don't use foundation too often). Seems overpriced to me based on it's quality.

It goes on smoothly and dries matte, which I love. It doesn't pill or otherwise affect the integrity of makeup if you use this as a primer. It smooths out any fine lines and doesn't have an overpowering scent. And it certainly does its job as a sunscreen!

Absolutely beautiful primer during the hot summer months. Goes on velvety soft and doesn’t feel heavy even with a decent facial SPF.  Slight sunscreen smell but not overpowering. No pilling or chalky residue- blends seamlessly and and creates a smooth surface for apply facial makeup. Pricey but worth it.
Goes on sooo smooth with no greasiness and a little goes a long way. The texture makes its more comfortable for when you’re re-applying throughout the day

I love that this sunscreen is transparent and it works with all skin tones! I also love the fact that it doesn’t have strong scent. My only complaint would be I can feel it on my skin all day. If I touch my face during the day it feels like a layer of silicon is on my face. Other than that it is a great sunscreen. Better than most!

I have a medium-tan olive complexion, and it’s always difficult to find sunscreens that don’t leave a white cast. This sunscreen is clear! I couldn’t be happier about that. 

I have also suffered from terrible acne and even used accutane, so I am wary of products that might irritate my skin. This sunscreen is so smooth, doesn’t irritate my skin, has a lightweight feel, and offers the protection my skin needs from the sun. 

I never liked using sunscreen because of the greasy/oily feeling and shiny outcome. The Unseen Sunscreen does not feel greasy AT ALL! And neither does it have that typical spf smell that is off-putting. 

To sum it up: YES, PLEASE! Love this sunscreen :)

I was really excited for sunscreen that wouldn’t cause a white streaks and that could be used as primer, however, it did not set well with makeup and cause me to breakout really bad. I give it a lot of tries but my face would still breakout.

Love this sunscreen! It is a clear gel, so no white cast and minimal blending, and it feels and applies just like a primer. It doesn't leave me oily, and actually feels like it mattifies my (oily) skin, so I don't even use a primer anymore. Yay!
Amazing sun protection, great as a base for makeup, overall a solid product that I will be using every day.
Feels lovely on my skin!!

Pretty good! I used it for the first time today as both primer and SPF. It made my makeup go on better than my daily primer, and it’s very transparent — you can’t even see it. I used it on my neck also. I have super oily skin and it didn’t make it any oiler, in fact I think it helped control some of the oil for a few hours. I would definitely recommend this for those who wear makeup daily and have oily skin!

This product saved my life. A bit dramatic, yes, but seriously. I was never into sincere until recently, and this is the first sunscreen I bought. Obviously I’ve used sunscreens before as a child and even an adult when I go the pool or beach, but I always used cheap sunscreens that made my face way too oily and also made me breakout. This product goes on so smooth, has an amazing velvety finish, and does not make you look white and pasty like normal sunscreen. I recommend this to all of my friends, family, boyfriend, his family, people at the gas station, etc. seriously amazing! Thank you!

This primer does a great job of protecting my face from sunburn and it makes my makeup last longer, but the formula is a little offputting. It is very silicon-y and I just don't like the texture. It is almost as if I can feel it clogging my pores. It worked great for my season as a tennis coach, though.

This is a perfect product. Exactly what I was looking for for summer. Doesn’t look or feel like the usual sunscreen — it seriously is invisible, and when applied has the consistency and look of a primer. Perfect amount of SPF, and the fact that it’s cruelty free makes it absolutely perfect.

I have never loved a face sunscreen so much! My skin is so sensitive and this doesn’t irritate me at all. I use my regular moisturizer first, then layer this on top with a few drops of foundation for a perfect serum/primer/tinted moisturizer combo!

I bought this based on another reviewer's comment "feels like Smashbox's primer." It really, really does. It goes nicely over my moisturizer, and doesn't dry out my already dry skin. I live in the Mojave desert, and it's great for daily use, but not if you're outdoors 24/7.
It is effective as a sunscreen, however I did not care for the texture of the product, nor do I think it worked well with any of my foundations (Koh Gen Do Maifanshi Aqua, Bobbi Brown Skin).
The only sunscreen that will not break me out. I absolutely love this! It also doesn’t make my face super oily like other sunscreens do. This is a must have for oily/ acne prone skin.
Got this as a free sample and I love it!! my makeup went on and wore perfectly all day. So impressed, I will definitely repurchase when my sample runs out!

This product leaves my skin with a really greasy look after a few hours. I am 40 years old and my skin type is normal, and I look like I did hot yoga after a few hours. It doesn’t grip make up at all and leaves my skin looking unfinished with a film. Product does go on smooth initially

This is hands down the best sunscreen I have ever tried!!! I won’t be using anything else after trying this. It feels just like a silicone primer and is invisible on the skin, no more white cast! I tend to have oily skin and this doesn’t look or feel greasy at all. Love, love, love it.

I am shocked that this type of sunscreen is so hard to find among drug store brands. I hate the white sheen left by sunscreen I normally use. I only took a star off because I'm not sure if it's worth the money to avoid the normal white sunscreen, especially since all sunscreen does the same thing.
Love the feel of this! It goes on so smooth and its nice to the touch! So far, the best sunscreen that doesn't make my face too oily. Just the right amount, especially if you live in Texas!

At first I liked this fine. A little slippery like a silicone-based primer, but after a couple of uses, I started to get little bumps all over my skin. I do have a slightly sensitivity to SPF and struggle to find ones that don’t do this to me. Will have to return...

Absolutely love this product. I’ve tried so many sunscreens for my daily facial skincare routine and this is by far the best. It doesn’t leave a white cast or greasy/oily film on my face. It’s weightless, clear, and acts more like a makeup primer. You would never know you have sunscreen on your face. The smell is pleasant too, almost undetectable. I have very fair, sensitive, dry skin. I put this on over my moisturizer and under any makeup. Supergoop’s Everday Sunscreen was too oily for my skin. I like using this one instead because I can control how much moisturizer I need on my face first and then add this sunscreen and not worry about it leaving parts of my face oily.
I loved that this was clear but this made me break out terribly. I had to give it up.

Seamless application!  If you want dewy, glowy skin this product probably isn't the best as it does have some mattify-ing qualities. But the light weight texture and priming abilities of this sunscreen cannot be beat!  A little really goes a long way so no need to repurchase often.  Tempted to try more from this brand
The BEST sunscreen I’ve ever used! I honestly will recommend this to anyone looking for a silky primer-like sunscreen without the chalkyness and scent of a normal sunscreen.

Goes on smooth, consistent to a silcone makeup primer, and leaves no white residue behind. Also no harsh scent that is usually associated w/ sunscreen. Can dab a small amount over my finished makeup throughout the day w/ out affecting makeup.
love supergoop, have been buying their sunscreen for years. so excited when this came out. it is clear and glides onto skin. however not ideal for layering makeup over it :(

This stuff goes on exactly like a regular primer, which makes it perfect for wearing under daily makeup. It has a really similar consistency to a Smashbox primer, but it doesn't leave as much of a chalky residue, so you can put it over your entire face rather than just certain places. Obviously, it's also CLEAR! A gamechanger!
This sunscreen didn't make me breakout! It's a miracle.

This lightweight formula feels like soft velvet when you put it on your face - to the point where I'm not sure if it's working to protect me from the sun or not. I'm going to assume that it's doing it's job and that I need to do my job to reapply every two hours. I also went on vacation to Mexico where the sun was beaming down on me for hours and face was all good from burns.

As good, if not better than advertised. Doesn't pill under make up. Very light scent, didn't make my senstive skin break out, and doesn't leave my oily skin feeling slick. Glad I found my sunscreen for the summer.
Goes on really smoothly and doesn’t make my skin oily and shiny looking at all! It works and feels similarly to a face primer! I recommend for any skin type
This sunscreen felt so soft on my skin!  It also offered the right amount of protection.  I will be buying this in the bigger size.
Really changes what I believed about a sunscreen. Sunscreens CAN be transparent, sunscreens CAN be lightweight, and sunscreens CAN feel good under makeup. YAS!

Love this product. I have always resisted sunscreens because of the feeling. This feels like a silky powdery substance when being applied. It reminds me some of my primer. I use PÜR Corrections Primer. Others say this is a silicone feeling, so looked like I am a fan of that. I give 4 starts because I am yet to know how it works as a sunscreen. I got a sample and I'm using that till I buy a big bottle. It broke my 10 yr old out but not me.
reviews.review_title: I'm a fan one week in.

reviews.review_text: I have used this one time, good so far. Love the smoothness and consistency of the product. Feels like a primer after you put it on. God under makeup.
I really like this sunscreen, it was recommended by an employee at Sephora, and I'm happy she did.  It only takes a min. to absorb. It's not greasy and no white cast.
The best sunscreen!!! It feels and looks like makeup primer when it goes on. I don’t wear foundation, but this would be perfect to wear under foundation for a smoothing effect. I love it
This is my favorite, go-to primer with SPF! It's so silky smooth when you apply it, it doesn't smell like sunscreen, and it doesn't have parabens.
I love this sunscreen - really is "unseen". Lovely texture, great under makeup, terrific product.

I usually wear a B.B. cream with spf or a regular spf with a powder foundation over, to reduce the shine. This stuff has the consistency of  smash box’s primer, but knowing the added spf and not needing a powder or cream foundation makes it so much better for daytime wear!

I really like this sunscreen. It goes on as a gel and it really does go on clear. There is no white cast at all and it does not leave my face looking oily or greasy. This is my new go to four everyday face sunscreen.

This had been sitting in my cart for a few weeks and I am so glad I finally bought it. It literally glides on my skin. I have combination acne-prone skin and this feels silky smooth. It works great as a primer. I really only need a tiny bit to cover my whole face. Love it!

This stuff is awesome! Goes on clear on deep skin, doesn’t make you greasier through the day. Very light feeling, similar to a primer. Sits great under makeup. Recommend especially for any dark skinned people looking for a flattering sunscreen. Heads up it does smell like traditional sunscreen.

I love how soft this makes my skin feel, and it’s so light too! I didn’t like to wear a lot of sunscreen since it’s too heavy under makeup. But this is almost like a primer, and works wonderfully under makeup!
I've tried a variety of different suncreens and by far this is one of the best! It doesn't leave any residue or oiliness and really  smoothes out my skin and prepares it for foundation.
reviews.review_title: Pefect mix of SPF and primer!

reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazeballs. Now, I can use the moisturizer I want, without settling for third-best just because it has a high SPF in it. It feels great on my skin, and provides a smoothing effect, tactilely and visually. The Supergoop CC cream I applied over the Unseen Sunscreen applied as normal, and stayed throughout the day as normal. Yay! I even gifted this to a  friend for her newborn because of how smoothly and quickly the sunscreen glides on. And because it doesn't have lots of nasty gunk in it and is also fragrance free, she was super happy with it, too! No struggling with baby to try to smooth out that unsightly whitecast from typical sunscreens or to apply it despite harsh smells from aerosol versions! I wish this stuff was around when my child was a baby! But this is going on the regular shopping list, because this Unseen Sunscreen is amazeballs. Highly recommended!

My skin is very fair, and I've tried so many "dry touch" sunscreens, hoping to find something that didn't make my skin feel sticky.  Some are better than others, but this product is IT.  Seriously, it's the holy grail of facial sunscreens.  The product is a gel (not a lotion), and when I put it on it literally disappears into my skin.  Zero wait time to put on makeup afterwards, and my skin feels exactly the same as it did before the sunscreen.  I was a bit hesitant about a getting a chemical sunscreen instead of a mineral/physical sunscreen, but this doesn't irritate my skin in any way (including right around the eyes).  I can't say enough good things about this... the Unseen Sunscreen rocks!
This stuff is amazing. Truly invisible, not greasy, goes on like a primer. Short but sweet review because it does what it says.

I decided to try out the Unseen sunscreen after loving the defense refresh setting mist. This is a clear gel that glides on very easily. It is lightweight, doesn’t have a strong scent and helps minimize pores! I love using all of supergoops products. My skin hasn’t had a bad reaction to any of their products!

I was deciding between this one or the Murad Invisiblur. I went with this one since you get more, cheaper and it pretty much does the same thing minus the anti aging from Invisiblur. I was a little bit concerned about pilling but it doesn’t at all (I use this after moisturizer and I use luminous silk foundation). I know some people mind the silicone texture, but this one doesn’t break me out and it does help blur and control oil. Overall, I really like it and I’d get it again as my daily SPF.

I wear this sunscreen on a daily basis. It applies like a dream for me. It doesn’t interfere with my moisturizers and oils on my face, and it doesn’t dry me out. It is the perfect topper to my skincare.
Loved the idea of this. But it never seemed to dry on my skin. It always felt tacky. Ended up returning it. Couldn’t get my makeup to lay smoothly over it and look good all day

LOVE!!  I got a sample from the store because I was skeptical after reading all the other reviews. But it goes on so smoothly and actually feels a lot like Smashbox Photo Finish primer. I wasn’t offended by the small at all and I feel like it did a great job of keeping my makeup smooth and in place all day.  I will be buying the full size tube.

I was using the Supergoop Everyday Sunscreen and didn’t have any problems with breaking out. I do prefer to wear it when I’m going to the pool or to play tennis, so when this one came out I wanted to try it. It goes on like an invisible primer, matte, hasn’t caused any breakouts and hasn’t caused any problems with my makeup. I don’t wear foundation during the Day, I wear my Dior Forever Powder over it without any issue. It doesn’t make my skin any more shiny than on days when I don’t wear it, and I honestly don’t have any complaints. 

I’m going to keep using it because it works great and it’s protecting me from the sun. Down here in the tropics, where it’s always hot and sunny, Sunscreen is a must.
This is my first time writing a review. This sunscreen is sooo perfect. Goes on soft, blends well, and works well with other makeup.
This sunscreen is super easy to apply and the best part is that it’s clear and invisible unlike many other sunscreens! It doesn’t leave you with chalky white stuff and your face. Highly recommend.

I was looking for a light sunscreen to wear under makeup and on no makeup days since sun is very damaging to the skin. This sunscreen is unusual in the sense that it is a texture and color of a smashbox photo finish primer. It’s slick and colorless. Which I like. I didn’t think I’d like it but I do. It’s a weightless and effective formula.
reviews.review_title: Unusual color and texture but effective!

reviews.review_text: This product is revolutionary. It is unbelievably lightweight and feels like nothing on the skin. Humans of all skin tones can wear it because it goes clear. Does not break my sensitive skin out. Does not smell like anything. Acts as a primer and keeps my makeup in place after selling at a farmers market (5hours), pool party and barbecue (4 hours) so 9 hours in total -- a total game changer for my oily, acne prone skin. Not even a regular makeup primer does that for me. Plus, I wasn't burnt at all in the Arizona heat. That AND it kept my makeup in place? I'm repurchasing as long as Supergoop! continues to make it.
The finish of the product is amazing - the spf questionable. I feel like a ton of sun made it’s way in.

This stuff is unbelievable! Living in Florida I need daily sunscreen. But since I’m really pale most make me even chalkier looking or with a ton of grease. This however is PERFECT! Fantastic finish that allows makeup to glide over.

This is one of the best primers I've ever used! It's an added bonus that it is spf 40 so that I don't even have to think about sun protection, it's automatic in my makeup routine. Perfect for the summer coming up!

No breakouts! No clogged pores! No greasy face! Doesn’t irritate the skin or sting the eyes. This is a winner for me!! I’ve been using it everyday for the past 2-3 weeks as the last step of my morning skin care routine. There is an unpleasant scent so it did take me a week before I stopped noticing it. I just wished it was more affordable. I would have given it 5 stars if the price was lower.
