Love the product and that it’s invisible. BUT for the price point I feel like it’s expensive and runs out quickly!
I am very impressed with this product. I have used the COOLA Mineral BB Cream for over two years and have loved it. This is a very close call. I even wore them both on my face (half
No white cast or sunscreen smell! It works perfectly! I would definitely repurchase time and time again!
This product was all I was looking for, skin absorbs it immediately and you can apply your makeup without problem. The texture feels really nice
Works great as a primer for makeup or to be used by itself. If you're re applying throughout the day it starts to ball up on your face but other than that I love this product

There are so many things that I love about this product! First, I love that it's SPF 40, as so many primers have much less protection. Secondly, I love that it absorbs quickly and isn't greasy at all. If you have more of an oily skin type, this product will work for you! Thirdly, I love that it's a primer and SPF combined. It's nice to cut out a step in my morning routine and to purchase one product instead of two!
Great product! Finally a SPF cream w/o grease and smell!!!!no smell, not overly oily, great to wear alone or under makeup. I will forever be buying this product!
This sunscreen broke me out however my husband loved it. It’s a little drying so I’d recommend using a great moisturizer underneath it.

This is now my go-to face sunscreen.  I have sensitive, combo skin and I know sunscreens are a must when it comes to skin care and healthy skin.  I've always had a problem with sunscreen either making my face greasy and my make up would slip off my face, or the sunscreen would give me a white cast, or it would make me break out in rashes.  However, this sunscreen is magic!  I don't need to use a primer for make up and my make up stays on perfectly.  It's lightweight, easy to apply and colorless.  My face doesn't look like a grease ball and I'm protecting my skin!  It doesn't have a fragrance, but it does have a faint sort of scent that goes away a minute or so after application.   I've used this for a month and so far, great protection, I don't need a primer, and no rashes.  This is a big win for me!

If you're looking for a makeup primer, this is totally it. If you're looking for something with more of a sunscreen consistency, back away slowly. If you've ever tried Smashbox's primers, the clear ones, I think it's called photo finish, that's exactly what this feels and looks like. I didn't enjoy the silky feeling, however, I can see how it would be great for people who wear a full face and still want the protection. I just wasn't a fan.
reviews.review_title: If you're looking for a primer, yes. Sunscreen, no

reviews.review_text: This stuff is absolutely wonderful. I hate sunscreens that leave me greasy or with a white cast. This sunscreen does neither of those things. It truly is unseen. It's very smoothing, like a foundation primer. I took this on a family vacation, and my entire family loved it. My brother even liked it, and he hates using sunscreen. This is the only sunscreen that I have found myself using every day, and I will definitely continue to repurchase it.

I find this to be pretty much untraceable. It’s a gel-like lightweight texture and sinks into the skin pretty quickly. However, I wore this for over a week and got 3 breakouts which isn’t very usual for me. I believe this made me breakout which is why I can’t recommend it.

it is ok product if you only use itself without foundation but with foundation, it leaves weird texture and doesn't have ablity to smooth skin surface. In the late day, if you touch face by accident, it totally leaves finger marks and skin looks very dull and pores looks even more noticeable.  In deed, if you use new powder, Becca hydra-mist set

This is a total 2-in-1 package. I scoured high and low for a good primer containing SPF. This sunscreen formula is translucent and glides on super silky. Like everyone says, no weird smell, not oily. Best of all, it's a perfect match for my Giorgio Armani Luminous Silk foundation - everything just goes on with smooth perfection.

After getting an extremely disappointing primer a little while ago, made all the worse by its hefty price tag, I'm all the more appreciative of this excellent product. It's crucial in my daily routine, even when I normally don't do a full face.

Definitely try it out.

it may be called Unseen, but all it did was make my zits seen. Wanted to love this but don't get it. First, it made me breakout ALL over. I even spread it down my neck and never breakout - and got zits all along my jawline too. I looked at the ingredients and all it is is pore-clogging dimethicone! I don't see why this is any different than hourglass' clear primer, with the exception of being in a cheap tube.
Best ever!  Awesome to use over daily moisturizer.  Keeps my skin from getting too greasy.  Makeup goes on great after applying this.
Great product, no breakouts, no white cast for my golden brown skin!! love it! supports all skin tones, a change in sunscreen!

I wanted to like this so much as I was going to add sunscreen to my daily regimen. It doesn’t make you feel like you were wearing sunscreen, doesn’t leave a white cast and not oily. However, everytime I use it, I breakout. My skin is sensitive and sadly this is not for me.
I like this sunscreen because it doesn’t feel like sunscreen, it’s very light. I been using it for a week now .

It doesn’t say it’s a primer but it seems that it works that way since it’s supposed to make a smoother surface to grip the makeup. It’s light, not tacky and has a very light scent which I prefer. It’s worth trying.

I cannot even begin to explain how much this product has changed my life. I bought this about a week ago and I already can't live without it. I have very dry sensitive red skin. Because I have rosacea, it is a necessity for me to put sunscreen on every morning. I had been using the Cera Ve sunscreen (which is terrible don't use it). It was thick and it looked terrible under makeup. Plus it gave me the worst white cast and I'm already very white. This does the EXACT opposite. It is completely clear so no cast. That alone is worth the money. ON TOP OF THAT, it is hands down one of the best makeup primers I've used. It has a consistency a lot like Photofinish primer. But better! In my opinion, it sinks into the skin quicker and better than the Smashbox one. Even without makeup your pores look so much smaller and your face feels BABY SOFT. I highly recommend this to all my rosacea girls out there and anyone who is looking for a good spf under their makeup!
reviews.review_title: Rosacea Girls! This is a MIRACLE!

reviews.review_text:
The idea is great, but sadly it did not work for me.  I found it pilled up over all of my skincare products.  I’ve actually had this same problem with the a couple
other Supergoop products, I should probably take that as a sign and stop trying.  Obviously still worth a try at least because of all the positive reviews.  I will be returning.
I bought this because none of the Fenty products have sunscreen. This solved my problem and doesn't leave a white cast. Truly invisible and no sunscreen smell. I need this supersized!

I have been using Supergoop! City Sunscreen Serum for years and loved it, so when this product came out I wanted to give it a try. This is hands down the best sunscreen product I have ever used. It goes on invisible and feels so lightweight. I wear it alone and under my foundation. It makes my face and neck look and feel incredibly soft and smooth.

I am in my mid-30s, mixed with medium tan skin, that is mostly dry except for a few sensitive, acne prone spots on my cheeks. I am recommending this product to all of my friends and family.

I have been looking for a great sunscreen that wasn't sticky or greasy forever. I avoided buying this despite the awesome reviews because I think the product name is stupid sounding and the packaging is ugly for the price.  I WAS SO WRONG. This stuff is fantastic. My skin feels silky and amazing and it doesnt negatively affect the wear of my makeup.
This product works great as a sunscreen and primer.  I have used it on mid-day hikes and it has really protected my face.
Best sunscreen for us oily queens, hands down! No ghostly residue. PERFECT!

I tried this out in the store because I heard great reviews. I has such a slippery gross feeling. It feels EXACTLY like the a silicone primer (ahem POREFESSIONAL BY BENEFITS). The second ingredient on the box is dimethicone so I'm not surprised. Would not recommend.

I'm so use to being able to tell if I'm wearing sunscreen, this was weird to get use to. Literally can't even feel it's there. I started by using to much at first to over compensate for the lack of goop sensation. It's very invisible too, feels like silk
I use this before working out and I assume it still works after I'm through, though dripping wet. It feels like a primer when it goes on the skin--very smooth.
Left a greasy layer on my skin that never absorbed and clogged my pores :/ it didn’t leave a white cast but the awful greasiness is not worth it

This sunscreen is amazing!! A little goes a long way, there's little to no scent when you first apply, it doesn't give you a white greasy cast, and best of all it helps with the oil production on my face! The only draw back that can be fixed is it does a have a tendency to pill, but only if you put it on immediately after applying moisturizer or foundation. If you give it a minute or two to settle in the skin it does not do that. You can't go wrong with this sunscreen, its very light on the face and easy to apply! I would recommend this to everyone who is looking for a great sunscreen!
reviews.review_title: The name of this product says it all!!

reviews.review_text: If you don't mind the feeling of the siliconey, dimethiconey feel on your face then this product is for you. I just don't like that feeling on my skin and for me, my oily skin seeps through as soon as I put it on. Do for me is probably a no. And also a little of this product goes a long way. Make sure to use a small amount when applying cause it will build up quickly.
reviews.review_title: On the fence for this one....

reviews.review_text: It's true that it's undetectable, smoothing, and doesn't look greasy. I was very excited about that. But it DOES smell. It's a chemical-like smell that lingers. I accidently licked above my lip and it was bad. I am on the fence about returning it.
reviews.review_title: Great and bad at the same time!!

reviews.review_text: Best sunscreen ever!!!!!! Everything about it is just perfect. Smooth finish just like primer. Not greasy and no whiteness. Finally something that my daughter can tolerate. She’s 4 and hates it when I put sunscreen on her so this helps because it’s not wet.
Couldn’t have wished for a better facial sunscreen! Some days I apply this under my makeup, but most days I just go barefaced—I wear sunscreen, and I’m out the door!

I never wore sunscreen daily until recently I’ve started investing in my skincare and my derm said it’s a must. I hated the feeling of the others I had tried. 

This product is amazing, I couldn’t wait to recommend to friends. It has the consistency of a primer (think Smashbox photofinish) but is 40spf!!! New must have in my beauty bag. Replaced my primer with this and get the added bonus of spf. Didn’t make my skin break out or leave residue.

I am so happy that this sunscreen works on my skin! I’ve always had the worst luck with facial sunscreen. I use to use only mineral sunscreen but my skin always reacted bad to it. That’s when I learned some skin types react better to chemical sunscreens over mineral, thus started my journey to find a safe chemical sunscreen. I love the feel of this sunscreen and I love that it just glides on and sinks in. I no longer have congested, bumpy, oily skin after a day of wearing sunscreen on my face. So so happy!
this is an excellent sunscreen I use it as a primer and I have no problem with it.  my skin is very oily and this products works well and doesn't cause breakouts on me.
Similar formular to but cheaper than Cover FX and Urban Decay
reviews.review_title: Unseen, non-greasy, best sunscreen so far

reviews.review_text:
This is it. This is the perfect sunscreen. Supergoop has done it. I'm calling it now that Unseen Sunscreen has just broken the final barrier of sunblock for all of us. 

A sunblock with strong spf, that does NOT 

1) make you pale/chalky
2) make you super greasy/shiny
3) Sit stickily on your skin and visibly in photos

Not only does it not do the above, which I NEVER THOUGHT POSSIBLE, it also comes with antioxidants and good stuff for the skin. 

It applies feeling EXACTLY like a primer, almost immediately feels invisible from the skin, gives a vague velvety blurring effect, and accepts makeup well. Whether it actually acts as a primer, I couldn't care less. I actually look forward to this as a final step to my skincare. I go through my entire day thinking constantly about how I DON'T FEEL IT. I wish I had one of those UV Lamps so I could prove to myself I was getting spf 40 coverage. It's literally that invisible and weightless. 

This sunscreen is incredible. It's honestly revolutionary in my eyes. I know, without a doubt, that this has changed the game of remembering / willing myself to apply sunblock every day completely. I know I'll put it on every day. There's no longer sacrifice, only benefit. 

I'm calling it now that this will be the new standard in sunblocks, that soon we will see a wave of every other sunblock manufacturer trying to achieve the same primer-like texture and weightless feel. Good. We're entering a new era of sunblock ladies, we've come a long, long weigh from the first release of Neutrogena Helioplex that I think we can all remember, and had already thought 'oh it can't get better than this'. 

Thank you supergoop. I'm in my late 20s, and it has never been more important to remember daily sunblock. With this, I know I will.

Although I knew that I needed SPF for my face all year round because it’s important I never wore it. I definitely tried looking and everything I used was a mess! Sticky white thick greasy miserable formulas that made my light combination skin breakout and look very oily which obviously ruined any makeup I wore. When I came across this I was so excited to try it! I LOVE IT! The texture is incredible (feels just like the Smashbox photo finish primer) and it’s not greasy! It didn’t irritate my sensitive skin and I had zero breakouts from it! It absorbs very quickly so it’s easy to include as part of your morning routine underneath makeup or just on its own after moisturizer. I use it as an SPF and still use a primer with makeup but I am curious to start using it as a primer and see if my makeup will last longer because that would cut a step out of my makeup rountine and it would make this product even more incredible!

This is an actual MUST to have in your self-care. Sun damage is the one thing that everyone should be concerned with, no matter how little someone thinks they spend in the sun. If I could recommend one product everyone should use every day it would be a face sunscreen - and this is the one they should use. The consistency is velvety and feels really good on the skin; It's not sticky or thick and has barely any scent. I have very sensitive skin so I was cautious on what product I was going to buy. I also have cut back on how often I wear makeup so I'm down to: a cleanser, toner, moisturizer, and this SPF.

This is an AMAZING sunscreen for those who haven't found their perfect one yet. I opted for this recently over a rebuy of another "invisible" sunscreen (which I enjoyed as well!) purely based on oz vs cost. I prefer this formula, higher SPF and it's smoothing
The only sunscreen that doesn’t break me out and leave a filmy residue - love it.

This primer is my new holy grail. It is what I had always wished the Smashbox Photo Finish primer was. It feels very silicone-y straight out of the tube, but just melts into the skin when applied. It also doesn’t ball up or do anything funky when you apply makeup over too. I never feel greasy or oily wearing this, and it keeps my makeup on all day. Plus the SPF is a great bonus! I highly recommend !

I’m an oily skin girl, acne prone and sensitive. I love this stuff. Goes on like velvet, doesn’t make my skin oily and controls my oil for a few hours. Most importantly doesn’t leave a white cast on my pretty brown skin.

I love this product! I purchased this the other day and I now use this as a primer. I hate wearing sunscreen and I have decently opted out of having sunscreen in my routine because it makes my skin oily and gives me a white-cast. This product is completely clear for a sunscreen and makes my skin feel very silky and smooth. I noticed my makeup applied well on top and my friend even said my face makeup looked very smooth and poreless. I have oily skin and this doesn’t exactly help me stay matte during the day but it doesn’t contribute to any more shine so this I love this!
absolutely love this product. it is so cool and works so well! i highly recommend to everyone! 10/10
Love this! Only sunscreen I’ll wear
Great for sensitive skin

This sunscreen is even better than expected! It works amazingly underneath makeup with no pilling whatsoever! It is also great to use without makeup due to the clear color and lack of residue. It is also odorless which is a huge plus for those like me who hate the typical sunscreen odor. Definitely adding Unseen to my everyday routine!
Love this sunscreen.  Dont even feel like im wearing it!
Amazing!!!! Because the sunscreen is matting and transparent there is no problem to apply under my makeup.
Love this- can use as a primer and my makeup goes on smoothly.  I have Rosacea and this does not mess with my skin.
This sunscreen does everything the information says it does.  It goes on light and is a good base for makeup.
that's awesome, I've never got this experience, very comfy

The texture of this sunscreen is light, silky smooth, weightless on the skin. It's most like a gel, but finer and a little goes a long way.  It's invisible and so far doesn't sweat off and sting my eyes.  the best face sunscreen I've used - I love it!

I love this. It is amazing! I use to never wear sunscreen, because some are either greasy or there’s white cast. But this changed my mind, it’s as if nothing is there! It’s lightweight and it melts right onto your skin!
Love it! Its a non-sticky gel like lotion that goes on like primer does. So smooth and not oily or greasy. Highly recommend!!

This sunscreen/primer is great. It feels slightly oily when you first apply it but it dries to an almost powder feeling and dries very quickly. It doesn’t have any sunscreen smell which is such a relief. I also feel like my makeup has been staying on better than with other primers or sunscreens I have used. I normally have oily skin and this doesn’t make me break out or get any more oily than I do normally! I use this every day and have been loving it!

Perfect. Zero white cast, so it’s amazing for darker skin. When I first tried it I was a bit worried because it felt like the smashbox primer which feels oily on my skin. But if you just keep rubbing it in it kind of absorbs and becomes completely matte. Usually I’m skeptical about skincare that makes primer claims, but this actually feels like a silicone based primer. Doesn’t break me out at all, I’ll be using this for as long as they make it!
Silicone mess! Sadly this was a big miss. I hate sillocones and didn’t realize this was just a silicone spf. Clogged pores everywhere. It just reminded me of a primer. Not a moisturizer by any means.

This should be called Unreal Unseen Sunscreen, because that is exactly what it is, UNREAL!! 
I love this stuff! It is amazing. It truly feels like you aren’t wearing a thing. It is incredibly sheer, light and glides on like butter! No white residue, no flaking and no oily feeling on the skin. 
This product is truly revolutionary in the sun care game! The best product out there when it comes to sun protection.

5 STARS!!!!!!! It’s really hard to find a good sunscreen to wear under makeup. This one is amazing! It glides on your skin! It almost feels like a fancy makeup primer. Its clear and absorbs fast. Has a silk matte finish. It’s not oily! Which is a major plus for me because I’m super oily in my t-zone after 2-3 hrs. I can’t say if it really protects from sun burn because I haven’t been out in direct sun. I’ll test it during summer time by the pool. But I do know it mixes well with makeup and hasn’t broken my face out. Yay!!! Everyone knows how sunscreens bring a pimple or 2 every time you put it on your face. Ladies, don’t hesitate. Try this!

I got this as a sample. I absolutely hate using anything that has sunscreen in it because they’re just so thick and heavy. Which isn’t good for my oily skin. But this. This thing here is so lightweight!! It has changed my outlook on using spf. I barely feel it on my skin and it’s super matte. I highly recommend!

This is the best sunscreen I've ever used!  The consistency is almost gel like and goes on smoothly.  It doesn't leave a greasy film like other sunscreens and does not make my skin oilier throughout the day like other sunscreens do.  A must for all!

Not for extremely dry skin. I really wanted to love this sunscreen. No white cash, not greasy and does not make you feel oily like other sunscreen do. It made my skin more dry, and Im already using  FAB intense hydration. Specially when youre outdoors with a cold wind. I’ll probably give this another shot in spring and summer. But this thing is awesome for normal-oily skin.
I have been looking for the best sunscreen and I found it with this product. It also works a an amazing primer leaving my skin as the best canvas for makeup.

I love this product! I have tried many other Spf’s and this one is the best! It goes on smooth, and invisible and very lighweight...I’m going to be ordering my 2nd bottle, even though I still have product left in my first one, I just don’t want to run out! I would love to see them make a Unseen Sunscreen Broad Spectrum in a spray to set the makeup throughout the day since this only last for 2 hours...I would definitely buy that also!

This is seriously such a cool product!! The texture of the sunscreen is very similar to the Maybelline Baby Skin Instant Pore Eraser primer. It has the faintest smell of sunscreen for a short while but it goes away quickly. As a very fair person, I don’t have to worry about sunscreen showing up too white on my skin, however I can confirm that it is completely clear once applied. This is such a useful product to have because protecting your skin from the sun, even in the colder months, is still essential. If you are susceptible to sunburns or just like to take extra precaution, this is a great product to have at your disposal.
This sunscreen really is invisible and mattifies the face making it a perfect primer for anyone with oily skin and pore issues!

LOVE! This Supergoop! product is amazing.  It's such a great primer for my face and feels great on (not like sunscreen at all!)   In my 30's, sun protection has become a top priority and I find the Unseen Sunscreen to work well with my skin (I also love to City Serum and CC cream).

I love this sunscreen SO much! I received this as a complimentary gift from Supergoop! to test out and am thrilled to find a high-SPF primer that doesn’t leave any white cast (it’s actually clear!) and doesn’t pill under makeup or over moisturizer -  it worked beautifully with both. Plus, there is no gross sunscreen scent – it is totally odorless. Talk about a dream come true! The only downside I found was that it didn’t play well with face oils. Bottomline: This has already become a new staple in my morning routine. It has me thinking of those long summer days ahead!

I've tried a variety of sunscreens, from LaRoche to the coveted sunscreens from Asia, and this blows all of them out of the water! I have 12-hour work days and my face never fails to be oily at the end of the day no matter what mattifying anything I've put on my face, I had pretty much just accepted it. But ever since I started using this, my face is not oily at all, even through sweating, working, etc. When it comes out of the tube it's clear, and disappears completely into my skin, no residue at all or silicone-y texture. It goes on beautifully even after all my serums, and works well under my primer
. I have finally found my holy grail sunscreen.
Love this sunscreen! It's so not greasy, feels weightless. Goes on clear and is the perfect primer before make-up! Its so soft and leaves your skin feeling that way too!
I wanted to love this based on the great reviews; however, it clogged my pores and caused me to break out. Beware if you are sensitive to silicones!

I love this sunscreen because it’s oil-free and great for daily use. I’ve been using it as a makeup primer after my moisturizer and it’s one of the best primers I’ve used - especially because it has so many additional benefits and you’d never know it was an SPF product.

I had never wanted to wear sunscreen everyday until this product. I KNOW. that sounds insane. But i mean it! You cannot tell you are wearing it, it is the opposite of other sunscreens I have tried in all of the best ways. NOT oily and INVISIBLE. epic.
Definitely a staple  I don’t break out and doesn’t cause flashback

This reminds me of the cover fx sunscreen except this is better. They are probably the same formula but this 
1. you get more product
2. it's cheaper
3. It's very smooth on the skin
4. invisible 
5. fantastic for deeper skin tones
6. No flashback even with sunscreen in it
7. works great as a primer since it fills in pores and blurs
8. it's a squeeze tube and not a pump. the cover fx pump always clogs and there's no way of opening it to get any of that product out

I highly recommend this and will be buying this instead of cover fx

Love love loveeeeee.  One of the best sunscreen I have ever used!  No white residue!  doesn’t irritate my skin or my eyes. Feels great on the skin. Doesn’t feel oily which is a plus!  Definitely recommend this sunscreen!

I just used this Unseen sunscreen on my trip to Australia and LOVED it! The sun is really strong this time of year, I wore this everyday under my regular make up and never got burned! It is lightweight, not too oily, and I didn't have to add extra sunscreen on top of my make up. Thanks, Supergoop!
This stuff is DREAMY! Oil free, weightless

So far I am loving this. As a black woman it's really hard to find a sunscreen that won't leave a white cast. It's also hard to find a sunscreen that works well with with makeup and my moisturizer.  So far this is doing great and I will be keeping it around.
reviews.review_title: Finally A Sunscreen Truly For All Skintones

reviews.review_text:
I love love love this sunscreen! Feels like nothing and looks like nothing! Bigger and cheaper than the Cover FX one I was using too. 
My ONLY complaint is is that it pills a little under my makeup. I’m going to try and leave it on a bit longer without applying foundation. But oh well! Still an awesome sunscreen. I’ve always been a big fan of Supergoop.

A  for Supergoop! with Unseen!! There are so many great things about this product. I love that not only is it totally invisible it's so lightweight and I can wear under my CC cream and bronzer without my skin feeling totally heavy. It's  also so natural and doesn't feel oil-ly at all, which I NEED for a primer!! Most primers are super irritating and smell weird... Unseen is not!! LOVE, love love!!

Love, love, LOVE. This is what I have been waiting for as a black woman. I love protecting my skin from the sun but I hate sunscreen because it is always so white. Unseen is brilliant as it goes on light and clear, you don't even know it is there. It is also perfect for priming make up. I also love that it doesn't smell. How do you even make something like this? Super cool, you have to try it!
I love love this product! I am so happy that I have finally found a product that is weightless and works as a perfect primer with SPF!!

I love this sunscreen!! It’s truly invisible, non irritating and works as a wonderful primer too!  I’ve been using it a few days and my foundation (which doesn’t have spf) has never gone on better. I can’t recommend this highly enough!

LOVE. Nearly forgot to write this review because this sunscreen is so out of site, out of mind as soon as you put it on. It feels almost like a moisturizing serum-clear, absorbs quickly and leaves no residue. Also fun fact I just learned: you need to wear sunscreen even in winter!!
Love this so much!!! Perfect primer!  Does not interact  with make up or moisturizer. Goes on light and soft.  Completely disappears into the skin.  It is pretty amazing that this is sunscreen.
reviews.review_title: Love this perfect primer with great SPF protection

is the unseen sunscreen mineral sunscreen??

answers.answer: There is two unseen sunscreens. One is mineral and one is not. I think they make both

questions.question: is this safe for teenagers with dry skin 14-18

answers.answer: Yes. This is a teen friendly sunscreen.

questions.question: I have been using this and it was spf 40 PA    did they change it to non PA   ?

Is this product good for people who don't wear makeup?  I am super fair skinned and burn in minutes outside (I normally wear more than double this SPF for myself) and I don't wear makeup.  What is the finish like?

answers.answer: I tried this because I am like you and I liked it! You just have to reapply it every 40 minutes to an hour!

questions.question: Is it good for 9 year olds and Would it break you out.

answers.answer: it's a very gentle sunscreen and makes my skin feel very soft, so yes
I don’t burn easily.but like when you go to the pool everyone wears sunscreen and so this might be the match for you so try it out and see love!

love you should wear sunscreen even if your not going out and it doesn’t have to be this one, i personally hated it bc it felt so siliconish like i wouldnt recommend it, if your gonna get a sunscreen get the inisfree sunscreen! its so good and leaves no absolute white cast and leaves the skin glowing

questions.question: is this worth it? I got a mini of it and it worked but I wanna know if there's a better sunscreen for a cheaper price point

answers.answer: There’s a cheaper “dup” at Trader Joe’s, but the texture is a bit different. It’s got some sort of melting beads in the product and the formula is a squich bit more oily and maybe a touch less blurring. It’s worth a try given the price, but tbh, I’m coming back to the Supergoop formula. A friend described the TJs one as the best sunscreen you’ve ever tried, if you’ve never had the Supergoop version. I hope this helps!

questions.question: Can I get this even tho I am 12 is it good for my skin

answers.answer: That should be fine! It’s just sunscreen, which is very good for your skin.

questions.question: Does an 11 year old need to wear sunscreen everyday even if it's cloudy and cold? Cause I'm 11 and I start to wear some sunscreen in the start of spring/ summer but I see older people wear it everyday but does it matter what age you are?

answers.answer: The rough rule of thumb is if you can see outside (sans manmade light ofc), then there’s UVA/UVB rays. Cloudy or cold, if you can see by the sun, then damaging rays are coming through the atmosphere. Clouds don’t filter out the stuff that gives you cancer.

Everybody should wear sunscreen every single day! It is very good for your skin and helps protect your skin against the suns rays, which are not great for your skin because they damage the natural skin barrier. Even if it is cold outside, there is still sun. Wearing sunscreen every day at an early age can help make your skin smoother and younger looking when you are older. That being said, there are more affordable options that could be just as good as supergoop but for cheaper.

Yes  people should wear sunscreen no matter their age.  You have to protect your skin starting when you�  re young so you don�  t develop sun damage  (which you won�  t see until your older). Hope that helps.

questions.question: is this a water based product?

answers.answer: It seems like it is a silicone-based product based on the ingredients list

questions.question: Is this a primer???

answers.answer: It is a sunscreen with a texture that works well for priming the skin for makeup.

questions.question: How is this considered ?clean? when the first 3 listed ingredients are labeled as ingredients to avoid in sunscreen?

answers.answer: The problem with 'clean' is that it is not a regulated term, so companies and brands can come up with their own list of 'clean' ingredients. However, sunscreen active ingredients in the US are regulated by the FDA as a drug. All of the sunscreens in this product are approved, which is likely why they are not on Sephora's 'bad' list.

questions.question: Is it good to use just by itself , without the makeup ? Can we layer it with our moisturizer & serum during the day as well ? How to layer it ?

answers.answer: This works great with makeup - it acts as a the perfect primer. The consistency is different than most sunscreens. You can definitely layer it. Wash face, toner, serum, moisturizer, Super Goop Unseen Sunscreen, then makeup.

questions.question: Normally moisturizer is put on after sunscreen and primer is put on moisturizer. Should I put this product on after after or before moisturizer since it’s a primer and sunscreen?

answers.answer: This should be your last beauty step. Moisturize, Supergoop SPF, then makeup (since this is also a primer).

Steps should be moisturizer, sunscreen, and then primer, in that order. You should also wait the dermatologist recommended 8 minutes (or more, depending on how heavy your moisturizer is) after applying moisturizer to let it sink in, before applying sunscreen. Sunscreen is considered the very last step of your skincare routine, and primer is the first step of makeup. This product combines sunscreen and primer into one step, so just apply after your moisturizer has absorbed. In my experience, this also keeps the pilling issue some reviewers have mentioned from happening.

questions.question: Is this primarily primer, sunscreen or both? Can it be used in place of primer? In place of moisturizer? Does makeup (foundation, powder) go on directly after? Thank you!

answers.answer: It's primarily a sunscreen, but it works as a primer as well. I recommended using a moisturizer before, then applying the product. After applying the sunscreen, you can either use another primer or go straight into foundation.
Both a primer and sunscreen. I've cut out primer now that I use this. I cleanse, moisturize, apply this, and then do my makeup.

questions.question: Does anyone have a problem with this sunscreen pilling? I?ll be applying my makeup and see small amounts of sunscreen rolling off

answers.answer: Helpful techniques are #1 Make sure you?ve waited 8 minutes or more after applying your moisturizer before applying sunscreen. (This is important not just to prevent pilling, but because applying chemical sunscreen on top of another product that has not fully absorbed interferes with the chemical film the sunscreen needs to form on your skin to work effectively and protect you.) #2 When the sunscreen is on your fingers, tap it in dots over the main points of your face using one finger ?cheeks, chin, forehead, etc. From there, use all of your fingers to pat it in like you would a toner or serum. Only after this should you then use a rubbing motion to move it to any places you didn?t fully cover with the patting. This minimizes the physical action and friction of spreading it and prevents pilling.

Sometimes sunscreen pills when mixing with certain products already on your skin. Take a look at what serums you're layering. For example, anything with silicone is going to do that, I found out it wasn't playing well with my Azelaic Acid, so now I just do that at night.
hi guys!! try mixing it with your moisturizer before applying...i mix it up together in my palms before putting it on - no pilling problems after that. :)

questions.question: Is this sunscreen chemical free?

answers.answer: Nothing is chemical free. Water is H2O. The oxygen that we breathe is a chemical. The glucose that our cells burn for power is a chemical, etc. if you are really asking if this is a chemical versus a physical sunscreen, then it is a chemical sunscreen.

You can search for specific ingredients and there properties at - https://www.ewg.org/skindeep/

Definitely the formulations to protect against UVA and UVB are farm less harmful than the sun's UVA and UVB rays themselves, which are associates with premature aging as well as skin cancer such as melanoma..  There is no naturally derived substance that is a sunscreen unless you put zinc on your skin (aka Desitin), which acts as a physical barrier to the sun's rays.
Literally everything is a chemical, so no. This is a "chemical" sunscreen, aka an inorganic filter.
